Manager Response: Dear mrwhit250,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We apologize that there was some miscommunications when it came to the availability of our amenities and the service provided by our front desk staff. We would like to hear more about your experience as we use your feedback to train and coach our employees whenever possible. If you have any details regarding your experience with the front desk you may reach out to me at 714.825.3333 x 1985.

Summary: The hotel is nice but the people aren’t. First they double charged us on our card, then charged us of 100 bucks each night, and would not give us the breakfast we requested. Would not recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear N229TXjoshuap,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We apologize that the service provided to you by our staff was below our standards and your expectations. We strive to provide the best customer service possible to all guests and I'm sorry to hear we failed. We will follow up with our teams with proper training to ensure we address your concerns. Again, thank you for your review and we do hope you will find it in your heart to stay with us again when you are back in the area.

Summary: We came in late for a soccer tournament and Nikki at the front desk was so amazing, friendly and thoughtful!!!! Offered water & cookies as well as accommodated a different room than what was booked due to a change of plans!!!  Truly an asset to your company!! She made our late night checkin painless!!
Manager Response: I am so glad Nikki was so welcoming and helpful. We do find her a wonderful asset to our Front Desk and glad you did as well.  We know that those late night check ins can be rough, I am glad it was a good experience for you.

Summary: Judi & Sheila were very polite, pleasant and very professional. I couldn't ask for better customer service. The is very clean and comfortable. There us plenty of parking in the lower level. Thank you ladies!
Manager Response: We are so glad you had an enjoyable experience here at the Doubletree. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Please come back soon.

Summary Heading: Need lots of improvement and training
Summary: 1. Request 4 bath towels, only can offer 2 because they ran out (no bath towels in the bath room at all) 2. Next night need shampoo, they gave me 9 conditioners, but no shampoo available. 3. Found collar pin on the floor, my kids almost stepped on it. 4. Toilet stuck, took one hour for maintenance show up after three phone calls. 5. Last, no cookies when checkin (not important to me)
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We apologize that the lack of amenities and issues with our facilities made for an unpleasant stay. We greatly appreciate your insight and have shared this with our team to motivate improvement efforts and better our service delivery. We know you deserve better and hope you accept our deepest apologies for not delivering the outstanding stay you deserve. We sincerely hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us the opportunity to show you our improvements and deliver a more rewarding stay.

Summary: My first and last time staying at a Double Tree Hotel. Horrible experience! Rude staff, dirty elevators, weird smells in the hallways, dusty pool (if you can call it that), dirty work on room, dirty room.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor, although we wished it were under different circumstances.    We are sorry that you found our hotel pool and elevators in need of service.  On top of that, the service provided at the by the team was below expectations made your stay less enjoyable.  We appreciate the insight and will follow up with our team members and appropriate departments to address your concerns. Thank you for letting us know.  Again, thank you for your review and we do hope you will find it in your heart to stay with us again when you are back in the area.

Summary: We "stayed" there last weekend.  The reason I have "stayed" in quotation marks is because we had to check out at midnight b/c the front desk never sent us 1) any towels, 2) pillows and 3) someone to fix the toilet.   It was literally a craphole room.  We checked in around 5pm and asked for the towels and pillows at 530pm.   Then asked again at 630pm then left for dinner and asking the front desk to have the towels and pillows be left in the room.  Came back at 9pm and asked the front desk again.  Called at 10pm and asked again.  Went down at 1030pm only to be told that they would send WHEN THEY CAN BECAUSE THEY ONLY HAD ONE PERSON WORKING.   At midnight we said forget it and went to the Westin down the street that had pillows, towels and a working toilet.    NEVER EVER AGAIN.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We're truly sorry to hear your stay did not live up to our standard.  Although we were experiencing a short staffing issue, it does not justify poor service. We apologize this experience and lack of amenities forced you to relocate to another property. We would like to gather more information from you to ensure you weren't billed for this night. Please contact me at your earliest convenience at gpatino@doubletreeocairport.com or 714-825-3333 x 1985. We would like the opportunity to Make it Right. Thank You.

Summary: The stay was good minus the parking fee. Unfortunate as a Hilton Honors member that they don’t waive parking and resort fees. The room was in good shape. Did a good job with cleaning protocols. Great location as I was getting my son from UC Irvine.
Manager Response: We are very glad that you found us a convenient hotel while visiting UC irvine. We do take great care in the cleaning and maintaining of our rooms and I am happy they were to your liking.

Summary: Sheila, front desk " multitasking wizard "... A perfect representative of Hilton.. should be working for concierge at a Hilton resort....without doubt..ask for Sheila for a civilized check in experience "NO JOKE"...
Manager Response: We agree with you that Sheila is a wonderful representative for us and we are glad you found her so helpful.  Thank you for taking the time to compliment her. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Nice hotel but there’s absolutely no place to walk your dog. The parking is a bit crowded and late at night people were just parking in the check in area and leaving there cars. I checked in on line but the room I picked wasn’t available so that was a waist of time.
Manager Response: Dear Rainrun,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor.  Our hotel has recently transitioned to becoming a "pet friendly" property as we did not allow pets in the past. There are some learning opportunities that come with this addition such as providing guests with a map of suggested walking areas for their pets. We thank you for that feedback.  We apologize that not having this information made for an unpleasant stay as well as the parking situation and the digital key issue. We will address with our teams to ensure the arrival experience is pleasant for our guests. Thank you again for your constructive criticism.

Summary: Good location. However, digital key did not work. Had to get regular key to get in room. No recognition at check in.  No cookies.  Elevators are slow and must be old. Room was okay and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear terrysQ8663LE,  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that your arrival experience was less than perfect. We know that as a loyal Hilton Honors member you come to expect a certain standard and its disappointing to hear that we failed. We appreciate your feedback as this helps us grow and improve the service we provide, especially to our Hilton Honors members. Again, thank you for the constructive criticism and hope to greet you again in the near future ( with a warm DoubleTree cookie).

Summary Heading: GOOD VIBES..... Love the fountain in front
Summary: This is by far one of my fav rooms when visiting a college friend I was greeted and offered so many amenities, great customer service by Natasha she is a sweetheart, it seems like the experience becomes better each stay. Breakfast Resturant for evening shopping close by nail salon across way with hair salon good amenities and the cookies we all know the cookies are everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review! We are happy you enjoyed the hotel amenities and the location fit your needs. We are glad Natasha was able to provide you with such great service. We look forward to seeing you soon, and of course we will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: I really liked the hotel. Nice amenities and the service was really good. The room was also great with a nice bed and shower and we enjoyed our stay. Parking was also easy and very manageable. Atmosphere was welcoming.
Manager Response: So happy you felt welcome and comfortable during your stay. I am glad that you enjoyed the amenities our hotel has to offer and that our parking was easy for you.

Summary: Nice Clean Hotel.  Had unseen travel issues.  Front desk (Natasha) went above and beyond to help us with our situation.  This hotel has been able to conveniently take care of my family in a pinch as we travel across the country. Thanks Natasha!  Thanks Double Tree.
Manager Response: We are so happy we were able to take care of you and your family while traveling.  Traveling can be stressful and we are glad Natasha and the rest of our staff could make it smoother for you. Please come back and visit soon.

Summary: My family and I recently visited Santa Ana, CA, and we stayed at the Doubletree by Hilton Hotel on E. MacArthur Blvd. Our stay was FANTASTIC! Not only was the hotel gorgeous and clean, the staff and service was outstanding. Judi and Nicole were attentive, professional, knowledgeable, and approachable. Our rooms were spacious and the beds are super comfortable. Breakfast was delicious and those Doubletree cookies are mouthwatering. This hotel is my top pick whenever I’m in Orange County. Definitely 5 stars!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and the 5 stars! I am so glad we were able to provide you with and amazing visit to the Doubletree Santa Ana. We look forward to your return to the Doubletree, will have the warm cookies waiting.

Summary: My son was in a 3 day basketball tournament. The room was ok, I couldn’t really get the AC to stay on. Pillows were uncomfortable to me. The lighting in the bathroom very dim. The pool was a very tiny!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Yaz was extremely helpful and super attentive. I was immediately helped as soon as I came. She was very friendly and engaging. I had a concern and she was quick to take care of everything. Will definitely return! I
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went to the DoubleTree for an event from my apartment complex, located across the street. Great restaurant, sports bar. They had a giant projector playing the Laker game. They also had a pool table, ping pong table, and shuffle board. Food was great and the cocktails were amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They offered us cookies and water right after checking in, they were very friendly & nice and I thought it was sweet they made a funny joke to my little one! They made us feel very comfortable! Very pleased and satisfied!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms smell like cigarette smoke, cafe never had an attendant, breakfast never arrived, AC thermostat did not work. Completely understaffed in every area. No room cleaning while you stay. No mask enforcement.
Manager Response: Hello CPC411,  First and foremost, thank you very much for providing your candid feedback. While I am extremely disappointed to read about your experience during your stay, I appreciate you informing us of the areas of improvement.  I sincerely apologize for the experience; I would love the opportunity to speak with you to allow the opportunity to make the stay right. Please feel free to reach out to me, my contact information is listed below.  Thank you once again, and I truly hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely, Jason Cure General Manager DoubleTree Santa Ana – Orange County Airport Email: jcure@doubletreeocairport.com Hotel: 714-825-3333

Summary: Great service good parking deal, first time in San Diego can’t wait to play tennis and go for a swim at the beach, I hope things go well and the weather is good, really trying to eat a lot of ice cream
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great visit thank you Judi for being helpful. I enjoyed my stay. And will definitely recommend to come back and stay with you again. You were very helpful and made me decide to take another night I can't wait to try the food at the restaurant and enjoy a drink as well.  Thank you again to all the staff you are all great. Great location,
Manager Response: none

Summary: So there’s two Doubletree’s right by the John Wayne Airport. The other one is find but the 201 E MacArthur location is the spot to be at!!  The front desk staff was very professional and accommodating(especially Judi!!). They have the best post Covid breakfast going, delicious hot options delivered right to your room. The bar/restaurant is fully operational and an excellent spot to watch sports games, huge projectors, with a shuffleboard table. Comfortable feeling walking into your thats it’s actually been thoroughly cleaned and they didn’t just slap a sticker on the remote.  All at a very reasonable rate! Highly recommend this Doubletree!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and recommendation!  We do pride ourselves on being professional and accommodating and are glad that this came through to you. I am glad you appreciated our breakfast and our restaurant. We do take care in the cleaning and sanitizing of rooms. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Our stay at the Doubletree started with a ? As the name of the hotel is actually the Doubletree Club by Hilton. That fact never showed on any of our correspondence. Once we were sure that is what we wanted, the stay was pleasant.  Clean, tastefully decorated, it was fine. Oddly, the hallway was quite dark. Both at night and during the day. No breakfast due to Covid. Quiet location, lake view is a plus!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great visit thank you Kim for being helpful. We enjoyed our stay. And will definitely recommend to come back and stay with you again. Thank you again to all the staff you are all great. Great location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our staff, especially Kim. We take great pride in our staff providing helpful service and we are happy they made your stay more enjoyable. Please come back soon.

Summary: Thank you Judi and Kim for taking such great care of me and my family while we were staying at your hotel. You went out of your way to make us feel welcome and helped us get all the little extras that make an overnight stay special.  Ed
Manager Response: I am so glad we could make your stay at the Doubletree special! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. We would love to have you and your family back anytime.

Summary: I stayed here to save time driving to the airport. It’s a really nice lobby and exterior but the rooms are a little bit on the dated side. Parking is pretty wild too and they charge $22 for a parking pass saying it’s to keep out the shoppers from across the road, yeah ok. Cookies are a positive side of staying here haha and of course Judi at the front desk is a doll
Manager Response: We are glad you found us a convenient location to get to the airport. Thank you for writing your review and comeback soon. We will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: I was having one of those days where you just want to stay in bed and hide from everyone. Which I would have done if my apartment didn't flood and ruin everything I had. So I had to get a room at the Hilton and Nikki was really supportive and helped me at every turn. I was finally able to relax take a bath and get some peace of mind. Thank you so much
Manager Response: We here at the Doubletree know how much some peace of mind can be worth and  I am happy we were able to provide a relaxing stay for you during the stressful time with your apartment. We look forward to seeing you soon, hopefully for a less stressful reason.

Summary: So much effort was demonstrated by Judi to make sure my long day ended on a comfortable and positive note. She anticipated my needs. It was very nice and certainly my experience was above and beyond my expectations. Great!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to comment on your hotel experience. We strive to make sure that every guest need is anticipated and met.   I am happy we could make a long day better.

Summary: From the moment you arrive the hotel does a fantastic job making you feel welcome. Kim was extremely accommodating at the service desk with our check in, especially having a dog with us. Room was extremely clean making us feel comfortable with our stay.
Manager Response: We are delighted we could welcome both you and your dog for a stay at the Doubletree. Thank you for taking the time to recognize our staff and especially Kim. We strive to make every guest feel welcome and comfortable.

Summary: Nice clean room. Comfy beds. Enjoyed the weather. Hotel was pretty close to work. Great service and hospitality. Nice people in the front desk. They were able to help out with direction and place to eat in the location.
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to write such a nice review. I am happy you found the rooms clean and comfy; and that our staff accommodated your needs.

Summary: Sunday service was incredible, I never felt so welcome and warm and fuzzy. We had an elderly woman greet us with such hospitality as we were booking in. Whether or not she knew where she was, I could tell her heart was in the right place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed the service and the welcome held here at the Doubletree.

Summary: Natasha was very nice and helpful. She accommodated our stay. There was a SUNDAY service, never seen that before at a hotel, very nice for the family. There is a pool, hot tub and a gym. All very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize Natasha, I am happy she was so helpful and accommodating.  it is great you were able to enjoy our pool and hot tub.

Summary: The hotel looks great the rooms are nice, the staff is awesome, I will keep coming back for sure. Their restaurant was open, so was their pool. The service was great and the rooms are clean and spacious. This place exceeded my expectations.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, we appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We pride ourselves on our great staff and we are happy they were able to provide you with such good service. We look forward to you staying with us soon.

Summary: Great service friendly and very very helpful love staying here every time I travel can't wait for my next trip always very clean and dependable nice staff as well never any hassle with the people here and staff
Manager Response: So grateful that you found our staff so helpful and took the time to write a nice review. Thank you for staying with us and we can't wait either until the next time returns, see you soon.

Summary: Checked in today with Natasha she was helpful and welcoming 😊 ☺. The room is nice and clean, parking was easy. Very nice and clean hotel. Bounes Natasha gave us fresh baked cookies 🍪 😋 can't go wrong
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize Natasha and I am happy she could be so helpful to you!  We are glad you appreciate the extra measures we are taking during Covid, to maintain a clean hotel. You are right the cookies are definitely a bonus, we'll have some waiting for you nest time.

Summary: Great customer service!!! Natasha was very helpful and able to answer all my questions. Very clean room and beautiful place to stay.  It's our first time here and we will be staying here again!!   It's the best.
Manager Response: We pride ourselves in having great customer service and we are glad Natasha was so helpful and able to answer your questions.  We appreciate that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return to the Doubletree.

Summary: First room we checked into had a foul smell. Hair in tub, stains on tub floor and what looked like old urine that had been splashed up on the toilet seat cover and not cleaned. Immediately notified front desk and 15 minutes later they sent someone up with keys to a room right next door. We check that room out, room okay, ISH. Restroom had hair in it ALSO. found toenail clippings on the floor. Front desk clerk who checked us in was super quiet but very kind. When i notified the front desk once we found the clippings she immediately offered to transfer us even though it was a bit late in the evening. Staff was super awesome, I just think its a lack of care from the housekeepers sadly and in the end that falls into the hands of the entire staff. Once they transferred us again,
Manager Response: Briannamuniz23,  First and foremost, I sincerely apologize for the experience you had during your stay in Santa Ana. As you can imagine, reading your review was a huge disappointment to us. We take immense pride in not only our hotel but more importantly the level of service we provide. Therefore, as the General Manager, I felt compelled to respond to the review.   I would love the opportunity to personally speak to you and ensure that we not only make this right and exceed your expectations, but in addition address all the issues you mentioned. My contact information is listed below.   I sincerely apologize for the experience you had, and I hope to speak to you soon.  Jason Cure  General Manager  DoubleTree Santa Ana – Orange County Airport  Direct Line: 714-442-1908 Email: jcure@doubletreeocairport.com

Summary: Judi From The Front Desk Helped Out With Finding My Reservation And The Hotel Was Very Clean And Staff Was Very Helpful And Respectful. Will Definitely Stay Here Again Whenever I Am Back In Town For A Couples Night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review. We appreciate you taking the time to comment about our staff and hotel. We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: Excellent stay at Double Tree. Judi in the front desk is  friendly and informative. She reassured me on questions I had. The room is clean and good size. Comes with a small refrigerator which is very handy. The bed is super comfortable. Slept like a baby! Nice sit down area. There’s a coffee bar as well as a restaurant with a nice bar. There’s a subscription to YouTube and Netflix. Free WiFi.I would definitely recommend staying here.   The only downside you have to pay for parking. About $20 a day.
Manager Response: That's wonderful that your stay at the Doubletree was so comfortable and you enjoyed your room. Thank you for recognizing our restaurant and coffee bar, we so glad we could accommodate you needs.

Summary: I got a room for my boyfriend and I for his birthday. We were welcomed by Natasha and she’s so sweet. She answered all of our questions and never hesitated to make us happy. She had tons of great suggestions and we were so happy to stay here!
Manager Response: It is so nice you were able to celebrate the birthday here at the Doubletree. We think Natasha is terrific too and we are glad she was able to make your birthday trip enjoyable.

Summary: The room was clean. The staff was Friendly and helpful. The hotel was not very crowded, felt safe and comfortable. Close to a lot of restaurants and shopping. Best part is of course the cookies, gotta love cookies.
Manager Response: We always want our guests to feel safe and comfortable, so it is wonderful that that was achieved for you. We also work hard to achieve a high standard of cleanliness and glad that you appreciated that.

Summary: Smooth service and positive experience during my stay. Maggie at the front desk was especially helpful. Will stay again! The room was very clean. The key card didn’t work with the parking entrance/exit which was annoying but besides that all good.
Manager Response: A smooth stay and a positive experience is something we strive for and I am delighted the Doubletree accomplished that for you. We are happy Maggie could be so helpful.  I am sorry you had issues with your key card but glad that didn't cause to many issues. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Beautiful room and such hospitable staff! Kim at the front desk was such a treasure—she was helpful with absolutely everything we needed and went above and beyond everyy time! Would 10/10 stay there again!!
Manager Response: Your title of legendary customer service is a wonderful way to describe our staff, thank you! We think Kim is a treasure also, thank you for taking the time to right such a wonderful review. Come back soon.

Summary: My husband always brings me here when he has to work nearby and we love it here. The rooms are huge and they’re always very clean. They’re Covid protocol makes us feel safe. The staff is always very helpful and friendly. Natasha is our favorite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our hotel and Natasha. I am glad to hear that the Covid measures we have put into place make you feel safe, we work hard to maintain a clean safe environment for our guests.

Summary: Amazing hotel in a great spot! Super upscale with amazing staff! My rooms have always been great! Views are decent. The restaurant has great service. They are very welcoming. Parking is expensive like the rest of California, but that's how it is on a protected garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate that our staff is able to accommodate all of your needs and make you feel welcome.  It is nice to finally have our restaurant open and I am glad you enjoyed it.

Summary: Great experience! Stayed in the area for work several times at different hotels- this is by far the best. Kim at the front desk was extremely nice and helpful. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfy.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had a great experience at the Doubletree, thank you for taking the time to right a review.  I am glad Kim was so helpful and able to take good care of you.

Summary: Doubletree by Hilton in Santa Ana was a lovely stay. I needed a quiet and reserved hotel to enjoy my stay and the DT did just that! Natasha at the front desk was very sweet and helpful. Will visit again!
Manager Response: We are happy you had such a lovely stay at the Doubletree. Thank you for taking the time to recognize Natasha and the service she was able to provide.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service from Mika & Judi
Summary: Mika took care of my wants and needs. I told her about my worth the other DoubleTree a few blocks down, and she saw i was tired,  annoyed,  slept,  and not looking well.  She gave me,  a high floor room,  quiet,  away from elevator, as i requested. SWEET. They even handed me 2 bottles of water and some cookies. Judi over heard me saying i travel down on a regular basis and gave me info on how to book with them with a corporate rate. I highly recommend this hotel. Customer service means a lot especially after a long day, or a bad experience from other hotels.  Thank you both Mika and Judi, I'll be back.
Manager Response: We are so glad we could take care of your wants and needs. We strive to have the highest level of customer service for our guests and always want to provide a wonderful, comfortable experience.  Please come back soon we look forward to hosting you.

Summary: My experience was very pleasant I enjoy everything from breakfast to checkout I highly recommend this place it is very affordable and nice will be staying again at a later date I thank you for all services
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a pleasant experience here at the Doubletree from start to finish! Thank you for your nice review, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Very nice, quiet and friendly. I like this place the rooms are clean. I think the bed is comfortable and the pillows too, the pool is open so that’s nice.  I did this just for the fun of it, doing something different besides the same Routine I got going on.
Manager Response: It's definitely nice to get out of your routine, we are glad you were able to do that here at the Doubletree. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and  found our hotel clean and the service friendly.

Summary: Excellent front desk staff and we had a very nice clean room with a great view in this beautiful luxurious hotel. We love being hilton honor members and enjoy the delicious cookies and food. Thank you for your services and generosity.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty of being a Hilton Honors member. We are very proud of the team at the Front Desk and glad that they were able to provide excellent and generous service. Please come back soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, safe, and surprisingly affordable
Summary: I had a wonderful stay.  The rate was super affordable and there were no nightwalkers/tweakers, (which are an amenity of the other hotels, in Costa Mesa, at this rate.) The staff was always very friendly, I was able to extend my stay twice, and the front desk handled it with ease.  Kim checked me in and was extremely informative and helpful, I did not need to search for anything or call down, it's a real talent to get your speech short, friendly, and informative; she nailed it. ( I would feel very comfortable if I was to have my mother stay here).  I'm glad to have stumbled across this gem if you are on the fence and reading reviews: I worked in hospitality for 2-3 years.  I worked for two properties in Costa Mesa, and through personal relations, I am familiar with quite a few
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. We appreciate all of your notes, especially since you seem to know the hospitality field! I am glad Kim  and the rest of the staff handled everything efficiently and with good information.  Thank you so much for the recommendation and we would love for you (or your mom) to stay with again.

Summary: Extremely clean! Very elegant. Judi at the front desk was so personable and knowledgeable. She took the time to explain everything in perfect detail to make us feel so welcomed. My boyfriend and I had a romantic evening at the restaurant/bar. Loved the drink specials! We booked on a whim because we needed a place for a night, but will definitely book again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are delighted you enjoyed a nice romantic evening at our restaurant and enjoyed the drinks. We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: Great work on helping me and my husband  I would like to thanks Jesse and Mika for their hospitality.people skills is awesome...keep up the good work Jesse and Mika my husband and would like to say thank you very much!
Manager Response: I am so glad Mika and Jesse could be so helpful. Thank you for recognizing their hospitality and people skills. We appreciate your staying with us while in town.

Summary: I came here for an over night stay. I came in feeling self conscious as I was by myself, but the front desk receptionist (Judi) was so hospitable. Judi was super friendly and easy to talk to. We had a couple laughs and great chit chat all while she got me checked in. She made a great first impression of this hotel. The room was quiet, clean and comfy! Will definitely book with this hotel again.
Manager Response: We look forward to welcoming all guests whether they are here by themselves, with a large family, or business associates and work hard to make everyone comfy.  We would love to have you back soon.

Summary: After spending sometime looking for the right room I came across this place and happy I did . Judie at the front desk was so accommodating and friendly . In addition the rooms are very clean . Will stay here again
Manager Response: We are glad the Doubletree accommodated your needs and was the right choice for you.  We take pride in the cleanliness of our rooms and observe strict Covid protocols.

Summary Heading: Comfort & Quality at a great price!
Summary: This is my first time staying at the Hilton Double Tree in Orange County & I was very impressed.  This hotel has excellent service, quiet clean rooms, nice bar, comfortable beds, good views and it’s very accessible to the freeway & airport.  I highly recommend and will return next time I’m in town. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review. We strive to provide excellent service to all of our guests and we are proud that our staff accomplished that level of service. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are in town.

Summary Heading: Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana oc airport
Summary: Kim were very friendly and hotel were clean, nice place to stay and their restaurant and coffee shop are very convenient inside the premises, very recommended to everyone, quiet place surrounded and shops are near by
Manager Response: We are very happy you had a nice stay and were able to enjoy our amenities like our restaurant and coffee shop. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Overall great experience! Clean room, friendly staff! I parked in the wrong parking garage (across the street) and my car was locked in (they close after 6pm)  This seems to be pretty common so the staff was able to help get me in.
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a great experience here at the Doubletree. We pride ourselves on our clean rooms and our staff.

Summary: Front desk was awesome. I accidentally booked at the wrong hotel but Judi took care of us an help us cancel the reservation from the other hotel an gave us a room. This took less that 10 min. Thank you
Manager Response: I am glad we were able to give you excellent and efficient service. We know there are other hotels in the area and that it can be confusing. We are happy we were able to serve you here at the Doubletree.

Summary: We stay in hotels quite frequently and I have to say we were very impressed with our stay here. The staff was wonderful Kim checked us in and was incredibly helpful and we even got warm cookies which is always a bonus! Extremely clean room and the beds are insanely comfortable! The pool and jacuzzi were open which just topped off a perfect stay here. Will definitely be back and recommending to anyone who needs a place to stay in Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are very glad Kim and the rest of our staff were able to make your stay enjoyable and that you were able to enjoy our pool. Please come back soon, we will have the cookies waiting!

Summary: I had an exam I needed to do it In a quite place , the employees here made sure I got the quite room so I can study. The place is very clean and and you feel safe , if anyone is ever looking for a nice place to stay double tree is definitely the place to go
Manager Response: Hope you did well on your exam. We are happy that we could provide a safe quiet place for you to study. Thank you for the recommendation.

Summary: Natasha good worker i like the hotel i love cookies coffie shop. Great service , will stay again. They also are close to the beach and have the restaurant open. Great service, will be suggesting to family and friends.
Manager Response: I am glad Natasha and the rest of our staff were able to provide you with great service during your stay!  We would love to have you back soon to enjoy our restaurant and cookies.

Summary: The staff and Judi are amazing! A couple of months ago I stayed here. While driving back home I got a flat tire. Judi made sure we made it back safely and directed the tow truck driver. She made sure we had a room as we were an hour away. We were back for another stay this weekend and it was nice to see her welcoming smile. Thank you all again and thank you very much Judi!!!  Cristina
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was extremely friendly. Very clean and good snacks and drinks in lobby. Covid friendly. Location is centrally located near a lot of cool attractions. Will be staying here again. Next to freeway is a plus !
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree. We pride ourselves in keeping to the new standards of clean due to Covid and are glad that this comes through to our guests. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying here. We love this DoubleTree. The staff is wonderful (they always give us plenty of cookies) the rooms are comfortable and clean and the restaurant is amazing. The cafe downstairs is sooo good and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us so frequently and for your wonderful review.  I am glad you were able to enjoy the restaurant, the cafe, and of course the cookies during your stay. Come back soon.

Summary: Came into the lobby after a long day of traveling and was greeted by Kim. She was very helpful and very kind also. Check in went very smooth, the room was clean and fresh smelling. I will be staying at this location next time I am in town!
Manager Response: We at the Doubletree know that traveling can be tiring and we are happy Kim was so helpful and that your check in was smooth and efficient.  Come back soon, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I book all of our business associates to the MacArthur Blvd location not only because it’s close to my boss’ home and the airport, but the staff is amazing! I see Nikki and Shiela  almost every time and they’re the best, I’ve had to book last minute rooms while wrangling a whole crew of guys with camera equipment, change a reservation bc i booked the wrong address, etc. and I know I can be a handful after a long day of work and taking care of clients !! But they’re always so patient and efficient, this location has definitely earned a customer for life. And we love the cookies!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!! We are happy that Nikki and Sheila were able to accommodate your last minute reservations and make you feel welcome. We are thankful to have you as a customer for life and we will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: Came back to my room at night and found that it was a shared room and I could hear the people in the other side. I called the front desk and they accommodated me and brought me up a key so I could change rooms and it was nice and quiet. I stayed at another place that had a water leak in the bathroom all over the floor. And they told me I had to come down to the lobby and get a new key instead of accommodating me so that tells me this place has a lot more class.
Manager Response: I'm so glad we could resolve the problem of the shared room for you. We understand that having an adjoining room can be sometimes be a problem. Thank you for your review and we look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: Sherila and Nikki are the best. They are very accommodating and willing to help Very helpful and very cheerful and not pushy making things difficult They both listen to what you want and need and not what they think you need  Thank you
Manager Response: We think Sheila and Nikki are great too, thanks for recognizing their service. I am happy that they listened to what you wanted and were accommodate you.

Summary: Excellent service, clean rooms, friendly service, we love this hotel.. good sanitation areas and beautiful place.. our family is really happy with the place and is really comfortable to a rest and relax
Manager Response: Thanks for your nice review. We are happy we were able to accommodate all your needs and provide you with excellent service.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed there in the end of February. It was such a great place very clean. The staff I can not say enough good things about the staff very friendly, helpful and always ready to help even when I thought I was asking for a lot. Judi and the rest of the staff are amazing if I could I would give them 10 stars!! I'm definitely coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Doubletree for your family vacation. We take great pride in our staff and their friendly attitudes, I am happy they made your stay comfortable and enjoyable.

Summary: Had a great stay at this hotel. Judi at the front desk was very helpful and helped turn my trip around. The trip started out rough but she was able to make it better. Nice clean rooms and terrific restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel great customer service I would definitely come back again parking was great as well and we loved the cafe downstairs along with the pool and gym! I love Santa Ana and I feel this is the perfect location not to far from Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are so happy that Maggie was able accommodate you and offer such great service.  I am glad you were able to take advantage of our cafe and other amenities .We look forward to your return.

Summary: Excellent service , We got a credit to a very nice room due to a group coming in before us and taking the room that originally they gave us we appreciate that thank you so much for the wonderful treatment
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed your stay, we love to upgrade when we can. Thank you for staying with us and we are glad we good provide yo with good service.

Summary: Kim was very nice and helped me to get to my room, nicely and things were clear when they were told to me, she helped me explaining about breakfast and helped my duaghters get to my room safe, thank you for your service I hope you have more people like Kim
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words regarding Kim, we think she is great too. I'm glad she was able to assist you and your daughters and provided good service to you. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: My stay in double tree by hilton
Summary: My husband and I enjoyed our time in doubletree and SHEILA helped us to make this stay convenient. She is polite and considerate. She helped us with all our basic necessities. As we had our exam the next day, we were thankful that Sheila was there to help us with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! I am happy that Sheila was able to accommodate your needs.  Hope you did well on the exam, please come visit again soon.

Summary: We were helped by Kim at the front desk and she was super helpful, sweet, and informative as it was our first stay at a DoubleTree by Hilton hotel. Our room was clean and tidy and it was wonderful to see after a long day exploring So.Cal. Thank you!
Manager Response: We are glad Kim was so helpful and informative, we also think she is sweet. Hopefully this was the the first of many stays at the Doubletree.

Summary: Room is cozy spacious & clean.  Breakfast is free. They deliver to your room. Shocking good! Restaurant food is good! I have ordered calamari & wings 10/10. Judi was excellent super helpful with my reservation. I stayed here almost a week. Will return.
Manager Response: I'm happy you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast with your Gold Hilton Honors membership. Thanks for the 10 ranking of the food.  Glad we could be helpful with your reservation.

Summary: Super nice customer service Judi was very helpful for a first time staying at this hotel. Hotel was overall very nice and clean, which is very good during these crazy time will 100% be staying at this one again.
Manager Response: We are happy you had a nice stay at the Doulbletree and glad we could provide helpful customer service. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Great stay awesome area would stay again highly recommend great food bar and lounge area for children. Clean rooms great view for sundries depending on what side of hotel your on. Newly updated rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for for nice review!  I'm glad you enjoyed our newly opened Meritage Restaurant and Bar and that you had a nice stay with your family.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Besides the great location and quality of the room, staff is amazing!! Judi was awesome!  There are a lot of nice restaurants around, they have airport shuttle and easy access to the main freeways.  My stay was perfect, couldn’t ask for more.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was very nice!! Thank you Kim for taking care of us. Very nice & friendly staff. Cookies were very good too & it was nice to sit in the spa. I wish the pool was heating but the spa helped me sleep good.
Manager Response: We're happy that Kim took such good care of you and we pride ourselves on our friendly staff. Come back soon, we will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: Had to book a stay last minute due to an electrical emergency home. The stay was very exceptional. Maggie at the front desk was very friendly and patient with me. She made me feel like I was home. I had a craving for a sweet coffee in the evening and she made me a remarkable caramel macchiato from the coffee bar in the lobby. I also loved how they had an assortment of goods available from liquor to gummy bears to milk. We also loved the new restaurant Meritage, had the calamari and flat iron steak, highly recommend. Room was very clean and we had a nice view of the city. Sad the electrician at home was timely and we only stayed 1 night.
Manager Response: Sorry for your electrical emergency, glad we could be your home away from home. I'm delighted that Maggie made your stay so enjoyable and helped with that sweet coffee craving! Next time come visit for a staycation and enjoy the restaurant. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: the customer service from Kim was amazing !! she was so nice and was very thorough. loved staying here !! the room service was amazing and we found the room to be very sanitized and clean. overall a great experience and would come again
Manager Response: Thanks for letting us know that Kim was so helpful!  We are delighted you had a great overall experience. We're glad you enjoyed the food. Come back soon.

Summary: Great hotel, anytime I need a place to stay this is the I place go too. Also the nice lady at the front desk(Natasha) was really helpful in getting me accommodated. It's lowkey and great places around to get a bite to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review.  I'm happy Natasha was helpful and able to accommodate your needs. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Me and my girlfriend enjoyed our stay here at the Double Tree. Our experience was very positive. From the clean interior of the rooms to the cold outdoor pool. The staff was awesome and accommodating. Especially from Kim at the front desk who was great. Two thumbs up 👍👍
Manager Response: Thank you for your two thumbs up review.  I'm glad that Kim was able to enhance your stay with us!  During these times we strive to have a high level of clean and sanitized rooms, we're happy they met your standards.

Summary: Great place and nice for family vacation. Place was very accommodating. Will definitely stay again here when we come back out. Close to a lot of places and easy to get to. Very convenient. Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: I am glad you found our staff friendly and our location convenient! It's terrific you were able to stay with us for your family vacation to California. Please come back soo, we look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: My experience was great had a good time will visit soon. You can also ask questions about your claim using UI Online by selecting Contact Us at the top of your homepage. Note: If you are getting a phone call from
Manager Response: We are glad you had a great stay and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Close to the beach and great shopping places.  Very frie6and helpful staff.located in a nice and safe part of the city  very convenient. We couldn't find parking at night, the hotel gave us a code for the struc5parking across the street.
Manager Response: We are happy you found the Doubletree convenient for your beach adventure. We pride ourselves on our friendly staff and  glad that they made your stay enjoyable.

Summary: Good hotel nice and quiet the area it’s good   We got cookies 🍪 at arrival   The personal it’s friendly   The hotel room it’s really clean and it look greats   The views trough the window are amazing   Love this place
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and found our rooms clean and our staff friendly.  And of course, the cookies are the best!

Summary: Hotel is beautiful! Sheila helped us with check-in and was super friendly! Our rooms were clean and gorgeous with a great view. I’m so excited to spend the weekend with my bride and enjoy our time together! Also thankful that despite COVID we still got our Double Tree Cookies!
Manager Response: We are so happy you had such a great weekend with your bride here at the Doubletree, Congratulations! I am glad that Sheila was able to give such friendly service and that she accommodated you with a nice view.  We look forward to your return visit, we will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: Natasha in the front was great she helped me and my girl find the perfect room for the weekend the room is nice and clean though well cleaned and freplenished  as always will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review. Natasha is a great team member and we are happy she was able to find the perfect room for your getaway.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is my second time at this location and it's my new favorite place. Rooms are clean and staff is friendly and helpful. Natasha was nice and very helpful checking us in. The hotel is very quiet (great place).
Manager Response: We are so happy you are a returning guest! It's our favorite place, so we're glad we have made it yours too. During Covid we have worked hard to have clean, comfortable rooms for all of our guests, we know how important this is.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Very friendly staff! Helpful and definitely would return again! I was given free cookies and the service was seamless! Making my business trip amazing! No more Marriott! Hilton is mg new habitat! Happy weekend!
Manager Response: Dear Saad S,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to know that you enjoyed the service provided by our team members. Our hopes is that all guests receive such treatment that they become loyal Hilton members. It is rewarding to know we made such impression. We look forward to your return in the near future.

Summary: Kim was the front desk and was super nice! I accidentally booked the wrong dates for our stay and she was more than happy to help. The hotel is COVID-19 safe and very clean. I highly recommend staying with them! They are super nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear S3572JCdianat,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize Kim at the front desk. We are happy to know she extended a helping hand in assisting with your reservation. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to a future stay.

Summary Heading: Doubletree by Santa Ana Orange County Airport
Summary: Hotel was very clean with sanitizer stations everywhere. Our room was very clean and Kim, the young lady that checked us in was very professional and friendly.Will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Inspiration 117345,  Thank you for your review. We are specially grateful that you took the time to recognize Kim at the front desk. She will be delighted to know she made a positive impression during your stay. Thank you for staying with us and hope to you see you back soon.

Summary: Friendly service, professionalism , clean rooms , comfy beds , coffee bar, thanks Natasha! She offered us warm cookies on our arrival and they were so fat to jump between coffee device and front desk duties. It was a good bargain for a fancy stay, we felt welcomed. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear jacobcH455EM,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are happy you enjoyed Natasha's service as well as the rooms and the coffee bar in our lobby. We truly are happy to serve you both at the front desk and at our Blend shop across the hallway. Our team members are multifaceted and happy to assist. Hope to see you back again in the near future.

Summary: Judi & Shelia the best 2 front desk agents. Super happy will recommend and stay here again. Very helpful with letting me know the area where to go eat walking distance. I also had the most amazing cookie I have ever had.
Manager Response: Dear tonygrandson,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are delighted to read that both Sheila and Judi made your stay enjoyable. We are also happy to know you enjoyed your stay and our cookies. We look forward to greet you again with our delicious treats!

Summary: Front desk was warm and friendly. Room Was spotless and bed was very comfortable. Great pillows. Best shower we’ve had in months. We travel 20-25 days per month and this is the nicest stay we’ve experienced in a while.
Manager Response: Dear Reggie_willis,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I'm glad that you were able to enjoy a nice warm shower after a long day of travel. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back at our property some time soon.

Summary: Amazing staff, very generous and care about customers experience. I would definitely recommend staying here, and will definitely be back to this location. Thank you so much double tree, and your amazing staff.
Manager Response: Dear Lilpxff,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our facility and that you are hoping to join us in the future. We look forward to being your host again.

Summary: The hotel was very clean, sanitized stickers at the room point of entry. Very helpful front desk and welcoming atmosphere. Clean room and comfortable beds. Shops across from the hotel with spas and other convenient shops. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear janettn2021,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are happy you enjoyed the room and were satisfied with the cleanliness in our rooms. Hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary: After a unpleasant day at the DoubleTree in Clermont I came to the property in Santa Ana and Judi was able to make my return back to the States a whole lot more pleasant.Clean property friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Qweyns,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate that you were able to recognize Judi for her efforts in turning your experience around after staying at another property. Hopefully next time, we are your first choice!

Summary: Natasha offers amazing service. Really nice and explains  everything. Make sure we are feeling comfortable the room amazing really clean. Excellent service !! Definitely comming back with no hesitation
Manager Response: Dear Rosieeprez_  Thank you for your kind review. We are happy that Natasha was able to offer amazing service during your stay. We hope to see you back at our property in the near future.

Summary: This is my first time traveling for work and with covid being rampant it’s intimidating. Natasha set me up with a great attitude and accommodated me for early checkin since I arrived 2 hours early. Will stay again because of the great service.
Manager Response: Dear Roop2050,  Thank you for your kind review. We are glad that Natasha made a positive impression with you with the early check in. We are happy to know you were comfortable traveling again even during COVID. We hope to be your hosts again in the near future.

Summary: Great place to stay! Clean , quiet and comfortable. Friendly and accommodating staff.  When traveling alone it’s safe and secure can only be accessed with a key keeping it private and secured. Recently remodeled the lobby with a nice study area also has food now along with coffee, tea wine and pastry’s yum.  Enjoyed my stay and will be back
Manager Response: Dear mzwashington7,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are glad you found our hotel accommodating and safe. Hope you visit us back soon!

Summary: Awesome, beautiful rooms that are super clean which is great especially during Covid. Natasha helped us out and she was super kind and accommodating. We have stayed here multiple times and keep coming back due to the cleanliness, amazing service, and comfortability.
Manager Response: Dear genogg,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are happy your enjoyed your stay with us and that Natasha was accommodating to you during your stay. Hope to see you back soon!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 3 days when we visited Newport. Easy 10 minute drive to the beach and shopping. Hotel was kept very clean. We even enjoyed their espresso bar one morning when we were in a hurry and were pleasantly surprised by the quality. Also enjoyed the spa. The air conditioner/heater was very quiet(we didn't notice it) opposed to many other stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I'm glad you and your wife enjoyed your stay and found it convenient. It's great you were able to enjoy our Blend espresso bar and other amenities. We hope you will return soon!

Summary: Great stay! This hotel provided us with great customer service, a clean room, and a beautiful view. Will definitely be returning and recommend a friend to come visit this hotel soon. Very covid friendly.
Manager Response: I'm glad you had a great stay with us! We take pride in our customer service and the cleanliness of our hotel, we know these are important to our guests. We look forward to having you back soon. Thank you for your great review.

Summary: I am a coach operator for OCTA and Christmas Eve I could not find a restroom anywhere. Nikki was very polite and allowed me to use the restroom. They also helped me find a room to book for a further date. Overall they were very kind, informative, and pleasant. I look forward to having my staycation here.
Manager Response: I'm happy we could be there for you on Christmas Eve and that Nikki was helpful. We look forward to you staying with us in the future and having a wonderful staycation with us!

Summary: When I arrived Natasha was super helpful working at the front desk, able to help me and my boyfriend out booking in a room. It was very well decorated in the Christmas spirit and was also given Choclate Chip Cookies as a welcome. 100% recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your 100% recommendation. We appreciate your visit and are glad you enjoyed our Christmas decorations. We look forward to your return and we will have the cookies waiting.

Summary: Wonderful customer service!! I’ve just come from a hotel that I cancelled my reservation with due to poor customer service and the front desk woman being unkind and unhelpful. I got a new reservation with this Doubletree and had a complete opposite experience with the staff being helpful, kind, and accommodating. Thank you Liu for being so nice and turning my California experience into a great one! Will definitely be back :)
Manager Response: We are so glad you found our staff so helpful and accommodating. We take great pride in the customer service we provide and Liu is wonderful. I'm happy she was able to take a bad experience and make it better for you!  Thank your for your review, please come back soon.

Summary: They were so accommodating especially Liu the assistant supervisor at this location was so helpful in informing us the the available amenities during the these trying times and had some excellent suggestions to make are stay so much more enjoyable.  She was extremely personable and professional and would highly recommend for anyone visiting Orange county
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review! I'm glad you found Liu's suggestions helpful and that your stay was enjoyable.  We look forward to you staying with us again on your return to Orange County.

Summary: I needed a room last minute and ended up on the phone with Liu. She completely helped me out. I was booked at another doubletree (double tree club-terrible), and I needed to get out of that hotel. Liu set me up. I’m so happy I made the switch. Awesome hotel. Will stay again. In comparison, the first hotel had nothing. No breakfast, no room attendant, no coffee, no work out facility not even  continental breakfast. This doubletree had everything, and even though the kitchen was closed, they brought breakfast to my room! Liu really turned our trip from scary, to amazing. Thank you Liu
Manager Response: We agree that Liu is amazing and we are very happy that she was able to turn your trip around!  We pride ourselves on our service and amenities. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Thank you to Kim at the front desk who went above and beyond to help me during my stay. The hotel is beautiful. Parking is easy. The room is very clean and modern decor and updated. Food is available during this pandemic!!!! Very large big screen TV. Wine etc available in the lobby. Wonderfully decorated for Christmas. I will return.
Manager Response: We are so grateful to Kim for all she does and we are very pleased she was able to assist you with your stay!  Thank you for the great review and we love our holiday decorations too.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Thank you Natash & Maggie for you help and support during my 2 night stay at Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport. Staying here and dealing with my grief was made bearable by your kindness.  I’ll be back.
Manager Response: Maggie and Natasha are 2 of our best and we are happy they were able to help during your stay. We look forward to assisting you in the future.

Summary: Very good customer services Front desk , Natasha that room aware very clean  nice motel I will come back soon. Decoration are really good on motel lobby really nice staff really friendly .that cookies are really good
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on our customer service so we are happy that ew were able to provide a friendly place to stay. Come back soon, we will have the cookies waiting!

Summary: I needed a place to stay after being evacuated do to the fires. This hotel went above and beyond to make sure I had a great stay.. The GM, Sales team and staff do a very good job and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We are so sorry you had to evacuate but glad that we could provide a safe place to stay.  Please come back again for a better reason and enjoy.

Summary: First time staying at the hotel, and definitely won’t be my last. The staff is super friendly specially front desk Kim she was super welcoming and helpful. The hotel itself is super calm, perfect for a vacation or business trip. There’s plenty food stops around the area and close to freeways if you plan to go visit around.
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on our welcoming staff, so we are happy that you found them helpful. Kim is terrific and we always appreciate how helpful she is. I'm glad we were able to accommodate your stay.

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights to get a much needed Thanksgiving break. The rooms were nice and shut with a seal after cleaning which made me feel safe.  All the employees were more than willing to help me with anything I needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your Thanksgiving break. The seal on the room does ensure that the room was cleaned and that's great that you felt safe.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Great service, Natasha was great. Very helpful and respectful, she made sure every question I had was answered and made sure I was set for my weekend stay and gave me a great deal :) definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!  We are glad that Natasha was so helpful and we look forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: Great easy access location.  Check- in was a breeze- quick and easy.  Lobby and rooms are clean, comfortable and beautiful.  Natasha was very informative and helpful.  As always, the cookies are delicious!
Manager Response: It's great to hear that our hotel fit your needs so well! I'm glad that Natasha was helpful. We'll have the cookies waiting for your next visit.

Summary: Our visit to the Doubletree by Hilton in Orange County was great.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful for any of our needs.  The hotel was clean and comfortable.  We appreciated their attention to detail to make us feel comfortable and safe during these COVID times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review. We're happy you felt comfortable and safe.

Summary: Loved the hotel everything was very clean and one of the nicest hotels I’ve visited specially for the price. Front desk staff Natasha was amazing, friendly and very helpful. Amazing experience over all would recommend to anyone and can’t wait to be back.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit with us.  We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary: Natasha gave the best service here a double tree in Santa Ana !!! Thank you for the great service !!! Thank you the room was so clean and the staff here is so quick to let with everything . We had a nice day at the pool which was so clean !
Manager Response: Dear 61darlenea,   We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and you had a great day at the pool! I will make sure that Natasha is recognized for the exceptional service she provided you. We look forward to having you stay at our hotel soon, your cookie is waiting for you!

Summary: Very clean and accommodating hotel. Excellent and friendly staff and service. I was helped by Natasha at the front desk and check in was quick and simple. All rooms are disinfected and sealed after each visit which creates an even more comfortable environment. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear 644jaymesg,   The safety of our guests and team members is of our upmost importance. We are happy to hear that Natasha made your check in quick and simple. Thank you for recommendation, we look forwarding to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located 20 minutes from Newport Beach, which is the reason we stayed here. The location is surrounded by business centers, so the outside is pretty clean & safe. The inside tells a different story. Hilton should invest some money into updating this hotel, including the rusted tub, squeaky elevators & the pool— oh let’s talk about the pool. It’s a 4 ft deep square with no appeal whatsoever. The concrete is peeling, the seats are outdated, the spa has a weird smell when the bubbles are on. Very underwhelming. The room was pretty clean, but don’t even bother using the mini fridge. It’s like 65-70 degrees at it's max. The worst part is they had no cookies! Yes people-their signature cookies were out! The best part of this experience was our front desk
Manager Response: Dear Luvmyjs3,    Thank you for taking the time to write a thorough review about our property.  We are happy to know that despite the areas of opportunity with our pool area and the facilities in your room, that Kimberly was able to provide you with the customer service that Hilton is known for.  Regarding the issues in your room, we will be sure forward those details to our Facilities team to address. We apologize your experience was short of perfect; we especially regret that you were not able to enjoy our delicious DoubleTree Cookies. We would love to send you some cookies home as a thank you for your constructive criticism and to apologize about your experience.   If you wish, please email me directly at gpatino@doubletreeocairport.com with your address and we will be happy to send you cookies expeditiously.   Thank you again for your feedback, and hope you give us another chance at a better impression in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Gadira Patino Front Office Manager

Summary: Always enjoy staying here at the Doubletree by John Wayne Airport, lovely ladies to greet you every time at the front desk. Judi and Natasha are always amazing and super helpful. They will make sure you are all set up to go whatever your needs. And also Some of the best cookies I’ve had! Nice clean rooms with a pretty big TVs is a plus for me. Quiet and peaceful area with plenty restaurants, anytime I’m in town. I stay at the doubletree!
Manager Response: Dear mortythehokage,   We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay at our hotel! I will make sure to recognize Judi and Natasha for assisting you in ensuring your stay is amazing. We will have another cookie waiting for you and we look forward to seeing you soon!   Thank you!

Summary: Maggie was so very helpful. She made sure we understood everything in the check in process. She even helped when I needed to add an additional night. Super sweet and jut excellent service all the way around!
Manager Response: Dear iPrincessBleu,   We are delighted to hear that Maggie was very helpful and made your check in process fast and simple! We look forward to having you visit us again, we will have your cookie ready for you to enjoy. See you soon!   Thank you!

Summary: It feels like the hotel has made some sparkly upgrades or recent renovations but what blew us away was the staff and their attentive service that went above and beyond. There was a party that went on late and our floor was loud all night and we called the front desk about something else but the staff member offered to switch rooms for us and even gave us complimentary breakfast for two that was top restaurant quality food and threw in some parfait juices and a fruit platter that would easily have been about $100 of breakfast. Just for two. And the room rate was so unbelievably affordable, motel prices but 4 star service. Shout out to Natasha who helped us out soo much and really made our stay even better. And the woman who worked at night who patiently helped me find a room that
Manager Response: none

Summary: Professional staff. Clean rooms and the whole hotel is clean. My stay has been wonderful. Great breakfast and nice amenities. Local to shopping malls and restaurants. Safe parking structure. Would recommend to friends
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The hotel is easily accessible off the freeway. It's close to the beach and many dining options. Natasha at the front desk was very kind and professional.
Manager Response: Dear Y1646PVlauraw,  Thank you for taking the time  to write a review about your stay. We are ecstatic that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our location convenient. We are also happy to know that Natasha made a particularly positive impression on your stay. Thank you for recognizing her. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you during your next stay in Santa Ana.  Warm Regards,  Gadira Patino Front Office Manager

Summary: Love this place....that’s an understatement...seriously. I’ve been to a lot of hotel, seeing that i travel for music and family. Double tree hotel is the standard that all hotels should strive to be like. From the front staff, to the room service...man even the cookies know how to treat you. Natasha if your reading this thank you for you attention to detail and welcoming attitude. This place is a 10/10 no cap.
Manager Response: Dear Ronnyboybeat,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review.  We are delighted that you were able to enjoy our property and especially our delicious DoubleTree cookies. Natasha is happy to know you remember her by name and that she made a positive impression on your stay.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!  Warm Regards,  Gadira Patino Front Office Manager

Summary: Kimberly was in the front desk she was very helpful and nice. Hotel is clean and neat. Room service is good. Area is quiet poolside is clean we like to stay in this hotel many times on the future. Also the high ways are close airport and the very nice beach. Newport Beach is only 15 min away
Manager Response: Dear M10KJericc,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review!  We are happy to know that you found our hotel convenient as well as our Room Service pool, and especially, Kimberly's service.  She will be happy to know you took the time to recognize her.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Gadira Patino Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a week.  The Staff was Excellent.  The Room was Beautiful.  I highly recommend this Hotel!  I do not think you will find a nicer Hotel for what they charged.    The Lobby area was so nice?  They had a Coffee Bar, which the Coffee was Excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Business222,  Thank you for writing such a nice review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our Coffee bar and the lobby area. We look forward to having you back in our hotel in the near future!  Warm Regards,  Gadira Patino

Summary: The service was ver great. The rooms are pretty nice and the beds are also very comfy. The front desk associate Natasha attended us and she was very helpful and kind to us.Totally recommend coming here.
Manager Response: We're happy you enjoyed your stay with us and that Natasha could provide you with great service while you were here. WE look forward to welcoming you back to the comfy beds.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and as described in the website. There are a lot of shops and restaurants within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again. It was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review, we're glad we could be of service to you. In these times of Covid, we are taking extra cleaning precautions to accommodate our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: From my check-in with Kim to my warm chocolate chip cookie to the quiet atmosphere after returning each afternoon from two full beach days, my stay was fabulous! I’ve already booked again for Thanksgiving!
Manager Response: We always look to give out guests a relaxing, quiet stay so I'm glad that's how you found our hotel.  We look forward to having you at Thanksgiving and will have the chocolate chip cookie waiting.

Summary: Very clean and quiet. No problems with checking in. Natasha checked in our reservation, she was very informative, and had a good attitude, and we will definitely be back. Nice hotel, friendly employees. I would recommend to others.
Manager Response: We're glad that Natasha was helpful and informative while you checked in and that you found the room to your liking. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please come stay with us soon.

Summary: One of the nicest hotels I’ve stayed at here in California. Their rooms are always clean and really comfortable. The staff here is always super friendly, and always helpful!  I always have a great stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for your very nice review. We are very glad we could make your stay comfortable and you found our rooms to your liking. Please come visit us soon, our staff looks forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This doubletree is nothing short of exceptional. Quiet rooms, comfy beds, fabulous lobby and let me say this; Judi and Maggie have set the bar high for customer experience when it comes to the checkin process. Their warmth, hospitality, and decorum were on par with some of the finest properties across the globe. Thank you again for making my stay pleasurable!
Manager Response: Dear itsmikeyhelikesit,  Thank you for your raving review! We are ecstatic that both Judi and Maggie made such a positive impact on your stay. I will forward your compliments to them as I am sure they will be happy to know you recognized their customer service during your stay. We are also happy to know that you enjoy our facilities. We hope that you consider us again during your next visit to Orange County in the near future!

Summary: This hotel is close to everything. My boyfriend and I come here often and each time we are greeted and checked in by Natasha and she does an excellent job so check in is easy. The rooms are spacious and they have a big flatscreen so that’s enjoyable. We plan to keep coming because of the service and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review. We're happy you found everything to your liking and that Natasha was able to get you checked in efficiently.  We're glad that our location meets your needs and happy ta continue great service. Come back soon.

Summary: Very clean helpful perfect customer service. Friendly. And I would like to give a perfect rating for Natasha........... Great pool. Quiet nice view. Love the cookies clean room room service awesome. Housekeeping on point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your terrific review of our Hotel.  We appreciate that Natasha was so helpful and deserves your perfect rating! Come back soon, we'll have the cookies waiting.

Summary: Excellent amenities loved them and hotel with amazing location. Love the details in the decoration.  Nikki has an excellent attention to tue clientes at the front desk Totally coming back for another visit here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. Your feedback is important to us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy our hotel and that Nikki made such a delightful impression during your stay. She will be happy to know you took the time to recognize her.  We thank you for choosing to stay with us during your stay in Santa Ana and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This location happens to be one of my favs, whenever I come into town for prenatal care. The front desk and housekeeping have been always been friendly when I visit. This place is very clean, from the outside to the inside. Which brings comfort during these covid pandemic. Judi and Kimberly are always very helpful/polite, I appreciate it. Genuine kind staff all the way around, very clean, and the caesar salads are amazing there.
Manager Response: Dear travelingmemoriess,  We appreciate you taking the time to write feedback about your stay. We are happy to know that you have enjoyed staying with us during your doctor visits. Our team will be happy to know they are being recognized; especially Judi and Kimberly. Our team loves what they do and enjoy these friendly interactions with our guests such as yourself. Thank you again for your feedback and hope to see you again for prenatal care, or a weekend getaway.

Summary: I went with my kids to this hotel in the month of August not knowing what to really expect during the pandemic, but they made me feel so comfortable as soon as we walked in. At the check-in counter Kimberly was the sweetest nicest person!! Kimberly had a sweet smile as we approached the counter she help us check-in and offered my kids some delicious cookies. The kids loved them!! When we got to our from room it was super clean and the beds were very comfortable. The kids really enjoyed our small get to the hotel. The pool area was very clean and was at all times fully stocked with towels. I would go back again and again to this hotel. Would really recommend this hotel. Kimberly thank you so much for making us feel welcomed and for being so nice! (she was wearing her mask but we
