Manager Response: We are so happy you and your family enjoyed your stay here at the Doubletree. We know we are lucky to have Kimberly at the Front Desk and we're glad she started your stay right! Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: They’re great they are very clean people are very nice in here very polite Everything is sanitized pool clean restrooms very clean beds are comfortable I most definitely recommend you and your family to stay here in this hotel Doubletree
Manager Response: Thank you for your good review. During these times, we know that a clean and sanitized place to stay is of high priority and we work hard to ensure a clean and comfortable hotel. Please come back and stay with us soon.

Summary: Great hotel. Very friendly. Kim was exceptional.  She greeted us with a smile and friendly banter.  We asked for places to eat, and she gave us a variety of different places to choose from.  She explained the parking procedures, and how to get to the room.  We will definitely come back when we are on the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to right such a nice review! We agree with you, Kim is exceptional and we're glad she was able to assist and be informative for your stay. We look forward to your return visit.

Summary: This is a great place to stay. I’ve stayed here many many times. Sometimes short stays and oftentimes long stays. I’ve never had any problems highly recommended. I am especially happy with my most recent stay where I had to check in early 10am instead of the usual 3pm front desk took care of it without a problem. I’d also like to make a special notification to Natasha at reception who was very helpful and super nice to me. 5/5 will be staying here again 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest at the Doubletree,  we appreciate your loyalty! I'm glad we could accommodate your desire for an early check in and that Natasha was helpful to you. We look forward to your next stay and hope to make all future stays comfortable and enjoyable.

Summary: Good service from Maggie of double Tree Santa Ana airport , I’m very happy to stay here ... good hotel good service I will recommend for my family and my friend to stay here in the future ... I will suggest all my friend from another state
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and we are glad you enjoyed with your stay. We know service is important to our guests and happy that Maggie could provide you with good service. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The staff are very friendly. The room is really comfortable and clean . Very accommodating to needs. Onsite location parking a plus.  Price is very reasonable. Love the fitness center. Love the location. Close to the beach and a few restaurants.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay on multiple levels. We appreciate your 5 bubble review and are happy that your stay suited all your needs. Come back soon

Summary: I have to say the greatest part of my visit at the hotel was the way I was welcome at the front desk  Thank you Sheila for such out standing service Made us felt welcome had issues with the parking be changed and she took care of it and also explained the reason behind such charge
Manager Response: Suvvyflyer8702,  First and foremost, thank you so much for acknowledging Sheila. As you can imagine, she is an amazing asset to our team. She always strives to make all our guests feel welcomed and comfortable, even during these times. We are very grateful for her to be a part of our team.  In reviewing your comments, I could not help notice for the 3 “bubble” rating, other than the parking charge was there anything else we could have done to improve your stay and earn a 5 “bubble” rating? We always appreciate the great reviews, but at the same time we always want to understand anytime we do not earn a 5 “bubble” ranking. We appreciate any further feedback you may be able to provide.  Once again, thank you very much for acknowledgement of Sheila. I will personally thank her. We hope you visit the us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Sincerely,  Jason R. Cure General Manager DoubleTree Santa Ana – Orange County Airport

Summary: Huge thumbs up if you’re coming to stay in the Octhis is the place for you thanks to the entire staff especially Maggie and her wonderful smile clean and quiet rooms Close to John Wayne Airport and a bunch of places to eat
Manager Response: I'm very happy that our staff, especially Maggie, made you feel welcome at the Doubletree! The next time you're in Orange County, we look forward to having you back.

Summary: This is the most beautiful Doubletree I’ve stayed in. Friendly staff(especially Judi), clean rooms, and a great coffee shop in the lobby. The parking garage was easy to use as well. I would definitely stay here again - especially since South Coast Plaza is close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about our property. Your feedback is important to us as we always look for ways to improve both the atmosphere and the amenities provided by the hotel. Judi will be happy to know that she made a positive feedback on your stay, and that you took the time to recognize her. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future on your next stay to the area.

Summary: Sheila and Judi provide the most phenomenal care and service. They always greet  me by name and are extremely professional. They treat me like I’m family and it’s always a pleasure to see them. Highly recommend for family, couples, business or just to get away. Thank you Sheila and Judi for everything. You are truly family in my heart
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to know that both Judi and Sheila take care of you every time you say with us. We are happy to have you as our regular patrons and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I'd like ton thank the whole crew for the wonderful service. Maggie, Natasha and Kimberly provided the most polite, couteous, positive customer service a hotel can provide. Delicious 🍪 by the way. !!
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree and pleased that Maggie, Natasha, and Kimberly provided such a positive experience! We can't wait to welcome you back. We will have a cookie waiting.

Summary: Double tree is the most comfortable hotel in this area in my opinion. I got a highest floor with awesome view, very comfortable king bed, super quiet. I planned to stay for only one night but I stayed for 3 nights just because the room is so cozy!
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, thank you for the wonderful review! Next time you visit us, let us know you enjoyed out top floor and the view and we'll see about having your room there again. Come back soon.

Summary: Great place! The women working in the lobby behind the reception counter are the best. They’re friendly, knowledgeable and go the extra mile. In particular Gadira and Natasha always makes sure that I’m taken care of and my stay at this hotel is always pleasant. I highly recommend staying at the DoubleTree Santa Ana for quality, relaxed environment but specifically for the excellent customer service provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We're very pleased you enjoyed yourself. The team at the Front Desk is always working hard to make our guests feel at home, and we're happy the team, especially Gadira and Natasha took good care of you!

Summary: All staff members were courteous and helpful. The entire hotel was clean. I was really comfortable staying here. Any time I called the front desk with a question someone answered with a friendly tone and provided me with all the information I needed.
Manager Response: I'm glad you found our staff friendly and knowledgeable and that you had a pleasant stay.  We look forward to your return. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I booked the hotel for an event for April 16 to April 20, but unfortunately because of the COVID-19 I HAVE TO CANCEL IT.  I talked to the lady who picked up the phone.   She told me she will cancel for me.  I did not have much experience about canceling... and not sure if I have the confirmation number.  I trusted her and kept going with chaos life with Virus.  Now I just found out that she did not cancel me.  And now they said I did not cancel and asked me to give them evidences!  So there is only way I could prove that I have to call my Phone service provider to give me a call log so I could prove them that I did call.    That really annoy because I live in FLORIDA.  We were shutdown by the governor.  Am not sure why the hotel did not really considered that people has to
Manager Response: Hello cindyIR7529AM,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel, although we wished it were under better circumstances.  I am sorry that you were unable to travel to Santa Ana due to the pandemic.  Typically, the hotel has a cancellation policy of 48 hours to be able to cancel without a penalty; due to the pandemic, we extended that cancellation to 24 hours and even allowed previously non-cancellable reservations to be cancelled as long as its within that time frame. In order to assist with the refund, we require a cancellation number. As it stands, your reservation fell as a "No Show". We can discuss a little further if you wish my contacting me at: gpatino@doubletreeocairport.com or 714-825-3333.  Thank you again for your feedback and I hope to get you a resolution to your issue.

Summary: According to them they just reopened after cleaning .......well they didnt clean very well because it was filthy and the calcium build up on shower head meant it barely worked and was very low. But hallways were dirty sticky. Also my husband checked in first and said he was glad it was him and not me , as no one at front desk but sketchy person in baggy shorts asking all kinds of crazy questions ......finally front desk showed up......lucky my husband picked me up later so didn't have to deal with that. Also no breakfast understand the COVID thing but most hotels have a bag of breakfast to go but not here.Also via phone said they were waiving fees for diamond members and essentials workers which we are both and that was a complete lie. Def would never stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear UKVISIT,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is genuinely appreciated as it is the first step in helping us improve our services. We are constantly looking for ways to improve cleanliness; specially during this pandemic. Since July, we have launched the Hilton CleanStay in partnership with Lysol in order to enhance cleaning procedures at our property and provide peace of mind for our guests. As far as breakfast, we are currently offering grab and go breakfast at our Blend coffee shop and complimentary room service breakfast  for Diamond members. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Wonderful welcome and warm cookies greet you after the doorman tends to your car and luggage.  The hotel lobby is spacious as well as the rooms which were so comfortable also.  This location is close to many eateries that you can walk to.  There is also a shuttle that will take you to any places within 3 miles and also the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Squigglemeir,   We appreciate you writing a review about our hotel. It is our honor to hear that we were able to make your stay as convenient as possible.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very friendly staff. Donna the bartender was very nice and helpful. Staff very helpful during fire alarm. Stayed as aircrew during a layover. Several nice dining options within walking distance. Of course the cookies were great.
Manager Response: Dear Oceancitybeachbum,   Thank you for choosing our hotel and taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to hear that Donna was able provide you with great service.  It is our pleasure to have served you, we hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Don't get the food, park somewhere else, and bring extension cords.
Summary: Stayed here for a business trip. The instructor said it was his favorite place to stay before this week. They served us cold food for lunch on Monday and Tuesday, most of us got ill. When we asked them about it, the manager said it couldn't possibly be from their food, it takes at least 24 hours to take affect. Our Food Safety Inspections course was teaching us the opposite. The manager was more attentive by Wednesday, but we shouldn't have had to worry about I to begin with. Power outlets are poorly placed and hard to get to. One room we used had exposed wiring. Parking is $20 per night and they WILL run out and expect you to tip the valets. Cars were parked over the sidewalk and it was not ADA accessible. Decor is outdated, pest control appeared have missed a couple
Manager Response: Dear JL1117,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and services you deserved during your stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues with your food and services provided by the hotel, we will work diligently with our teams to ensure the situations don't happen again.   Thank you again for your constructive criticism and hope you give us a chance to make a better impression in the future.

Summary: Overall good hotel with good amenities, make sure you mention and they enter your HHonors account if you have one. Otherwise it will be overlooked. Parking is easily accessible, beds are great, oh also, make sure they don't put you in ADA accessible if you don't need one, they did put me in one even though I did not ask for it, oh well. Cookies are great:)
Manager Response: Hello Mekans2020,   Thank you for writing a review about out hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed all of our amenities during your stay. We hope to see you again and we appreciate your loyalty.

Summary: Visited Disneyland for a long weekend and booked here for a great rate. Alexander was wonderful checking us in. Room was ample with a large television. This was nice as we are seeing smaller TVs. Bed was comfy and rooms are quiet. Parking is located underground and can be tough to find a spot on a busy weekend. Great location!!
Manager Response: Dear Petra623,  We are excited to hear that you had a great stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience, and most importantly, to recognize Alexander for his service.  He will be thrilled to know he made a positive impact on your stay.  Thank you again for your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The parking elevator situation is stupid...I arrived at midnite and got stuck in the underground elevator with 7 other guests because you need a key to go up to the lobby.  One group had keys cause they already checked in but, of course, the key didn't work.  So we got out to walk upstair but the stairway was locked.  You have to drag your luggage all the way inside to outside of the parking lot, and walk around the dark street sidewalk corner in order to access hotel from at lobby.  Many hotel have key requirement for room access, BUT this is a first for underground parking that give guests no option other than walk half a mile to check in.  Room is very nice and clean.  Bed is comfortable. There's constant humming on the floor all nite felt like a fridge compressor.  Sound
Manager Response: Dear toothxt,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We're truly sorry to hear your stay did not live up to expectations. We strive to bring the light and warmth of hospitality to each and every guest, but it appears we have missed the mark this time. We greatly appreciate your insight and have shared this with our team to motivate improvement efforts and better our service delivery. We know you deserve better and hope you accept our deepest apologies for not delivering the outstanding stay you deserve. We sincerely hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us the opportunity to show you our improvements and deliver a more rewarding stay.

Summary Heading: A Doctor’s trip to Orange County
Summary: Business trip to the Orange County, to get inspired and make new connections. The weather was nice but the pool was small. The people were friendly but the bed was warn and a little lacking in support.
Manager Response: Dear drdaniel4u,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are disappointed to hear that your bed was lacking support. We understand the importance of providing extraordinary accommodations for our guests and want you to know that we have taken note of your feedback as we look to make improvements.   We are committed to providing you with an excellent guest experience and hope you will consider visiting us again in the future.

Summary: We have loved this hotel. The staff is friendly and efficient. The rooms are comfortable and super clean. The parking is excellent under cover below the hotel. There are a few simple eateries across the street with fun ethnic and local choices. It is very close to the airport. Will be back.
Manager Response: Dear kawidd,  We couldn't be happier to read your review on us.  The staff will be happy to know they made a positive impact on your stay. Thank you for letting us know of your experience.  Thank you again for the great review.  We look forward to when you return to the Santa Ana area and can stay with us once again!

Summary: Every staff member was professional and helpful.  And I repeatedly requested cookies and wasn't denied once.    The room was nice.  The bathroom doesn't have an exhaust fan, so bring Fabreze for your companion.  😉 The old coffee filter from a previous guest wasn't removed by housekeeping.  🤮 The bed was comfortable and the linens looked clean.
Manager Response: Dear lamaestra91,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback as we are constantly looking for ways to improve our amenities and services. I have forwarded your compliments as well as the issues in your room to our team for proper follow up. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and hope to make an even better impression with you next time.

Summary: This hotel was amazing for the price you could not ask for more definitely a four-star hotel Yass was  absolutely an amazing host we checked in late she helped us find a place to eat and  made our stay awesome
Manager Response: Dear Bmxmon,   We appreciate you writing a review. We are happy to hear that our hotel was able to live up to your expectation and provide you with great service. We are thankful for your loyalty. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff.  Rooms are nice.  Spacious lobby.  Walking distance to several nice restaurants.  Great shopping nearby.  Close to SNA airport.  Great breakfast with professional wait staff.  All around this is a great hotel and hope to stay here again.  Quiet and peaceful atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear Jtaylor,   Thank you for writing a review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with our hotel. We hope to provide you with friendly and professional service again in the near future, see you soon!

Summary: The blankets were worn with holes, towels stained and with wear visible, no response to requests for replacement of coffee cups and creamer in room.  Check out was a nightmare.  10 people in line wit only 1 person at the desk. Absolutely not what it use to be. Very disappointing
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor, although we wished it were under different circumstances.    We are sorry that you had such a disappointing experience with us. We apologize our service and accommodations fell short of your expectations.  We appreciate the insight and will follow up with our hotel to ensure we do a better job of replacing any supplies that need to be replaced and staffing accordingly for busier mornings.  Again, thank you for your review and we do hope you will find it in your heart to stay with us again when you are back in the area.

Summary: Nice hotel. Suzy helped me out at the front desk and she was amazing. Super nice, and super friendly. The Rooms were very nice as well. Comes with breakfast, too. I Will definitely come back again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are happy that your experience was a good one with us.  To read that Susy made a positive impact on your stay and that we met your expectations is great to hear. Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again!

Summary: The Doubletree brand brings with it certain expectations. With those in mind this is a good example. The staff are all friendly and the rooms clean and a decent size. The gym is well equipped too. However, the lift (elevator) situation is terrible. One out if two was out of order (three days and counting) and, according to a guest, this is a regular occurrence.   I took the stairs,  before you ask, but they take you outside.  Not good - get it fixed!
Manager Response: Dear vonireland,  Thank you for sharing this invaluable insight into your recent visit. We are pleased to hear that you received friendly service from our staff and that you enjoyed your room and our gym. We are truly sorry that our elevator was out of service during your stay. Feedback such as yours helps us to identify areas where we need improvement. The attention to detail and proactive service separates one property from another. We strive to ensure all of your needs are met, but it seems we can do better. Please know our team is reviewing your comments as a way to better serve you going forward. We hope to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: The location is nice close to John Wayne airport. The hotel is old and dark and worn. Rust was in my bathtub and lightbulbs was not working. One elevator was working and long lines waiting for this. Restaurant staff was welcoming, but the menu was boring and the surroundings reminded me of hotels from a time long forgotten. I ended up checking out after one day and booked another hotel. It was simply to depressing.
Manager Response: Dear johanm92,  Thank you for staying with us at our hotel. We appreciate your candid review of our property.  New perspectives about our hotel and our guestroom appearance help us make improvements to our guest experience on an ongoing basis. Additionally, we’re sorry the food quality didn’t meet your expectations. We work continually to enhance our menu offerings, and your comments will help us improve. We will continue to focus our efforts, and we hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us a second chance to deliver the stay you deserve.

Summary Heading: Good from far, far from Good!
Summary: I’m a heavy traveler, global and domestic. I had booked 8-nights at this Doubletree based on recommendation and I’m a HH member.   For the money, better value elsewhere! 1. Bathroom - multitude of rust stains around bath overflow drain.  2. Bathroom - massive (2ft x 5”) of delaminated paint/coating at back of tub. I stood on paint chips while showering.  3. Room -huge HD TV, guide says HD channels. ALL standard def channels, only with half of them lost signal.  4. Charge for Breakfast 5. Wanted $22/night for parking!!!  When complained dropped to $12. I checked parking site for John Wayne airport, they charge them, $9, but want $12/22 from HH.   CHECKED OUT after two days and went to Marriott Residence Inn. Far better value for the money!
Manager Response: Dear Plugger222,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. It truly disappoints us to hear your stay did not go as smoothly as we had intended. We only want the best for our valued guests and members, and clearly we missed the mark this time. We've shared the key points you highlighted with our team to use as training tools and step up our service delivery. We will continue to focus our efforts, and we hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us a second chance to deliver the stay you deserve.

Summary: It was a pleasing stay. Nice people and nice room. Good price, nice people, perfect location. Very comfortable bed. Parking was easy, it was peaceful and quiet. Staff was friendly from the front desk, valet, restaurant, office people behind the scenes (I met them in the elevator...very nice people.
Manager Response: Hello spcain,  Thank you for your raving review! We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay all around and that our team got a special mention from you. We will be sure to pass on the positive feedback. Hope we have a chance to host you again during your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: We had a short stay (one night) but we really enjoyed it. Room was very clean. The front desk personnel were very sweet and welcoming. Only downside was that the walls are pretty thin (we kept people talking and playing a guitar).
Manager Response: Hello Jackie A,   We are glad that your stay was very welcoming and that we were able to provide you and your family with great service. We appreciate your review and would love to serve you again.

Summary: Rooms were nice and quiet. Beds were comfortable. One annoyance was that I called the front desk to request (late) housekeeping, and they said that housekeeping would probably be able to make up my room. I could also see housekeeping still busy in the hallway outside. But when I returned in the evening housekeeping did not make up my room. The parking garage is convenient, but parking is way too expensive. The garage is mostly empty.
Manager Response: Hello briancG7245HO,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback about your stay. We are glad you enjoyed the rooms. We are sorry that your room was not serviced as requested. We will make sure going forward that no guest gets missed. We thank you so much for being our guest. We look forward to getting another opportunity to provide our 5 star service.

Summary: Nice experience, people next to me was very loud I notified front desk and the situation was resolved quickly. Went to the bar when I arrived everyone was very nice. Actually the driver who was just getting off was very nice to our crew.
Manager Response: Dear Trip586397,   Thank you for writing a review about our hotel. We are pleased to have provided you with great service. Our team is truly happy to have had the opportunity to serve you and your crew.

Summary: The staff was helpful and welcoming, and the accommodations were superb Because of its property location, there bbn is a $22/day charge for parking which is excessive for a non-resort hotel, but I'm not sure that can be helped. Overall, it was a great stay
Manager Response: Dear Hawaii49er,  It is our honor to hear that we were able to provide you with such a warm welcome. We are glad that you had such a pleasant stay, we hope to  serve you again soon with our great service!

Summary: A very nice stay, we have stayed there before, the location is very convenient to Orange County attractions, is very well maintained, the rooms are clean and efficient, the staff has always been friendly.  I am sure we will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Hello MarkieRosenthal,   Thank you for your loyalty with our hotel. We are truly pleased to hear that we were able to continue to make you stay with our hotel enjoyable once more.  See you soon!

Summary: Housekeeping missed 2 out of 4 nights. No signature cookies on arrival. Breakfast was delicious and dining staff was amazing  Parking garage elevator requires hotel key to access elevator so when checking in you have to either valet or hike up the hill with your luggage
Manager Response: Dear mrua2016,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and while we’re so happy you enjoyed a delicious breakfast, we are very sorry for the issues encountered with cleanliness and our elevator. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, and we hope you will come visit us in the future.

Summary Heading: Whomever does the hiring does a phenomenal job !!
Summary: Alexander and Abbey at front desk are just a delight.   Adam who works night shift really saved the day for me one time and theres one other young lady that is always so happy i will get her name and edit.      i have to admit a couple of years ago i acturally wrote a negative review.    now i cant say enough of good things.   Clean, Friendly , very competitive, etc.....   dont bother wiuth other double tree across the way.   they have the worst attitudes and will treat you like a number.       I think in the last seven mopnths ive stayed here 27 days.      KUDOS  to management and their hiring decisions.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was very pleased with the service I was given this evening by Abby at the front desk. It’s very clean and the hotel staff is very attentive and friendly.I definitely will be staying here again and I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Abby at the front desk was so sweet and helped me and my mom so much! Shout out to her!!! The stay was wonderful and the room was nice and spacious. The man who works in the store down stairs is also very nice as well!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although it is next to a man-made pond, this double tree was an okay stay. I paid for the "holiday essentials" package which included a daily breakfast, premium wi fi, and late check out. The location was nice. When I checked in, my holiday essentials package was not mentioned at all. The lake view room is best when you stay above the 4th floor. The room I stayed in only had 1 trash can and missing some of the complimentary bathroom essentials. No mini fridge is included. Satellite TV was definitely not at full working order since a 1/3 of the channels were not working. The toilet was also not working (poor flow). Will most likely be my last stay here.
Manager Response: Dear smagana85,  We regret that your experience with us was anything less than ideal and that you faced such complications with your room. We're also disappointed to hear the service you received wasn't up to par. Providing our guests with exceptional service is something we take seriously. Please know that your feedback be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future.

Summary Heading: Staff is not willing help, seem overwork. Room is okay thought.
Summary: Most staff at the front desk is not interested in helping, from requesting a quieter room to asking for general questions.  Room is nice and hotel is at a nice location.   Cleaning team is awesome thought.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff has no compassion, very short responses almost scripted. I spoke with Suzie a supervisor she didnt care about anything other than her policy. During our call the only thing I heard was policy and what she COULDN'T DO.  Way to wow a customer. Total thumbs down. I understand policy
Manager Response: Dear TrailBlazer623281,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that the next time you’re in the area you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.

Summary: My husband and I stayed a night as we had our associate Christmas Party in the banquet room, we usually stay a the Westin (much more expensive) we were hesitant on booking. We were both impressed by the suite space, comfort and customer service. We will be returning for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, friendly staff, lots of amenities. Stayed here several times. Always go back. Have never had an issue. Entire group I stayed with this time, we all had a great time. Food is good in the restaurant. Gift shop has lots of choices.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is nice and big,the room was nice,big and clean.I was so happy to have a TV that was bihher than 50",the employees were nice and courteous,the valet person needs to open up the woman's door before the man,the only problem is that I had a little rust in tub
Manager Response: none

Summary: The plumbing in the room I had received was clogged before I was even able to actually use the restroom. The air conditioner and fridge were also both very loud in the room and made it hard to sleep. Also, even though I had the do not disturb sign on my door. every day I would be woke up by house keeping.
Manager Response: Dear savannahsrose90,   Thank you for your review. As a flawless guest experience is what we aim for, it appears we missed the mark. Please accept our apologies for the lackluster stay and for the unsolicited wake-up call. We've shared your experience with our team and have committed to be more vigilant with our service standards. We welcome you to return next time you are in the area to see our improvements and receive the level of hospitality you deserve.

Summary: Suzy and Abby went above and beyond our expectations tonight! This is our third time staying in the hotel and these lovely ladies made our night with the gluten free cookies we always enjoy each stay! When we arrived they only had the regular cookies, they went out of their way to hit the mark for our special request! Double tree is our second home thanks to special employees who accommodate their guest like this!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Of all the DoubleTrees I've stayed in around the state, this one is up there in terms of how nice it is and how great the foot at the onsite restaurant was- they have a different special each night, and we loved what we had. I didn't use any of the amenities, but the room was very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Almost everything about the hotel was wonderful.  The hotel was great, breakfast was wonderful.  The only downfall to my stay was the lumpy, uncomfortable, very well used mattress in the room.  The cookie was great.  I would still stay at Double Tree, this was just a bad night.  Usually never have any issues.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This small hotel has small rooms too, no free breakfast, paid parking and no walking distance restaurants nor groceries nearby. Free wifi, beds are comfy and bedroom and toilets are clean. The best part of our stay is their free chocolate chip cookies! A must try for every guest!
Manager Response: Dear cresil,   Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We greatly appreciate your compliments and kind words about our cleanliness and bed comfort, but we would be amiss if we did not relay our disappointment to hear we did not fully meet expectations on your recent visit. We've taken all points of concern mentioned above to heart and have shared these with our team. It's our intention to use this as a learning opportunity and guideline in our improvement efforts. We're consistently fine-tuning our service levels to keep them at the high level our valued guests deserve, so your insight is more valuable than you know. Thank you again for sharing, and we hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us the privilege to host you once more.

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms and beds. Good work area with sufficient charging outlets. The staff was friendly, professional and accommodating. Excellent bar and restaurant, very friendly staff. I had a couple outstanding omelets and home made granola for breakfast. I will return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed one night at this hotel on a Friday. Check-in was quick and and we received our two complimentary Hilton Honors water bottles. We were pleased to see our room upon check-in on the HH floor. However, after being in the room for about two hours finishing up some work, we heard a bubbling sound come from the bathroom & were suspicious of the sink. 5 minutes later, the entire room smelled like rotten egg! I called the front desk and she sent an engineer who basically confirmed nothing was wrong with the sink and the water was flowing. I asked if we could switch rooms and she kindly provided me another set of room keys.   Upon entering our second room, there was no office chair and the fridge was broken. We were also about to brush our teeth when the sink
Manager Response: Dear travelswu,  Thank you for sharing this invaluable insight into your recent visit. We are disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy your stay due to the odor coming from the sink. Our goal is to create a rewarding experience for our guest and based on your feedback it seems as though we have fallen short on this occasion. We will definitely share your concerns with our maintenance team as to address the issues you mentioned. Feedback such as yours helps us to identify areas where we need improvement. It's the attention to detail and proactive service that separates one property from another. We strive to ensure your every need is met, but it seems we can do better. Please know our team is reviewing your comments as a way to better serve you going forward. We hope to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: Old and Out-of-order air-conditioning system and bad ventilation
Summary: We went there to stay over for a wedding as recommended by the wedding party.  Therefore, we did not do much research which is a big mistake.  The hotel is very old with broken air conditioning systems.  The first night we were there, the air conditioning was as noisy as a ship engine and we had to turn it off.  We ended up feeling very hot and did not sleep well.  The front desk apologized and said the air conditioning system in that room was broken.  She promised to give us 5000 Hilton Honors points as compensation and promised it would appear on our account in one week.  But, it never happened. The next night, we changed to another room.  The air conditioning was supposed to be working well.  But, it was still a lot noisier than all the other regular hotels that we have
Manager Response: Dear lesabelg,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent feedback. We're very sorry that we were unable to meet your expectations, specifically regarding the air conditioning. We strive to ensure your every need is met, but it seems we can do better. Please know our team is reviewing your comments as to better serve you going forward. We hope  you'll consider staying with us again whenever your travels bring you back to Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and a Great price
Summary: We needed a hotel close to Anaheim for one night and the price for 2 rooms at this hotel was within our budget. We will normally book with points but the AAA discount price made it more cost effective to pay for the room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughters and I stayed at this Doubletree for 4 nights while visiting Orange County area. Clean, friendly staff. James at the valet was our first employee we met and he was a delight. Very welcoming to Calofirnia with his friendly service and smile. The front desk staff helped us with every question we had with a smile and of course a warm cookie and water. We were there to visit Disneyland and the beautful California beaches. I would recommend this Hilton Hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've heard the same excuse for (not having an HD signal in the rooms)  the past 5 years. Were in the middle of changing our cable/dish company services. Apparently this franchise owner is too cheap to subscribe and offers the same excuse each time. I feel bad for the employees that have to repeat the BS excuse.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is like lipstick on a gorilla.   They have some flashy decor in the lobby but every step u take you start seeing the charm fall away.  The carpet looks like its 30 years old... the elevator vibrates and creak in an unsettling way... the traffic outside the hotel never seems to stop creating a noisy sleeping environment... the pool is plain and uninspiring... the water pressure in the shower is dissmal... the gift shop is a tiny cheap little closet.. and the deal clerks although they smile sweetly didn't actually provide the basic services that I needed. I will not be staying here again and will be informing the admin at my company not to book this hotel for anyones business travels in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Abbie H,   Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We're truly sorry to hear your stay did not live up to expectations. We strive to bring the light and warmth of hospitality to each and every guest, but it appears we have missed the mark this time. We greatly appreciate your insight and have shared this with our team to motivate improvement efforts and better our service delivery. We know you deserve better and hope you accept our deepest apologies for not delivering the outstanding stay you deserve. We sincerely hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us the opportunity to show you our improvements and deliver a more rewarding stay.

Summary: Hotel is all around good. Nothing exceptional but for the price/location it's pretty good. I like double trees because they are consistent. I can say don't waste any money on the room service. Usually room service is over priced but pretty good food. This is junk at an insane rate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: With Doubletree quality, the cookies, very good onsite restaurant as well as several others in walking distance, including Starbucks, this is a great choice for business or leisure travel.  Good dinner specials Mon-Thurs and an airport shuttle to boot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great customer service - I felt welcomed. Staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was spacious and clean.  The bed was very comfortable.  The valet service was great.  Easy check-in and check-out.  I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One elevator, broken bathroom sink, out dated equipment
Summary: First of all the Hilton survey is way too long, it should be just one or two questions. One elevator for a large hotel made it long waits, and it's as if the sign at the front desk about the elevator being down was the same to Hilton as having a working elevator. Put up a sign, problem fixed. Broken sink, low self-esteem inn!!!
Manager Response: Dear histan2019,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered and we’re working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. As well, we will share your feedback about the survey received with the Hilton corporate offices. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again and give us an opportunity to show improvement.

Summary: Staff are very accommodating, rooms are clean, and the hotel is centrally located to various excursions and events.  We were on a couples getaway and there are  a couple of very good restaurants within walking distance and room service meal equaled 2 meals for us...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a Friday stay that was relaxing after an extended stay in the nice outdoor hot tub and very relaxing bed.  Only down side was the quality of the food in the restaurant. Manger did try to make right
Manager Response: none

Summary: They offer an airport parking service.  1. they were not clear as to where I was to actually park.  I finally got situated. Parked. Went to catch the shuttle. I asked front desk regarding where I had parked and if it was ok. I was told, yes it is ok.  Two weeks later when I got back my car had been hit.  I was parked by security cameras.  Front desk was not helpful at all.  I just want the info from the video as to who hit my car.  The cameras are a joke.  I have been on hold more than 30 minutes this morning trying to get a hod of security,  Front desk picked up, put me on hold and never came back.  What kind of a hotel are you running here??? Where is anyone in customer service? I would not stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room and central to great attractions
Summary: Great area to stay! Hotel room is clean and well decorated. At check in with offer a warm YUMMY cookie!!! Defiantly recommend taking the cookie! The hotel centrally located between the beach, Disney, baseball stadium and much more!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hilton Doubletree is a slightly older facility. The price does reflect this. It doesn’t disappoint in areas of comfort, cleanliness, amenities or service. We adjusted well after our warm nightly cookie. 😋 Safe area close to interstate.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read that our team met your service expectations and that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable. Our team will love to read that they made a positive impact on your stay.  Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to greeting you again with a warm chocolate chip cookie!

Summary: I’m giving this hotel 5 stars. Everything from the room to the food to the complimentary cookies & water at night when getting back late was excellent! The staff here are very accommodating and will go out of their way to assist in anything you need.
Manager Response: Hello sherry000962,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read that you enjoyed our famous DoubleTree cookies, our food as well as the service from our team. It is nice to know the staff was accommodating throughout your stay. They will be happy to know they made a positive impact on your stay. We thank you for sharing it with us.  Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again!  Sincerely,  Gadira Patino Front Office Manager

Summary: Pool is dinky but the rooms are great. Staff are great as well even when dealing with an unreasonable quest. Breakfast was made to order eggs and a menu bar. Very nice and convenient. Easy freeway access.
Manager Response: Hello lvdatweety95965,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read that you found the rooms to be great, as well as the team.  It is nice to know the team did a good job assisting an unreasonable guest, which we will let them know of their good job.  I'm positive the team will also love reading your review as well.  We thank you for sharing it with us.  Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I feel like the quality of the rooms can be better with the price your paying for. The $10 daily parking rate is ridiculous as a guest to the hotel there shouldn't be a charge as your paying so much already. Bathtub needs to be updated and maintained as ours had a very slow drain and rust accumulated around the drain. Pillows could use a fluff and larger pillows would've been a bit better
Manager Response: Hello JAP650,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate the feedback.     We are sorry you felt the experience was not worth the money.  We appreciate your feedback so we can continue to work on our quality and service and your insight will do just that.  Thank you for sharing it with us.     Again, thank you for your review of us. We do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree in Santa Ana recently. It was a central location to all events for the weekend. I loved the drinks and the bartender was amazing! But what I didn’t love was bar menu. I was very surprised that there was not any typical bar food of wings, sliders, fries, or nachos. The bar food consisted of high end eggplant hummus, deviled eggs, and a margarita pizza. These dishes are good, but don’t mix well when you are drinking a lot and need to coat your stomach. I do recommend that the hotel adjust their bar menu. It will definitely attract more drinkers!
Manager Response: Hello shevone448,  Thank you so much for posting a review about our restaurant and hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate the feedback on your experience.   We are so happy that you enjoyed the drinks and the bartender while staying with us.  I'm sorry that our bar menu wasn't what you were expecting and we didn't have the normal bar menu fare.  We will certainly take your comments under advisement and let the team know of them.  They are greatly appreciated.    Thank you again for your review of us. We look forward to when you can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Hotel Staff not friendly or welcoming; Restaurant services was poor and food quality marginal. Breakfast Buffet was missing many items (out of food) and couldn't get the waiters to provide coffee, etc.  Room was clean and presentable.
Manager Response: Hello scottldavis,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are sorry to read that you found the hotel team to be not friendly or welcoming.  This is out of the norm for the team, but we will certainly follow up on this issue.  We are happy that you found the room to be clean and presentable, though.   Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in desperate need of updating.    The common space and rooms are old, uninviting and unpleasant in general. The breakfast was chaotic and understaffed - slow service and dishes not restocked in buffet area. The staff are all gracious and kind but clearly they are overwhelmed and as a customer you feel guilty asking for service because they look so busy. We stayed 3 night and on the last night our next door neighbor was blasting music at 1130pm and it took 2 calls to guest services to get them to quiet down. Overall I would definitely not return nor recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Alia H,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor, although we wished it were under different circumstances.    We are sorry that you found our hotel to be outdated and needing of updating.  On top of that, us being busy and having the team look to be understaffed made it seem even more difficult to stay with us.  We appreciate the insight and will follow up with our hotel to ensure we do a better job of staffing and follow up. Thank you for letting us know.  Again, thank you for your review and we do hope you will find it in your heart to stay with us again when you are back in the area.    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Sleep on a cloud. This was one of the most comfortable hotels we have stayed at. Having a warm cookie upon entrance. Clean facilities from the moment you walk in. A refridge in your room. Convenient parking. They made our stay very very comfortable. Close to easy traveler amenities starbucks and various dining for a quick bite. Made it a very nice stay
Manager Response: Hello Voyage752518,  Thank you so much for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate the feedback on your experience.   We are so happy to read that enjoyed your stay and had a comfortable night's rest.  The famous DoubleTree cookies are always a plus too.  The team will love to read how much you appreciated their efforts in cleanliness, as well as amenities we offered.  Thank you for letting us know.    Thank you again for your review of us. We look forward to when you can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Just your basic hotel, rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  Swimming pool is quite small but it does have a nice workout area.  It was frustrating that one of the elevators went down during stay and was still down when we left.  This caused major delays getting to your room.
Manager Response: Hello 2plus4Family,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.   We are happy to read that you enjoyed your overall experience with us with the clean rooms, comfortable bed and nice workout area.  I am sorry there was an elevator issue while you were staying with us, but please be assured this was repaired and now in working order.  Unfortunately, this was not the case with you, but we still appreciate you letting us know.  Again, thank you for your review and we do hope to have you stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Very run down for the cost. Most of the staff was not helpful and rooms are uncomfortable. The garage does not have enough spaces for all guests so you may not find a space but will be charged $22/night.
Manager Response: Hello erstep98,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel, although we wished it were under different circumstances.  I am sorry that you felt the team was not helpful and the rooms seemed uncomfortable.  We understand that when we are busy and the parking lot is full that it can be frustrating, especially when you arrived after midnight.  We will continue to work on our parking situation so that we can ensure spaces on very busy nights.  Thank you for letting us know.    Again, we appreciate your feedback.  We do hope you will find it in your heart to give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest.    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: While this is an expensive area to stay in I still felt that the hotel did not live up to the DoubleTree standards of other Hilton hotels.  For what I had to pay for a room it seems a lot of remodeling is needed.  That said, the staff was delightful and accommodating.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin P,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your feedback.  Your comments are well taken and we thank you for letting us know about your experience with our guestrooms.  We are happy to read that in light of the guestroom, you found the team to be delightful and accommodating.  The team will love to see your comment on them and we thank you for your kind words.  Again, we thank you for your review and we do hope you will still give us an opportunity to have you as our guest again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Paid overbooked parking, leaving guest outside
Summary: We paid for self parking, yet the parking was overbooked.  We came back one night around 10 pm, there was no parking spot left, forced to park next door (no extra charge), it was really an inconvenience.  There was valet spots left, yet we were not allowed to park there unless we paid full price instead of complimentary or just pay the difference since this was not our fault.
Manager Response: Hello BillyMedford,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.   I am sorry that were issues with parking that made you not have a perfect experience.  Thank you for letting us know as we'll be following up with the valet and hotel teams on how we can improve the flow of the parking.  It is feedback such as yours that will help us improve our service and quality.  Again, thank you for your review.  We do hope to have you as our guest again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I have been to this hotel several times and all of my stays have been great. As a HHonors member,  I am very satisfied with the room. Most important, my request for a late check-out ( 4 pm) has always been granted and I truly appreciate it.
Manager Response: Hello Jo S,  Thank you so much for posting such a nice review about our hotel and service on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read that you've had consistently great service each time you've come to the hotel.  As an Honors member, we appreciate your loyalty to the brand and our hotel.  Thank you for letting us know about your experience.  Thank you again for your review of us.  We look forward to when you can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Great location, parking was a bit pricey especially if you get in too late and there are no spots available. Elevator was out of order to get to parking 2 of the days while we were there which complicated things but not much could be done. Overall great hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Dawn R,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate the feedback on your experience.    We are happy to read that you found us to be a good location with a great breakfast and that the overall experience was so good.  I'm sorry there was an issue with the elevator to the parking garage after the recent earthquakes, but that has since been resolved.  We thank you for sharing your comments with us.  Again, thank you for your review of our hotel and we look forward to when you can come back to stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Overall great staff, very helpful.  Food at restaurant was basic but good.  Facilities were well kept and clean.  Parking was extra charge of $25 per day, a little cheesy for the hotel.  Drinks in the gift shop were very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Hello jeffbA8952AS,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are happy that your experience was a good one with us.  To read that the overall team was great and that the hotel was well kept and clean is great to read, and comments the team will love to see.  Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Good value and convenient to airport. Minor cleanliness issues with room that I reported upon checkout. SNA airport opens at 5:30am, so it doesn't make sense to get an earlier ride, instead of using their shuttle. Fitness facility has great equipment.
Manager Response: Hello F9548YKstevenb,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback on your experience.    We are happy to see you found us to be a good value and convenient to Orange County Airport.  Thank you for letting us know on the minor issues on the room and we'll be sure to continue to follow up on our quality.    Thank you again for your review and we do hope to have you back as our guest again when your travels bring you back to the area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Check in experience almost made me late for an important business dinner
Summary: Went to check in, they said I didn't have a reservation, I showed them my reservation, they looked again and said I didn't have a reservation and that I must have booked at the other Hilton hotel, told me to take Uber to the other hotel with no offer to call before, turns out I did have a reservation at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello twbathome,  Thank you for filling out a TripAdvisor review.  We greatly appreciate your feedback, although we wished it were under different circumstance.  I am sorry there was a miscommunication on our end with your reservation.  We have taken note of your comments and will follow up with our team as your reservation was missed by us.  Obviously, we could have been more attentive to your needs and I apologize that was not the case.  Thank you for letting us know so we can work on improving our service and quality.  Again, thank you for your review and I do hope that you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again when you are back in the Orange County area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Positive feedback about the hotel and one employee in particular
Summary: My experience was excellent at every level. The hotel has a great culture, and it is reflected everywhere.  I wanted to single out one employee in particular, a young man by the name of Alberto. He was extremely friendly, polite, professional, and went the extra mile to help me with anything that I needed. He really improves the guest experience, and reflects your hotel as positively as possible.
Manager Response: Hello donald55xx,  Thank you for posting such a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your comments on your experience.    It is so great to read how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  To say the culture is reflected everywhere is wonderful to see and a great observation as well.  To speak to highly of Alberto is not surprising as he is a great team member.  We are truly fortunate to have him working with us and we'll be sure to let him know of his job well done too.    Thank you again for your review of us.  We look forward to when you can come back to the Orange County area again and give us the opportunity to have you as our guest.    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Great staff and comfy accommodations... don't be fooled by the other Doubletree in Santa Ana (Hutton Centre) - service there is lackluster, food is inconsistent and accommodations are not comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Adventure37930480698,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your feedback.
