Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This was a great place to stay while I was there! It was in a great place with a lot of accommodations around that were easy to get to. I would recommend this place to anyone. I would also go back and stay there my next time in the area!
Manager Response: Hello Pioneer56250580092,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read how much you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would not only come back and stay with us again, but you would recommend us to anyone as well.  That is a true testament to you experience and we couldn't be happier.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to when you are back in the area again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: The hotel and staff were wonderful, so friendly and helpful at all times. Our room was large, comfortable and clean. Travel in a wheelchair with extra needs can be hard but it was perfect and so relaxing a real vacation! Look forward to returning soon.
Manager Response: Hello Judith W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We truly appreciate your feedback.   The team will love to see your review and your wonderful comments on them.  Thank you for letting us know about their friendliness, the cleanliness they achieved and how you had such a relaxing experience with us.  We look forward to your return soon too!  Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to when we can have you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This is a very disappointing review to write.  My wife and I have stayed here repeatedly over the years.  It has always been a comfortable hotel in a good central location for us to visit friends and family.  We likely won’t be staying here again, although it’s partly also the fault of the Hilton app.  I’ll keep it short. The room looked fine.  It was clean and well stocked.  However, not everything worked.  Two electrical outlets didn’t work.   Which wasn’t noticed until my phone died an hour after I unplugged it.  The tv remote didn’t work properly.  There were empty pizza boxes in the hallways that weren’t  removed until late the next day.  The flower planter in the lobby was empty except for dirt and a couple pizza crusts.  Plus, when the hotel is busy with kidks sport
Manager Response: Hello Traveler395,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  I am sorry that you found our hotel to be downhill and that you mentioned you won't be staying with us again.  You have brought up some good issues for us to follow up with when we have sports teams staying at the hotel, along with the outlets that will need replacing too.  We are happy to see that you found the room to be fine and that the team was very pleasant and friendly.  Thank you for letting us know both sides of your experience.    Thank you again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I made reservations for this hotel this morning for seven days I drove an hour and 20 minutes away to get here and I made it very clear to the reservation technician that made my reservations that there would be no deposit and that I could pay cash for the full amount for this for seven days upfront and she said yes no problem when I got here there is no manager on site until Wednesday or supervisor. Alberto I believe that's his name he was very disrespectful and rude just smiling at me with that evil smile like basically a f me. I'm on hold right with Centrol office and they said everything I said is true and Centrol office said that the front desk is making up there on rules and they can't do that. I've been sitting in my car for about 1 hr and 30 mins. This is so not right I
Manager Response: Hello Brian P,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel, however, we wish it were under different circumstances.    We are sorry that there was an issue with your reservation and that someone had told you that paying cash was acceptable with no credit card.  This is something we will follow up with the reservations department that wasn't through Hilton.  Additionally, we are also sorry that you had to drive 80 minutes from Anaheim to get to our hotel only to have an issue occur, this was certainly not our intention.  Our team certainly wasn't trying to disrespect you, but I apologize if it was taken that way.  Thank you for letting us know so we can follow up with the team too.      Again, thank you for your feedback, as much as we hoped it would have been better.  We realize we may have lost you as our guest, but we do hope that you would reconsider if you are ever wanting to come to our area again.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Last night of Our 10th day of vacation!
Summary: Friendly service and a quick check in. Fresh and hot baked cookies 🍪. Got to the room early. Very clean room nice and comfy king size bed. Big screen tv. We would highly recommend this hotel and would come back and stay again.
Manager Response: Hello monicadG6903YJ,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We truly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read how much you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were the final night of your vacation.  The team will love to see how you thought they were friendly and how much you enjoyed the room.  To say you'd highly recommend us is a true testament to your experience and we cannot thank you enough.  Again, thank you for the kind words on the review and we look forward to when you can come back to the Santa Ana area and can stay with us again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Arrived with family checked into three rooms. Our front desk woman was very helpful and made sure the childrEn had cookies while we checked in and even offered complimentary breakfast to me and my family
Manager Response: Hello Pioneer179221,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review about our hotel!  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to read that you had great service and that he team member at the front desk was very helpful with you and your family.  I'm glad to see they made sure the children were taken care of, that is so important!  Thank you so much for sharing your comments.  Again, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your experience.  We look forward to when you can come back to the Santa Ana area and stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I stay at hotels three to four days a week.  I also am a diamond level Hilton level guest.   This hotel has nice people working there, but there seemed to be no sense of customer service.  When I checked in, I was given a room that was on a low floor right over the Main Street and it was very noisy.  When I came back for a new room, I had to wait about ten minutes to get the room changed because the two staff working the front desk where on a phone call.  One was trying to help a guest get to the hotel on the courtesy bus which was good but then someone else should have seen that two people were in line and helped us.   The bar is ok and the food is good.  But when I was at the bar, one of the people at the bar was harassing the very nice bartender and making people feel
Manager Response: Hello ScottB427,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback.    I am sorry to read that you did not like our hotel and that there was a wait with your room after your room move.  That is disappointing to read as it looks like we could have had someone assist, which was not the case.  Thank you for letting us know and I will follow up with the team on this.  Regarding the guest in the bar, we have addressed this with Hilton, as we know of whom you speak.  Please be assured that our team's well being and safety, as is our guest's too, is a top priority.  Again, we appreciate your insight and we'll be sure to continue to work on our service and quality.    Thank you for your feedback and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest.   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect night from driving all night
Summary: Greeted  well in valet help with walking in the hotel customer service was great got a room quickly hotel was nice and clean room was very comfortable blankets were clean and white was great  stay I would love to stay in a suite next visit.
Manager Response: Hello Fearless65841969739,  Thank you so much for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  I am happy to read that you were greeted well and had great service delivery upon your arrival from driving all night.  The team will be happy to see your comments on them, as well as their efforts at ensuring the room was clean and comfortable for you.  To say that you would like a suite upon your next visit is a true testament to how much you thought of our hotel and we thank you for the kind acknowledgment.    Again, thank you for the nice review. We look forward to when you return to the Santa Ana area and can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I had an amazing experience with my stay. The hotel was clean, the food was delicious, the cookies to die for and the customer service was exceptional. In specific, Augee; the hotel shuttle driver. He made our trip an unforgettable experience. He was professional, pleasant and just made us feel at home. You can just tell he takes his job very serious and that he truly enjoys his job. We loved the cookies, but would  definitely go back just for Augee. Highly recommend this one of kind hotel.
Manager Response: Hello melissac788,  Thank you so much for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your feedback.  It is so great to read that you had such a wonderful experience with us.  We couldn't be happier that you found the hotel to be clean with delicious food and exceptional service delivery.  Hearing about Augie does not surprise us as he is a great team member and one we are fortunate to have working with us.  We will be sure to thank him for a job well done.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and those that may read your review in the future.      Again, thank you for the great review. We look forward to when you return to the Santa Ana area and can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Great location, near to Freeway 55 and 405. And very close to South Coast mall. Have to mention the Breakfast and the friendly staff in the hotel restaurant. Excelent Service....!!! Rooms are super clean.
Manager Response: Hello achc77,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We couldn't be happier to read your review on us.  To say we have a friendly team in the restaurant, along with excellent service and clean rooms is wonderful to see.  The team will appreciate your kinds words too.  Thank you for letting us know of your experience.  Thank you again for the great review.  We look forward to when you return to the Santa Ana area and can stay with us once again!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I have to say that I was very happy with our stay at the Double Tree Santa Ana. Got a great deal and had to jump on and very glad I did. The hotel is between a very nice business Santa Ana & Irvine area. Keep in mind that they do have a parking fee of $22 self and $29 valet you might want to consider that extra charge to add to your over cost in my case it was still worth it. We got checked in by Alberto very quick and efficient young man, this time I did not book thru the hotel but still ask about Hilton Honors number,  gave us 2 bottles of water very nice touch and off to our room, I did feel this hotel is geared towards the business meeting client the lobby is more or meeting rooms did not really have a nice hang around lobby, we walk to our room and we are happy with our
Manager Response: Hello latinos28,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are just thrilled to read how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing about the hotel and especially about Alberto and his service delivery.  He does a great job and we are truly fortunate to have him working with us.  We will be sure to let him know of his job well done.  The team will also be happy to see how much you enjoyed the hotel too.  Thank you for letting us know of your experience.  Again, thank you for your review on our hotel and team.  We look forward to the next time you are back in Santa Ana and can stay with us!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Decent hotel, shame about the noise from adjoining room
Summary: This is a well-run Doubletree with friendly helpful staff, large comfy rooms, a fitness centre and a cool little outside pool. There's a free airport shuttle, an omelet bar at breakfast plus they very kindly allowed me to check in a little early, so overall a great stay.  Unfortunately, my room - 613 (honors floor)  - was noisy. There was quite a bit of traffic noise from outside, plus I could hear the people next door and their TV blaring late at night, even with earplugs in. The traffic noise wasn't too bad, but the TV / next door noise was disruptive for sleeping and working.  I appreciate that the hotel can't control guests behavior with the volume button, but suspect that the situation was exacerbated because the rooms were adjoined by a door. I recommend avoiding 613 / 615
Manager Response: Hello sarahdU2122RA,  Thank you for your review of our hotel on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your feedback.  What nice comments about our hotel being well run!  Thank you for letting us know about the hotel, the team, the breakfast and the early check in.  The team will appreciate your kind comments. I am sorry that the neighbors to your room were loud, as well as the traffic that you could hear.  I understand we cannot always control guests, but we could always do better to monitor the hallways even more to ensure guests keep their noise levels to an appropriate level.  Thank you for letting us know so we can work on this area.     Again, thank you for your review after your recent stay with us. We look forward to when you are back in Santa Ana and can stay with us again!   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I call the hotel several times to tell management that they need to spray for bugs.  something bit my breast the first night.  I thought it was a bruise and put alcohol and peroxide on it and later that week it heals and I saw two bite marks scab over.  I call the hotel to request that they spray the room for bugs.  I never received a call from management as of today.  I was there for 3-26 to 3-30-2019, when I checked out they told me the there printer was not working and they would email me. I had to call back to get them to email my receipt and was told them again that the manager never called me.  They haven't called me and I don't know if the sprayed room 450. They charge me $450 for my stay,
Manager Response: Hello LJP1956,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your feedback.  We are sorry that there was an issue with your room and that there was something that left marks.  Please know we take any insect issue seriously, so we did both an internal and external investigation and in both scenarios nothing was found.  I am sorry that I personally did not contact you back, but am happy to discuss with you at any time. I can be reached via email at kmyers@doubletreeocairport.com.     Thank you once again for your review and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you as our guest.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Stay in this hotel for business meeting. Very good and friendly service. Big and nice bar. Rooms are big with nice king. Breakfast is good. Private parking. Also pool in this hotel available. Very quiet rooms.
Manager Response: Hello Erik v,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are happy to see that you enjoyed your visit with us when you stayed during a business meeting.  To read that the hotel was good with friendly service is exactly what we love to see.  We are happy that you enjoyed the newly renovated bar and that the breakfast was good as well.  The team will enjoy reading your comments.      Again, thank you for your review after your recent stay with us.  We look forward to when you are back in Orange County and can stay with us again!    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This hotel is located very close to LAX and it is easy to get in and out of. The parking is convenient and the cost is reasonably inexpensive. The room was very nice and clean with a really large TV. The staff was helpful and check in and check out were easy.
Manager Response: Hello Carl D,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your feedback.  We are happy that you found the hotel to be clean with our new 55" HD 4k televisions that we are almost completed installing.  They are a wonderful feature that makes the experience improved.  However, to say that the team was helpful and the check in/check out process was easy, that means so much to us and the team.  Thank you for sharing it.  As a side note, we do hope you meant SNA instead of LAX as we, too, are close to the airport, albeit John Wayne/Orange County Airport.    Again, thank you for the review and we do hope you will be visit us in Orange County again when your travels bring you back to the area.  SIncerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: The staff at this hotel are absolutely wonderful! When I asked the girls at the front desk where to go shopping they pointed me in the right direction and informed me that the hotel shuttle would be able to drop me off since it was in their 3 mile radius of the hotel. I thought that I had hit the lottery since I didn’t have to pay for an Uber. Then came the shuttle driver Augie! What a treasure Augie was! He was so kind and helpful and told me all the good places to go and gave suggestions for dinner and activities. He even came back and picked me up!
Manager Response: Hello Untchj,  Thank you for posting such a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We greatly appreciate your feedback after your recent stay with us.   We are thrilled to see that your experience was absolutely wonderful.  To read about the team and Augie is what we strive to accomplish with service and it is great to see that happened with you.  We'll be sure to let Augie know of his great work and we are truly fortunate to have him working with us.   Thank you once again for your feedback.  We look forward to when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area and you are able to stay with us again!   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Hotel is older but well kept. Clean rooms, Friendly staff and warm cookies at check in are great. Only down side is only two elevators and they were really slow. Front desk was a little slow but in there defense they had 20 people checking in at once.
Manager Response: Hello cwiggins29,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor after your recent stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.   We are happy that you felt it was a good stay and that the hotel was well kept with clean rooms and a friend team.   That means so much to hear your experience.  I'm sorry the elevators were slow and the Front Desk was busy at the time you checked in.  We will look at our staffing more closely and hope to curb some of those instance when many people check in at once.  Thank you for letting us know!    Thank you again for your feedback. We look forward to when you are able to come back to stay with us again!   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: We travel to OC quite a bit and this is our go to place. The property is beautiful, the rooms are fabulous, the breakfast is delicious and the staff is second to none...Big shout out to Eli, Angie and Sheila for making our stay(s) wonderful! They are the best Front Desk Team EVER!!!
Manager Response: Hello Leonce B,  Thank you for posting a wonderful review about our hotel and team on TripAdvisor! We greatly appreciate your feedback.   We are happy that we've become your go to place when traveling to Orange County.  It is great to read how much you find our hotel to be beautiful, the rooms to be fabulous and the breakfast to be delicious.  More importantly it is great to read how much you find the team to be great.  Eli, Angie and Sheila are great team members and we are fortunate to have them working with us.  We'll be sure to let them know how much we appreciate their efforts.     Thank you once again for your feedback. We look forward to when you are able to come back to stay with us again!    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I stay at Hilton properties every week. I was very disappointed to find that this facility fell well below the service and facility quality I have come to know and love about Hilton. A better option is the Hampton Inn Riverside/Corona. It's not as close to the airport- but it is closer to what you expect from Hilton.
Manager Response: Hello Stephen A,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your feedback.   I am sorry that you had a below average experience with us.  We are disappointed to read that you felt our service and hotel quality fell below what you expect out of a Hilton branded hotel, but even more disappointed that you felt compelled enough to tell others to stay away and look to stay at a hotel 32 miles from us and John Wayne Airport.  We will continue to work on our service and quality.     Thank you again for your review.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: We were guests for a birthday and retirement celebration.  The location was easy to get to, parking was safe and convenient.  This was an excellent location and venue for a dinner party.  The food was outstanding!
Manager Response: Hello AuntieM37,  Thank you for posting a wonderful review about the event you attended at the hotel on TripAdvisor! We appreciate your feedback.   We are so happy to read about how much you enjoyed the birthday and retirement celebration that you attended at our hotel.  It is great to see that you found our location excellent and the food to be outstanding.  The team will love to see your comments and we appreciate you sharing them with us.     Thank you once again for your feedback. We look forward to when you are able to visit us or attend another celebration at our hotel again.     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Great accommodations and top notch service
Summary: Staying in for a business related trip for 12 days. Great stay comfortable and  relaxing. Have to say the front desk manager (Galinda)  Sp? And the shuttle driver Went above and beyond. Eugene the driver had a great conversation with me to a drop off and explained some of the area and nice places to visit to a person that has never visited the area with great detail and care and it’s this kind of service that would bring me back as a repeat  guest in any possible future travel plans thanks agai.  And as a side not the cookie is awesome  Joe
Manager Response: Hello ezkimo702,  Thank you for posting a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We truly appreciate the feedback after your recent stay with us.   We are just thrilled to read about how much you enjoyed your 12 night stay with us.  To read how comfortable and relaxing it was it great to see, but what is even more thrilling for us is to see your comments about our team.  We are fortunate to have both Gadira and Eugene working with us and we'll be sure to let them both know how thankful we are for their efforts.  Thank you for sharing your experience.     Again, thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to when you are able to visit us again when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area!   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: I stayed there for 1 night because we attended a wedding in the area. The room was super clean. The free printing in the lobby was helpful. I didn't get the breakfast, but there was water/coffee around the lobby which was nice!
Manager Response: Hello Excursion37338322623,  Thank you for posting a great review about our hotel on TripAdvisor! We truly appreciate the feedback after your recent stay with us.   We are very happy to read how much you enjoyed your stay.  The team will enjoy seeing your comments being super clean, thank you for sharing that with us. We couldn't be happier that you felt compelled to let us know of your experience.    Thank you again for your wonderful comments and we look forward to when you are able to get back to the Santa Ana area again!  .   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, no coffee, no continental breakfast.
Summary: There was not a continental breakfast.  There was no coffee available at the Front Counter.  No microwave available in room. Rooms were nice, hotel was clean.  Gym was okay weights only went to 50lbs, no machines.
Manager Response: Hello Aknadler,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your feedback on your experience.    We sorry that you had an average stay with us and that didn't offer a continental breakfast and didn't have any microwaves in the room.  Although not at the front desk area, we do offer complimentary coffee by the entrance to the restaurant.  We are sorry that was not mentioned to you while you stayed with us.  Thank you for letting us know that you that the rooms were nice and the hotel was clean as well.  The team will enjoy seeing those comments.  Thank you again for  your review and we do hope you will stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Just stayed here for a “staycation” with my boyfriend and really enjoyed the breakfast! I really want to thank Abel for going above and beyond. He was so friendly and even went out of his way to make me a hot chocolate when they didn’t even serve them. I felt every special and it shows he cares about all the guest.
Manager Response: Hello serenaaleece,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We truly appreciate the feedback after your recent stay with us.    We are very happy to read how much you enjoyed your staycation with us, in particular the breakfast.  Thank you for letting us know about Abel.  We are fortunate to have him working with us and we'll be sure to let him know of his job well done with your stay.      Thank you again for your wonderful comments and we look forward to when you want to getaway again for a visit to our hotel.      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Brief stay in this DoubleTree for a wedding. We didn’t fly into Santa Ana but the shuttle would have been great if we did. Room was mostly comfortable - a couple minor things preventing a 5 star review: the water pressure was not strong in the shower, all the pillows were overly soft, and the walls were super thin so we heard our “neighbors” and I’m sure they heard us.
Manager Response: Hello 914christinee,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor after your stay with us.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are  happy that you enjoyed your stay overall and that the room was comfortable.  As a note, we will be adding more firm pillows in the future, but I am sorry these seemed soft to you.  Also, we'll look into the water pressure as that isn't something we've heard.  Thank you for letting us know of your experience and giving us an opportunity to get these addressed.    Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to your next visit with us when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area!    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Our Company held a two day convention for 500 members & the Hotel doesn't have enough parking in the main building. I you don't ask you will never know that they have additional parking across the street. We found out by chance when we saw a parking attendant opening the gate in the Restaurant, car rental & people living in the building across the street.
Manager Response: Hello Irving J,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your feedback.   We are sorry you are not 100% satisfied, detailing the issues with parking.  It sounds as though we should have been more forthcoming regarding the additional overflow parking we have and I am sorry that there was a lack of communication with you.  We will follow up with the team on this so we can get more information out to the event organizers.  Thank you for letting us know.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we do hope you will come back to our hotel, whether for sleeping rooms or conducting a meeting.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This was a surprise (see photos). Tub refinish coat peeling off. Signs of rust. This was in room 740 (top floor).  Also, the iPhone app continues to fail on Checkout. I've reported it several times.  Until now, I've rated this hotel 4/5. I thought that I had finally found a responsible management team. No so. On each encounter with management failure, I will knock off a point. After the next one I'll disqualify this hotel.  One positive note: This hotel (possibly the brand) is the only one that seems to be supplying a real bathmat, something that I have also recommended for years.
Manager Response: Hello Larry W,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your feedback as it will help up improve our quality and service.     From reading your review, it looks like we needed to do some repairs to room 740.  Thank you for letting us know as we'll have our engineering team focus on this room so that other guests don't have the same issue.  Additionally, we'll follow up with Hilton on the app that seems to be inconsistent with you on the checkout option. I'm sorry that you feel our leadership team, in particular myself, is not responsible.  We obviously have work to do in order to change your opinion of our hotel.  Again, thank you for letting us know.     Thank you once again for your feedback and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest.     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: This hotel was in a great location for our event. I have stayed at Double Tree hotels many times in several areas and always found them to be at the top of hotel chains. The hotel was room was clean and the staff first class. It was an excellent location for our event.
Manager Response: Hello GoPlaces18984612247,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are so happy to read that you had a great stay and that our location near the freeways, along with the clean rooms and first class staff made your experience that much more enjoyable.  That means to us and the team will love to read your review too.    Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to your next visit us us soon!   Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: What a great stay! I need to mention Alberto from the front desk is by far the best! Very professional but so very accomodating as well. He went above abd beyond for me and i really appreciated it! Valet were ALL awesome! We had a bit of a hiccup with our tv but the engineering staff sprung right into action and fixed the issue immediately.  Thanks again Doubletree for such a stress free stay for me and my family! Until next time!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello island_gurl808,  Thank you for posting such a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your detailed comments about your stay.     We are thrilled to not only read about Alberto and how he made your stay memorable, but to see the team also recover well from the hiccup that occurred too.  We are fortunate to have Alberto working with us and we'll be sure to let him know, as well as the other team members too, that they played a part in your 5 star experience.  Thank you for sharing it with us and those that may read your review as well.       Thank you again for your feedback and as you said, until next time when you can have another stress free stay with us when your travels bring you back to Santa Ana area!      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel. Close to John Wayne / Santa Ana Airport. Only one restaurant on site. A few restaurants are around the hotel. Friendly staff. Shuttle to and from the airport available. There are many breakfast options but for my stay it was the same thing every morning.
Manager Response: Hello nicolew8091IC,  Thank you for posting a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your kind words about the hotel.  What wonderful comments you said about us.    We are happy that you found us to be a good value and our hotel to be nice.  To see that our location was suitable and the team was friendly is great to read.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.      Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when your travels bring you back to Santa Ana area!      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Welcoming Staff. Clean and organized hotel. The room was clean, bed was firm and sheets were clean. Bathroom was clean. Overall stay was very pleasant with no travel stress. Thank you to the wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Hello 327gw,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  What wonderful comments you said about us.    To read that the team was welcoming, the hotel was clean and organized and we gave you no travel stress, is simply perfect to us.  Thank you for sharing your stay experience, but more importantly, thank you for noticing the wonderful team too.  They will love to read your review and know they played a hand in your experience with us.    Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to when your travels bring you back to Santa Ana and you can stay with us once again!      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Must Stay for Hilton Honors Members
Summary: This was my second stay at this hotel and this hotel has been consistent in making me feel appreciated as a Hilton Honors member. During my ist stay, I got a room upgrade with free breakfast. I was also granted a late check-out ( 5 pm) which for me is the most important benefit. During my second stay ( March 15-March 17, 2019), there was no room available for upgrade. Alexander of the front desk gave us a parking fee discount even without  me asking in leu of a room upgrade. Furthermore, the standard room with king size bed was,  as expected , clean and spacious. The complimentary internet access was fast. Most important of all, I was again granted a late check-out ( 4 pm) by Alberto of the Front Desk. My loyalty to the Hilton brand has been truly appreciated by the hotel staff
Manager Response: Hello Jo S,  Thank you, Jo S, for posting such a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We are thrilled to read your detailed comments on the team and hotel.       First, thank you for coming back to stay with us.  We cannot thank you enough for being our guest again.  Second, we are so happy to read that we've been consistent in making you feel appreciated as an Honors Member.  To mention Alexander and Alberto and what they did to make a memorable experience, is so great to see.  Thank you for sharing your comments as we are truly fortunate to have them both working for us.        Thank you once again for your feedback and we look forward to you staying with us again when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area!      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Stayed here just for 1 night, i believe the supervisor "David" i think his name was, very nice, easy check in. Location is close to John Wayne airport. The room was a nice size, good location, and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello chavelly c,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  It is great to see that you found our service to be good and fast.      It is great to read that the supervisor did well at checking you in and was very nice.  Also, we are happy to see you found the room to be a nice size and the beds were comfortable too.  To make this good of an impression on you for one night is great to see.  Thank you for letting us know about your experience.   Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again, whether another birthday or a getaway trip to California!     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my sisters for my birthday trip to California. Room was clean & smelled nice. Hotel staff pleasant & the complimentary water was a blessing! For it to be an “airport”’hotel it was beyond my expectations
Manager Response: Hello BunnyLoe,  Thank you for posting such a nice review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We are happy that you felt it was an awesome stay.     Even though we are near John Wayne Airport, we never feel as an airport property and to read that you felt the same way is exactly how we want our guests to feel.  Thank you for letting us know we went beyond your expectations and that the hotel team was pleasant and the room was clean.  Our team will love to see those comments.      Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again, whether another birthday or a getaway trip to California!     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Travelling from eastern time to the west coast is always draining.  The facilities and staff were very pleasant and definitely made my stay fantastic.  I highly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Orange County, CA.
Manager Response: Hello Stay54322018633,  Thank you for posting such a wonderful review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your comments on our hotel.     It is always great to read about the travels of our guests like you coming from the eastern side of the United States where we helped make your stay fantastic.  To say you'd highly recommend us is a true testament to your experience and we couldn't be happier.  The team will love to see your comments too.      Thank you again for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back on the west coast!      Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Amazing place to stay! I would highly recommend . The staff was great, everything was so clean and it's in an excellent location. We enjoyed the hotel so much we stayed an extra night. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello Sunshine15682720499,  Thank you for posting a great review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate the kind words and feedback.   We are thrilled to read that you found us to be an amazing place to stay and that you would highly recommend us.   The team will be excited to read your comments on them about their friendliness and cleanliness, along with the location.      Thank you again for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to when you can stay with us again when you are back in the Santa Ana area!     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to the airport for business travel
Summary: Rooms are spacious and suitable for your laptop and business needs. This hotel accommodates large groups for conferences so you will up against a lot of guests in the lobby, jockeying for space in the hotel bar, and a longer wait for check-in/check-out. Daily parking in the garage is a bit steep. Hotel provides complimentary chocolate chip cookies and fruit if you ask the front desk. Hotel restaurant has a good menu and you can do takeaway vs. room service. There is a Starbucks within walking distance. During my visit the printer hooked up to the computer was not working.
Manager Response: Hello SFOBEYOND,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate the feedback you have given us.   We are happy that you had a good overall stay with the spaciousness of the guestroom , the hotel restaurant and location to many other businesses.  I am sorry that the lobby was full with other guests, which made it difficult for you to check in/out in a timely manner.  Also, we are replacing the lobby computers and printer so the next time you are at the hotel, you will see an improved area for our guests.    Again, thank you for the feedback and we do hope you have you back as our guest again soon!     Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: Easy location for getting around LA since it is very close to three freeways going all directions.  I needed to go to North Hollywood, LAX area and Beach cities during my stay and it was easy getting to all of them (except traffic at times).
Manager Response: Hello Larry B,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review on TripAdvisor.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.  We are so happy to learn that you found our central location to be convenient for getting around the area and that the breakfast was great too.  Thank you for letting us know.  Again, we appreciate the feedback and hope to have you back as our guest again soon!  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager

Summary: The rooms need some upkeep. The carpets need cleaning, the breakfast didn't have much of a selection, lots of traffic noise and elevators super slow. The most positive is that it's near the airport and had other places to eat at a short walk distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would like to thank Gadira from the front desk for going out of way to accommodating me the handicap space at such a crucial time. I will never forget how she actually went outside to look for me to give me a permit while I was trying to recuperate. Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel a lot for buisness. This hotel has been great. Angie at the front desk was outstanding!!!! Food was really good at the Meritage, Donna and Lisa will take great care of you. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone traveling in this area. 5 stars from me!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Found the bathroom to not be cleaned properly (loose hair leftover from prior guest) and the small was not pleasant. Great location though! Also, parking was not ok, I had to pay for parking for my 3 day stay and did not find parking for the two days.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall I was very disappointed with my stay.  My initial room was very noisy and the room I was moved to was dirty, the shower didn't work properly, TV didn't work at all, and the toilet didn't flush with ease.  Pool was not operational, gym was not clean.  Bathroom was dirty and in need of a deep clean.  Hotel staff was friendly but new.  I think for the rate there are better, cleaner options.
Manager Response: Dear Wander34629149985,  We are very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

Summary: I stayed here about a week ago the parking isn’t free, the breakfast isn’t free. That wouldn’t be so bad if the rooms looked nice, but the bathtub had rust all over it. Nothing was updated. I’ve stayed in way better Hilton’s with updated rooms that included free breakfast and free parking. It’s definitely not worth the money you’ll end up spending. The 6 dollar water they have in the room tastes like the water in their sink.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice and comfortable room, clean and warm. Didn’t like that I had a door to the next room. But overal very satisfied with the service the cleaningness, and the experience with the hotel. Would stay at the hotel again if I come to the area another time
Manager Response: none

Summary: toke my wife here for a short getaway. 1st time staying at this hotel, very nice outside and inside. till we go to the room, tv remote was broke, no body wash, asked the front desk for some more and they said i had to come get it? when i got there they did not have any? morning breakfast was horrible. was not impressed, will never be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great customer service from valet to front desk, beautiful hotel,great amenities, nice outdoor pool, good breakfast, rental car center on premises, complimentary shuttle. Right near the beach, South Coast Plaza Mall and Irvine Spectrum. We stayed here for 5 nights, Our rooms were Spacious comfortable, and clean. They have the most comfortable beds! All staff were so polite management, front desk, housekeeping, and valet. We will be returning again. Thanks Doubletree!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Jesse at the front desk was wonderful!!! He went above and beyond his duty to accommodate my request. The location is convenient and surrounded by many stores and shops within the vicinity of the hotel itself.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Though DoubleTree prides itself on "on-site dining", this restaurant is sub-par and expensive. Three different meals, and all were disappointing. Breakfast buffet was $28 for one person with cold, congealed eggs and outdated (over ripe) fruit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Front Desk Staff goes the extra mile!
Summary: I left my phone in an Uber while I was on my way to the airport. The front desk staff went out of their way to retrieve my phone for me and fed ex it back to my home. I want to thank this entire property for getting my phone back to me. This particular Double Tree has a big heart.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor Communication. Missed attention to details.
Summary: Horrible pre-arrival experience. Demonstrated lack of communication and paying attention to details and preferences. This hotel is clean but tired. The breakfast was standard for Doubletree. Restaurant staff were friendly. I won’t be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The restaurant service and food was so bad that it tainted the rest of our stay. I had to call the front desk to find out if the restaurant was open and to ask them to call the restaurant to let them know we were there. I also had to go into the kitchen twice to find our waiter. Awful!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quality stay at the Double Tree by Hilton Hotel Santa Ana - Orange County Airport!
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the Double Tree. Great amenities for the price and the location was great.  I will definitely stay here again in the future.  Who doesn't love a warm cookie at check in??? :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall Good Food. Good Selection of Breakfast items. Good Draft Beer selection, but below average value based on prices. One elevator usually doesn't work and no inside stairs are available. Use the service elevator if needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Keep coming back to this hotel!
Summary: I always get welcomed by the nicest staff and they are friendly. They make sure all my needs are taken care of. It's in a great location for the things I am doing. I just love the hotel and the cleanliness it has. The beds are also super comfy
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a wonderful experience at the Double Tree. The bed was very comfortable, internet was fast, and the food was great too. Scott and Pattie from the dining room made the experience a great one. I hope I can come back sometime.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was clean and the associates were nice. We did not like that there is a daily rate for parking.Everything else was nice!The location is good, very close to many places to visit  like Huntington Beaach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beside the toilet clogging issue, everything else is very good, room is clean, staffs are friendly and very helpful. I would recommend others to stay with this hotel which near SouthCoast Plaza and JW airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stayed for a day during long weekend
Summary: We stayed here for a day during Memorial day weekend. Location of this hotel is good as airport is near by, going to Laguna beach, Newport beach is commutable from here. Hotel has a computer and printer near the reception office which was helpful to get Universal tickets printed next morning before checking out.  Cons:- room assigned to us was looking old. Room requires an upgrade to make it feel homely.
Manager Response: Dear ketan81  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms.  We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.					  Thank you, Miri L.

Summary: All of the staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. I spent a lot of nights at this hotel and always enjoyed talking with and seeing the staff. The hotel itself was really nice and was a nice home away from home.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and bridal party stayed at this hotel the few nights we were in town for our event. We enjoyed the the service at the bar, restaurant and in-room coffee service. All staff: you were respectful, professional, and timely in our requests. We will definitely recommend this hotel stay to our friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed there since it was one block away from building I was working. Never again. It started bad by the young lady who was very abrupt. No hi, Can I help you, just "are you checking in?" "drivers lic and credit card. No thank you, have a nice stay, or anything nice. Did get a cookie! Hotel is old and run down. Room was small. Bathroom has cracks in tile in shower, tub was peeling off what looks like a paint job, NO Ventilation in bathroom at all. After first shower, water ran down from ceiling onto the floor. Next night I left door open and filled up the bedroom with steam. Used the plastic ice bag first night but never got another one back. Stayed 4 nights. Hallways were never cleaned or vac. There was the same small paper that was one the floor for three days by the elevator.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There is a free shuttle from the John Wayne Airport to the hotel.  Unfortunately I landed during the shuttle driver's break so they offered to reimburse me for the Uber ride.  That was great.  (Follow the signs to the Uber waiting area on the 2nd floor of the parking garage)  The hotel offers a shuttle to the South Coast mall, about 2 miles away, but you have to call and sometimes wait 20 minutes and the drivers squeezes you in between rides to and from the airport.  I was lucky and was upgraded to the Executive level - 7.  Not sure what made it executive to be honest except it had a robe and bath mat.  There is a restaurant/bar on sight, but I didn't use it.  The rooms were quiet and comfortable - nothing fancy.  The hot cookie on arrival is always a hit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Two Night Stay Booked But Checked Out After First Night
Summary: I had a 2 night booking and opted for a green room to get additional points by informing the hotel by phone and in person but to my surprise and dismay, I was checked out after a one night stay without my instructions. I called the GM to complain but the GM never returned the call. I called late at night to rectify and was helped by their night person Jesse. Jesse fixed the issue and I am thankful to him. The breakfast buffet was good and the server and restaurant staff was great. The room I was given had stains on the carpet but other than that all others looked clean. Btw, I am a diamond member and this is the first time this issue happened to me and I have been a member for many years.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay. Pool and hot tub must do.
Summary: Had a great stay went with my girlfriend and swam and hot tubed it up great night stay. Grabbed drinks at the bar had some food couldn’t have asked for a better night stay. Complimentary cookies took some to go thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel almost every week and have for over 40 years. The shuttle driver who picked me up was the best I have ever had.  Great conversation, helpful information, took my bags to the desk, introduced me to the desk staff and the greeting was so much more than I normally get.  The staff made the check in and event not just something we had to get done.  This really was a different experience and it started with the shuttle driver.  I will be back to this hotel.  Do not let me down staff make sure everyone gets the same great service I got.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel if fairly easy to find just a couple minutes off the 55  highway.  It is in more a of business district. Parking for check-in was a little tricky but once we got that figured out check-in was a breeze. Our room was very nice and updated. We were able to control the temperature so it was the right temperature. Actually the only complaint about the room was that for the first 30-45 minutes after check-in it sounded like they were doing drag racing on the street outside. The parking garage is tight and they stack cars up in there to the point that it is almost impossible to get out. One night we received a knock on our door. It was the security guard.  He stated that they had found our car with the doors open in the parking garage. He wanted me to go down and check it
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great Location and close to everything,  friendly staff who is there to make sure you are taken care of, very clean hotel, welcoming staff who all want to make sure your stay with Double Tree Hilton is a place you would like to stay again. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Negotiate parking rate and ask for your water/cookie for HH
Summary: I'm a gold HH and I had to negotiate with them the overrated parking fees , that I did not pay before , also I had to ask for my own water/cookie which are my right ! This should not be a Doubletree at all
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is genuinely appreciated as it is the first step in helping us improve our services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: This hotel is fantastic. It is located near John Wayne and close 3 major highways (405, 5 and 55). There is a nice bar in the lobby, and the breakfast buffet was terrific. The in-room wifi was very fast as well.
Manager Response: E B,   Thank you for your review, I am glad to hear that you had a terrific stay with us.

Summary: Please be careful - They do not disclose hidden charges like Parking $25 per night etc.The elevators were very unsafe and malfunctioning. How did they even get the safety certificate. It could not even take more than 5 people.
Manager Response: Vacation64121780728,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the elevator issues encountered, and we are working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again.

Summary: The bar tender Donna Holsapple was great. Absolute best service. Very attentive, very polite. I never once had to ask for anything because she always asked first. I would definitely recommend the Meritage bar kitchen and and the double tree for anyone traveling to Santa Ana Ca.
Manager Response: Wattier1,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us, I am glad to hear that you great service during your stay. Thank you for such nice comments about Donna, we will surely share them with her and the hotel team.

Summary: Great service and great accommodations. Will definitely be coming back. Typically we use this location to nap after our little getaways before our long drive home. The cookies are delicious also. Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Double Tree by Hilton Hotel Santa Ana is a perfect place to stay if you are visiting a college student at UC Irvine! I was there to watch my daughter in a play at The Irvine Barclay Theater. The Embassy Suites Hotel I usually stay at was booked. The Double Tree was wonderful and now I know a great replacement if I want to stay at another hotel! Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: High End Service and Facilities for A Great Price
Summary: We planned a last minute trip to Disneyland and my husband recommended booking at this hotel. At first, I was not too happy since it wasn’t spitting distance of the parks. However, the staff more than made up for it! From the warm gooey delicious chocolate chip cookies at check-in (and every time my kids asked for one), to the excellent facilities manager who ensured we had everything we needed, it definitely felt relaxing and wonderful staying here. The staff are well trained and truly care about the guests. Thank you for treating us all so well!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The morning sun rises over the mountains. It's spectacular to leave the giant blinds open and be woken up by the colorful morning. The Hotel is very clean and is pretty fancy. I felt safe and comfortable. Walking distance to some restaurants and 10-15 minutes to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: recent stay in Double tree hilton Sta. Ana
Summary: overall is great, the staff are all great, just the hot water but its not really a concern plus we were given free breakfast..i am happy with my stay and will surely come back and refer some friends especially in sta. ana area..in new york city where i live, its pretty expensive and the people are not that accomodating
Manager Response: none

Summary: To sum up my stay briefly my charged was charged multiple times. The staff could not give me a straight story on why I was charged multiple times, completely unprofessional and ridiculous. I then was charged two deposit fees, as well as for my first night which was supposed to be free because they overbooked the hotel. I had to fight to get my money released and still ended up paying for my stay the way my money was handled here was absolutely unnerving, I will not be back.

Summary: Tony at the front desk made our trip magical from the moment he helped us! He supplied us with some forgotten items, gave stickers & cookies to our kids, brought us extra blankets, towels & made sure we had breakfast!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hilton-brand hotel near John Wayne airport
Summary: The staff at this Doubletree Hotel is a big plus - very helpful and nice. The hotel is conveniently located near the north end of the 73 tollroad (i.e. "freeway") and very near the John Wayne airport right on Macarthur Blvd. We did not have a refrigerator in our room, but some rooms do have refrigerators. So if you want a fridge, be sure to ask for one when you make your reservation or at least when you check in.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel great!  Location great! Room service breakfast - questionable.
Summary: As we know, room service is pricey. I am okay with that. But, when the quality of the meal is just so-so, it kind of hits the “unmet expectation button. It was the typical American breakfast. But, the bacon was too hard, potatoes soft and luke warm, eggs okay, and no catsup.  Oh well. Denny’s is an alternative.
Manager Response: Robert C,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay with us. We strive to ensure our guests experience the best visits possible during their travels and we fell short of our goal this time. Your feedback has been sent to concerned department managers for review and follow up.

Summary: Only regret was not being able to stay longer. The staff here is OUTSTANDING! I felt welcomed and well cared for my entire stay! Mini fridge in the room, great drawer space and workspace for my laptop. Location is great- easy, immediate access to the 55 with connections to other major freeways. Right next to John Wayne airport. Despite the busy area, there is little in the way of annoying noises. Great stay!

Summary: Room and bed were excellent slept pretty well. However I have no breakfast included and fridge in my room. I was quite disappointed for what I’ve paid. Also had to pay for parking lot 21 dollars at night for this location.
Manager Response: Dear Storyteller603075  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service.  We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.					  Thank you, Miri L.

Summary: Received the prepaid rate, upgrades and no surprise costs upon check out. The staff was professional and politeThe hotel was clean and the room was perfect!  The only concern we're the doors, they slammed when they shut

Summary: My room was 746 then 723 When I check in Angie and Marie made sure I had everything   and also Eli Alberto Eliese made sure I had the right upgrades for my diamond status and raphia made sure breakfast was made right and shuttle drive Adam Victor Jesus Margarito  Eduardo made sure I got to my work on a timely schedule and Estrella made sure I had all any bath amenities available and I was treated with utmost respect

Summary: From the time we checked in until the time we left we had a great experience. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Food at the restaurant was delicious. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

Summary: We had a couple of unusual requests during our stay; mostly due to our extended stay at this location. Surprisingly every single request was not only met but exceeded beyond our expectations...all because of Raul who went above and beyond. The help he provided to us on every occasion superceded even the highest rated small boutique hotels we have stayed in. Raul made our stay even that much more better. Please ask for his assistance during your stay at this hotel.

Summary: The only positive about this hotel is the airport distance and shuttle service.   It is very close to the freeway and the rooms are very noisy.  The air conditioner unit is the box on the side of the wall which is also noisy.    $18 for valet or self parking.   Restaurant is not very good compared to other hotel restaurants.     Price is lower some times but it's very average place and you can expect lots of freeway noise.

Summary: nice enough hotel but lets be honest. . you're outdated and unprofessional.  Thats just the front desk males.   My experience with the restaurant was unlike anything ive ever experienced.   I ordered a French dip sandwich and side salad. .basic.   Waited 20m. Got up to room realizes no au jus - which makes a French DIP - called to request and went BACK DOWN and received a nice gooey plop of brown gravy.   I called another time to ask for manager and had to wait another 20m. I called back to demand a manger and was told I'd get called back.   After 10 more min I finally got a call back to say they'd comp my meal.  OOOOOO.... so gracious after an hour of me trying to fix it.   offered me some free bar stuff. . . .why would I ever bother to pay them after this ridiculous service?

Summary Heading: Good stay and location for business trip
Summary: Food in restaurant was good, general service was good. My room was really cold and I called the front desk because I couldn't get the heat to kick on. They sent Victor up and although the temp wouldn't adjust, he went above and beyond to make my room a comfortable temperature and brought me up a space heater to use. He also brought me a breakfast voucher for the trouble. THANKS VICTOR for making the best of a potentially negative situation and good night's sleep.

Summary: The hotel itself is beautiful. Staff could be more welcoming including restaurant. Drink selection is slim. Food isn’t the best, I would order out next time. Hotel is good for a reasonable rate. I will stay again for sure.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at a great location
Summary: This is a wonderful hotel close to the airport and a lot of other sites.  They had great services and amenities . Really nice big room and amazing staff .I highly recommend this hotel. Will stay here again

Summary: We are all entitled to make mistakes but we have to make sure we acknowledge the mistakes and correct it by making a commitment and need to be delivered correctly. The fraustration when the mistakes will followed by another mistakes due of luck of documentation and poor communication

Summary: I love the location of this property - close to great places to eat yet still very quiet.  We had room 720 which I recommend.  Nothing fabulous, but on a very quiet corner.  We  had a peek a boo view of the Disney fireworks each night and great sunset views each day.  I especially appreciate the white bathroom rug in the bathroom.  It kept my feet toasty warm and felt great.  I've wondered why hotels don't include that touch, and it was wonderful to find this hotel had it.  Negatives:  Bathtub badly (really badly) stained with rust color.  The edge of the tub appears to have pink mold growing by the faucet.  Upon entering the room there is a very strong mold smell.  We did have engineering clean and deodorize, but the next day it was back.  However, once you walked past that

Summary: We have stayed in the Hilton Chain for years, spending weeks, even months in our favorite hotel.  We have stayed at the Double tree a few times and thought it was a beautiful hotel, but had always preferred The Embassy Suites until this current visit to the Hilton Double Tree.   This has been the best experience we have had in this hotel and instead of booking at the embassy,  we have been in the double tree for 2 weeks.    The front Desk has been extremely kind and friendly. Cristina at the front desk was the reason we decided to stay at the double tree instead of checking out and returning to the Embassy.  She allowed us to stay in our room, which has always been important to us and not always possible at other hotels,handled all of our needs and requests smoothly and with a

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for only one night on the way of vacation, but I experienced the excellence of the costumer service before, during, and after my stay. Not to mention the ease of requesting connected rooms and welcoming greeting, the most impressive thing is that they helped me find my lost watch and wedding band in the room and mailed it back to me. The facility manager, Roy, searched the rooms twice thoroughly. His supervisor, Teresa, found my watch and ring. After I contacted the hotel, they mailed it to me immediately. I really appreciate their service. Definitely recommended.

Summary: I am a frequent business traveler to the Santa Ana Doubletree. On my latest visit I happened to misplace and leave my favorite necklace at the hotel. Not only was the housekeeping and front desk staff extremely accommodating, they were also very quick to reconcile my inquiry. They called to inform me they had located my necklace. Thank you to Maria Cantoran in housekeeping  for finding my necklace that was irreplaceable! I can’t thank you enough!

Summary: This motel is clean & comfortable. It has a nice restaraunt, gym, store, waiting area and a great staff! They all go the extra mile to let us know we were appreciated. The maids left nice touches with the room.

Summary: The staff is very welcoming and happy to help you. Love how I can go on the app and choose my room. The hotel held our event and were very helpful and accommodating. Easy amd quick check in and check out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great job everyone,  moustapha,  Jesse, James, Roy and all employees from front desk, restaurant. Clean rooms, prompt valet with smile, not to mention cookies,  cold water upon arrival. We would definitely be back there next Time we're in orange county. Thanks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel stay was nice, Room was comfortable, Room service was very good, Restaurant was great and very affordable. Issue that prompts me to kick off a star is I was overcharged $9.66 for my third nights stay when I had a prior confirmed reservation made on the hotels website. I brought it to the attention to the young man at the front desk before leaving, showing him my confirmed reservation and he assured me he would deduct the charge. Didn't happen. An overcharge is an overcharge be it $1.00 or $100. They should have taken care of it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Do not leave ANYTHING in your car if you leak in the underground lot. The back window of my vehicle was smashed and $2,400 in tools were stolen. At least 5 hotel staff informed me that this is a regular occurrence and it happens at least on a weekly basis. The manager claims I was “misinformed” and the parking lot is safe and secure and expressed this was an isolated incident.   She informed me that their insurance would contact me “next business day” and so far 3 business days later I have not been contacted. I would not stay in this hotel ever again, nor would I recommend anyone else stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Sofa bed is so uncomfortable you can feel every spring. It honestly shouldn’t be considered an extra bed. If you need more beds book the double. Carpet has stains. Shower curtains need to be replaced. Holes in walls where photos used to hang. Rooms have a weird smell. Staff doesn’t seem to care if they are fully booked. Ice machines don’t work. Couldn’t check in early.

Summary: Easy access from the airport and to all attraction in Orange County. Comfortable beds, big closets and plenty bathroom counter space. Small pool area with hot tub. Several places to eat within walking distance. Breakfast buffet in the restaurant is good. Don't pass on the breakfast "special casserole". It's almost like enchiladas without a lot of the sauce. Put scramble eggs on top. Really good! Restaurant staff friendly and attentive. Front desk a little under staffed. Always a wait in line to speak to someone. But friendly and helpful. Don't forget to ask for the fresh baked cookies!

Summary: This is our third time staying here for my son's soccer tournaments. The worker at the front desk took a very long time checking us in this time and was very confused. Maybe she is new? No big deal....but when we unfolded the sofa bed, it was obvious the sheets had not been changed so we had to call and have clean sheets brought up. Again, not a big deal, but my son was very tired and we had to wait. Our WiFi password never worked so we had to call about that too. Our key did not work to activate the parking lot entrance either. None of these minor inconveniences are why I'm giving this hotel a 3 star rating, however. I'm giving this hotel 3 stars because it's 2018, and they still have no decent vegan options at their restaurant. While so many other leading hotels here in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good evening.  The Doubletree on MacArthur in Santa Ana has really stepped it up since my last visit. The hotel was nice before and it still is nice. What is stepped up is the personal service and the new menu at the restaurant is outstanding! Donna behind the bar and restaurant is very attentive and accommodating and friendly.  The only complaint I ever had was my remote for the TV in my bedroom needed new batteries. And engineer named Victor was up at my room in minutes with new batteries.  The remote still did not work very well and I thought that was it for service. Victor returned five minutes later with a new replacement remote that works great. It is the personal service from staff like Victor and Donna that make me want to return.   Yet another great benefit is the

Summary: This property is in the center of it all in Santa Ana. The hotel is pretty big for a Double Tree high ceilings in the lobby.   Didn't need to use our rental to eat, etc... as everything was pretty much in walking distance.  Clean and safe property. Great free chewy cookies. Yummy  Our favorite property so far.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was fine for us.  Person at the car check in area was very helpful - watched our car while we checked in, dropped our luggage in the room and left after that. Check in was smooth, nice interaction.  Room was a corner room.  Lots of space.  Our only complaint was the air conditioner was not sufficient enough to cool the room.  Breakfast was filling and cooked to our order.  Not a feast, but perfect for our needs.  I am a Diamond, so our breakfast was included.  If you don't get breakfast included, I suggest trying some of the surrounding locations.

Summary: This has been a horrible stay so far. We are fans of double tree, but clearly this one needs some work. Out of rooms, parking and TOWELS. Thats right, they suggested we share towels, and we paid for this. $20 a night for parking, but they ran out of spaces. 200 rooms and 50 parking spaces. FYI- we don’t write many reviews and we are not the complaining type. We usually just put up with it. Tonight, the shrug of the shoulders by the front desk staff telling us they had no towels left in the building and the 4 of us could share the 2 we have put me over the edge. I know, I will live... and things could be worse, but for anyone looking for a place with parking, towels or even sufficient rooms (overbooked), should look elsewhere. Heard others complaining in the elevator this evening

Summary: Booked one night via Orbitz - note some third party sites indicate free parking, however this was not the case.  Arrived early, however no early check-in available.  We used the facilities to change and headed to the beach.  Check in took less than 5 minutes, and keeping with Doubletree tradition we were greeted with warm cookies. Staff proved friendly and helpful.  Room had two queen beds - I have to say these hotel beds and pillows were the MOST comfortable EVER.  Room was clean and we made use of the fridge and coffeemaker.  Would have preferred more towels based upon room occupancy.    Hotel location close to freeways, and beaches not far away.  We did not utilize the pool or the breakfast.  Underground parking garage was easy in/out.  Grocery store, gas, and restaruants
Manager Response: June H,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your visit with us. I am glad to hear about your experience and hope that you enjoyed it, please let us know if there was anything we could've done to make it even better. We hope that you'll be able to visit us soon!

Summary: Phoned ahead for late arrival didn’t matter system was down at 11 o’clock had no keys for the room after a long wait at the desk. The air conditioning system screeched a not stop variety show like something from a metal shop that actually shook the bed. TV did not work so much for the World Cup and the hot tub was in tandem. Room was not made during our day vacancy’s so we phoned at 4 o’clock to have it done that evening. No cookie at check in but the place was crumby. How far the Shilton has sunk.

Summary: When traveling I prefer to stay at a DoubleTree Hotel first and foremost.  Always find friendly staff and clean rooms.  Never disappointed.  Although I did not get a chance to enjoy the bar and restaurant this time; I have never been disappointed with the drinks, food or service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here so many times over the years. Great place to stay, always clean and super friendly. Unfortunately with their parking fee they have officially priced us out of staying again. The daily fee to park on the premises takes a reasonable rate and makes it too expensive for us. We have watched it steadily climb over the years...they are getting greedy.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hilton Property - Quiet Area - Nice Property
Summary: I chose this hotel, located quite near John Wayne Airport, for my recent stay in Orange County, and boy was I impressed. The lobby is fit for a king, the recently renovated restaurant was great, the room was spacious with a great few of the hills in the distance, and extremely quiet all around.  I definitely will be back and I will recommend, hands down.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place, perfect location, good value!
Summary: Close to airport, best service in town.  The Staff was extremely friendly, and I was offered one of their signature cookies and two bottles of water check-in.  I asked for a room on a different floor than I was booked and Maria very graciously made the with for me.  Thanks for a great stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I visited this property and generally thought it was fine.  The staff was nice, the rooms were good.  No overall complaints.  A Hilton affiliated hotel should be stellar, this one needs some detail.  The fitness center has adequate equipment but is missing some elements such as aerobic balks which are a minimum.  The fitness center was not clean, which was disappointing.  Everything from the bathroom to the floors were in poor shape.  Not acceptable.  I would stay here again but the management and staff need to pick it up a notch when it comes to clean.  That doesn’t cost money and keeps travelers happy.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Best Hilton near Orange County Airport
Summary: This airport is very convenient to get to from the airport. The staff is very friendly helpful. The bar and menu selections are good and the service is quick. I have stayed at the other Hilton hotels by the airport and though they are nice, this Doubletree is my hotel of choice.
