Summary: We stayed at the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana one night while we explored the Laguna Beach and Huntington Beach area. It is very easy to find and close to the John Wayne airport. We chose the self parking option which is $21 but at least there is a parking garage to keep your car cool.   The room was huge and well appointed. Large windows gave a good view of the surrounding area. The fitness center was very nice.  There isn’t much in the immediate area but there is a marketplace type area across the street that has a Starbucks and a few other restaurants. The hotel also has a restaurant inside. We enjoyed our brief stay at the DoubleTree in Santa Ana.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My last stay at this hotel was in 2004 and I am glad to report that the staff still does a great job! Not to say that the hotel isn't showing signs of age, but that is to be expected. My room was clean and well appointed and the location is great as it is close to South Coast Plaza and a tons of restaurants. As others have pointed out, self parking is $21 per day and the garage is only 1 level. During my stay, there was a Church group there for some kind of conference and they took a lot of the spaces in an already limited parking area. However, all things considered, I would not hesitate staying at this hotel again. I was there for the Newport Beach Jazz Festival and may very well be back in 2019!

Summary: Nice location close to airport and UCI, self parking (rare to find); clean, safe in the room, nice amenities; if you have Hilton Honors membership much better deal that others nearby. Staff very friendly and helpful.

Summary: It is a nice ,clean in a good location with the parking lot underneath. I would think it is quite good for the bucks. I went down for my daughter's UC Irvine graduation and we went to a good restaurant afterward and had a very good time.

Summary: My husband and I stayed 4 nights at the DoubleTree-Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  It was the best experience I have had staying at a DoubleTree to date.  The staff is superior.  Kudos to Alex and Alberto at the front desk who set the tone for our stay.  Both are a class act.  The room was super comfortable and the bed was great.  We slept like babies.  Javier in the restaurant made sure our breakfast was delicious and I appreciated that he was able to find me Tazo Breakfast Tea (thank you).  Overall a wonderful stay and we are looking forward to returning.
Manager Response: Debra H,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your visit with us. I am so glad to hear about your experience, and that our team members made your stay. We strive to provide the best customer service, we hope that you visit us soon in the near future!

Summary: Great place to stay. I travel often for work. Donna at the restaurant and Gloria and Alexander at the front are excellent. Special thanks to Donna for always taking good care of my team and I. They have recently remodeled the place and it looks great.

Summary: I enjoyed myself I really had a really wonderful time the staff was nice the food was great and the state was excellent thank you for everything I really really enjoyed myself I will stay here again I will recommend this to all my friends and family

Summary: $21 was charged for parking that is too expensive.  The hotel should tell customer in advance that there is parking charge. Washing sink blocked. A bath tower provided wet and dirty with yellow stain. Pipe under the sink leaking.

Summary: The breakfast buffet is good but kind of pricey for eggs and fruit. The staff was great, the location is easy for freeway access.  The pool is the smallest I've ever seen- it fit our soccer team, but when other's came, there wasn't enough room.

Summary: Forgot my wake up call. After a long day out I had to hunt down a housekeeper with my dirty towels and trash as our room had not been cleaned. Summary: My friends and I stayed at this hotel over memorial weekend and the staff is highlight of this hotel! Alexander was so helpful when we had questions when booking our rooms! Thank you for your kindness!   Alberto and Elise at the front desk were very warm and welcoming when we all checked in. They accommodated us beyond what we expected. They explained how things worked around the hotel with such grace. I could not thank them enough for being so helpful, kind and available to us! With the hotel being so close to South Coast Plaza, Tustin Market Place, and Costa Mesa we had such a terrific stay!
Manager Response: Hannah V,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us and your experience. I am so happy to hear that Alexander, Alberto and Elise made a connection with you. We have shared this review with them and the hotel team, we hope that you visit us soon!

Summary: Very nice place, comfortable rooms, great amenities. Nice location, quiet and luxurious. Front desk staff, Gloria and Francisco, were extremely helpful in making my stay here quite comfortable and enjoyable!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Attended a double 50th birthday celebration of a couple friends. Stayed for 2 nights. Thanks for the warm cookies and free bottled water on our first night.  I felt at ease in this hotel. Slept like a baby. The staff at the front desk were helpful. Most especially the driver of the shuttle who was on duty that evening. My friend and I were trying to get directions from the front desk on how to get to the nearest drug store or pharmacy.. .like CVS .The driver volunteered to drive us there even though it was time for him to go home. Waited for us and drove us back to the hotel. Loved their breakfast buffet. We took our time although they stopped serving at 11am. Their banquet/conference  rooms were spacious enough to accommodate 200 people. The dance floor big enough for those who
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel room & some carpet needs some improvement. Bath room tile grout looks old. Front desk cold, not very helpful. Expensive car parking $21 per night while internet parking at same location for less than $10. Other Hilton or other facilities charge about $15. And cookies ran out. Stay away. Will not come back.
Manager Response: Dear ttn5153,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the many issues encountered, and we are working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. Your feedback is genuinely appreciated as it is the first step in helping us improve our services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Came here for conferences and events.Ok facilities and nice staff. Parking is reasonable. Food is ok. Salad was ok. Main course was ok. Drinks were fine. The podium and lights are ok. I asked about the cost of renting the venue and the organizer said that the price was quite competitive.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check in was a breeze with friendly staff.  Plenty of self parking available.  The room was clean and spacious.  Hot shower with no issues with anything in the room.  Breakfast was great with plenty to choose from.  Will definitely stay here in the future.  The only negative was old food trays in the hallways which need to be picked up much more often.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great hotel with friendly staff. A good location to get to just about anywhere. They are doing some renovation to their restaurant and bar in the near future but I’m sure their service level will remain top notch.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We use this hotel as a group on bi-monthly trips. The staff treat us very well and the accommodations are fine. The hotel is near our meeting location and is also near to the airport, so it's very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Location and Price! Poor Service & Outrageous Parking Fee!
Summary: As a Hilton Honors member, I expected more but given how little I paid for the room, I guess my expectations were too high. Service was not good in any way shape or form. From check-in, to my repeated calls to housekeeping/maintenance and not getting a timely response or accurate resolution to my issues. and $21.00 to self-park??? No thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at this Double Tree for a quick business trip. Room was ready when I arrived staff was very polite and answered all my questions. This location has easy access to freeways and is very close to John Wayne Airport. I would gladly come back for my next trip to the OC!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have been traveling for business and staying at this hotel.  Gloria and Francisco are wonderful hosts always greeting me with a smile and great service.   Marilou provides exceptional service each morning during breakfast.  I appreciate the smiles from these folks during my stay.  If you’re traveling for business or pleasure this a great place to stay.  Tom D
Manager Response: none

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel for anyone on biz in Santa Ana. Thanks to Gloria, Francisco and the entire staff.  I stay at this property often and the service is exemplary. I will be certain to stay here in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I would not recommend this hotel
Summary: This is my third time to stay at this hotel and I was very disappointed about my experience. At check in you show your id and credit card which I did. I then went to my room and was in there for 45 minutes or more and my phone kept ringing. Finally after the 3rd time someone called I answered and the person said are you with a certain group. I said no and he said we need to know who is in this room of course without having a clue who this was I wasn't going to say. I then call the front desk from my cell phone and let them know and it was the same person. He needed to know who was in the room and I explained but then said how do you not know you took my id. He asked me if I would change rooms because they messed up and I said no I'm already trying to go to bed. He was very
Manager Response: none

Summary: We hosted an important meeting at this hotel, and it couldn't have gone better. Mayra and her staff were awesome. Food was awesome, rooms and meeting space were great -- we couldn't have been happier with how smoothly everything went.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location is great, the staff was outstanding. The restaurant is open until 11 and is good. I really appreciated the free airport shuttle and it's easy to get around from the location. A nice, but reasonably priced place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The entrance to this property is odd - it almost feels like a delivery entrance. But once inside you realize this is a large convention space.   The rooms were decent. Not typical but OK.  The airport shuttle leaves on the half hour and takes less than 10 minutes. But traffic can be heavy so you are if leaving or arriving at a peak time add 10 to 15 minutes. But SNA is far easier than LAX. If you have pre-check you can expect less than 10 minutes from entering the airport until airside. There's not much to see or do at SNA so you don't want to arrive too early.  The food was good. The A/C worked well and the wifi was excelllent.  But - and this was a big but - holy crap is it loud here. Cars were racing up and down the street in front of the hotel all night long revving their
Manager Response: none

Summary: Extremely difficult almost every step of the way. I wish we had stayed elsewhere. Could not get room service to deliver forks/plates on our wedding night. We waited two hours and then gave up. The toilet in the upgraded suite was auto-flushing all night. Discarded food trays were left outside the room next to us for over 14 hours. Staff walked up and down the hall but couldn't be bothered to remove it. Every time we asked about our reservations we got different answers. Sometimes they were all canceled. Sometimes some were canceled. Sometimes people had extra rooms. Sometimes people had no rooms. 90% of the people we talked to said we needed to talk to someone else because there is no information available. Took twenty minutes for someone at the bar to ask us if we'd like a
Manager Response: none

Summary: stayed here as part of a group with my sons roller hockey team.  Didn't spend much time at the hotel but we did get a good night sleep and the showers were fine.  we will be staying again in April so hope the experience is just as good if not better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Initially had issues on a very slow turn around response time on emails and phone calls not returned timely from the Sales Manager and the Events Manager regarding an event I booked for 150 guests. I was very disappointed, but they made it right by correcting the slow response issue, and providing great service and accommodation. Great staff assigned in my event: Luis, Jose Rebollas, Jaime Gallegos, Felicitos Aguirre, Juan Gallegos, Laura Hernandez. Thank you Kisha Cravin for making it right! My event turned out wonderful!!!

Summary: Almost perfect, one maintenance guy kind put me in a bad mood, when he rudely stopped us and rudely said to return the luggage cart when he saw myself and 3 elderly ladies struggling to take luggage to our room. Other than that, everything was great. Everyone else was wonderful!

I hope that we have you visit us again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Stayed one Saturday nite - Good price for this area
Summary: Paid $153.00 total includes taxes fees and parking fore a Saturday nite   Good deal,  very clean hotel.   Pretty quiet,  stayed on exec level 7.  Treated like an silver honors member, fresh fruit,  cookies and water.
Manager Response: Gonnahavefun4eva,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us, I am glad that you were able to stay with us and had a great stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Very nice and a great convenient location. Super service and staff is very attentive to guest needs. I would definitely stay at this property again. Also a fair value with pleasant rooms. The restaurant is also very nice and the food is good.

Summary Heading: Great stay in a great area
Summary: I stayed one night while in town on business. The Hotel is very nice and located in a great area. There are several restaurant options in the area. I would have given this hotel a 5 out of 5 had their food quality been better. Club sandwich wasn't good at all and breakfast buffet wasn't either. The greatest part of my stay for me was the water pressure. I was able to get in and get out without wasting 20 minutes rinsing off due to restricted water pressure. I will be staying here again, just not Eating here again.
Manager Response: GT6,   Thank you for taking the time to write a response about your visit with us at DoubleTree Santa Ana, we welcome any kind of feedback so that we can share with our team to improve where we can. We look forward to having you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: A nice location close to everything and easy on- off the freeway. The staff was great both helpful and friendly. The food was fair the restaurant staff was engaged and worked to make it a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Russell M,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review, I am glad to hear that our staff was great. We hope to have you visit us soon in the near future!

Summary: Hotel was clean. Staff was very nice. Far enough away from Disney craziness but close enough to not spend a fortune on transportation. Breakfast was included and they had a decent variety of food. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Brandon S,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and it's location. It truly is a very convenient location for guest attending Disneyland but yet do not want to stay too close to it. We hope that you visit us soon on your next Disneyland visit.

Summary: The Hotel is close to the SNA airport. The Price is very reasonable and our breakfast was excellent. We ordered off the menu, it was less expensive. Our Room was as pictured on their website.  Although there are flights arriving after 10:30pm, the last shuttle is 10:30.
Manager Response: lmyers21,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review, I am glad to hear that your breakfast experience was excellent with us, we hope to see you soon on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: We attended a 3 day conference at this location. The hotel was very attentive and took great care of all of us. Our room was very clean and the staff was wonderful and very attentive. The food for our conference meals and snacks were impressive, and we have attended many conferences.The hotel is in a good location for restaurants, beaches, about 15 min away, and walking.
Manager Response: Carl-Lisa F,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us during your conference, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed it very much and had a great experience. We hope to have you visit us on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Good stay but could have been better
Summary: Hotel app for check in did not designate executive floors. Front desk did not know either. Park price a little high. Doubletree is know for their cookies but they ran out of cookies on 2 of 4 visits to the front desk. All fixable issues. I would still stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful property; easy access and good location
Summary: Great, polite service at this property. Gift shop had some erratic hours and is small, particularly considering they also carry toiletries and medicine, etc.  Rooms are comfortable and well-appointed. Comfortable bed! Bathrooms were clean and in good repair.  Looks like they can accommodate meetings in an extensive lobby area, but I did not look in any of the meeting rooms.  Overall, a good choice near the Orange County/Santa Ana/John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Chip B,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us, I am glad to hear that you were able to enjoy your stay with us and experience great property. We can definitely accommodate small & large meetings/events. we hope to have you stay with us again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Quick drive from John Wayne Airport.  Room was spacious.  Staff was friendly. You have to pay to park in underground garage.  My  only complaint...we should have asked for a room NOT facing MacArthur Drive.  There is street noise to contend with.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fine Hotel for trip to DisneyLand
Summary: I booked this hotel through another discount provider. Personally, I think it was overpriced.  When I arrived at the hotel after an 8 hour drive from northern california, I arrived to be told there were no parking spaces. To make it worse, it was 1AM, but there was a significant wait at check in and despite being here 3 nights, I never got the cookies. :-(  Other than the minor inconveniences, the hotel was clean. I didn't encounter staff much. There is a rooftop pool.  The drive to Disneyland was reasonable.   I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’ve stayed at the hotel many times over the years as our office is across the street.  The hotel is an older hotel, we’ve been in our office location 15 years and I know this hotel has been there a majority of the time. However, they do an excellent job keeping it update and it could easily pass for a pretty new hotel.  Very clean, very updated and maintained.   This was my first stay where I didn’t interact with anyone at the hotel as I did everything from my app and digital keep, including adding parking. Loved it!  No lines,no wait, right to the room I picked!  Parking was clean and secure under the building and lots of choices within walking distance to eat. The gym was nice for a hotel gym but a little on the sparse side but definitely adequate. The pool area is small so
Manager Response: DallasJeffA,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us, I am glad that you were able to enjoy an effortless stay. Many guests now a days are using the digital which we recommend as it is easy to use and many guests love the fact that they can go straight to their room. Thank you again for taking the time, we hope to see you soon!

Summary: I called the hotel ahead of time and spoke to Diego, asking for an upper floor, quiet room. Diego at the front desk was very helpful.  Upon check-in, the staff is friendly. The shuttle drivers are awesome as well and will take you to nearby restaurants or the airport.
Manager Response: Eleanor R,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us and our property. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed Diego's service and that he was able to accommodate your requests. We hope to have you visit us soon!

Summary: What a great experience.  I stayed at a local Marriott, however came over for dinner and drinks.  Donna is fantastic at the bar - gets to know her customers and will not steer you wrong!  Equally as nice is the Facilities Manager Roy Rios - everything comes down to people and due to Donna - I could come by more often!
Manager Response: Rick H,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us in our restaurant. I am glad to hear that Donna's customer service will bring you back to the hotel, pretty soon we will also be renovating our restaurant. Thank you as well for mentioning Roy, both Donna and him are great assets to our hotel and I'm really glad you were able to experience that.

Summary: Nice hotel with amenities.   Close to John Wayne airport with shuttle.   Nice bar area and just off the freeway.   Bathrooms are a bit dated,  but bedding and beds are nice.   I always stay here when flying out the next morning.
Manager Response: Paul A,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review, I am glad you found our property to be convenient as well as comfortable, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and even better staff
Summary: My family and I landed in California early the day we checked in. The hotel told us we could call and see if they had any rooms available for my family. They did not, but told us to try again around 1pm. We went to the hotel and nothing was available yet, but they were trying to get two rooms by each other for us. They offered us cookies and let us sit in the lobby until rooms were available for us. Once we checked in, they offered more cookies and water for us. We got to our rooms and just needed a few more pillows and blankets and were delivered to us within minutes! If we had questions or needed anything during our stay, they were answered or taken care of right away! Friendly staff, clean hotel and a very great location to many things
Manager Response: 630candaceb,   Thank you for taking the time in writing a review regarding your stay with us, I am very glad to hear that we were able to accommodate you and provide excellent service. We hope to have you visit us again in the future for some more DoubleTree cookies.

Summary: I was attending a 2-day company event in this hotel and stayed a  night. Room was very clean and comfortable. I am usually picky and do not sleep well if the bed or pillow are not to my liking, but I slept really well in this hotel.   I also used their fitness center which was clean and wasnt crowded . There were 5-6 basic machines and some weights, but just what I needed at that time.  Breakfast was good with cereal, eggs, pancakes, breads, danish, juices and coffee.
Manager Response: WorldCitizen360,   Thank you for taking your time and writing a review about your stay with us, I am glad to hear that you had a very comfortable visit. I am also glad you had a comfortable rest along with enjoying the breakfast we offer. We hope to have you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: From the parking garage to either east or west on ramps, one block away. Great hotel for business stays. Best morning restaurant staff ever! Food is good quality with lots of nutritious choices. Decent wine list with full bottles at a decent price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at many Double Tree Hiltons across the country and they are all superb hotels.  This hotel definitely lived up to my past experiences! The staff was kind and efficient and the rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is somewhat dated (in-room carpet should be replaced), so that was a bit of a disappointment.  I also had some purchases shipped to the hotel, but the hotel staff at the front desk did not locate all the packages during my stay at the hotel.  So in the end, I discovered a package had already been delivered prior to my arrival but the front desk folks did not seem to look hard enough for it.  I ended up paying for the shipping cost of the package to get it back home although I personally feel that the hotel should bear some of that cost as a matter of principle.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There was no hot water on 1/17/18 and one elevator stuck in middle of morning at 7 a.m. for well over an hour. Lines on every floor caused 10 to 20 minute delays. This isn't first time we've had no hot water. Our business group has had it on at least 2 previous stays over the last 12-15 months.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, horrible  service in restaurant.
Summary: I love the Hilton Brand.  The hotel staff at this location is fabulous.  Our room was perfect.  The water was not as hot as I would like it.  The food was good.  Went to lunch in the hotel restaurant.  It was not crowded and we did not have to wait in line to get in.  We had to seat ourselves.  We never got a menu.  We had to flag down the manager twice and a bus boy three times just to get water.  The manager took our order after waiting 32 minutes.  Our food arrived but we still did not have water or tea.  No one gave us a check.  I wanted to walk out without paying but I never have nor will I ever do that.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I attended a conference at this hotel.  The hotel staff was very friendly and belpful.  The parking valet even helped me load my luggage on the cart.  They have shuttle from the airport and locally.  If you drive, paid parking is available.  They also have a great restaurant.  The food was good.  But foremost, my room was very spacious and clean.  I would gladly return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay was very enjoyable and being greated with a warm cookie is the best!  Beds are comfortable, soft and room was clean.  Loved the bathroom products for hair and lotion smelled great.  Didn’t eat at restaurant so can’t comment on that.
Manager Response: Tatiana R,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am glad to hear that you found your stay enjoyable with us and the amenities provided in the room to your liking. Hope that you can visit us again soon!

Summary: I have been writing reviews of most hotels I stay at and restaurants I eat at. I don't write a bad review unless there were several things wrong and it was not corrected. Before I write a review about this dump, I would like to advise my fellow travelers that there are ALOT of other hotels in the area, so if you have the option of choosing a hotel, avoid this at all costs! These were the issues:  1. They advertise about a shuttle being available and taking you to places within 2 mile radius, everytime we request a shuttle they dont have one available even if we wait. so the shuttle is a joke 2. We were there at a business trip so having internet is essential. they had no internet from 3 am the next morning we were there until later in the afternoon. You would think they would

Summary: Great job for the attendant that help coast dental meeting .. she was excellent always on point and went over and beyond.. we where never unattended always had fresh fruit ,coffee and was very fast to make sure we eat on time and cleaned up quickly.

We strive to provide great customer service, whether it is for an overnight guest or for an event attendee. Hope to have you visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed her night prior to and night after our cruise.  Hotel is high quality for both room and staff.  Room was very nice size, furniture in good shape, and very clean.  Refrigerator in both rooms.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  The first night we did experience an emergency alert at 12:30 a.m. with evacuated the hotel, but thankfully turned out to not be a true emergency.  Apparently someone was showering with the bathroom door open and the steam set off the fire alarms.  Next morning I very politely asked the desk clerk if we might get breakfast comped due to disturbances and she immediately did so.  Also, this hotel advertises a free shuttle to/from SNA Airport as well as within a 3 mile radius of hotel.  On our arrival at airport I called for shuttle but due to it
Manager Response: BRANPLB,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am glad to hear that we were able to provide high quality customer service during your stay, I hope that you visit us soon!

Summary: This has been a great experience. I am a huge believer in quality of service and anything above and beyond the standard really makes a difference. My favorite staff was the late night front desk workers as I had a very late check-in. Getting the room ready was a slight delay, but their genuine service and providing me with a cookie definitely made me more than content with waiting even though I came in close to 2am. After a long day, having the staff care for you and be happy in welcoming you makes all the difference. The cleanliness of my room was also a little bit more than standard. Taking an extra step is really noticeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience while visiting us. I am glad to hear that we were able to provide you excellent customer service, our goal is to always treat our guests with the highest quality of service. Hope to have you visit us again for a DoubleTree cookie!

Summary Heading: Great Value and close to Disneyland
Summary: If you are not in need of a hotel directly across from Disneyland, this is a great hotel to stay at good price. It is in close proximity to freeways, dining and more. It is only about 13 miles or less from Disneyland. Our family of four stayed here for one night and upon arrival, we were quickly greeted by the front desk and checked in within 5 minutes. We were offered freshly baked cookies as soon as we checked in and recognized as Hilton Members and offered free water to our room. The hotel was very clean, our room was great (minus a little tight and not much room to walk around) however, it was excellent for our family of four.  The restaurant staff are friendly and the food was excellent! This was a great hotel for us to stay at that was the right price for where we needed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience regarding your stay with us. I am glad to hear that you had a positive interaction with our staff, because we do strive to provide the best customer service possible. Hope to have you visit us soon while on a Disneyland trip or family getaway to enjoy some DoubleTree cookies!

Summary Heading: Had no problems at all the whole stay
Summary: My room was clean and spotless with many towels, the house keeper was really amiable as well. Roy was very professional and nice, he was very helpful and even brought out towels for my sister-in-law and I. Roy definitely went above and beyond.
Manager Response: Hello Leslie V,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel.  We greatly appreciate your feedback.    We are so happy that you had such a wonderful experience with us.  It is great to read about Roy and how much he assisted you.  He is a great team member and one we are fortunate to have working with us.  We will be sure to thank him for a job well done.  Thank you so much for sharing your stay with us.    Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to having you stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana area again!    Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager 714.442.1908 (direct) kmyers@doubletreeocairport.com

Summary: Will never come back again to this hotel. Water was cold.  Towel hanger fell off.  Not enough towels were in rooms. I had booked 2 rooms and requested to stay next to each other as my family had come from overseas... I had called and and requested this when I booked the room.. the staff were informed 3 times but no action was taken.
Manager Response: Hello pranilar,  Thank you for posting a review about our hotel, although we wished it were under better circumstances.  I am sorry there were issues with your reservation and that it led you to say you will never come back again.  We have followed up with the issues you mentioned and worked to correct this at the hotel.  We appreciate you letting us know and we will be sure to work on our delivery so we can improve our service and quality.  Thank you again for your feedback and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to have you back as our guest again.  Sincerely,  Mr. Kym Myers General Manager 714.442.1908 (direct) kmyers@doubletreeocairport.com

Summary: I was in town for Christmas weekend and somehow managed to lock myself out of my own car. Roy flagged me down trying to break into my own car like a newb. Within a few minutes he was able to get in. I showed him identification and then tried to offer him some cash, but Roy refused to take it. A true professional.   Oh, and the rooms are nice too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am happy to hear that Roy was able to assist, and save the day for you. Hope to have you visit soon!

Summary: The lobby was beautifully decorated, and the staff extremely courteous. My executive room was a good size with great views. Very comfy bed and I liked the decor. great location, i will definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am glad to hear that your experience with us was a great one. Hope to have you visit us again!

Summary: Front desk was quick and efficient, the room was clean and spacious, the staff attentive,  and I had a great stay. I used the complimentary internet and had breakfast with no complaints on either.  I would stay here again if I were in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am glad to hear that you had a great stay with us and was able to experience some of our amenities as well. Hope to have you visit us again!

Summary: I had a great experience at this location!! Loved the free warm cookie. Easy access from highway. Room was clean, bed was very comfortable...I slept good!! I was there for business & lunch was catered by the hotel, food was excellent & staff very friendly & helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback regarding your stay with us. I am glad to hear that you were able to enjoy some of our delicious cookies and enjoyed your stay with us. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: From the moment of check in, excellent customer service with front desk staff, housekeeping, dining room, gift shop to name a few.  Property appearance and cleanliness made initial first impression a 5 star.  Was there for 2 nights after a hectic family Thanksgiving and needed to relax.  This hotel did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, I am glad to hear that you experienced a great time with us. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Leak in room and temp of room 61-63 degrees
Summary: -Friendly and welcoming staff -Room had major HVAC leak- standing water and soaked carpet -Thermostat was not operable- temp in room stayed between 61-63 degrees during entire stay -Room was clean- besides leak issue  Reported issues- was not resolved, wasn't offered a different room and staff never followed up after report
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the nicer doubletrees in the area.  We have stayed at this location and the one across the street from here and we thought that this location was newer and the facilities were a little nicer.  Parking is a little pricey at $20 a day, but that is kind of expected for the area.  Self parking is easy to access and it there is an elevator that take some you right to the lobby.  Location is good with quick access to the freeway and there are lots of restaurants to choose from within a 5 mile radius of the hotel.   Staff was friendly and breakfast buffet was good.  Lots of standard fare like scrambled eggs and pastries and lots of fresh fruit.  You can get other eggs too like omelette or fried eggs, if you give the order to the waitress.  Our rooms were nice, they
Manager Response: none

Summary: I received fantastic assistance from Linda when making my booking.  My dates did change a little and she was very helpful and accommodating every step of the way.  My room was very nice and was cleaned and replenished daily.  The breakfast was also very well presented and the staff were very helpful and the service was excellent.  In addition, I used the gym which was nice and clean.  My final comment is that unfortunately  I left an item behind in the room.  I called Linda and she was able to return this to me.  If you're looking for friendly, courteous staff that go above and beyond - this is the place for you.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Staff is not engaged in their guests experience.
Summary: The rooms are not well maintained.  There needs to be a full renovation to update the entire hotel.  My bathroom sink backed up every morning when I wasn’t using it. It left a disgusting residue and odor in my entire room.  I reported it twice but it was never fixed.  The restaurant staff albeit nice , had ridiculously slow service.  Allow for plenty of time to get your meal.  Overall not one of the nicer Hilton properties in the area.
