Summary: The only problem with the hotel service desk was that when I wanted to change the dates and add on more dates to my travel, the hotel personnel where unable to accommodate.  Subsequently they found another room for us but wanted to rented to me for more money rather than the same rate that I initially received as a rewards member.  Is that the way you treat rewards members?  I would have at least hoped that you would of loved my business and be happy to have me for more days and would offer the same rate as I initially paid as a rewards member. I learned my lesson.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are terribly sorry that you had that experience. If you can contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so that we can discuss further that would be great. Thank you again for being our guest and I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: Everything about our stay was good except for the noise level of people going in and out of their rooms late in the evening and early morning; everything in our room shook and woke us up every time someone opened/shut their door (we were on the top floor). Also had very loud, obnoxious neighbors one night who partied into the wee hours. Had to call the front desk several times for them to intervene. Seems like there was not a lot of insulation in between rooms to block out the noise; seemed like the hotel was a bit older, maybe that was the problem...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so sorry to hear that you experienced this during your stay. Pleas contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so that we may discuss further.

Summary Heading: What you'd expect at a DoubleTree.
Summary: As my colleague once reminded me - it's tough to go wrong with a chain hotel. That holds quite true with the DoubleTree next to the John Wayne Airport in Orange County, CA. The staff are friendly..the room was neat and clean..and I was a happy camper. One thing to note from my recent stay was the order-head room service ticket was not collected the night before, so I would recommend calling in your order to be on the safe side if you're on a tight AM schedule. Otherwise - food was great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback about your stay. We are glad you enjoyed everything. We are sorry that your breakfast order was not handled correctly. We will make sure going forward that no guest gets missed. We thank you so much for being our guest. We look forward to getting another opportunity to provide our 5 star service.

Summary: We were there for 4 days and just need to do a small load.  They do not have laundry at this hotel.  Now they gave us a list of places to go.  Some had bars on the windows.  So I went over to the Double Tree Club and use their machines.  They were very nice.  These guys need to cut a deal with the other Double Tree it is 2 blocks away.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are going to look into your suggestion. We tank you for sharing and thank you for being our guest. We hope when you return.

Summary Heading: Great location, Pleasant staff, & Good cookied
Summary: This hotel is perfectly situated close to shopping and beaches. South Coast Plaza is just a 5 minute drive from the hotel and just a 15 minute drive to Newport Beach. My check-in was great and they even recognized my Hilton Honors which offrred me a room on floor 5 or 6.  After enjoying dinner at Mastros, i decided to hang out in the hotel's bar for a few hours. Decent crowd and great customer service.  Around 3 am i was awakened by loud music.  The front desk immediately located the problem and silenced the loud music. I was presently surprised and will return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so excited that you enjoyed your stay. I love that your problem was solved immediately and with ease. Thank you aging for being our guest. Can't wait for your return.

Summary Heading: Great 1 Night Stay at Double Tree OC Airport
Summary: I only stayed 1 night for business but the staff was very friendly upon my after hours arrival. The room was very clean and maintained. I had a great breakfast in the morning. All the staff in passing were friendly and smiling. Overall great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments. We are always happy to see that our guests, even 1 night can have a 5 star experience. Thank yo so much for being our guest. We are anxiously waiting for your return.

Summary Heading: My daughter and I enjoyed our stay
Summary: The front service desk staff were very attentive to my daughter and I. She really enjoyed her stay. I would go back there anytime I need to stay in Santa Ana. The first thing my daughter said when we walked in was " wow this is beautiful mommy'" it made me feel like it was a good choice to stay there. The waiter at the restaurant also was attentive to us and our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad that you and your daughter were able to experience the little things that made your stay even morn memorable. We are so happy that you were our guest and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Hotel was clean, quiet, and the courtesy van which takes you anywhere within 3 miles is a real bonus.  They also pick you up at airport and return you.  Saves loads on cab fare.  Complimentary coffee in lobby was excellent and there was also fruit infused water. There was a great mexican dining establishment a block away "The Little Onion" - I had the special Maui Maui with a mango sauce and it was great as was the desert, key lime pie.  The happy hour menu looked great but we never got back for that.  Next door  is a liquor store and a bakery where you get breakfast burittos or sandwiches.  Directly across the street from the hotel is a lovely lake with a path around it which is nice for getting some exercise.  Also a Starbucks across the street.  I would highly recommend this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. Being a business hotel it means worlds to us that you had everything you needed during your stay. We are very happy to hear that you had an opportunity to try the little onion. It really is a hidden gem. We are so happy that you were our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The hotel is clean but looks like it's on the older side. I had a room that faced the highway so not very exciting with such a long stay. There is a roof top bar which is nice to relax. Drinks expensive for 2 beers and 1 mixed drink $32.00.  Restaurant on site was good but also expensive breakfast buffet was about $25 with tax and tip. No free coffee in lobby which would be great for guests who are there on business and have to get to work early morning. Ordering breakfast separate   Not Buffett juice and coffee were $4 each  And the glass of juice was a small glass. 3 had breakfast at it was $81 with tip. Way too expensive for what you get.  Pool area was ok to relax. No on site laundry for guest to use, have to send it out to be done. Kind of strange considering the beach is
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was booked into this hotel by my company for a business meeting right across the street. It was a very convenient location for me. Everything about this hotel was easy... from the airport shuttle pick up to room service. The front desk personnel were always friendly and accommodating. I loved the breakfast buffet in the morning. Good choices, I had something different every day. While internet and breakfast were included for me, you may have to purchase them separately depending on how you book the room. The room service menu was adequate and the service prompt. I did not have a rental car, so I didn't venture far from the hotel, but it was a very nice area to walk around... there is a man-made lake with ducks and turtles. I did not go in the pool, but it looked very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We love when our guests have an enjoyable time on our property. Thank you so much for being our guest and we really look forward to providing 5 star service on your next visit.

Summary: All of the hotel staff have treated me and my family with such respect that no other hotel has. Not only do they help us with a smile, they are glad to have a conversation with you. You will truly feel like you are a valued customer at this hotel! Amazing staff, clean rooms, and delectable food combine to make DoubleTree Hilton a truly wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback regarding your stay with us. We are so happy that your experience set us apart from any other hotel. We really try to make all our guests feel human. Thank you so much for being our guest and we are anxiously waiting for your return.

Summary: We had a great experience with this hotel, it was a last minute stay for a wedding and they didn't disappoint. We will be back soon. Already planing a return mini vacation. We would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so excited to here that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to you coming back. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Horribly Old Bathrooms - seriously needs upgrade
Summary: Overall the hotel room was as expected, breakfast as expected but the bathrooms were seriously old and in need of refurbishment. I understand Hilton would want to stretch it out as much as possible so they can keep earning but, for a location like this with business travelers, it is an extremely poor decision.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so sorry that your experience was hindered by the condition of our bathrooms. We are looking into and will be working on this. Thank you so much for being our guest. On your return please reach out to me so that I can handle your reservation personally.

Summary Heading: Great hotel & close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: Great hotel. Love the breakfast buffet at their restaurant (included with my rate but varies). Warm cookies when you check in. The pool is upstairs on top of a floor and a bit smaller than most Doubletree hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry that we did not meet the 5 star satisfaction. We will continue to focus on our guests and what they have to say. Thank you so much for being our guest and we are excited to see you again.

Summary: The hotel was nice but when it comes down to the pool being clean and things are broken i would give it 3 stars. The pool and hot tub were dirty. I will stay somewhere else when I go back. When i pay for a stay at a hotel and want to load my car up in the valet area they should not rush me and tell me I need to move.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for you review. I am sorry that we fell short of the 5 star experience. We are looking into the maintenance or the pool area and addressing the issue. Thank you again for providing feedback and thank you again for being  our guest. If you decide to give us anther try please reach out and I will handle your reservation personally.

Summary: This place is horrible. We were the first to check in at 3pm, but they refused to give us the 2queen room that we reserved through expedia. At first they were saying that they did have some 2queens available, but those were reserved for some folks who paid more by booking on their own website. What a bloody mess!! If you don't like people to book through other websites then please don't put your information there. After a few minutes' argument they went on saying that the 2queens were simply sold out. One of us ended up cramming into a crappy sofa bed for a few nights. And they didn't even want to give us free parking for the huge inconvenience. Thank you for ruining our vacation!  As we went out of the elevator and were walking toward our room, we noticed there were at least
Manager Response: Than you for taking time to give us feedback. Please if you would contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so that we may discuss further.

Summary: Had a good time with you thank you for everything keep up the good work it was nice  experience  it was close to the airport it was close to everything that we needed to do for that day with our family it was a nice day
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Than you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I was in town for work and stayed at the Doubletree. They were kind and welcoming to us and even provided fun extras for being a Hilton honors diamond member. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean. Breakfast was filling. I would stay here again if my travels brought me back to Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review about your stay. We are over the moon happy that you experienced the 5 star service that we always aim for. Being a diamond member we know that travel is almost a guarantee, that is why we try to make your stay as if you were home. Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Best hotel for your Disney and OC adventures
Summary: This hotel is absolutely amazing!! First of all, the location is in the heart of Orange County, close to John Wayne airport(SNA), the beaches, and Disneyland. There are public buses that takes you to all those attractions. There's no need to rent a car if you stay in this hotel. However, if you choose to rent or take your own vehicle, they have covered parking in the basement. Covered parking is rare in hotels these days.   The rooms are clean and spacious. They have a great gym, complete with free weights. There is also a nice pool and hot tub, ideal for families. We had multiple meals in the restaurant and all were delicious. There are also numerous places to eat within walking distance.  Most impressive in this hotel is the wonderful staff. I particularly remember Alex and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so excited that you loved the hotel. We are even more excited that our staff especially Alex and Diego made you feel special. We are truly blessed to have them. Thank you so much for being our guest and we cant wait for your return.

Summary: This is a first-class property in every way, and I found it so convenient that it will be my place to stay in Irvine from here on.  Even though it has a lot to recommend it in terms of service and appearance, one of its most important features is its location.  It's right off the Costa Mesa Hwy only an exit or so off the 405 and very close to John Wayne.  Superb location regardless of where you are coming from.    The housekeeping staff was warm and friendly, and attentively addressed the few special items I asked for.    One thing I like is a shower with a strong water flow, and this hotel had one of the best showers I have ever enjoyed.    Didn't get a chance to eat in the restaurant this trip, but I will on the next trip.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so happy that all aspects of your trip were met. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Rooms are clean...staff was friendly and responsive. There seems to be a slight disconnect between housekeeping and whoever manages trash collection and room service pickup. Housekeeping did a great job on the rooms but room service did a horrible job of picking up dirty dishes from the hallways. Dishes sat out in our hallway for 2 days waiting to be cleaned up. Trash cans were also over flowing in the parking garage. My hope is that management reads this and realizes that whoever is in charge of these things needs to up their game. My review would have been better had it not been for the trash issues. And FYI...room 645's walls need some work.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing feedback about your stay. We are so sorry that the experience was not to your liking. We have made the managers of those departments aware and since these issues have been rectified. Thank you so much for being our guest and we hope that we are still your choice. We definitely want the opportunity to provide you with the 5 star service on your next visit. We will see you soon.

Summary: Horrible experience, staff did nothing to stop a college basketball team from disturbing an entire floor of guests.  Our Grandson was so terrified throughout the night that he vomited several times from the screaming of profanities and pounding on our walls and doors ALL NIGHT LONG. Zero sleep destroyed our vacation.  Staff at checkout was remorseful and acted like they could care less.  No apology or offer for compensation of any kind.  IF THIS IS WHAT I CAN EXPECT FROM THE HILTON CHAIN, THEN NEVER AGAIN!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know of this situation. Please contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so we can discuss this matter.

Summary: This hotel did not stand out as being a top rated hotel. The location is great beyond the ease to the airport and local dining areas. The hotel staff was kind and courteous. The rooms were substandard with mixed-matches cushions for the couch and a lack-luster decor, with a bathroom that needs proper ventilation and bathtubs that aren't peeling paint. There's a daily $24 valet charge or $20 if you park your car yourself. The outside pool and hot tub are very small. We did not eat at the hotel restaurant because of the very expensive menu selections and we had great options in the area. Overall I would think twice before staying again at the same rates.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with feedback. We are very sorry that your experience was not the best. We always want our guests to have a 5 star experience. If you would contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com, so that we may discuss further. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel based on the free breakfast. They denied us the free breakfast and required us to show proof by printing out the website, staff was argumentive, and we had to pay for parking, after the website clearly stated free parking and free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. If you would please contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so we may discuss further.

Summary: Beautiful property, perfect location, friendly staff, WONDERFUL WARM FRESH BAKED COOKIES were a pleasant surprise at check in. Bed was soft and comfortable. Overall a good place to stay. Would have loved to have complimentary breakfast😕
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are very happy to hear that everything went well during your stay. We thank you so much for being our guest and we hope you will return soon.

Summary: Diego and Alex were amazing! Very welcoming and attentive. Answered any questions I had and made sure that I would enjoy my stay! My significant other & I decided to stay at this hotel for a quick getaway and we enjoyed it very much. Quiet and peaceful. Would recommend to friends and family!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words Ms. Oun. We are very excited that you were taken care of by Alex and Diego. We are very fortunate to have them on our front desk team. We are so happy that you were our guest and we can't wait for your return.

Summary: A great hotel to stay in. The check in process was fast. Friendly staff at the desk. The only problem was checking out, I wanted a receipt to check any charges but was told their printer isn't working. I'm still waiting in my email for them to send the receipt or acknowledgement but nothing sent. NO RECEIPT of transaction really is not good practice. Other than this issue. Everything was great. I would stay there again😊👍
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are very happy to hear that our hotel made an impression on your stay. For your reservation there was no charges incurred at the hotel. This was a 3rd party reservation and they send a receipt at the time of booking. We are so happy that you stayed with us. Thank you again and we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Friendly Staff, Honors Room Wi-Fi Did Not Work
Summary: Overall, the hotel was very clean, the room was very clean, the staff was very friendly.  The only issue I had was with the room wi-fi.  Surprisingly, after reporting the issue to tech support using the number they provide you with on the wi-fi slip, nothing happened.  No one checked equipment, no one was sent to the room to investigate the issue and try to resolve.  It was suggested by the tech support rep to wait a few hours to see if the issue resolved on its own.  I was offered to switch rooms which was more of a hassle than having room wi-fi so I worked around it.  Each person I interacted with about the wi-fi did not seem interested in actually investigating and resolving the issue at all, only finding other accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing feedback about your stay. We are sorry to hear that the internet during your stay was intermittent. We are looking into that and want you know that we will fix right away. Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. We look forward to having you back and thank you again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Great service, beautiful property, and great location!
Summary: The staff was wonderful from the initial greeting at the front desk to the beautifully folded towels in my restroom to the exceptional service at breakfast. I would highly recommend a stay at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing feedback about your stay. We are very pleased that you enjoyed the Hotel. We are always happy to ear when our guests experience the 5 star service. Thank you so much for being our guest. We can't wait for your return.

Summary: What a joke I do not mind paying 20 dollars a day to park my car at a nice hotel.  Asked if someone could help with the bags a guy pointed to a cart.  Got to the room we pre paid , never again.  We booked a king with a pull out sofa.  The room was so small the side bed would not open all the way.  Manger told me all the rooms were the same size.  They told the would refund the money so we booked at a different Hilton paid a much higher rate.  Still never got a refund 8 calls later between hotel and the Diamond desk I give up.  Not sure what is worse this is how they treat a Diamond member or this is how they would treat any guest!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us feedback. If you would please contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so that we may discuss further.

Summary: I enjoyed staying in this Doubletree. It was in convenient driving distance to the meeting that I was to attend.   The staff is positive and friendly. The hotel campus is clean and offers a nice breakfast. Breakfast is pricey at $19 with protein and $15 without.  Spa and pool are minimal.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay. Hopefully when you do come back we can provide a 5 star service. Than you again for being our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed here Mother's Day weekend for a get away. Staff friendly, room clean, comfortable and property well maintained. Breakfast buffet quite good; restaurant service excellent. No issues with this property and will stay again next time in area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to post your review. We love hearing that you had an amazing Mothers day weekend. We are so happy that you found everything in order and that the Hotel welcomed you. We are so happy that you were our guest. We cant wait for your return.

Summary: This hotel is located so close to Disneyland! It is close to two wo bus stops that run every few minutes and that take you right to the front gate. The pool and jacuzzi tub are a welcome relief for tired bodies; even mid-day. Ask for a room that views the park's nightly fireworks. You can then skip the crowds that night and get up early the next day to enjoy the park earlier than most (Morning Magic).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so excited too hear that your stay was magical. Thank you for being our guest. We can't wait for the magic to continue on your return.

Summary: Jets in the Jacuzzi are way too low. They are positioned in a way to hit your butt crack! YES way!  Not very relaxing at all! Like no one very checked during the construction?????  Very BAD!!!!!!!  Needs to be torn out and start over!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are very sorry that the Jacuzzi was not to your liking. We appreciate you taking the time to inform us about this. Without our guests we may not know about this. We are looking into it. Thank you again for being our guest and we are hopeful for your return.

Summary: This was a great hotel for a wedding party and family to stay for a weekend. Everything you need during the stay and close to Disneyland and other attractions if some folks want to go. I worked with staff to get a great rate for the area, free Wifi, and reduced parking by 50%.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the hotel meet your needs. We love when vacations even mini ones can be successful. We hope on your return visit we can wow you again. Thank you so much for n=being our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Clean rooms, nice tv. comfortable pillows, friendly staff.  Its close to the airport. Great cookies.  Store downstairs is the most reasonable of any hotel store I've ever visited.  Parking is $20 night but that is ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you so much for being our guest. We cant wait for your return.

Summary: I stayed here for business for 3 days straight and felt at home. Angel and Diego took amazing care of me and deserve a raise! They were so welcoming they even gave me a free breakfast voucher. Every day I was greeted with a smile and clean room. Location is close to the airport which I needed, but not close enough that I could hear airplanes. I look forward to my next stay at this great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so happy that Angel and Diego made you feel at home. Everyday we try to make all our guests feel this way. We are so happy that you felt at home here at our Doubletree. Thank you so much for being our guest and we are excited for your return.

Summary: We had a great stay! Diego provided exceptional service. Location is perfect. Room was clean and bed extremely comfortable. Highly recommend staying here! Minutes to the airport and close to beaches. Hotel bar was a good spot to hang out.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are very pleased to hear that Diego made an impression on you. We are very proud to have a hard worker on our front desk staff. Thank you so much for being our guest and we can't wait for your return.

Summary: I worked with excellent hotel staff members who made my endeavor as Conference Chairperson successful.  I've been involved in many conferences, and this hotel's staff stayed available at all times to make great things happen.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. We are so happy that your event was successful. We are very pleased to hear that the employees you encountered made everything run smooth. We thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to hosting you again soon.

Summary: when I go to a hotel there are simply a few fundamentals that are ecpected...1 is hot water for a shower.  I had to take a freezing cold shower...I complained, but did not have time to wait for an engineer to correct the problem. I had a meeting to go to.  I went unshaved!  Terrible situation..staff said sorry and here is your bill.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing feedback about your stay. I am so sorry that we did not meet your expectations when it came to hot water for your shower. This was unexpected for us and we have since fixed the issue. If you can contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport.com so that we can discuss further you are more than welcome to. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: The conference rooms were excellent the only problem was sometime the sound system was too loud. The area for the vendors was great, food was so good in the restaurant and at the conference was excellent.  Our room was just what we needed.  I always enjoy the cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you conference went well. We are so glad that you were our guest. We cant wait for your return. We will have a warm cookie waiting.

Summary: I stayed here during business training, I was not really impressed by this hotel. Usually Double Tree hotels are a lot nicer than this one, and this particular hotel appears to be dated. I did have a few problems with parking, but it was addressed by management. The main complaint with the hotel was that the hot tub appeared to be dirty and not cleaned for weeks, it was extremely cloudy as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your recent stay. I am so sorry that we fell short of your expectations. I am glad that you brought to our attention the Hot Tub. Since you have stayed with us this issue has been fixed and we thank you. We hope that when you come back we can supersede the last stay and make it right. Thank you so much for being our guest. See you soon.

Summary: Morning buffet was very delicious. Hotel is near airport  and easy access to freeway.  Check in was quick and easy  Francisco, Diego and Gloria were very professional and friendly.   Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so pleased that Francisco, Diego and Gloria made your stay much more comfortable. They are all great associates and we are proud of them. We are so glad that you were a guest of ours. Come back Soon.

Summary: Clean and pleasant. For a softball travel ball parent, it was close to a few different softball fields with a minute or so to get on the freeway. Travel ball is expensive but this was a great deal for a nice safe hotel, it was worth the money!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so pleased to hear that our hotel met all you expectations. We are so glad that you were our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed here recently while in town for work.  Great location, super clean and great value, considering it being so close to the airport, freeways and South Coast Plaza.  Gloria at the front desk was great with recommendations and directions.  She was always very helpful and patient.  Overall a great stay and experience.  Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so happy to hear that Gloria made your stay. We are very glad that she is a part of the Front desk staff. We always strive for 5 star service and we are so happy that you received that. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to your return.

Summary: the property staff was very friendly. Front desk helped us tremendously with our questions. had a nice conversation with Gloria at the front desk. enjoyed her positive attitude and willingness to help.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments. We are pleased that the Front Desk were able to go above and beyond to help you with your questions. I am glad that Gloria stood out to you and made an impression. We are very glad that she is on our team. Thank you so much for being our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel was by far the best. Great location to all freeways and shopping centers. Helpful staff, clean and reasonably priced. I will definitely stay at this location every time I visit Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so happy that our Doubletree provided you with everything you needed, from service to comfort. We love hearing about our guest experiences. Thank you so much for being our guest. We are very excited to hear that we are your hotel of choice for your return visit. We can't wait.

Summary: If you want a relaxing, high amenity, clean room, this is the place for business or leisure.  Location was perfect to freeway and access.  Room was so clean and spacious.  I have stayed here before and will stay again.  Staff was extremely helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so pleased to hear that the hotel and the staff our your home away from home. We love hearing that our guests are happy. Thank you again for being our guest and we can't wait for your return.

Summary: The rooms are very clean and spacious. The hotel staff is fantastic and very helpful. I've stayed here a few times and I will continue to frequent this particular Double Tree location. The front desk staff has been extremely helpful everytime I've  been here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback.  We are so happy to hear that the staff makes your stay every time. We appreciate the repeat business and appreciate that you continue to choose our hotel. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to your return.

Summary: The guest room could use the addition of USB ports.  The breakfast buffet, while there is a variety of selections, the ot food was cold.  At $19.00 I expected better.  Also, the mattresses need to be flipped.  I felt like was sleeping in a deep pit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of your stay. We like that suggestion and will look into it. I am so sorry that we did not meet your expectations with our breakfast buffet. We always want our guests to feel the value when staying with us. The appropriate manager will be informed and we will work on that. We thank you so much for being our guest. We are hopeful for your return.

Summary: Nice spot, convenient and reasonable. Stayed with the family over Easter. Kids enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Rooms were comfortable and hotel was fairly quiet with the holiday weekend. Have stayed there before though and will return again. Recommended for anyone in North/Central Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so happy that you and your family had a great Easter. We are excited that you continue to return. Thank you again for being our guest. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great location for your average DoubleTree
Summary: Great location for day trips either down to San Diego or up to Universal Studios and everywhere else in between.  Easy access off the freeway.  Yummy DoubleTree cookies on arrival (and if you need another one during your stay).  Parking is in the garage below with plenty of space (unless there is some convention at the hotel).  Beds are on the soft side and the pillows were TOO soft, which is the big negative for our family.  "Queen size" beds are on the small side (really a full size?)  Buffet breakfast is the same every day (hot and cold items).  Front desk staff is really nice.  For the right price (lower than the nearby Embassy Suites), I would stay again, but would make sure to bring my own pillow.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased that you loved the hotel. We are sorry that the pillows did not meet your expectations. We will look into this. We are so glad you were our guest and we look forward to your return.

Summary: I stayed on the weekend and the rate was shockingly low, so I was quite pleased, add in the free WiFi and was the making of a good stay.  Less pleasing was the fact that I had to pay for parking and breakfast.  As others have mentioned, the location is great, next to the freeway and the airport.  The room service options were also quite good.  I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to provide feedback about your stay. We are so happy to hear that you loved the hotel amenities. We are so happy that you were our guest and look forward to your return.

Summary: The most positive thing about this hotel is location location location. I stayed here for 2 nights on a business trip and given I had to be in Anaheim, Newport, Huntington and Long Beach the location was great for free way travel.  Outside of the location this hotel was average. As a Hilton Diamond member I stay at a lot of Hiltons, some stand out for being amazing and I have had 1 or 2 that were horrible but this one was just your average run of the mill hotel from my point of view.  The room was clean and ok, the thermostat seemed to have some issues regulating the temp but nothing major.   I can't saying anything horrible, if I had to choose something I guess any hotel that makes me pay for parking annoys me in general (even though my company pays for it). I think it's crazy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback about your stay. I am so sorry that we did not meet or exceed your expectations. As a diamond member we appreciate your thoughts and we will follow up on these issues. We hope your loyalty will continue and we look forward to your return. Thank you again for being our guest and for being a Hilton Honors Diamond member.

Summary: Great experience. Rooms clean and comfortable.  Staff amazing and helpful.  Breakfast was good amd tasty with many selections.  Valet parking provided for a fee.  Close to freeways and venue location, I felt safe and secure.
Manager Response: We are so glad that our hotel can make your day. We are so pleased that everything during your stay was great. Thank you so much for being our guest. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Room was clean. We were able to check in early. We attended a wedding in downtown Santa Ana. Proximity to location was great. Rooms were quit and beds comfortable. Breakfast was delicious, fresh and for being continental there was a wide variety of breakfast choices. The attendant was friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback about your stay. We love hearing that your stay was great. Thank you so much for being our guest. We are anxiously awaiting your return.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for conference. Making reservation easy, check-in and check-out easy. Staff great, everyone I dealt with very nice. So nice to have everything needed all in one place. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind remarks. We are very excited to hear that your stay was great. We are so glad that everything you needed was right where you were. Thank you so much for being our guest. We can't wait for your return.

Summary: I was very pleased with this hotel over all.  Great accommodations, very clean, great staff, excellent room service. No complaints at all.  The tv remote was a little older and was difficult to use at times, but that was very minor compared to everything else.  Room service was excellent.  I thought they were going to be late, but they were right on time.  Great food.  Great meeting space.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy to hear that the room service team came through with a good and timely meal. Thank you so much for being our guest. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: superb service.....diego  and   francisco get 2 thumbs up..polite courterous and profesional service..service like that will keep me coming back.......thanks diego                                                         .......thanks francisco 201 east mcaurther double tree.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing you experience with us. We are so glad that Frankie and Diego made your stay. We are very proud of the service they present. Thank you so much for being our guest. We and the cookies are waiting for you.

Summary: The room was clean, bathtub looks as though it is ready to be reburbished a little. Overall great place to stay for the price. Comfortable and quiet as well. abiut 10 minutes away from Disneyland, so if you don't mind the drive, I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you again for being our guest. We hope on your return we make your stay better than the last.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, very nice hotel, and close to John Wayne Airport!
Summary: There is a free shuttle to and from John Wayne (SNA) airport- the shuttle was not available when I arrived, so they paid for me take a cab, which was very nice. They also let me check in early. Great service from all the hotel staff I interacted with-everyone was friendly. I did not eat at the hotel restaurant, so I cannot speak to it. I did eat breakfast at a Starbucks across the street and a few other restaurants there too.  The hotel is clean, it was quiet on the weekend we stayed and the bed is comfy. Our room had a nice view! It was in a great location, near the airport and center of the city. We took Uber or walked everywhere, and it seemed to be fine.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so glad that you you had 5 star service. We strive everyday to make each guests stay great. Thank you so much for being our guest. We cant wait for you to come back.

Summary: We had a Wonderful experience at this hotel!!  Frankly, Abel and Diego made sure we were completely satisfied with our stay and went above and beyond to make us happy customers!  We will definitely be back when we return to Orange County again!  Room was large and clean, location is central and staff was amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so excited to hear that Frankie ,Abel, And Diego made an impression on your stay. We are always happy to hear that the customer service is excellent. Thank you for being our guest. We anxiously await your return.

Summary: I visited the area last week during a business trip and stayed 2 nights at the Double Tree. The room was great, clean and had everything you need. Self-parking will cost you $20, so I opted for valet at $24 per night. The hotel's wifi (very good) and breakfast were included during my stay. The hotel offered a variety for all tastes. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are always excited to hear that you enjoyed your time at our Doubletree. We are glad that all areas were to your liking. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Not good or bad. Just ehhh
Summary: Can't really say that this hotel is good or bad. The lobby looked nice but my hilton honors room smelled like it was out of the 70s. Or like visiting your grandparents that lived in the same house and never renovated for 50 years. Valet was fast getting cars. The round about was terrible because without the valet being there people did not know how to navigate around it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so sorry that your room was not up to your expectations. I have made sure that the Housekeeping manager is aware and is working on the issue. We are so happy that you were our guest. We hope on your return visit we earn the 5 star rating.

Summary: From the front to the back of the house, the hotel staff amazes. John (Front Desk Mgr) leads a stellar group--testimony to his style. John fixes issues first then asks guests questions later.  Diego excelled at check-out with clarity and efficiency.  Moreover, went beyond the call of duty helping me find a brand new Motorola DROID after a wedding gala held at the hotel. Initial panic subsided--convinced by Diego he sincerely meant what he promised. Not only that, he joined effort with Housekeeping, together Diego and Guadalupe N. recovered, secured, and immediately notified me the phone was safely stowed away at Front Desk ready for pick-up. The staff at the DoubleTree is off-the-chart superb. John:  Congratulations to your team of professionals who truly went beyond the call of
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. I am so happy that we we could make your day by finding your phone. I am so happy and proud that Diego and Guadalupe acted accordingly. Thank you again for being our guest and we cant wait for your return to the property.

Summary: My family and I stayed here last week during our Disneyland trip. When we arrived we were helped by Enrique . We drove from the Bay Area , so we were super tired, but Enrique greeted us with a big smile and fresh cookies that made us feel better. He made us feel very welcomed.    Our room was great. The bed and pillows were so comfortable. The hotel in general was very quiet . The breakfast was very delicious. They have food for every taste and diet.   Our check out process was as great. Francisco was the one that helped us with our check out. He was very helpful and fast. All in all this hotel has great employees . Service is really important for us . So if you are planning your Disney trip don't hesitate to give this DoubleTree a try!!!!
Manager Response: We are so excited that you stayed with us. Thank you again for the kind remarks. We are always pleased to see that our employees make a difference in our guests stay. I am so happy that Enrique made you fell welcome. Thank you so much for being our guest. We look forward to coming back.

Summary: Overall a great stay.  Superb value for the quality.  Staff extremely helpful and professional.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Hotel was clean and beautiful.  Walking distance to food and coffee!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are glad that our staff made an impression during your visit. We cant wait for you to visit again.

Summary: Love Hilton hotels. Always clean, staff always nice. Locations are everywhere. The hotel rooms are clean and spacious. There are always plenty of bath towels. For some reason the sink in the bathroom stunk so we ended up using bottled water. I did report it upon checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are so happy that we met and made your vacation memorable. Thank you again for being our guest. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Very comfortable stay. One of the elevators did not work. So long elevator wait time. We got 2 free drink vouchers for comp. Stairs only take you outside the hotel and not to the lobby. Cookies were delicious. Very close to Orange County airport. Shuttle service was very convenient. Will highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick 1 night stay. The hotel was clean, parking was on site and below the hotel.  Access from the freeways was easy as was getting in and out of the hotel. The breakfast buffet that is included for elite members was decent and included hot items.   Pro tip: If you are an elite and using late checkout make sure they key your key card appropriately.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We hope on your next visit we can make your stay  better than this experience. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Chose this hotel because of airport shuttle service which was kind of a joke
Summary: Chose this hotel because of airport shuttle service and short, two night stay for business in the area. After a very long day of travel from the east coast (flight to Seattle in the a.m. and evening flight to SNA) I called front desk for the airport shuttle at SNA. It was 8:30 pm and the gentleman who answered the phone said "It's going to be 20 minutes due to traffic". I opted to jump in a cab because I was simply running on fumes. There was NO TRAFFIC. I was disappointed I had been flat out lied to. Ordered room service breakfast and it was prompt. Food quality was nothing to write home about. As expected, basic pool was teeny. Would have liked to chill there for a few hours my second day there, but honestly, didn't like the secluded vibe and decided not too. I had a 6:45 am
Manager Response: Thank You so much for your feedback. We  are so sorry that we did not meet your expectations while you stayed with us. We will take your feedback and work on being better. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to make it right. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: The hotel was well situated by the 55 freeway which was convenient. However the hotel itself wasn't great. There are only 2 elevators and 1 was out the entire 4 night stay with a completely full hotel due to an expo. The wifi was spotty, the water would only get warm not hot and the room temperature wasn't consistent. I wouldn't recommend this hotel unless I knew the above were corrected.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We have Since fixed all the issues. We definitely understand the frustration it caused during your stay. We never want our guests to experience any issues and for that we are so sorry. We hope that we can still have another chance to make it right. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: Very Happy To find a Better option for Spring Break. Great location to Disney and New Port Beach. Service was good. Valet was awesome.  The rooms looked renovated on the website, however when we checked in the room looked nothing like the photo on the website. Humid in the room. One elevator was out service all weekend. Only one working elevator  guest trying to squeeze in and the Jacuzzi was out of service. My biggest concern was the restaurant. We sat at a table that had 2 coffee mugs with lipstick stains. We used the to go coffee cups for all drinks. The plates on the buffet were dirty. The cookies provided to us upon departure that morning were HARD. The elevators were dirty as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations to the fullest extent. We have since fixed the elevator and Jacuzzi issues. We apologize about the other issues and are working quickly to get them solved. We hope that your return visit we can meet the 5 star expectation. Thank again for being our guest.

Summary: This was my second stay here and I am pleased to say that I've enjoyed it. It's not bad of a drive to Disneyland. Price wise it is good for the pricing. Staff is very welcoming and makes the stay even better. Valet parking is good. $20 for my whole stay. Doesn't get better then that. Bed is also very comfortable and rooms are clean. Only thing I feel should be added to it is a microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are always excited to hear what are guests have to say. We are glad our staff and your bed were there to make your stay great.  Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to your return to the property.

Summary: The staff at the hotel couldn't be more helpful.  The hotel itself needs some updating and they only had one elevator working so it caused massive congestion.  Overall a good hotel for the value we received considering it was a convention weekend.
Manager Response: Thank your for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay.We are sorry about the Elevator inconvenience. We have since fixed the issue and we cant wait for your return. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: Absolutely fabulous! The airport shuttle not only will pick you up, but can drop you off anywhere within a 3 mile radius which saved me tons on my stay. Angel recommended a few locations at the Tustin district to grab a drink and hangout with my colleagues. The rooms are very nice and comfortable to be in especially if you're a Hilton Honors member.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you gave us a 5 star review. We are glad that we were able to make your stay stress free. Thank you for your kind word about Angel. We are excited to have you in the near future.

Summary Heading: My stay in the Doubletree Hotel
Summary: The hotel is nice and clean, the entire staff is extremely friendly and helpful, Wifi is high speed, rooms very clean with large size TVs, the hotel shuttle will take you even beyond the advertised three mile radius, a clear recommendation!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for feedback. We are so glad that everything went smooth during your stay. We are glad that your accommodations were met by the shuttle staff. Going the extra mile is always something we strive for. Thank you again for being our guest. See you soon.

Summary: I usually stay at the Marriot down the road, but this location won my staying preference with their welcoming staff and delicious cookies. The rooms are modern with new beds as I read through past reviews. The front desks receptionist Stephanie and Angel were the best. I had a few request and they were even able to accommodate me with a microwave being sent to my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that we were able to accommodate your requests, and that Stephanie and Angel took care of you. We are glad that we are now your booking preference, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Every time I have a chance to visit family in south LA, I always tried to reserve this hotel to stay.  their very friendly staffs that'd made the different, and their fresh and free cookies are no words to describe.  It happened to us once time when we arrived late in the evening and was so tired, the lobby staffs offered to help out every thing they could to make our stay as comfortable as they could, and due to this lateness and tired, they also offered the free breakfast in the morning which really made our days.  Take and stay this hotels anytime.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We strive daily to give the best service at all times of the day. We are so happy that we could make a difference during your stay.  Thank you for being our guest. We look forward to your return.

Summary: I did a quick one night trip here and wish I had planned to stay longer. The room was beautiful! Everyone was very friendly and the hotel itself is very nice. The location is good as it is only a few minutes from the airport as well as malls and restaurants. The breakfast was pretty good too!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that your stay was great. Thank you so much for the feedback. We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel is a modern hotel with newly furbished mattresses in each room. The front desk agents Angel & Stephanie were kind enough to upgrade us to a Hilton Honors floor with no additional cost and at an early check in too. The check in process was quick and easy. The cookies really hit the spot after a long drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am so happy to hear that the front desk agents Stephanie and Angel made an impression on you. We are so happy that your stay was seamless. Can't wait for your return. Thank you so much for being our guest.

Summary: First of all the cookies here are amazing. The staff in all departments are on point especially at the front desk. The receptionist Navarro gladly made me a Hilton Honors account and helped extend me another night upon request.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback in regards to your stay. We are always pleased to hear that our staff especially Navarro was a highlight in your stay. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you on your return visit.

Summary: Nice clean hotel.  I booked here because my last hotel had an abysmal printer.  For business I frequently have to print paperwork.  My only complaint about this hotel is that the restaurant is located right in front of the giant sliding doors, the cold air made dining here very uncomfortable.  Hotel is clean, bed is comfortable, great lighting, , I will definitely book again for business, but for pleasure I would choose elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us feedback about your stay. We know how critical it  may be to have access to a printer especially for work. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I am surprised that Hilton would put their name on this hotel…it's dirty (including the nasty dining room), HH requests are not fulfilled, management is snippy, room temperature can not be controlled, rooms are tiny, and the list goes one.  Have never stayed at such a terrible Hilton Hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. If you can please contact me at jortiz@doubletreeocairport so that we may discuss.

Summary: Excellent service from the two receptionist Stephanie & Angel. Welcomed with a delicious cookie at check in and was recommended a variety of local bars and restaurants. The shuttle driver Eduardo was on time to pick us up from where he dropped us off. The rooms are modern with new mattresses. Recommend anyone to stay at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are so happy that Angel, Stephanie, and Eduardo made an impression while you were our guest. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to seeing soon.

Summary: Awesome staff, the hotel room was clean and there was wifi with our stay. I got my second night cheaper and got 2 warm chocolate chip cookies when I checked in for me and my guest. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have traveled all throughout the states and this property has been one of the most pleasant to stay at. With new mattresses throughout the hotel and excellent customer service from Angel & Alex at the front desk. This stay couldn't have been any less perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my second time to stay here and the hotel was good. The staff was super friendly and the location is great. The rooms are normal doubletree rooms and still seem pretty new. Workout center isn't much of anything but overall I would stay here again. Great location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Extremely attentive and courteous staff throughout the hotel.  All service most prompt and delivered with a smile. Very competitive rate for the area and great location.  For runners, nice surrounding area to walk/jog.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: No hot water, overcharged, poor restaurant service, points didn't post to account
Summary: Just wanted to share my experience with a very negative experience I’ve had with this hotel.  Probably the worst Hilton property experience I’ve had in my last 2 years of traveling and staying almost exclusively at Hilton properties each week.  My travel patterns have me staying over 150 nights a year in hotels and I usually stay at Hiltons.  I normally can overlook small issues but this hotel takes the cake.    The first issue was when I had dinner in the hotel restaurant on my first night, the service was inattentive to say the least.  My coworker and I waited almost 10 minutes to find a waiter to take our order.  Then when drinks were delivered, my co-worker’s bar drink was forgotten and we waited another 10 mins to flag down the one waiter who seemed to be serving the whole
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Location & Staff Great, Rooms Average, Bathrooms Run Down
Summary: The location of the hotel is within five minutes of malls and many high-rated restaurants. The staff was jovial and held my bags when I checked out so that could do some further exploring. The rooms were quite average; beds were comfortable and the heating system was functional. However, the windowsills were dirty, and the bathrooms had chips on the walls. The water pressure was extremely low, and it was not reaching warm/hot temperatures. Lastly, the breakfast buffet was good, but the food was not hot and i noticed there wasn't anything for vegetarians (I'm not a vegetarian; just a thought). Overall, this is a good choice for a hotel if you're on budget, but don't want run down. If your budget is a little higher, I'd suggest elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent choice of location, quality service in every way! The service from check-in, the quality of the rooms, the food service, and the conference and meeting rooms were great. The restaurant staff was exceptional during either the catered portions of the conference or the service in the restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for Park and Go!
Summary: This was our overnight for both ends of our trip to Puerto Vallarta.  Parked the car and took the shuttle to SNA for our flight.  Enjoyed the Happy Hour in the lounge and our breakfasts were delicious.  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful hotel to throw a wedding. The staff was so helpful and friendly to get a hold of the banquets when needed. Diego and Angel made sure to keep the cookies coming throughout the stay and they are to die for.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this room online when our flight for our vacation got cancelled and re-scheduled and re-routed a day later. Needless to say we were cranky, tired and just wanted to get on with our Mexico vacation and not be in California.. but the staff made us feel extremely welcome and we were able to relax for the evening.  The free shuttle service took us to a great local restaurant for dinner so as we could enjoy the local fare while in town.  The warm cookies and fresh fruit upon check in are a welcoming touch. DoubleTree had never disappointed. This location was extremely clean and well situated for the area.  If we had more time I'd like to visit the surroundings more.  Well done front end team.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: DOES NOT LIVE UP TO ITS NAME
Summary: We were really looking forward to our three night stay at this hotel after our cruise, BUT it was not at all what we were expecting. First of all they slam you with a $24 parking fee in addition to the exhorbiant nightly rates. Our first night we were awakened with screaming by guests in the room next to us where it continued for two hours straight. Security did little to resolve the problem. We could not get heat in our room and we were extremely cold. The carpet on the floors were frayed and the room needs considerable attention. I would not choose to stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Never had I stayed at a Doubletree property before, but the cookies are one of the biggest reasons for me to come back. Special thank you to Navarro for all the love and warm cookies given to me throughout my stay. Traveling on a budget wasn't easy, but these cookies and excellent customer service got me through it all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good stay at a nice hotel. Nice clean rooms. Good location good amenities. Staff was very helpful. Especially like the enclosed parking. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone visiting the Santa Ana, Irvine area!
Manager Response: none

Summary: parking was a nightmare- we valet parked our car and the attendant damaged our car- still waiting to get it resolved.  Our rooms were dirty and we had no hot water.  The staff were rude, and no one had any sort of authority to resolve our problems
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If you want hot water don't stay here
Summary: I've traveled for business for 17 years I was the first ever guest at this hotel when it opened. It's never had reliable hot water. The staff tolerates hookers working the bar area. I've spoken to the staff many times and their response is Hookers have to work somewhere
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked a last-minute trip here for the weekend and overall it was very nice, especially for the low price. My only complaint is that the shower needs an update. The shower head seemed old and didn't work very well, and the shower handle was broken and kept falling so the water kept getting scorching hot. We tied a rag atriums it though which held it up.   Good experience other than that. I was worried about hearing the airplanes but we couldn't hear a thing. And we had a very lovely view. The staff was also very helpful and courteous. I recommend this hotel for quick getaways, last minute trips, or short stays.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here just to get away for the weekend and the hotel rooms were very nice, clean and quite and cant leave the awesome cookies out.  When I arrived at the hotel the front desk agent name Gloria Armenta was very kind and pleasant to speak with and she was very helpful and made my check in very easy. I would recommend this hotel for great staycation or if you are in Orange county visiting and need a hotel near the airport its close to a lot of different restaurants and the staff there is awesome. Not to mention the mall is very close as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My flight was delayed getting in and Angel took excellent care of me by providing the best customer service by upgrading me with my hilton honors club room as well as providing me with a breakfast voucher the next morning!  I have traveled to Santa Ana numerous times and prefer this hotel over the other double tree down the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed 2 nights on business, had a great experience. Breakfast was really good, room was clean and quiet, and wifi was relatively fast. I'll be back for sure.  I had the HHonors Diamond breakfast voucher, and they have good hot bacon, potatoes, scrambled eggs, and beverages. All the items were really good quality (nice thick bacon) so that made a real difference.   Rooms were fine, no complaints...bed was comfortable, no problems.  The hotel itself is just fine, convenient to the airport, and they run a free shuttle. Front desk staff was quite friendly and accomodating...I'll be back for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice and Clean Hotel with Great Location
Summary: The hotel is nice and clean for business/casual stay in a very convenient location just off of 55.  Staffs are very helpful and friendly.  I picked a one bedroom suite, but it turned out to be two connecting rooms.  Just be careful not to close the door in between, you may get locked out of other room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice stay from check in until check out. Seems like a very laid back hotel, even though it is on a bustling street.   I am Hhonors Gold and was given a Kit kat bar in addition to my warm cookie at check in. I was also given 2 breakfast vouchers and I will say the breakfast was very good. Real scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, french toast, potatoes, cereal, fruit, breads, juices, etc. It makes Doubletree more valuable since it is a very good breakfast right there on site.   My room was clean and everything was functioning. The only weird thing is that there was a large lamp in the corner that sticks out and makes walking around it a bit awkward. I hope they get different lamps for that corner.   Parking the in garage was easy and you use your room key to get in and out of the
Manager Response: none

Summary: When my husband and I initially checked in to the hotel we had a bit of complications trying to get our membership information, we tried to get help with one of the receptionist but we had no luck since she seemed bothered, a few moments later we spoke to Liza, the other reception attendant and she was amazingly helpful. She answered all our questions and made it possible for our stay to be as comfortable as it could be. I wished all the receptionist were as helpful as her since it is already overwhelming trying to get settled. Liza's kindness made it much easier to relax.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Double-Tree is by far one of the best I have ever stayed in! The staff make you feel like royalty! Immaculate rooms, delicious food, and exceptional service just to start. I would highly recommend this location to any company/organization looking for a hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked a last minute room while I attended a 4 day conference at the hotel. John, the front desk manager went above and beyond to help me find a room within my price range. The breakfast was delicious and the rooms were clean and comfortable. I was very happy with my stay and the kindness of all of the staff, especially John.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall hotel is very nice, but hot water was not working in shower. Staff didn't offer to reduce my room charge. Disappointed. Hopefully, next time I will not have this issue. Very convenient location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had good experiences with this DoubleTree several years ago, so when a hotel closer to my company HQ was fully booked I thought that it would be a good option, although a longer drive. I booked a stay for two nights. Unfortunately I was very letdown by the service and basic hotel amenities. When I arrived the keycard marker wasn't working so I couldn't get in my room or come and go with my vehicle without getting a parking ticket. The two visitors directly in front of me in line faced the same situation and the staff offered them both complementary dinner vouchers for their trouble. When it was my turn - no voucher, no apology. I was just offered - why don't you go out and get dinner (at 9 pm) and come back in a couple of hours? Perplexed, I was about to leave when I remember
Manager Response: none

Summary: Major props to the catering staff who helped us set up the event and breakdown for the next event they were efficient polite courteous and of great service especially Laura Hernandez!!! As an event location near the orange county airport I would highly recommend this venue to any business that's looking to hold an event in Orange County.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT FRIENDLY SERVICE/ A Great Stay!
Summary: Customer service is the most important thing a front-desk clerk does, & OUR FRONT DESK CLERK  Gloria Armenta that checked is in surely greeted us with the biggest and best smile. We felt very welcomed coming from out of town. It was one of the best greetings we have had in awhile. It was very refreshing and just started our week off in the right direction..... The hotel was very clean, and everyone very courteous friendly, & helpful.Also a convenient location, and fabulous food as well!!!  Thank you Gloria for your courteous and superior friendly service!  Thank you Gloria for all you did for us and for the great welcome when checking us in. We will definitely be returning
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It's only great when you complain
Summary: The Double Tree Santa Ana has been a frequent hotel for our group.  It is conveniently located and easy to access.  The service is hit or miss and it greatly depends on who is working.  This can be very frustrating. Over the years, it has been good, but it is never great.  The rooms are nice, but dated.  The food is good and the Bar staff is wonderful - they always remember your name, which is difficult at best for the front desk.

Summary: I typically stay at the Hilton in Costa Mesa but that was booked out so I decided to stay here since it was close to the office for the week.   Rooms were clean and nice as well as spacious. Not too up to date, but cleanliness is more important to me. The bathroom size however was a problem. It was very small. I'm 5'1" and of average weight but struggled to get around the bathroom if the door wasn't closed- which I don't close often because I'm by myself. But if I didn't close the door I wouldn't be able to get into the shower because the toilet was in the way. It would be nice to see something bigger considering the rooms are suite style so there is a living area and a bedroom area leaving them with plenty of room to expand- thus I was baffled by how small they were.   Service
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best hotel, amazing price, amazing service. You can't go wrong with a Double Tree Hilton So legit. Every time I have stayed there I felt incredibly welcomed. The rooms are always very nice and clean!!

Summary: This was my second time staying at this hotel for business.  I was there for 3 nights. The first morning I had to take an ice cold shower.  When I mentioned this to this front desk, they said they were aware there was no hot water and it would be fixed. I asked if they would comp my breakfast, which they did.  Day 2, there was no shower at all...no hot water and no water pressure, so I was only able to take an ice cold sponge bath. Once again I mentioned this and once again my breakfast was comped. Day 3, I was finally able to take a hot shower before checking out.  At checkout I requested compensation for the 2 out of 3 days without hot water or a shower and was told that the 2 days "free" breakfast was all the compensation being offered. Considering that I was paying upwards

The lobby was beautiful and the ballrooms looked spacious - there was a wedding in two of them and they looked like they are having fun. I was a little aggravated that I checked in with my two kids yet there were only two bath towels and washcloths in the bathroom. Even the second night we stayed they hadn't put in three towels. I called the front desk and they did send up extra towels quickly.

Not only did the atmosphere feel right, but they understood my concerns about having to switch rooms and took care of it without me even having to go into detail. Summary Heading: A Nice Place To Stay Near the Airport

There are not many decent places to eat within walking distance, so eating in isnt a bad option.  Rooms slightly dated, and my room during this last stay had a slightly musty-stale smell, but not a show-stopper.  Fitness center is serviceable, but the TV conn etions on the elliptical machines don't work.  The front desk staff are courteous and prompt.  Parking is onsight, self-park underground.  Valet available.

Other reasons I love this location: near my favorite beach crystal cove state park, near south coast plaza, and balboa island, whale watching. Summary Heading: Great stay 15 minutes from Disney parks
Summary: If you don't need to stay right next to the Disney parks, the DoubleTree in Santa Ana is a great hotel at a very reasonable price.  We stayed their the last night of our trip because the other hotel we had stayed at Tues-Thurs wanted 2x the rate for the Friday night, so we moved a bit further away from the park before driving home on Saturday.  Had we known how good the DoubleTree was, we might have stayed there the whole time.  Great amenities, friendly staff and good food.  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  Breakfast was very good at the restaurant and complimentary internet was quite fast.  We would stay their again and it was 40% less per night than many of the same class of hotels right near Disney.   Worth a 15 minute drive to park each day in my opinion.

Summary: Stayed here over the weekend for a wedding in the area.  By far the best value for the buck, but one thing to keep in mind is that parking is 18 dollars a day. He was more than accommodating, even going out of his way to explain how the new tap-door lock features work, giving my wife and I a nice room on the top floor to make sure we got uninterrupted rest after our flight, and waiving the parking fee, since there were no other alternatives in the area.  He made a big difference in terms of our stay, and if I am in the OC area again, I would book at this hotel just for this kind of service.

Summary: Checked into the Double Tree Santa Ana because of a one week training class in Irvine, CA.  Hotel location is great about 3 miles from the airport but hotel could use a re-décor.  Restaurant breakfast is over priced for what you get.  Lastly, beds and pillows to mushy for my taste.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was nice, comfortable bed, convenient location, and a nice staff.  The parking situation was a little “different” but I was able to find a spot to park every night of the stay.  Overall great experience.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Service with Room Reservation Blocks

From our first experience with this hotel, Jacqueline has been very responsive and positively vocal with all our needs, giving her A+++++ in correspondence.  Our process of booking rooms with her - went very smooth, and her professionalism and radiant attitude has given us the confidence that we have chosen the right hotel to house our out-of-town guests.  Jacqueline has been very helpful in accommodating our needs.  She is a great team player, and she is excellent at her job and it shows when dealing with circumstances outside her reach.  We hope to work with Jacqueline Um again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent service for both meeting and stay

Jacqueline is very responsive, friendly, and her and her team are easily reachable, even during the meeting and even at our after meeting event .  The DT even offers shuttle service to/from the airport which is convenient for our out of town guests.  Thank you Jacqueline for always serving with a smile!

Summary Heading: A Great Place to stay in the OC
Summary: I have been staying at the Doubletree Santa Ana for many years now and every experience has been top rate. Every employee you meet is very cordial and has a "can do" attitude.  The rooms are well maintained and always clean.  The restaurant and lounge are top notch and also always a good experience.  I can't leave this review without mentioning one of the best ambassadors for the hotel and that is Jacqueline Um.  She has been handling our group for the entire time our company moved into OC and her professionalism is second to none.  Jacqueline's one of the main reasons I keep coming back to the fantastic hotel.  I also want to mention that this is very convenient to John Wayne airport and access to major freeways.

Summary: I worked with Jacqueline Um when I booked a Territory Sales Director Conference for Nationwide. I have booked events all over the country with different hotel chains, and I only wish Jacqueline was the only person I could work with. The speaker of the event and the attendees were also extremely impressed with how the event turned out and the service they received while at the DoubleTree Santa Ana.
