Summary: I had to work out a last minute sales meeting, Double Tree was more than accommodating! They were very professional, we were well taken care of the whole day!  No curve balls when it came to paying the bill either. I want to especially thank Jacqueline UM for taking great care of us!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your opinion on TripAdvisor, it was a pleasure to have you as our guests. We would like take this opportunity to thank you for your collaboration and we hope to see you again soon at DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana. I will sure and pass along your kind words to Jacqueline

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a good location
Summary: This hotel was nice and appeared to be newer. It is nicely located close to the interstate and close to the airport; but you don't have all the noise. The staff was very friendly and happy to help in any way they could.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We hope to welcome you back to DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana on a return visit.

Summary: My company hosted an event at the DoubleTree in February 2016 and I was fortunate enough to extend my stay to enjoy Orange County for a few extra days.   Being from the east coast our company selected this property because it is centrally located in southern California. We had many regional event attendees tell us after the event that the hotel was easy to access and a perfect place to host an event. It couldn't be easier to get to the airport from the hotel, and traffic was fine in the area.  Everyone we worked with for our event was excellent, very professional and easy to work with. I wish Jacqueline Um could manage our company's room block for all of our events across the country, her patience with our many changes was much appreciated! Kisha Cravin also did an excellent job
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing DoubleTree by Hilton Santa for you recent event. I was delighted to hear you and your attendees had a successful and wonderful experience. It was a pleasure to host your event. I will sure and pass your words of praise to Jacqueline, Kisha & Brandon.

Summary: Staff was incredibly accommodating at every turn.  Attending Conference and reserved private room for company meeting outside of the conference.   From reserving the meeting space, to the front desk arrival & check-in, to the meeting room provided -- all was as expected and the service was over the top.  Every request was accommodated immediately, efficiently and effectively.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. Our team is dedicated to deliver service with a warm and friendly smile. We sincerely care about your needs and we strive to make your visit comfortable, memorable and productive.  I am looking forward to welcoming and servicing you on a return visit.

Summary Heading: Very Friendly staff and Conveniently located.

Summary Heading: Very friendly and helpful in a time of need!

After unsuccessful attempts to get them into a decent hotel in the middle of the night, it was refreshing to find the help of the staff on duty at 1:30a m, who not only got them a very nice comfortable safe room, they also gave the girls parking and some breakfast. As parents 400 miles away we are so appreciative of the consideration and help the girls received from this hotel and staff! Thank You all very much!  E. Marie

Summary: I recently had a large group stay and everything was planned seamlessly. Jacqueline Um was who I worked with the get the reservation set up, and everything wen perfectly! Summary: I experienced an unfortunate situation that involved the hotel being evacuated due to fire alarms in the middle of the night. This was on a weekday. I'm not sure who it was or what caused the alarms to go off. The fire department never arrived. No one at the front desk was able to tell us what happened. We weren't sure if we should return to our room or not. After about a half hour in the front driveway in our pajamas a dozen of us just went back to our rooms assuming it was a fluke. The next morning everyone was talking in the lobby while they were checking out, we were asking what happened and we found out it was a party and smoke set off the alarms. Outside of this, the hotel was average. The food was not very good at the restaurant, but there are many other places to eat in

Summary Heading: Great Looking Hotel and Bad Room

Towel was not enough and I could not find anybody at front desk when I wanted to bring it to their attention. The bed was fine but the cover sheet was so old that you could see damages on it. I did not use them as it was in bad shape. You would not expect this from $250/Night hotel.

Summary: Good quite location, spacious, clean and comfortable rooms. Had a package with Breakfast, Fast Internet and Parking which is good value for money. There is no public parking at all - even for a short while. This is the only negative about this hotel. Onsite restaurant/bar serves good food and drinks and service is excellent. Summary: I went to the Double Tree to visit friends (I don't like sleeping on sofas) and had a great room on the 7th floor with a nice city view. I am a Hilton Honors Gold member which gets me free wifi (some of the Hiltons charge for wifi), a room upgrade if available and late checkout.  My room had a King bed and an in-room safe that fit my iPad and stuff.  Not all the rooms have the safe so you have to make sure you request one if you want it.  The air-conditioning unit is a little noisy but didn't keep me awake. Great restaurant and fitness center with a pool too.  Everything was immaculate and the housekeeping staff were friendly and efficient. There is a free airport shuttle which is awesome.  It runs every 30 minutes. There are TWO Double Tree hotels within a mile of each other so
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stay at Hilton Doubletree - Santa Ana, CA

Summary: I work with Jacqueline Um every month to assist me with the needs of our District Manager meetings.  We correspond via phone and emails, as I am in the corporate office in Tampa, Florida.  Jacqueline is always so friendly and responds promptly to my phone calls or emails.  She works efficiently and accurately. Summary: Loved this hotel overall. Excellent staff and I would recommend who ever to come and stay at this location. Not far from disneyland and excellent conference room. The restaurant staff is beyond what I thought and the food is great.

Summary: I just yesterday stayed at this hotel and everything was okay. It wasn't until I went out and came back late where I was questioned and investigated by the security guard there didn't catch his name but he is a Hispanic male. He has questioned me twice both times that I've gone very nosey and rude too. This is a great hotel the security guard kills it for me.

Summary: The night auditor, Dean, literally help save my life. I was having a medical emergency about 12:30 am and I asked him the name & address of the nearest emergency room. He found it, fetched a cab, and generally looked after me until the cab arrived. He was calm & cool while I was suffering a lot of pain (kidney stone).  I so appreciate the personal touch! Thank you!

I was surprised at the fee for self-parking ($18). That said, there was plenty of parking and the garage was clean.  Did not have the opportunity to use the bar/restaurant, but it looked nice.

Summary: This hotel was a great meeting location for our group. The staff did an excellent job with all of our event needs. Jacqueline Um exceeded our expectations & was always willing to accommodate us. Thank you for that!

Summary: I had the pleasure of working with Jacqueline Um Executive Meetings Manager who was extremely beneficial in making this a wonderful place form my executives to start their day. Summary: A wonderful stay all the way around - convenient, frequent shuttle to the airport, safe and clean parking facility, great breakfast buffet, accommodating and security-conscious guest service personnel - and we absolutely love Leroy!!!

Summary: The hotel was clean, friendly staff! Parking was pricey. $18 a day for self or $20 for valet. I was there for a wedding in long beach, with family and we visited Huntington Beach which was only 8 miles away, family in Costa Mesa. The location for this trip was perfect right off the two freeways we needed. The room was small for 4 people and average but updated! We got a great rate by naming our own price through Priceline, I would have been disappointed if I paid full price though! Hot tub and pool were clean jets did not work in hot tub. Shower was very small and shower head a very rough water flow. Tub is for a child size only!

Summary: We booked this on Priceline for a last minute wedding (at a great deal). I was very pleased the hotel. The common areas were very clean and well cared fore. The staff was very helpful and pleasant to deal with, every employee I came into contact with would smile and ask how I was doing. The room was clean and comfortable, however it seemed a bit small and cramped. the bed and pillows where comfortable. The bathroom was very small  and cramped. The big downfall was the self parking was $18.00 a day. However I here this is pretty common in California. I would gladly stay here again.

Summary: Our business holds many meetings at this hotel.  Last month we hosted a particularly complex meeting group who needed both sleeping rooms and meeting space.  Our contact, Jacqueline Um, did everything possible to make sure the group's unique needs were met.  We heard nothing but raves about the hotel and service.  Thanks so much, Jacqueline!

Summary: The lobby and the staff were great, but the hallways and doors to the rooms look a little outdated and the elevator took so long I had to take the stairs. The location was good for what I needed and I would stay there again.

Summary: This hotel is located close to the airport, but you won't hear the planes taking off.  They offer a free shuttle service to and from the hotel every 15 minutes.  The staff were friendly and the hotel was clean.  Our room was nice and spacious and best of all affordable.  We would definitely stay there again.

Summary: First off we are diamond members with Hilton Honors and travel constantly so I am basing this review off of my experience here compared to the many other hotels within the Hilton brand we have stayed at. Charging $18 for parking is insane, the parking garage below the hotel was never more than 1/4 of the way full for the entire 8 days we stayed here. Most of the time we are able to park for free since we are diamond members, not here. Next, we have always had free breakfast for adults and kids in our room, this includes all items hot and cold on the buffet as well as the entire breakfast menu. Not here, all we got was bagels, english muffins, dry cereal (which they literally ran out of the little boxes), and muffins. What a complete joke! I was told if we wanted to pay an extra

Summary: WE chose this hotel due to its location to the SNA airport during a recent family visit.  The shuttle service was a little slow on the pick up from the airport in the evening due to transporting some drunk people from a local concert, but the trip from the hotel to the airport in the morning was very good and prompt starting at 5:30 am.  We would definitely stay at this location again when in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for a week, and found the service excellent. My choices from the restaurant menu were delicious, and Javier, my morning waiter was attentive, wonderfully helpful and caring. The outdoor pool area is small but clean, with fresh towels. All the help was friendly and personable, from the "careline" (which for some reason automatically transfers you to the parking attendant), to the cleaning staff. Area has some small chain restaurants and a Starbucks across the street, but isn't the comfortable neighborhood walking area portrayed. For better dining and cultural options, one will need to drive into one of the many nearby towns.

Summary Heading: High quality hotel for an excellent price
Summary: The Double Tree hotel was very nice and the price was very reasonable.   They treat the Hilton Honors members extremely well with complementary Wi-Fi.  The breakfast buffet is also included free of charge to Hilton Honors members and that was very good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is very nice, the lobby is impressive, they offer parking however you have to pay $18 per day. the room was comfortable, clean, it has a fridge. Unfortunately our A/C was not working properly, we kept trying to make it cooler and it was set at 75 which with 4 people in the room, it got warm! Also we could hear the bathrooms from the next rooms when they flush. For a quick stay near the airport i wouldn't mind staying here again, we were just crashing there since we had an early flight from Orange county airport. Otherwise, I would stay somewhere else.

Summary: We hosted 2 huge events there, in the same month and both the event space and rooms were perfect. Jacqueline Ume helped with organizing the meeting, and she always responded in a very quick and friendly manner. Everything was taken care of and made our jobs a lot easier not having to worry about the space. We will definitely be booking more events and rooms with them!

Summary: Bad slow service poorly maintained HVAC heater stuck on  Horrible review site that will not let me put in what happened       Not enough people on staff to handle visitors Staff arguing with customers (not Me0   for extended times and not addressing issues

Summary Heading: Friendly, efficient and the place to stay in Orange County

I even used the shuttle to go to one of the nearby places, and was told I need to call the front desk before 10:30PM to have the shuttle come back. I was on the phone for about 20 minutes before someone at the front desk finally answered. Unacceptable, and I would not go back to this particular location when visiting Santa Ana again.

Summary: My family and I definitely had a wonderful stay here at the hotel. It is such a beautiful hotel right when you step into the lobby. Easy parking access with a reasonable fee for guest. There is a shuttle that runs a 3 mile radius to various of restaurants. Restaurants are walking distance as well. Amenities are great as far as the pool and fitness center. We did not experience any in hotel dining but i am sure it would have been great. Staff are friendly and helpful and will accommodate almost all requests needed. Rooms are spacious, clean, and up to date for my taste. Mr. Hernandez was a great help during our stay and we look forward to coming back soon. Thank you very much!

Summary: This review is long over due, but this hotel was fantastic. We stayed here over Valentine's Day weekend as we were visiting Disneyland. The breakfast was super yummy. Since it was Valentine's Day, I surprised my boyfriend by decorating the room in the morning (hearts on the wall, banners and garland hanging up, etc.). When we came back to the hotel that night, I was happy to see that housekeeping didn't throw anything away. They cleaned the room as usual, which we appreciated, but they didn't move any of my decorations which was very nice of them. The nicest part of our stay was the lady who
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: When you know you won't be relaxing pool side you turn your focus to good sleep, accessibility, and cleanliness. Valet is RIGHT in front of check in. I had my room key and warm cookie in about 3minutes flat, and I was off to get a good nights sleep in before a long conference day.  The room was quiet, clean, and had all the basics.  Quick and to the point. Perfect for business travel.

Summary: I always have high expectations when I stay at a Hilton Hotel which is not often.  My expectations were met and exceeded.  It all started at check-in. Our room was ready even though we were three hours early.  The room was wonderful.  Just like the rest of the hotel it was expertly appointed.  The beds were extremely comfortable.   The WiFi was easy to access and functioned perfectly.  Although it only tested at 1.7 Mbps my wife and I ran videos at the same time and there were no issues.    They provided a refrigerator and a coffee maker that could make two cups of coffee simultaneously.    Either the room was completely

Summary: Stayed here with my choir and other members of my church including my Bishop and we had a wonderful time in the Newport Beach Area.  The hotel was a perfect spot for us and the service here was great.  We'll be back!

Summary: Hotel location is ok, but it is really old and outdated inside.  Rooms seriously need remodeling. Airport is close, but a lot better choices in the area. Restaurant men and food quality is not close to average compared to the competition.  Really limited menu more like a quick stop if the highway kind of place.

If you could please let me know what room you stayed in I would definitely take a look to see if the room was lacking. From the restaurant perspective we have a new Chef that will be putting her mark with a new and very comprehensive menu by the second week of September. We do hope you are able to come back and try the new menu and libations. Sincerely, R Dalgado 7144421908

Summary Heading: Recognition of your kind attention and hospitality
Summary: Hello Ronnie,  I stay at your hotel (DoubleTree" Santa Ana - Orange County) with my family from July 10 until the 20, unfortunately the time goes too fast and I wasn't able to write you my congratulations for the excellent service and especially for the hospitality and attention from all your staff, highlighting to Alejandra Rivas and Gloria from whom I don’t remember her last name but surely you will know exactly who is she.  Thanks and would you please extend to them my greatest appreciation to them for their entire attention that they had with my family and myself
Manager Response: Dear Lazaro P, It was a pleasure connecting with you and thank you for all the positive comments you had about the hotel and the team. Alejandra and Gloria will be very thrilled to hear about what you have to say about them. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Visiting our Godson and his new baby.  Airport was close and hotel was easy to find.  Valet parking only.  Checkin was fast, efficient, friendly.  Many places have your reservation but it takes so long to checkin.  Room was large, modern and well appointed. Towels thick, grout and caulking clean, frig quiet.  Air/heat worked well. Checkout a breeze.  Only issue was restaurant happy our menu was being changed and none of the mixed drinks on the menu were available any longer.  The humus was the best I've ever had.
Manager Response: Dear retiredatlast130, Firstly love your user name. Thank you for a detailed breakdown on all that you loved about the hotel. Yes that hummus is outstanding , if I may say so. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at the Double Tree by Hilton Santa Ana-Orange County Airport hotel.  The check in was very professional and courteous.  The room was nice and they also had a nice pool and breakfast.  Walking distance to local shops and restaurants.  Very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear ckck, We are glad you enjoyed the hotel and got to spend some time at the pool. We hope that you visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were there for a soccer tournament, so we had ten rooms or more total and everyone was content. The hotel was near the airport, which was our choice. It was clean and the beds were comfortable. It was a nice place to stay. if you appreciated cleanliness and a comfortable bed!
Manager Response: Dear J B, Thank you for your very positive review about our hotel. We are glad that you like it and everything went well. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The soccer tournament required the team to stay in hotels, local to the tournament soccer fields. I volunteered to make the reservations for the team. Little did I know, there was furious competition for the hotel rooms! I attempted to block rooms at two other hotels, without any luck: rooms sold-out.   I was put in touch with Jacqueline Um at the DoubleTree in Santa Ana-Orange County Airport. Jacqueline assisted in answering the numerous questions from the team and facilitating the needs of our team.  I will definitely recommend the hotel for future use by the team and my own needs.
Manager Response: Dear L S, We are so glad you stayed with us and that Jacqueline was able to take care of you. Yes that was pretty busy weekend with the West Coast Football Tournament and rooms were in short supply. We look forward to your next tournament and visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Arrived without reservation at hotel late at night. Hilton reservation App was down. Turned out, even the front desk was having issues. They called Hilton reservations, and was told it would take 3-4 hours to fix.  Leroy at the front desk was our Hero. We had an exhausted/crying baby with us. Leroy went beyond the call of duty to ensure our comfort, despite the delays due to technical issues with Hilton Reservation System. He literally ran to get us situated. We travel to the area quite a bit ... for sure, this hotel is where we will continue to stay ... especially if we also get an opportunity to thank Leroy again.
Manager Response: Dear Mango 94909, We are so glad the Leroy was able to come to your immediate assistance especially after a long travel period and an exhausted family. I will definitely share your email with him and the team and it will make his day. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Meeting for 200+ Dentists - and it was perfect!
Summary: We used the entire ballroom and every single staff member was more than awesome to work with. The food was phenomenal (hats off to the chef) and we will certainly be back. Special shout out to: Jacqueline Um for the room reservations and having so much patience with us Leroy at the front desk Shannon our event manager walking me off the ledge and Luis our banquet manager for the majority of the stay  For the sleeping rooms - mine was impeccably clean and I slept like a baby.  I highly recommend this venue, especially under the new leadership of Ronnie!
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Eweisbrod, It was a pleasure meeting you and having the honor of hosting your event. All the staff mentioned, including myself will be thrilled when I share your comments with them. Once again thank you for your business, your kind words and your understanding. We look forward to your next meeting and visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We booked this hotel through PriceLine using Name Your Own Price. We were a little scared of what might come up, but we were pleasantly surprised. The check in process was very quick and easy. We got to the area earlier than expected and the staff got us checked in before the actual check in time. The staff was extremely pleasant and very knowledgeable of the area. Gave us some great recommendations for food/drinks close by. The room was clean and smelled great. It had a couch in it which made relaxing nice. The breakfast buffet was very good. We did not eat dinner there but we had a few drinks in the bar and everyone was very nice. Overall it was a great experience and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear JenniferIB23921w, Thank you for all your lovely comments about the hotel, food, bar and staff. We hope that you choose us directly the next time you are in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very good Rooms. Clean &luxurious. Good breakfast  buffet. Stayed 2 nights on Aug 5 &6th.   Front desk staff was extremely professional & helpful.(all of them). They were also familiar with nearby attractions, restaurants. etc.
Manager Response: Dear harsha m, Thank you for all your lovely comments in regards to the room, staff and buffet. We are glad that you were able to spend time at local attractions and  restaurants as well. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary: Even though they were able to get me into a room with my early arrival; everything fell from there.  No recognition as Diamond member, had to ask for my free water x2 and then still did not receive it.  Voiced concerns about TV remote control x2 had to call the front desk 3rd time to have it fixed.  Had trouble with door lock on arrival and took over 30 min to have someone come to room and open for me.  Air conditioning was way too cold, asked for it to be reviewed, and never occurred.   just asked for simple things and they could not deliver.
Manager Response: Dear Snoopy5176, My apologies for not giving you the service you so deserve. I am glad we had your room ready on time. With summer being in a sell out situation we normally place 2 bottles of water in all Hhonor rooms. I will not speculate as to what happened with your room. Please do give us another chance and visit on your next trip to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Reserved a 2 bed room. Got to the room and bang, it was a king size bed.  After being at Disneyland all day in the heat, we were all looking forward to a good night's sleep, but one of us had to suffer on sleeping on the floor as there were no more rooms with 2 beds or any roll-aways.  As a consolation, we received a complementary breakfast, but the voucher wasn't filled out correctly and the waitress told us to tell the front desk to properly fill out the voucher. HUH?   Very sad and to top if off, no cookie at check in. :(
Manager Response: Dear akiokk, I do apologize for you not receiving the room type you requested and not receiving your cookies at check in in very unlike the hotel to do so. There was a very short window when there was a National recall of all the cookies and cookie dough and we were without product for 2 days. Be assured we will have them ready for you on your next visit. If not please reach out to me directly. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Was in Orange County for my sons soccer tournament. The hotel location is central in terms of freeways which can be important in the area.  People like Leroy at the front desk go out of their way to be helpful.   I had a request so he picked up the phone and made two separate calls that made things happened.   With a smile he turned down a thank you tip-pretty cool!
Manager Response: Dear matelajolla, Thank you for your very positive comments. Yes Leroy is a very positive and enigmatic employee and I am so glad he was able to able to make your stay better. He will be very pleased when I share this with the team. Sincerely, RDalgado

Summary Heading: Wedding Guests stay at DoubleTree Hilton SNA
Summary: Right from the start I had a very positive experience with DT in organizing our out of town guests to stay at the hotel.  This would not have been possible without Jacqueline Um, the event manager's help.  Jacqueline helped me with all reservations for the 3 nights for our twenty guests, and keeping track of cancelations or additions during the period prior to our wedding event.  Jacqueline is very organized and her attention to detail is outstanding. I really enjoyed working with Jacqueline due to her very personable qualities.  Jacqueline understands customer needs well and proactively helps out in ensuring that the guests have a pleasant experience during their stay at the hotel. Also, Jacqueline followed up very promptly after our event to make sure everything went smoothly
Manager Response: Dear Harish P., Thank you for your lovely review. Jacqueline is going to be very excited to see your review. We are so glad all went well with your stay and we do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is close to beaches, great shopping, performing arts, and excellent restaurants. It is quiet and the staff are warm, pleasant, helpful and friendly. On-line pricing was very reasonable. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline S, Thank you so much for writing such good things about the staff and the hotel. We look forward to your next visit when in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Beatrice at the front desk makes the stay great!  We stayed a night came back a few nights later and she remembered our likes, dislikes and accommodated accordingly.  The kind of representative that every hotel should have.  The Valet parking...Bell staff...Housekeeping...all excellent.  Rooms are spacious...comfy beds...spotless & the Double Tree cookies are always the best!
Manager Response: Dear Paul R, Thank you for recognizing Beatrice as she will be thrilled when she sees this comment. Also a big thank you for all the other lovely comments about our staff, services and hotel. The Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies are the best and I am glad you got to experience them. We will have some fresh ones in the oven just for you on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This Hotel is in a quiet area and convenient to all of Orange Co.  Across the street are great restaurants and a Starbucks. We spent time on Newport and Huntington beach.  We love the cookies and kind staff.  Valet parking is so convenient and easy.
Manager Response: Dear Tom W, I am so glad that you had a wonderful stay and we do appreciate all the good things you mentioned about our staff, services and the hotel. We hope that your travels brings you to our neck of the woods soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Will stay here again, Our stay was wonderful and the staff was so great! Because they were so nice I  WANT to come back...the rooms were beautiful and clean and the breakfast was delicious. The valet parking was new to us but we really enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Dear 99fayea, Thank you for such lovely comments about our staff, services and hotel. We do take your comments seriously and we are here to please. Please visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: One person lying is bad ... two people lying is unforgiveable!  Reception man lied about accomodations; dining room server had the gall to tell me, after almost 20 minutes of waiting for my simple order of short stack, that the cook could not find the "mixer" for the pancakes.  Unbelieveable.  My granddaughter told the bus-boy that I had not yet received my order, and he went to the kitchen...lo and behold, less than 5 minutes later, I had pancakes on my table.  Obviously server just forgot to place the order!  Then lie about it! The "roll-away" bed was very narrow, with a sagging mattress, and was told all of the roll-away beds were the same.  Ugh. If I had made these reservations personally, I would be angry at myself.  But the reservation were made by the tournament director
Manager Response: Dear halmoni2015, We are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay and that you believe our staff lied. We do not take accusations of lying easily and I will look into the matter. Please call me with your confirmation number. I assure you, our goal is to make sure, you have a pleasant stay and do hope you will give us another chance. Sincerely, R Dalgado 7144421908

Summary: Hotel site convenient when flying from John Wayne Airport.  Parking is very limited for a hotel this size. I have always liked Double Tree Hotel.  They give you the most delicious chocolate chip cookie upon check in. I get also an excellent free breakfast for being a gold Hilton Honors member.  Bathroom also quite small.  Employees are courteous and attentive. Hotel is very clean. I will always come back to Double Tree.  Price at this hotel is very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Deo200, Thank you for giving a shout out to the staff and the hotel with its amenities. So glad you love the Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies. They are the best!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very Good for an overnight stay
Summary: Good value.  The service and accommodations are very good.  The lobby area looks like a high priced hotel, but the rooms are very basic, but comfortable.  The carpeting throughout the hotel needs to be replaced.  There is quite a bit of street noise on MacArthur Blvd.  Valet parking is the only parking available, so expect to add an additional $20 to the price when comparing options.  This hotel is best suited as an overnight stay for transiting travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Knockersf22, Thank you for taking the time to write a very positive review. We will be changing back to self parking and valet parking, a choice each guest can make by August 16th. Hope all is well in sunny Hawaii and we hope to see you back in our neck of the woods again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My family and I were just there 5 days for a tournament and this was the nicest Double Tree we have ever stayed in!  The hotel was clean, comfortable, quiet, centrally located and the staff was EXCELLENT!  From the moment we walked in LEROY greeted us at the front desk with the best customer service we have ever received.  He remembered our names and every time he saw us he addressed us personally. He would check in with the kids about their games.  I know this sounds corny but he personalized the entire trip for us.  We make a lot of these trips and have stayed in some random locations but LEROY was a highlight.  He went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and make sure we had everything we needed. We will definitely stay there again....I hope they pay him well I
Manager Response: Dda2000, Yes you are correct when you say that Leroy is special and am so glad he was able to make yours and your families trip special. Thank you for the shout out towards clean rooms abd friendly staff. We do hope you visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very good location near major freeways and John Wayne Airport but with no traffic and jet noise. Nicely furnished rooms with friendly helpful service. The valet parking is necessary due to the arrival and departure car flow.  There are several restaurants and latte's across the intersection for dining options.   As a Diamond HH member hot breakfast is included at Hilton Garden and other Hilton properties, but not here.... it's an upgrade fee. Management may reconsider this?Surprised at the first morning breakfast fee, the waiter forgave my bill.
Manager Response: Dear globalcamera, Thank you for your lovely comments as well as being a Diamond member. I am glad the server was able to take care of you as yes you do get breakfast with your elite status. I do apologize for the front desk staff overlooking this at check in. Do come and visit again when in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Absolutely LOVE the whole Front Desk!! always been so great, all with a smile on their face. Seems like they really love working here, which is great to see. Although there is a valet charge but I don't mind, can't blame them, its the way the area is. But glad they switched over to Valet only.
Manager Response: Dear mr_angel_m, Thank you for your glowing comments about our front desk staff. They will be thrilled when they see your comments. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Hotel crappy Parking Valet forced
Summary: As always this hotel has great rooms, decor, and customer service.  They recently changed their parking to forced valet parking.  The experience was dismal at best.  The entry area is not designed for valet parking with a large number arriving at the same time and we ended up sitting on the street waiting for a place to clear so we could even get into the entry area to drop our car.  This is one of those add on items at a higher priced hotel that seems like another price gouge instead of value add.  Free parking went to 20.00 a day.
Manager Response: Dear Ron R, Thank you for liking the hotel. We have listened to the voice of our guests and will be reverting to self as well as valet, a choice that you can make, as soon as the middle of August. We do thank you for your patronage and do hope to see you on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Held meeting here as well as overnight rooms
Summary: I plan my company's meetings and we hosted a training seminar at this hotel that included catering, a/v, overnight sleeping rooms, etc. I selected this hotel because of the location, the competitive price, the look of hotel and their ability to accommodate my needs and budget. I was pleased because the meeting manager helped to make this another successful event. I worked with Jacqueline Um to set up the meeting. I was very satisfied with my experience as she responds lightning fast to my emails and paid attention to details that I overlooked as I was booking two other meetings simultaneously. All of the attendees were pleased with the service, the food and the sleeping rooms. If you plan meetings and have a lot of professional people to please, you know that it becomes
Manager Response: Dear Kelsye B, Thank you so much for the lovely comments. We are pleased that all went well with your meeting and you enjoyed the food and services. Jacqueline is the best and you were in good hands. We hope to see you at your next meeting. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is in the middle of all of the activities you're in Orange County to enjoy! Close to the Beach, Theme parks and right around the corner from the John Wayne airport. Just a short drive to shopping and entertainment too!
Manager Response: Dear KK_Boise, Thank you for your lovely comments. We are so glad that you were able to access all the shopping, amusement etc. and didn't have to spend too much time getting there. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Everything ELSE was great!  Room nice and clean.  Bed comfy.  Had to call to get WiFi to work, but that got fixed easily enough.  But the room service meal I ordered I could NOT eat!  They did take it off my hotel tab, but still.  I was HUNGRY!  Fish and chips was horrible.  Underdone fish that I didn't think was safe to eat.  Fries old, cold and limp.  Slaw, meh.  They didn't screw up the bottle of beer.  I did get two shakers of salt but no malt vinegar, and no pepper.  They did make it right and took the meal off the hotel tab.
Manager Response: Dear Nondy L, I do apologize for the quality of room service you received. The Fish and Chips is one of our top sellers and is most liked by guests. Unfortunately we messed up and I am glad our staff was able to make it right. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Much more than just free cookies!
Summary: Stayed here for one night while on a shopping trip to Orange County. All of the staff members were very friendly and the room was clean, comfortable and quiet. Ate dinner in the dining room because we were too tired to go back out and fight traffic again after checking in. (This was a Friday night.) The service was very good, the food was okay -- not spectacular but good; had a kale salad with grilled shrimp and it was nicely prepared. Also had the hot breakfast buffet and was pleasantly surprised to find the scrambled eggs and sausage were really fresh (not like they'd been sitting in the steam table for an hour) and the fresh fruit was very good. I usually stay at the Hilton Costa Mesa when traveling in O.C. but there were no rooms available -- I would definitely stay at this
Manager Response: Dear RightOn TheCorner, Thank you for staying in the Hilton family and we are glad that you got to enjoy the warm, Doubletree Chocolate chip cookie and I do agree with you , it is a nice touch, especially after a long flight or a hard days work. We look forward to having you stay with us on your next visit. Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to have a meeting!
Summary: The private meeting room that they gave us was great. Our server was on the ball and very helpful. They fixed us an excellent lunch. I would highly recommend this hotel, we can wait to come back again!
Manager Response: Dear Bill L, Thank you so much for your wonderful comments. We are ecstatic that your meeting went well and the service and food was to your liking. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: There wasn't much in the area, however if you're willing to drive 10-15 minutes (depending on traffic) you can get to plenty of things.  The room was clean, the front desk staff was helpful, the cookie you always get was nice and hot...what more can you ask for.
Manager Response: Dear JYLEE L, Thank you for writing your wonderful comments about the hotel and its proximity to various attractions and places to be. The Doubletree Chocolate chip cookie I am sure was your highlight! We do love it when guests such as yourself tell us how warm and delicious they are. We shall make sure to keep some more on hand for your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Amazing staff and beautiful area - the perfect combo!
Summary: We stopped into the SoCal area for about 10 days for the CrossFit Games up in Carson, CA. This hotel was our first stop.  Valet service was top-notch and very responsive. Recommend calling down to them a few minutes early so your car can be waiting for you by the time you get downstairs.  The front desk staff was top notch; every time we walked in, we were greeted cheerfully by the DT team member regardless of what time of day it was. Whenever we walked out, they would ask "what's your plan for today?" and we would reply with a general idea of what we wanted to do in the area. The staff member would get very excited and recommend a bunch of spots to check out, even offering some local tips to beat traffic or see an amazing view of the bluffs.  Santa Ana was just the first leg of
Manager Response: Dear Emanual D, Thank you for taking time to write a wonderful review about our valet staff, front desk team and the hotel. We are glad we were able to assist you and definitely look forward to your next stay with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I reserved rooms at the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana-Orange County Airport for my wedding party and my family members visiting from Phoenix and Japan. Jacqueline Um, the Executive Meetings Manager, provided me with excellent service.  Jacqueline was very cooperative during the initial contact was helpful throughout the process. Jacqueline very accommodating with my many changes with respect to setting aside addiitonal rooms and changing names on reservations as the guests moved around.  Jacqueline remained calm and professional throughout the process even though I was becoming frustrated.  At time of check-in, Jacqueline met me personally to make sure everything was as requested.  Again, she was extremely helpful.  The accommodations were confortable and the staff was very
Manager Response: Dear Barbara, Congratulations on your wedding and so glad that everything went well as hotel accommodations should be the last thing on your mind on your special day. So glad that Jacqueline was able to help you sort everything out and yes we are so glad to have her as part of our team. All the very best. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Perfect One Week Stay at DoubleTree Santa Ana
Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at DoubleTree Santa Ana.  My family of four recently stayed here for 1 week during our summer vacation in Southern California.  After a long day of air travel, it was a relief to only drive 7 minutes to arrive at the hotel.  We were greeted by the Valet Parking who immediately took care of our rental car and luggage.  We were checked in at the front desk by a young lady by the name of Alex.  She was very kind and took great care of us and even hooked us up with a few extra cookies.  The cookies tasted just as good as everyone on Trip Advisor has described.  The hotel room was clean and spacious enough to suit our family of four.  The beds were super comfortable.  We slept like babies every night.    The location of this hotel served our day travel
Manager Response: Dear Matt C, Thank you for your glowing remarks on all aspects of the hotel, staff and services. Our team will be most proud when they read all your comments. Yes Alex is all smiles and I can just picture her handing you those warm Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies. Also thank you for pointing out the location of the hotel and how central it is to all attractions  and beaches. We are glad that you had a marvelous stay and we look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: It was really pleasent my stay at this hotel. Since my arrival the staff was great !! The room was big enough for 2 people. Good bed , cleaned bathroom . They receive packages with no extra charge . The only bad thing is to pay for the vallet U$20,00 a day .
Manager Response: Dear Karin C, Thank you for spending a week with us and that you enjoyed the hotel and the staff. Yes valet is $20 and we hope that you were able to benefit with the ease of accessing and leaving hotel. Also hoping you were able to call the valet staff ahead of time so as to have your car waiting for you when you left the hotel. A few of our guests appreciate this perk as it saves them time. Thank you again for making our hotel your home away from home. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Just as a great hotel stay should be
Summary: Our stay here was wonderful. We had a great suite on the top floor (room 723) When we arrived we were warmly greeted by the valet staff who were attentive and very quick  to help us throughout our entire three night stay. We never had to open our own car door or wait for our car. We'd call down for it and by the time we got outside it was always waiting. The front desk staff were friendly and welcoming as well. We checked in online so checking in was a breeze. We got our key cards, warm cookies, and water and were on our way. One of the guys (I wish I would've gotten his name to give him the proper recognition) even told my daughter a joke and the next day she told him one. He always greeted us upon our return to the hotel and engaged us in conversation. Great personality and an
Manager Response: Dear danskat, That was a lovely and well written comment covering a lot of areas in which you and your family enjoyed yourselves as well as a lot of areas where we can increase our guests satisfaction. In regards to the Doubletree chocolate chip cookies, they are a brand standard and are served and enjoyed all over the globe at 400 plus Doubletree Hotels. I am sure in time there could be alternative choices.  Thank you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: It was nice place and conveniently located (easy direction) from Santa Ana airport. Room was clean and all staffs were extremely professional and welcoming guests. Free bottle of water and cookies at the front desk, if you ask.  Small lake next to it was real charm
Manager Response: Dear sam_kay_CA, Thank you for your lovely comments. We do appreciate your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We showed up from Seattle with five tired girls in tow.  The staff was so nice, even delivered warm cookies and milk to our room for the kids.  The room was clean, housekeeping was spectacular and the food was outstanding.  The Hotel is very close to Disneyland, Newport Beach and Universal Studios.  Even though the accommodations and location are great, what really makes this a special place is the staff.  Everyone from the front desk to the housekeepers were friendly and went out of their way to make our stay special.  They were very knowledgeable about local attractions and gave great advice and directions.  If you are going to Santa Ana, this is the place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Todd M, Wow, we just loved all the good things you glad to say about our staff and facilities. Yes travelling with 5 children can be an experience and I am glad we were able to make it a great experience. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was treated as a 2nd class citizen from check-in, at the restaurant, etc.  There was a wedding at the hotel of which I was not a guest.  Had I had been informed of this prior to check-in, I would have had the option to change hotels.
Manager Response: Dear James P, I apologize that our staff did not give you the treatment you so deserve and that having a wedding at the hotel made your stay uncomfortable. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered due too this. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great stay. Great location. Great value.
Summary: We stayed at this double tree in June of this year. Location is close to the airport, but not on top of it. Close to expressways and close to restaurants. Staff was very helpful and cheery. Would stay here again if we travel to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear CaseyH, You are so right about being close to the airport, but not on top of it. Being half a mile away alleviates any airport noise. Thank you for taking the time to give us a positive review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: When we arrived and saw that the hotel was engaged in hosting a large wedding party with several large associated events throughout the day, we were afraid it would impact the service we received. We were pleased with the fact that the hotel had staffed adequately to pull off a lovely wedding and still make us other guests feel special.  The hotel is well furnished and sparkling clean with an impressive lobby and meeting space area.
Manager Response: Dear IkesEx, So glad you mentioned that we made you and our other guests special, even though we were busy with a wedding. Thank you for your very positive comments. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed three nights at this hotel for business. The hotel staff was very friendly. I really love the omelette station the you guys have. your chef IVAN RODRIGUEZ is amazing and really professional! Everyone I encountered has a smile on their face and wanted to make sure my stay was good. The room was very nice, clean and comfortable. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear robert-xhico, Thank you for your glowing review about the property and the comfort and friendliness you experienced. We will definitely share your message with Ivan. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: First I received an email from the manager asking me to respond to any issues to him and to not post any issues I might have had. That was 2 days ago and I have not heard from him so here goes.  When I checked in my room was in completed disarray and there was a commercial fan trying to dry the carpet. Had to call to have room put back in order. The next morning I was awakened by a dog barking at my door. Why was the dog next door to a none pet room!?! To top it off my room was never cleaned nor were the linens replaced. Spoke to the manger upon checking out and he was quite arrogant in his reply. Gave me a $50 credit...big deal! Do not stay here. P.S. Valet staff - wonderful!!!
Manager Response: Dear Birdie 16, Thank you for taking the time to write this review and point out the fan issue and compliment our valet staff. Without seeing your confirmation number, I am presuming that we had a room that was damaged by water and in order to accommodate you on a sold out night, the staff tried to get the room fixed and make sure we took care of your reservation. I may be wrong, but would love to discuss the situation with you. Please feel free to call me directly at 714 442 1908 to discuss. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Good stay minutes away from SNA
Summary: This is my second time at the hotel, the first being more than a year ago.  The room is comfortable, relatively quiet, and furnished with modern decor. The bed and linens are especially comfortable and provide a great night's sleep.  Nice chair to catch TV in...and good work space to catch up on work.  Bathroom is decent with typical DoubleTree amenities.  Hot/cold water are fast with plenty of pressure; air conditioning was quick and quiet too.  The breakfast foods are improved over my last visit: they're using fresh eggs and delicious bacon among other things in their morning buffet, which is complimentary due to HHonors status.  While the breakfast is much better, the parking isn't. While this hotel offered ample self-parking in the past, you're now required to pay a rather
Manager Response: Dear Michael_K_SNJ, Thank you for being our guest and detailing your experience with us. Yes our kitchen now has a very accomplished chef and it shows on the quality of food and beverage the team puts out. Thank you for recognizing our friendly staff and clean accommodations. Unfortunately parking is very limited in our general area and as a guest you do have the convenience of driving straight to the lobby. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Watch out for higher rates than promised.
Summary: We had a group rate promised since we had several players staying for most of the week.  When we called for reservations on the very first day we were notified, the Group Sales rep charged us $20 more per night! I had to speak with someone twice to just get some of the overcharges returned.  We still were ultimately overcharged by $20.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew N, Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I would like to see what happened if I can get your confirmation # or last name. There are a few possibilities as we have had multiple sports teams stay with us and all were fine with the agreed rates. With your group there could either be that the cut off date to book had elapsed, breakfast was added to the rates, a booking was made for an upgraded room. Please let me know, if we made a mistake we would be more than happy to rectify the matter. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The move from self-parking in the hotel's garage to valet only will keep me from staying here in the future.  I have stayed at this hotel roughly 25 times since 2008 and the experience has always been very good.  Needing repeated access to my car for multiple meetings throughout the day makes self-parking a mandate.  If valet-only parking is the new standard, then I will stay at a competing hotel nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Stan S, We do appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us over the years. This says a lot of about and the services we have provided to you in the past. We definitely want to keep you as our customer and can look at ways to have your car close by for easy access as needed. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me on your next visit and we can try and work this out. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Had a problem but Ronnie, Christina and Staff resolved this- Thank you
Summary: Had a less than great experience, but due to the staff stepping up to resolve this as they did I felt it only fair that I remove my post from April 2015 and give them credit for stepping up and resolving this.  I have been heard from and they have been great at following through.  Thank You Ronnie and Team.
Manager Response: Dear Matt B, Thank you for taking the time to let us know the issue and resolve it while you were on property. We appreciate the fact that you did what you did with the old review. Many thanks, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed at the property for a week.  I have always stayed here, and liked it.  My last stay coincided with a wedding.  I was informed on Friday that the lobby would be closed from 9:30AM--10:30AM.  So i tried to grab breakfast at 8:00, but the line was at least 10 people and  they seemed short staffed.  So after waiting for 10 minutes I decided to leave.  I was held up because the wedding party wanted to take pictures at 8:30.  The delay ultimately caused me to be late.  When i complained to the front desk staff, I was asked "Did you receive the notice?"  I reminded her of the time posted on their notice...she did not seem to care.  The GM ultimately offered some concessions, however why would I return when I feel they are lacking in customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Michael C, It was a pleasure speaking with you while you were on property. Once again I do apologize for the inconvenience caused by the bridal party while they were clicking pictures in our lobby. You are absolutely correct, the times that we printed, did not match with the bridal couples timeline for their photo shoot, as well as the breakfast staff being under staffed. We do value your business and we do focus on customer service as part of our culture. We look forward to making your next stay a more enjoyable one and hoping you can use some of the concessions I was able to offer. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Greatest hotel in the world!  Awesome rooms, greatest staff, and wonderful food and fun!  There's nothing about the hotel that isn't perfect and the staff sees to that!  I visit this hotel at least once a year and am always greeted with a welcoming staff and a warm cookie.  The breakfast bar is awesome.  The food is always fresh and high quality.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa C, I just love a review that starts with "The Greatest Hotel in the World". Thank you so much for recognizing the hotel, our staff, and the breakfast bar. We look forward to seeing you on your annual visit next year. Our gratitude for your comments once again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Clean and Beautiful Hotel. Would Be Perfect If....
Summary: I was surprise by the nice décor and lobby area. The room itself is clean and comfortable. However, if you get a lower level room, street noise could be a problem if you are a light sleeper. Room insulation itself is not bad. I don't hear any sound from the adjacent room, but I might be lucky to get a good neighbor. Pool is outdoor and small.  Standard room amenities: Fridge, coffee maker, in room safe but no microwave. There are plenty of food options within walking distance. Self parking is expensive. You might have problem finding a big enough space in the underground parking if you drive a big vehicle.   It would be perfect if I wasn't placed on the 2nd floor room, close to gym and pool access. But overall great value and will be back if I have a chance.
Manager Response: Dear Enrico K, Firstly thank you for recognizing our hotel to be beautiful and well kept. I do wish you come back again so that we can put you on a higher floor. The hotel has been busy during summer and am sure advance planning will help secure the room that you deserve. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Parking was way to tight. They need to fix that.
Summary: The hotel was very business like but I was there for a weekend event with the family. The first night I come rolling in the parking garage was packed! I was thinking to myself, "How does a major hotel not have enough parking in the city area?". So I parked illegally across the street every night of my stay. Really not good for this hotel image. Luckily it was during the weekend so did not get a parking ticket or towed. The rest of the hotel was up to Double Tree standards for sure. I'm a Hilton Honors member so the staff, free bottles of water and room were amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Jerry Flanagan, Thank you for your candid comments and yes you are lucky you did not get a ticket or towed. As of July 1st the hotel is a hundred percent valet and you will not have the issue you did have. Thank you for being a loyal HHonor member and for recognizing the hotel as it stands. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Ben at the front desk was amazing. He made the check-in process quick and was so helpful. The hotel was well appointed, everything was clean and staff very friendly. The hotel is in a quite area with many food & other services close by. What a great place to start your vacation.
Manager Response: Dear jkrussell, Thank you for recognizing Ben and he will be thrilled with this comment. Appreciate the fact that you liked everything about the hotel and yes the restaurants in the neighborhood are lovely. We look forward to your next visit. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: 105 classmates attended their 60th class reunion on June 12th at the DoubleTree. The attention to details of our event provided by staff members was "OUTSTANDING". The booking of rooms by Jacqueline Um went exceedingly well.  The banquet layout by Kisha Cravin followed up with Captain Hilda serving a "SPECTACULAR" buffet of salads, soup, and fruit complemented with blacken salmon and crusted beef tenderloin. All attendees praised how good everything was including many choices for desert. The happy hour, or two, that followed our afternoon event made it a very special reunion.
Manager Response: Dear mgwood, Making an event such as your 60th reunion a special and joyous occasion, brings joy to all of us. We are so glad that Jacqueline, Keisha, Hilda and the team was able to go above and beyond. We now hope to see you at your 61st reunion. Till then, we thank you for taking the time to voice your wonderful remarks. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here for business and had an early van ride to the airport. They didn't have coffee out that early but one of there best, Scott hunter, overheard me asking about coffee and brought me out some. He even gave me an altoid for after so I didn't have coffee breath.
Manager Response: Dear RJ_Driver 15, Thank you for your wonderful comments on Scott. This is his second comment from a guest such as yourself this week and he is walking around with a huge smile on his face. Getting you coffee is one thing, but getting you an Altoid takes it to another level. Yes he is special and we are so glad to have him on our team. We do thank you for your business and taking the time to write this comment. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: They cater to my business needs
Summary: I have been using the Doubletree for business travel for over 4 years. Being close to the airport and the office it is very convenient. We regularly bring our team for Sales meetings in Irvine and they have never disappointed. Rooms are clean, the restaurant has a great breakfast, and the staff is friendly and understand the value of service.
Manager Response: Dear Jacques D, We are proud of the fact that we did cater to your business and thank you for the commendations. 4 years is a long time and we thank you for your business and loyalty to the hotel. Of course I can just picture our AM crew wishing you at breakfast each morning and making our hotel, your home away from home. Thank you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I've been coming here for years and I went for a run this morning, around the streets like I always did. Well my route didn't compare to the route Scott suggested. There's actually a lake across the street with a running route around it. Thanks Scott!
Manager Response: Dear Wayeasy, You could not have said it any better, "Scott is the man"". We are blessed that Scott is part of our team and was able to make you daily workout run more enjoyable. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Accommodations were perfect. Friendly staff who are all very accommodating.  Big callout to the Executive Meetings Manager - Jacqueline Um. She always goes way beyond to ensure all our team members have an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear Brian K, Thank you so much fro your business and the trust you place in the hands of Jacqueline and our service staff. We all appreciate your business very much. We look forward to seeing you at your next event here at the hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I had the pleasure of working with Jacqueline Um, the Executive Meeting Manager and her crew twice!  They are on top of their game and made our experience a great one!  Jacqueline is very organized and efficient.  The very reason why I decided to host our sales event there the 2nd time was due the outstanding experience I had working with her on our first sales event.  She is by far the most professional individual I've worked with in a very long time.
Manager Response: Dear ilee 188, Thank you for your glowing remarks about Jacqueline and the service she provided to you. We are extremely happy and proud to have her on our team servicing esteemed guests such as your self. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I cannot say enough good things about my experience with the Double Tree in Santa Ana! We chose this location to house about 25 sales reps for a local sales meeting. I worked closely with Jacqueline Um, and she made the process EXTREMELY smooth and painless. I bombarded her with emails, adjustments, additions, all at the last minute, and she was able to accommodate each of my requests (demands?) at a moment's notice. This was the one aspect of a completely hectic sales meeting week that I didn't have to stress about. Jacqueline had it DIALED. We will always be a loyal customer of the Double Tree in Santa Ana! Thank you for everything! You truly went above and beyond!
Manager Response: Dear Jenny C, Thank you for your wonderful comments about Jacqueline. Yes I do agree, she is the best. We are glad all went well with your meeting and do hope to see you sooner than later for your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I went here the other day for a work meeting. The room was nice and service was great. There was always someone at the front desk that was more than helpful! For a business trip, it was reasonably priced. The only thing that could have been better was the price of the snacks from catering-- felt like it was a little too pricy for what it was.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa G, We are thrilled that your meeting went off smoothly and that you enjoyed the services of the team. We do apologize that you felt the food was pricey. We take great pains to keep our costs and pricing inline with the market as well as endure the increasing costs on products. We hope to see you again for future stays and events. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff was extremely super serving!  I imagine if I had complained about my issues it would have been taken care of.  I had such a busy trip that I had no time.  Ice machines were broken (which I needed for my athlete child).  Room smelled but I got used to it.  Room service food was cold and subpar but the restaurant breakfast was great!  Beds were super comfy!
Manager Response: Dear Amy O, Thank you for the great comments about our staff, breakfast and super comfy beds. I apologize for the ice machine not working, the room service food being cold and the smell of the room. We do hope you will give us another chance when you are next in this area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great location but service is poor
Summary: Pleasant, friendly, helpful staff but the hotel is under staffed.  I called 5 times before I finally got someone at the hotel to answer, then I waited 30 minutes for the hotel shuttle to pick me up at SNA airport after I was told it would be there in 10 minutes.  I finally took a cab.  Automated  wakeup service doesn't work and neither does someone at the front desk.  I kept calling and finally quit as no one answered the phone.
Manager Response: Dear Headhunter 5507, I do apologize for the lack of staffing and unanswered calls, alarm, as well as the shuttle not running on time. We do however appreciate the mention of us being a great location and do hope that you give us another chance to earn your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I loved the place, Management and staff so much, instead of moving into an apartment, I ended up staying here for almost two months. To top it I ended up making best of friends. Very nice place to have a grand function too.
Manager Response: Dear PK, It was wonderful having you as our guest for 2 months and you eventually became a friend and family to myself and my team. We were absolutely proud to have someone of your caliber, trust our capabilities and staff, during your transition to the California market, while you were setting up your business.  It was a sad and happy moment when you got your own place. Sad to see you leave and happy that you had anchored your home. We do hope to see you again when time permits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This was a very nice place to stay. Very close to airport which made it extremely easy. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone who is traveling, whether business or pleasure. The cookies don't hurt either.
Manager Response: Dear Vince T, Thank you for giving a shout out to the proximity of the hotel to the airport, staff and services. Yes the Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies are like icing on the cake when tired and hungry. We do hope to see you again. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Dont let the lobby fool you.
Summary: This hotel has a spectacular lobby which will lead you to believe that the hotel rooms are equally impressive. Well the room are not impressive, this hotel is dated and the rooms were small. We were upgraded to the Hilton Honors floor but, I could not see thing that would make it a upgraded room. The room was so small the King size bed took up most of the room. You had to almost turn sideways when passing near the end of the bed and television. Also had to call down stairs twice regarding the room next door slamming doors until after 3:00 am. Happened again near 6 a.m.. Complained to the front desk and received a credit to my room but because of the 18.00 a day for parking did not see much of a difference. Also the carpets through out the hotel need cleaning. Plus for the Hotel
Manager Response: Dear Jay C, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed version of your stay. We are happy that you were pleased with the bell hop and staff that you encountered. We apologize that the neighbors kept slamming their doors in the night. I have passed on your comments to our facility manager and we will work on the carpets. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: A+ all the way around! Jacqueline helped me from day one of our planning. She was excellent to work with and was very accommodating to our needs.  We had MANY last minute changes and the banquet staff handled them with no problems.  The event room was set up to our specifications. The food was great and our rooms were very nice!  We will definitely book another seminar at this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Rick S, Your comments about our team to include Jacqueline, banquet staff and our culinary team was delightful. We do appreciate your business and thank you sincerely for such glowing remarks. We do appreciate it. Thanking you, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Business Traveler’s Oasis in Orange County
Summary: I spend between 60 & 80 nights a year in Orange County for business and have stayed at a ton of different hotels in the area from Santa Ana down to Laguna Hills, this place is the perfect mix for the business traveler.    Service - The staff at this location are some of the best I have met, at every level.  The manager of this property is doing a great job, and the pride shows through.  As a Hilton Honors member, I can tell you that the Double Tree franchise is kind hit or miss, this one is a grand slam on the service side! - Keep up the good Alexandra!  In O.C. you have 2 choices for hotels cheap and rundown or over priced, this property strikes the right balance.  Your in a true hotel, but the price will not give your CFO a heart attack when you turn in your expense sheet.
Manager Response: Dear brimil, This is one of the best comments with a lot of thought put into the material that I have seen in a long time. Being an Oasis and a cut above other OC hotels and the brand has put a new feather in all our caps. Not giving your CFO a heart attack was a first for me and sounded so good. With all the travel that you do, we are so very glad to please and we do hope you make us your home away from home. Once again, we are indebted with this glowing and sincere post on Trip advisor. With gratitude, R Dalgado

Summary: The Restaurant was superb, especially the wait staff which was Javier Robles, Roberto Perez & Maria Carransal.  I have stayed here many times and the same good service always exists.  Mike Brasher 007216548
Manager Response: Dear Michael Brasher,  Thank you for your glowing remarks about our restaurant team member's. They all appreciate (as do we) the comments from esteemed guests such as yourself. We do appreciate your business, Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here for an event held in Huntington Beach. Location was close enough that the drive to beach was an easy 15 minute drive and far enough away to not be caught up in the huge event crowds. Room was clean and comfortable and staff was friendly and very helpful. Neighboring room was obviously in party mode Friday night letting loose waves of noise up until about 4AM. Thankfully, Saturday night was nice and quiet. Despite the interruption of sleep one night we would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear eatineatin, Smart choice staying away from the crowds at the beach. Yes we are a quick drive to the beach and am also positive a little more price friendly as well. We apologize for the neighbors keeping you up. In the future if you do encounter a similar issue please phone the manager on duty and we will take care of the issue for you. Your good nights rest is extremely important to us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The Hilton was a great experience. The downstairs cafe was amazing food and the staff was courteous andattentive. Especially Vanessa G. She was amazing and helpful with everything we needed. Definitely coming back!
Manager Response: Dear azdrew23, Amazing comments about our staff in our restaurant and we all thank you for that. yes Vanessa is an amazing server and we are so glad she is on our team. We do wish you the best in your travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I had researched several facilities near John Wayne Airport to host an Executive Event for our team and was fortunate to speak to Jacqueline Um, Executive Meeting Manager. She made the decision to hold the event at the Doubletree SNA easy with a competitive price structure, professional attitude and wiliness to accommodate our unique needs. Jacqueline actually went "above and beyond" to ensure every aspect of the event was perfect from planning to execution. She made my job easy by proactively addressing every detail and working within our constraints. Our team was extremely happy with the meeting room, friendly staff, and delicious food. I frequently plan events remotely and find the type of experience provided by Jacqueline's team is rare. We look forward to having the
Manager Response: Dear nicole1232015, Thank you for your glowing comments about Jacqueline, our banquet staff and the food. We have a great team and Jacqueline is exceptional at what she does. We are so happy that all went well in your meeting and we hope to service your group again and soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Nice doubletree property located very close to the airport (shuttle provided takes 3 mins). However, when I arrived, the shuttle was quite infrequent (as it was explained to me the shuttle also serves any address within 3 mile radius so the demand is high), but this should not mean one has to wait in excess of 30 mins for the shuttle to arrive at 10pm.  The staff are really nice and I appreciated a call to my room to ensure the room and all else is to my satisfaction. I was also provided with extended check-out which is much appreciated.  Swimming pool and hot tub are on the open air, in a nice area but the street noise means not much relaxation can be had.  Breakfast was about average for a doubletree property - medium choice and proactive staff looking after the guests. I did
Manager Response: Dear MartinFGM, Thank you so much for your detailed comments about the hotel, staff and services. We apologize for the fact that you had to wait longer than usual for the shuttle. Depending on how busy the team gets we are usually on time with the shuttle runs. Yes the staff is amazing and we now have an omelet station mid week when busy. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This was such a great hotel, but the surrounding area was so nice too! There were so many fun little restaurants and shops to discover. All the staff I encountered were very kind. And who can forget The Cookie? I wish I'd been able to stay longer!
Manager Response: Hello Hollie P, I am so glad that you liked the area. The restaurants and shopping at South Coast Plaza is world class. The Doubletree Chocolate chip cookie that you loved is also "World Class", best cookie in the world in my opinion. We hope that you do come and visit again to enjoy all of the above. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very nice, clean room, helpful staff
Summary: Overall, our visit was very good and we would stay again.  We had an issue with the internet during our stay and some noise from roof, but that did not last long. The hotel is very nice! The staff was excellent!
Manager Response: Hello Jeremy W, Thank you for recognizing our helpful staff and the cleanliness of the rooms. Our staff will be delighted to hear your comments. Yes we are in the process of upgrading our internet provider and speed and will have a great product in time. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: On May 30 th 2015 last minute i was searching for a room near irvine calif. It was for a celebration for me and my girlfriend and i wanted to make it special evening. I called the double tree by Hilton where i had visited a friend a couple years prior to see what there rates were. A man Named Leroy Answered my call and i told him i needed a room for me and my girlfriend and it was a special occasion, He assured me he would make it a special evening not only with a great room rate but also had chocolate covered strawberries and breakfast for the two of us. The rate was remarkable and Leroy with his Texas twang was so accomadating and pleasant . His trusting Voice i felt assured in my choice. Thank You  Leroy for all your help. The night was so fantastic for us and we will
Manager Response: Dear Russ P, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed and awesome review. Much appreciated and Leroy is as pleased as punch once I shared with the team. You gotta love him, with his Texas twang and spirit. We appreciate your business and are glad you were our guest. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I recently spent a weekend in the Double Tree Santa Ana with my daughter to celebrate her birthday. Before heading down, I spoke with Leroy on the phone. He told me they would make it a memorable trip for my birthday girl. They did not disappoint. When we arrived, the staff was courteous, the hotel was clean and our room was lovely. The front desk even took the time to hand "deliver" a letter from Hogwarts to my daughter (which I had slipped them) and played it off beautifully. She couldn't figure out how they knew where she would be for the weekend. While we went out for the afternoon, Leroy, Christina and Alex decorated our room and left a birthday treat and card signed by the staff. It was a memorable trip. For a hotel that probably sees more clientele for business, they
Manager Response: Dear Saida S, I was so happy to read your story and experience and we are ecstatic that your daughter had a wonderful birthday and that she was in awe and surprised. Leroy, Christina and Alex are the best and am so glad you and your daughter were able to experience their genuine need to make your day special. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed at the double tree to meet the "New Chef" Shannon Olvera, she let me know that there is a new menu coming soon that has a little bit of everything to please everyone palate. She has created a menu that consist of american dishes with a Californian fusion flair.
