I think that once people start coming to try her food they will love it. there are not many restaurants around this area so this will be a nice change. Please go and visit and talk to the Chef.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We were greeted by the very friendly Leroy who turned out to be not quite so "bad" after all (just a jest alluding to the song about Leroy Brown).  We got free WIFI and complimentary breakfasts which is usual where ever we stay, is what I told him.  Self Parking was $18 and Valet $20 so for 2 bucks we got some great valet service too.  The room with a king size bed is spacious and cosy.  The only thing I am missing is the tub for the next few days and a firm mattress, at least there is a hot tub...
Manager Response: Dear ilovetravel13, With a web name like that I am sure you do travel a lot and we are so pleased that you encountered Leroy and got the Texan an all. You are correct in stating that for $2.00 more you were well taken care off by our excellent valet team as well as spend time in the hot tub. When you travel brings you back to our area we hope that we can serve you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: From the moment we walked in, we were greeted by Ulysses who welcomed us. He noticed my husband and I were wearing matching shirts and asked what we were celebrating. We explained that it was our two year anniversary and he congratulated us and offered to send up champagne and strawberries to our room. We explained that we don't drink alcohol so he sent a bottle of Martinelli's instead with a plate of strawberries, raspberries and blackberries. What a thoughtful gesture! Ulysses even called to make sure we received the treat. When we called the front desk to ask where the pool was, he was so quick to answer and so kind. We had a peaceful night with no disturbances. In the morning, we went to eat breakfast at the hotel restaurant and our waiter Zee explained the full buffet was
Manager Response: Dear Aubrey G, I am so glad that Ulices and our team here were able to make your stay a memorable one. Loved the story about the matching shirts. We do hope you come visit again sometime soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice facility and very convenient in the OC.
Summary: We stayed at this Doubletree in April 2015 for four nights. We had a king room on the top floor. The room was very clean, quiet and the bed was comfortable. We thought the AAA price was very reasonable, too. We have stayed at a few hotels in the OC and this one was right up there as far as quality and value. Oh, and the lobby staff was great, too.  The pros for this venue were: Clean, comfortable and quiet room. Temperature was easy to control. Nice size room for sleeping. We didn’t stay in the room much beyond that.  Bath and shower were well equipped and clean. Nothing to write home about but they served its purpose. Lobby staff was very friendly and seemed to be interested in the quality of our stay. Modest but nice workout room. It works. Small pool and hot tub were adequate
Manager Response: Dear MACCLES, Thank you for taking the time to write a very detailed review. We are so glad you enjoyed the services of out team. As of June 1st, basic Wi-Fi in rooms is going to be complimentary for all Hilton Members. We hope that we can enroll you into the HHonors club, the next time you return to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: nice hotel with excellent customer service
Summary: Stayed here during a holiday weekend while visiting family in the area.  Lobby staff was very welcoming and all smiles at check-in.  They definitely place a strong emphasis on customer service, which always makes a huge difference in experience.  The hotel was very clean and nicely decorated.  The breakfast buffet was served in a nice dining area with pleasant service as well.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Bill B, Your glowing comments about our staff smiles and the lovely breakfast buffet has made coming back to work after a long Memorial day weekend a joyous one. We do have a great team that has been excelling at customer service and we do hope your  next travels bring you back to our hotel, sooner than later. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: typically a good hotel but this trip not impessed, very poor service, maid service took 1 hour and 30 minutes to bring us towels. toilet was broke and my key to my room had to be fix several times during the stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jason S, We do apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay and we will continue to strive to work harder at resolving issues in a quicker and more efficient manager when they do occur. Waiting an hour and a half for towels is not acceptable. We do hope that you give us another chance when you are back in this neighborhood in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The fantastic staff at the DoubleTree Santa Ana are not only customer service experts but also reflect their professionalism in their work effort and ability to resolve customer issues. As an Office Manager at a large university I can occasionally have students and directors accidentally use the incorrect form of payment which can sometimes be a huge hassle. The staff at the DoubleTree made my resolution quickly and correctly. My issue and request were immediately understood without extensive explanation, and resolved in a timely manner. Thank you DoubleTree for your service!
Manager Response: Dear George K, Thank you very much for acknowledging our lovely and hardworking staff. We are thrilled we were able to take care of all your billing issues with your students in an quick and efficient manner. Please reach out to me if you need any help with future groups. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: A few days prior to my check in, I was calling to check on my "when you arrive" order, and a man named Ben answered the phone. He was extremely rude and did not even answer my question. Other than that, this hotel is PERFECT. I love that there was no age restriction and I was allowed to enjoy a comfortAble night there after my prom night. I would DEFINITELY stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jordan T, Thank you for your sincere evaluation about our hotel and that you enjoyed your stay even with the one issue that took place.  We do hope to see you on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very nice clean hotel, fantastic customer service!
Summary: This hotel is very nice, very clean, with a staff of excellent customer service. One staff I'd like to recognize Francisco at the Front Desk. He was able to take care of an issue that I had with great composure while I explained my issue which was not informed to me when I made reservations. I stay at the Hilton hotels and used to stay an average of 3.5 times per week, every week for the past 5 years. Doubletree Hilton in Santa Ana is one of the finest staff I've experienced. This day and age, every business is a competitor to each other even though they don't directly complete in any way, shape or form. Francisco did a great job and I'd like to recognize that to Doubletree management.   Drew K.
Manager Response: Dear Drew K, Thank you for your kind words about our staff, hotel and especially Francisco. Yes we are glad to have in on our team and it is nice to hear that he was able to make your stay better. Safe travels. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay.  The staff and the accommodations were top notch! I would recommend this hotel to any business traveler.  The shuttle takes you to nearby restaurants, shopping and the airport.  There are also some restaurants within walking distance.  Great brand, greater value.
Manager Response: Dear C6596QWjenniferb, Being a valued business traveler it was heartening to read your lovely evaluation about our hotel. We are also glad you were able to take the shuttle and explore local restaurants. Being so close to South Coast Plaza, the restaurants in the area are all amazing. We do hope to see you again on your future visits to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very nice hotel and very good rooms. Courteous staff. The only thing which I would like to mention about the parking charges for resident guest should be at no cost and breakfast should be inclusive in standard. Everything otherwise is very decent.
Manager Response: Dear hranawat, Thank you for taking the time to write a lovely review about our hotel. In regards to parking, yes we do have a reasonable parking fee. We do hope that your future travels will bring you back to the area and that we can earn your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: we worked directly with Jacqueline Um, Executive Meetings Manager, who handled everything specific to our needs and made the entire week perfect for our guests!  The hotel is beautiful and the location is perfect for our corporate needs, but it also has a luxurious feel (and appearance) that suggests traveling for pleasure would be just that!
Manager Response: Dear Sue R, We are so glad that the Training event you conducted at the hotel went well. Jacqueline is extremely pleased with the lovely comment you wrote about her and we hope that your future events and training will either bring you back to our hotel or Doubletree's around the world. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This facility is always very well maintained, clean and very comfortable.  The staff are very helpful and friendly.  It is a generally very comfortable place to stay when away from home.  I use this facility whenever I am in the Santa Ana area.
Manager Response: Dear Richard K, Thank you for your glowing comments about our hotel and wonderful staff. We are so glad that you have made us your home away from home. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me, if there is anything I can assist with on your future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Extremely friendly staff, clean, comfortable facility.  As with most places we stayed in CA, there was a nominal fee to park.   Our biggest complaint (other than noisy neighbors) was the breakfast was not complimentary, as it has been in most of the other Hilton branches we've stayed at.  We looked at the menu and the items offered were average at an expensive price.  We think we saved about 50% by walking across the street to Starbuck's and eating there.
Manager Response: Dear Amy S, Thank you for all your positive remarks about your stay. Yes we do charge a fee for breakfast and we do follow the Doubletree standards with the varieties of breakfast breads, juices, cereals, hot and cold food items to include "made to order fresh omelets".  We do hope you will experience our breakfast in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed at this Doubletree in Santa Ana for 2 nights recently while on business. Checkin was a breeze with the HH app and the smiles and cookie were appreciated. The room was clean and comfortable. However when I went to look out the window I spotted something black between the couch and window on the floor. It was a pair of gym shorts obviously left inadvertently by a previous guest. Not something you want to find in your hotel room.   The next day I needed to find a ride back to the hotel from Anaheim and inquired how much a taxi would cost, a young woman was nice enough to call the cab company and inquire for me, then Ben Robely suggested I call a Uber car. This was a great suggestion as it was half the price of a cab fare.  The real issue with this Doubletree occurred the
Manager Response: Dear Steve W., Thank you for your review and all the other good experiences you had during your stay. Yes it is a practice that we slip the folios under the door and am baffled as to what happened the morning of your departure.  It also looks like we did not have enough of drivers with the heavy 5:30 am rush and I do apologize. We do wish you well on your travels and hope that you will stay with us on future trips. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel has a great appearance on the outside.  Impressive lobby and public areas but the room I was in was absolutely filthy.  Gum stuck to my nightstand, very dirty carpeting (probably the dirtiest I've seen in my travels around the world), and a dirty bathroom with hair left on the shower wall and flooring.  Front desk staff is friendly until there is a problem, then they become somewhat unprofessional.
Manager Response: Hello Marion M.,  Thank you so much for talking the time to express your concerns. Firstly thank you for commending the look of the hotel and the lobby. I did bring up the concerns of cleanliness of your room with our Facilities Director and the housekeeping Supervisors as they are very proud of what they do and their ultimate goal is to provide you and our guests with clean rooms. We do hope you give us a second chance. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed at the doubletree for a week while doing disney, beaches, etc. it was conveniently located. It was my husband, myself, our 11 month old daughter and three year old son. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Marilu was our server every morning at breakfast and she was wonderful. She went out of her way to accommodate our special requests and see that we were well taken care of. Her hospitality as well as all other staff we encountered made our stay very pleasant!
Manager Response: Dear KACano, I am so glad you had a wonderful week of vacations and especially as Magical Disneyland. I am positive your children must have been totally enthralled. Thank you for your wonderful comments about Marilu and I am so glad she was able to make your stay special. I will definitely share the same with her and the team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Business Trip Saved by Outstanding Customer Service
Summary: Was on a business trip and multiple things went wrong or situations occurred that I need help.  Ms. Alexjandra R. was incredible in fixing everything and/or helping me get situated for success.  I have spent 50 - 80 nights in hotels each year since 1985 (3 million miles on Delta alone) and can not remember anyone as helpful as Alexjandra.    The facility is nice and clean and everyone is friendly, but customer service is over the top.  A great place to do business.  There is only so clean  a place can be, there is only so many amenities, this location is fine on both.   Customer service is what makes the difference and this location starting with Ms. Alejandra is outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear East TN 199, That was really a touching note that you wrote expressing the services of Alejandra. She is going to be so excited as with her team when I share your comments with all. With your busy travel schedule, thank you for taking the time to express your feelings and I am so glad that Alejandra  was able to right the wrongs. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: For a practical, no frills, no hassle stay, this hotel is fine.  Staff are friendly, and the man cleaning the pool was particularly helpful and obliging when we turned up early to swim.  There is a charge for parking which is never welcome, but at least they are up front about it.
Manager Response: Dear Robert G,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. We do hope you will stay with us the next time you are in town. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Typical business hotel, booked it via the website that lets you know the name of the hotel after you book it (not sure if I can name them here.) I got good deal, about 30+% off actual price. The hotel is catered more for business travelers, so there's no frills, more like a cookie cutter, generic. The room had a King bed, it was clean and comfortable warm chocolate chip cookie included!
Manager Response: Dear EseEquis, Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Ye during the week our hotel caters to business travelers primarily and social and leisure during the weekends. We thank you for staying with us and do hope you stay with us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. It was everything that anyone would expect in a great Hotel. We will stay there again. The lobby was very nice. Check-in was simple all the staff was over the top in helping us feel right at home. Check was simple and morning staff was over top in there quality of service.
Manager Response: Dear Myles E, Thank you for rating us a 5 and we are so glad you had a lovely and pleasant stay. We do hope your travels bring you back to our hotel and that we are able to be your hotel of choice in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: The staff goes ABOVE AND BEYOND
Summary: I would like to give a special thank you the Leroy and the entire staff.  Everyone was great. Leroy noticed my daughter was headed to a cheerleading competition and was nice enough to ask how it went the next day.  This was a great personal touch. I should add I was impressed at how quite and comfortable the room was too.
Manager Response: Dear Marty B, We do appreciate the time you took to write this glowing review. We will definitely share the review with Leroy and all the team members. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Family get trip to Santa Ana
Summary: Nice hotel with friendly staff but I don't like the way they nickel and dime you to death. Parking was $18 per day and internet access that is free everywhere is another $10 per day. Add taxes to these services and you are adding $30 per night to the published room rate.
Manager Response: Dear George D, Thank you for your review. Yes we do charge for the services and the pricing is below what most hotels in this area charge. We also have it published on all our websites so that it is not a surprise.  We do wish you the best on your future travels. R Dalgado

Summary: I believe this hotel provides good service and comfortable rooms (except the small pillows). I have had two stays and reserved for a third in 4 days. I don't know if this is the best bang for the buck, but it is a comfortable hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Budd S, Thank you for taking to write about your experience and stating that we have comfortable rooms. Please do visit us when you are back in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: At check in I felt very welcome.  I got great advice about a local Mexican restaurant, and always enjoyed the warm cookie.  The room was well appointed, quiet.  Breakfast had many good options, but trying to get coffee was a challenge.  Not enough waiters!   Unnecessary glitch in an otherwise good restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Asiadream, Thank you for writing a very detailed positive stay that you experienced at our hotel. We do hope you choose us on your next visit to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The room was fine but the restaurant.... what was it???  Fine dining with a bar and loud sports on TV or a sports bar with dining tables?  The lighting was too bright for dining.  The décor Italian/Mediterranean.  And the menu a mix of all.  Sitting at the table near the window having dinner with the staff chatting, standing around just a few tables away.  The food didn't make up for the confusion in the décor, lighting or staff.
Manager Response: Dear Alps110, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed experience that you had in our restaurant. We tank you for the positive room experience comments as well. As of last week we have hired a new and talented Executive Chef (who featured on the TV show Chopped) and will have a new and exciting California Fusion menu by mid May. In the meantime I will share your comments with our company's design team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: DoubleTree, Santa Anna John Wayne Airport
Summary: Dirty Rooms-No A/C, Really Bad Food, this hotel is old and although they have updated the rooms...their A/C System needs to be replaced or fixed. We complained to the front desk, they sent someone up to our room, but that is not where the problem is.
Manager Response: Dear 466barryp, Thank you for your review. I am very sorry that you were not happy with your room assignment during your recent trip. We strive to accommodate all reservations but occasionally cannot meet every room request. If you would like to discuss this matter in more detail, please contact us at the information below. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance if you return to the area.  R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is a great deal for the area and the staff is very accommodating.   Wonderful service in the restaurant as well.  You will not be unhappy with any part of your stay if you choose this Doubletree Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 927sharonj, Loved your response and your affirmation of the restaurant and team. We do thank you for that. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Assigned me with a downgraded room & ripped off at the hotel bar!
Summary: I made online reservation through Hilton dot com as a diamond member.  I chose a room" Top floor deluxe room with sofa."  They assigned me with a top floor but the room with a small chair with stain on it. Ew! When I called front desks, I was told me a like.( the room I booked was assigned to other guest  etc., blah blah)   I went to the bar for happy hour says bottled bud light for$4 and I had 2 bottles but when I asked for a check, I was charged $10.50 + tax instead of $8. I didn't want to turn my happy hour to mad hour so I didnt complain & gave a generous tip anyway, but decided to let everybody know.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very sorry that you were not happy with your room assignment during your recent trip. We strive to accommodate all reservations but occasionally cannot meet every room request. If you would like to discuss this matter in more detail, please contact us at the information below. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance if you return to the area.  Thank you, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: This hotel provides one of the best customer service to us during our stay. We asked for extra pillows and this and that. The delivery was very prompt. We like it and will definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Victor L, Thank you for the wonderful words of praise that you used and we do appreciate it. We look forward to your next visit. Safe travels, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for early morning flights
Summary: Our family stayed here the night prior to returning to the east coast.  We love the free airport shuttle.  Rooms were clean, staff friendly, good room rates and love the cookies upon arrival.  I would stay here again in the future.  Nice common, lobby area.
Manager Response: Dear randell2015, Thank you for your appreciation of the Doubletree Chocolate chip cookie and the breakfast buffet. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Irvine
Summary: Very friendly staff at the front desk.  Welcomed with a warm cookie and smiles.  Breakfast buffet was excellent, wide selection and copious amounts of food.  Will definitely choose this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear KellersGeorgia, We do appreciate you posting your very positive experience. Yes we are really close to the airport and a warm chocolate chip on your way back home makes for the perfect stay. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is near the airport with a free shuttle to and from, and walking distance to outstanding restaurants (The Little Onion), and close to services.  It also has a nice restaurant/bar and underground parking.
Manager Response: Dear James L, I am so glad you we able to walk to the local restaurants across the street as well as try ours. Please do visit when you are in the neighborhood the next time. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Typical Hilton, which is to stay fine.
Summary: Breakfast was good, but other than that nothing remarkable.   Although I paid a daily parking charge my key never work to get me out of the garage. I am Diamond I did not get my bill under my door the last day either. Minor annoyances, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff D, Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member and we do appreciate your feedback. Yes I have spoken to the night staff and we apologize for not  putting your folio under the door. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My experience was excellent.  From the initial booking, follow up, and on site execution. The staff was first rate, the facility was great and the food was excellent. I would like to personally acknowledge the following for their warm, and excellent service. Jacqueline Um Hilda Zamora Jose Luis Rebollar Miguel Borbolla Also the front desk staff was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Trade Show Coordinator, We are thrilled that all went well with your event and thank you for listing the team members that stood out as we want the rest of our staff to emulate them. Last week we hired a very talented and acclaimed chef and look forward be your hotel of choice for your next Geiger event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Excellent all around stay.  Appearance, check-in, checkout. The hotel lobby was impressively clean, the airport shuttle was very convenient as well.  Rooms and amenities were in excellent order. Would recommend without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear Z5908R Udanieh, Love the words "Top Notch" and so glad we were able to stand out for you. Please do come and stay with us the next time you are in our area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: When we arrived at the hotel I was greeted warmly and given cookies for my children. When we got to our room I realized that we needed a roll away bed because we had five people. When I called down I was told that they can do a roll away in a double queen room because of fire safety. I didn't know what to do because we couldn't comfortable sleep five in that room. The girl at the front desk didn't skip a beat. Upgraded us to a king with sleeper sofa room where they could do a roll away and we all slept great. The next morning when we checked out I was once again given great service and cookies for the road. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear jordan a, Thank you for such a glowing review. I am glad we were able to take care of all your needs and more importantly that you and your family loved our Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookies. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Just stayed at the Hilton in Santa Ana (next to John Wayne airport) Very nice. Dora the front desk receptionist was outstanding! The room was nice and clean (didn't want to leave). The staff was very kind. Good experience
Manager Response: Dear David M, We are glad you had a pleasant stay and that your interaction with our staff was pleasant. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Don't book unless you're ready for a nightmare!
Summary: Me and two friends found a deal for this so called hotel on Expedia.  If you're booking online do not trust them at all!  We found an issue in our room (a single with 1 king sized bed) and a week prior to arrival believed it too be solved.  Well after two nights stay and numerous complaints  I am ready to call the better business bureau.  I was told they could do nothing to accommodate us beyond giving us more pillows to sleep on the floor.  I would avoid this place like the plague they obviously overbook and don't know what they are doing or how to be professional or courteous.  Vacation ruined!
Manager Response: Dear Cody Formisano, Firstly please let me apologize for you not receiving your proper room type. I was trying to find your reservation under your posted name in the system and was not successful. If you do not mind giving me a call with either the confirmation number and/or the name of the reservation that your room was under, I will definitely look into the situation. My direct number is 7144421908. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Very satisfied with DoubleTree and love the warm chocolate chip cookies.  Would stay here again.  It was still a little cool for an outdoor pool but it was positioned where the sun shined right into the pool area.  Was nice to sit out there.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia P,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review on Trip Advisor. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: No frills, no fuss - good place to stay - very clean - smells great.  Rooms were a little small - but no big deal - it was clean.  Had a couple of issues - but management is awesome at "making it right".
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia P, Thank you for your comments. Yes we are a business hotel during the week and have a lot of leisure guests on weekends.  We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Good hotel, beware of parking fees
Summary: The hotel itself is very good. Friendly staff and nice accommodations. Clean room and minimal noise.  I wasn't aware that we would have to pay $18 per day to park. That was not included in any of the pricing.   I am not a fan when hotels do not disclose "hidden fees" and charges. Along with the high room rate, I most likely paid to much. Next time I will shop around instead of accepting a friends recommendation.
Manager Response: Dear Jesse R, Thank you for taking the time to write your review and commending our staff and cleanliness. yes we do have a charge for parking and have it posted on all our partner websites. If there was site you booked us and did not see the fees listed please let us know so that we may rectify it. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: The location is close to SNA although there are a bunch in the area. The simple amenities though are lacking. May not be a big deal to some but the hotel does not have a coffee bar. Yes you can get a coffee or bagel takeaway at the restaurant. But a Starbucks/anything in the building would be a better option. There is a Starbucks across the street which is open very early. But by 730A, it will be very crowded with a queue of 20 or more. The hotel is dated and it can show it in parts. Unless you are a high level Hilton Honors member, you will pay $10 for internet connectivity. Parking is $20/day. So depending on what you are looking for, you may prefer one of the newer hotels in the area where breakfast, coffee and parking are included.
Manager Response: Dear am08540, Thank you for taking the time to post your comments. You are correct, we do not have a Starbucks at the hotel and yes there is one right across the street. As you mentioned our restaurant is open and you can avail of coffee from 6 am to 11 pm. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: I recently stayed here for two nights for business and it serves that purpose perfectly. Just give them a call when you arrive and the hotel shuttle picks you right up at John Wayne Airport (Hint: if you have TSA Pre-Check and your terminal lane is closed, go to Terminal C, it's always open. The airport is small enough that even if your gate is on the other end of the airport, it's only a five minute walk back to Terminal A), and drops you off, no muss, no fuss. The warm cookie at check in is always nice, too. All the staff I encountered were lovely.  I used the small gym, two elliptical machines, two treadmills, and some free weights. Enough to get in a workout on the road. But the pool is a small one, so if you're looking for some cardio by swimming laps, you'll have to look
Manager Response: Dear Kelly M., Thank you for the strong "Business Trip Perfection" caption and a very detailed version of the local area and things to do. We do look forward to being the hotel of your choice when you visit this area in the future. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Flying in so late we decided to stay close to the SNA airport and pick up our rental car the next morning. The hotel offers free airport shuttle and it was prompt. The hotel is only a few minutes away in a very nice part of town. We were there on a Friday night so things were pretty quiet the next morning, which we appreciated. The hotel is beautiful and clean, staff was very friendly and helpful. Being the weekend we were able to obtain a great room rate which made it all the more enjoyable. I would highly recommend this hotel for it's proximity to airport, weekend price and great staff.
Manager Response: Dear Suef56, We loved your comments about the hotel, look and cleanliness. We do appreciate you posting that and wish you safe travels. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Nice hotel.  I have stayed at it several times over the last year and never had an issue with anything.  I was always meeting others and never had a car, so I have never really ventured out to anything nearby.  It seems like a decent area.  The hotel (and area) is clean, quiet and the staff is attentive.  I'd go back if I needed to stay in the area again.
Manager Response: Hello Dan W, Thank you for your wonderful comments about the hotel. If you do not have a car on your next trip, w will be able to shuttle you to restaurants and the humungous South Coast Plaza Shopping Center within a 3 mile radius. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: I don't know if the warm cookies they gave us at check-in was a Hhonors thing, or if they do that for everyone, but that was a nice touch. They were good cookies too!!  We weren't there for long, but the bed was super comfy and I slept really well.  Breakfast was decent, if you get the buffet, they'll make you eggs to order or a personalized omelet in the kitchen.  ;)
Manager Response: Dear Kayla S, With comments such as yours we will need to make you guest of the day the next time you are here. I may be biased, but yes the Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies are the best and also not just for HHonor members, but for everyone. Also glad you liked our beds and did take advantage of our fresh cooked to order omelet's. Safe travels and we look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Stay Here When in So Cal!
Summary: We flew into the Orange County Airport (SNA) and this hotel was minutes away.  Even better, it is 20-minutes from Newport Beach.    Ulices, at the Front Desk, even gave us a 2 pm checkout on our last day - and another round of cookies. He was very customer service oriented, as were others.    We had a king bed, and the mattress was spot-on comfortable.  Take advantage of of the Nail Spa Resort across the parking lot.  We did a pedicure the first morning before heading off to the beach.  Talk about happy feet.    Irvine is the best place to go whether doing the beach or Disneyland.  It is even close to the Factory Outlets over in Orange.
Manager Response: Dear Robert_Denise_1, Loved all your comments and so glad Ulices was able to take care of your needs. You are one of our first guests to recognize the nail and pedicure services and glad your feet are happy. Spot on with being close to entertainment, beaches and shopping. Out comfy mattresses await your next trip to Sunny So Cal. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: The Doubletree at Santa Ana was clean, quiet, and pretty. We got a great price for the Friday, Saturday, and Sunday nights that we stayed there. We look forward to using this hotel again.  Also, there are some excellent quick food restaurants just a block away which was very convenient for us.
Manager Response: Dear Seth L, We do thank you for your vote of confidence and giving us an excellent review. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: bad service, charged wrong room rate (normal rate instead of corporate rate), had to claim the reduced rate. After checking my bank account it appeared that the amount of 230 USD was not credited on my account. Had to complain about this with long waiting lines at the phone. Not very service oriented personnel in general and noisy hotel (water pipes)
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Saskia, We do apologize for the billing error. Our accounting manager did contact you yesterday letting you know that your account will be credited $231.99. This will take about 3 - 5 business days for your bank to clear the money. Once again, our sincere apologies. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Second visit - still very convenient for work near SNA
Summary: Stayed again while on business in Irvine, and again, a convenient and pleasant hotel.  Self-parking ($14/night), easy to find (unless you confuse it with the Doubletree Club down the street! D'oh!) and great staff make this a no-brainer for a business trip.  Used the fitness facility this time - smallish for the size of the property, and all cardio machines were filled up by 6:30pm.  There is a pool (didn't use it), so you could take a dunk instead i suppose.  Room service was quick and decent.  Great service.  WiFi included for HIlton Silver (maybe even without silver)!    Best of all?  Standard Doubletree warm chocolate chip walnut cookie upon arrival - which is probably why i should have spent more time in the fitness facility!
Manager Response: Dear daisyfe, Thank you so very much for your positive feedback on our property. Our staff and a "warm" Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookie await your return. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Always enjoyed my stay here except this time...
Summary: Needed to go on a unexpected trip.  Having had good experiences at the Doubletree Santa Ana many times before, I booked my four night stay, one night with Hilton points, one night with Hotel.com reward, and two nights paid.    This time, my stay was not good.  Some of the problems could not been helped but most were preventable.  I called three days before my arrival to request for an 8am check-in since I was arriving after a 5-hour red eye flight but they said to call back the day before.  I called back the day before and they said that a request would be placed on my reservation but it could not be guaranteed.  I understand that but why couldn't they done the notation on my reservation when I called three days before.    When I arrived to check into the room, it was not
Manager Response: Hello Torobster, Thank you so much for your feedback as we do appreciate. Occupancy during the last 2 weeks has been up there as there have been city wide convention's and early check-ins become extremely challenging. We also do give our guests 2 bottles of water on check-in. Possibly having 3 separate reservations for one stay confused our team. We do not have an excuse for not having our cookies ready for your consumption. Please let me know the next time you are in town and I will personally make sure we deliver those warm lovely Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies to you. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: First off, great location near South Coast Plaza Mall, Segerstrom Center for the Arts (attended an opera there--amazing facility), Newport Beach, the airport, etc. Facility itself needs some updating: room was not up DoubleTree standards. Room was poorly ventilated. Overall just seemed tired.
Manager Response: Dear Kim N, Thank you for your response and comments. Yes you are correct, the hotel is situated conveniently close to a lot of entertainment activities and also close to multiple freeways for easy access. Our ownership has recently upgraded all the guest rooms, banquet and lobby areas. If you do not mind sending me your confirmation so that I may check the room you stayed in.  I can be reached at 7144421908. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very Friendly and Helpful Front Desk!
Summary: The front desk staff is top notch. It doesn't matter what time of day you arrive or need help...they are always friendly and helpful. The cookies at check-in are always a treat!! The room was very clean and nicely appointed. The bed was comfortable and had 2 types of pillows to choose from. The hotel is in a very good location. Easy on and off the highway. I was visiting my son at Camp Pendleton and it was about a 30 min drive to the North gate on Basilone Rd. There is a fee for valet or self parking per day. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear luvtotravel, Thank you for making our front desk staff proud of what they do. We are delighted to serve and glad that you enjoyed the hotel, facilities and your room. The Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookies are always a "hit" with our Guests. Also loved your user name, and look forward to your next visit when you come down to camp Pendleton to visit your son. Mothers Day perhaps? Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Very good location. Personnel very nice, kind and helpful. Room was very clean. Excellent condition and amenities in bathrooms.Overall execellent. My family and I will gladly make reservations in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Pelusactotaro, Thank you for your kudos towards our staff and services. We do hope your future stays will lead you back to our hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Experienced a phenomenal stay during a business trip.  Quiet room with plenty of room to stretch, relax and get some work done.  Breakfast options were delicious.  Had dinner in hotel one night.  They were out of the wine I selected for my meal, but came back with a more expensive option at a lower price to compensate.  Great service.  Will definitely stay here again when I'm back in town.
Manager Response: Dear analIF7553CU, So glad you enjoyed your stay and most importantly all the food and beverage you experienced. Our food and beverage team were most excited to get your positive comments and they thank you as well. Cheers, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: Property is in a great location for easy access throughout Orange County. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Easy check in process with great staff. Excellent restaurant options on site and many more close to property. Dill definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mike H, Thank you for your very positive feedback. We love it when our guests have all good things to say about our hotel, staff and food and beverage experience. Thank you for sharing. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: I came here for two nights for an event that was on the property. The banquet food was delicious. The sleeping room was clean and quiet. The property is centrally-located, close the freeways and the beach, which was perfect for my needs. My interactions with staff were pleasant. Overall, it was a good stay. I have no major complaints, just a few minor issues. 1) The room's heater and a/c was non-existent. It only had a fan blowing. 2) They have a serious lack of parking spaces. The parking garage was full when we came in late Friday night. We took the last valet spot available. I don't know where the other three cars following behind us ended up parking. 3) This is the second time I've stayed at a Doubletree property in less than a year and both times my warm chocolate cookie
Manager Response: Hello bbaldwinl, We do appreciate your nice comments about the hotel and your stay. We will have your room checked for the AC. We do have alternate parking across the street in a garage that valet has access to. A Doubletree Cookie that is "not perfect" is not our style and thank you for bringing that up. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary: The customer service here is excellent; everyone is super nice including the room service delivery person. The room was clean and so was the bathroom. The only issue is the mildew/rust around the bathroom drain that no one wants to see when they're showering.
Manager Response: Dear missmichelleann, Thank you for your kind words appreciating all the staff and services. It really means a lot to the team. WE will definitely look at your room and make sure we get it back on track. Sincerely, Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: I was on a short business trip and found the location convenient.  I am a frequent Hilton user and found the staff friendly, the room clean, and slept great.  I would not consider the lobby warm and family friendly.  For my travel and business purposes, exactly what was needed.
Manager Response: Dear JamesJ, Thank you for your vote of confidence and that you loved staying at our hotel. We also thank you for being loyal with Hilton Hotels. Hope you are staying warm and if not, please visit us again. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary: Fabulous experience - staff are helpful, housekeeping gets to know when you get home and they clean before you get there, lovely location - the pond across the street is gorgeous, and all the room amenities you need to work are more than available.
Manager Response: Dear KathrynK, Our goal is to make our guests feel that this is their "home away from home". We are delighted you felt as such and we look forward to you visiting your home again. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary: They desperately need new mattresses.  First night the bed was so soft and lumpy I slept on pull out couch.  They moved us to another room, and the mattress was only a little better.  Staff said there was nothing they could do to fix the soft beds.
Manager Response: Dear ScottB, I do apologize that your stay did not go as expected and that the mattresses were not to your liking. Please do give me a call when you are back in our neighborhood and we will make your  stay a better one. Sincerely, Ronnie 7144421908

Summary: I have stayed here before and will stay here again. I stayed here on the way out and when I returned from a trip. They are airport close but not under the flight path, so no noisy take-off or landings. The property is clean and the people are nice. Well, okay, the driver of the van (Jesus) wanted nothing to do with helping a handicapped traveler with my luggage but he was okay. The room is spacious and had all the amenities you would expect from a Hilton property, including a super comfortable bed.  There are several dining options close by and it is close to the freeway. I would stay hear again when traveling out of Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I recently stayed at this Doubletree for the Surf City 1/2 marathon and I was blown away by how courteous and accommodating the staff was. They had valet parking, a shuttle to take us places, and when we came back from the race, all the staff members were in the lobby to cheer for us and give us cookies and water! I've never had a host hotel be that wonderful before. I love staying at a Doubletree anywhere I go, but this one was even better. The daily breakfast was fantastic, too! I have been dreaming about that fantastic blueberry muffin I had one morning....so fresh and delicious! I hope they are a host hotel next year as well because that will be the deciding factor on whether or not to run surf city again:) Thank you, everyone! You made my trip even better!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I received this hotel after booking through Hotwire. This was not our first time staying here and knew what to expect. Upon check in, the front desk clerk (sorry forgot the name) informed me Hotwire had me reserved in a king bed even though I specified 4 adults. Now, I was checking in at 1:30am on 12/31. So, you can imagine my disappointment. However, the clerk searched and checked us in a 2 queen in a handicapped room. If I didn't mind. I said perfect! The room did not disappoint. We did not stay in the room to often so this is what we wanted: Beautiful, clean, spacious, comfortable, quite, and safe environment to leave our car. The bonus was the free parking through Hotwire. Alejandra the day manager made sure that was honored.. Great customer service. Would Definitely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Unfortunately, this hotel did not meet our usual expectations or experiences of the DoubleTree brand. Room was only fair. An item was left in the room from previous traveler, indicating cleaning was not thorough or complete. Staff did not make us feel welcome or even like they cared that we stayed there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My wife and I were just finishing our little vacation to Southern California and had our flight delayed. With having to stay an additional night we chose to call the Doubletree. I am a diamond member with Hilton and this place was completely booked. Jesse, the man behind the counter, made sure that he found us a room and made me feel as if I was royalty walking in the door. While taking my vehicle to park he took it upon himself to grab my bags and take them  to our room. When I went back to the counter to give him a thank you gift, he would not have anything to do with it. He told me that I was his guest and  wanted us to be very comfortable. Jessie is the man.  I travel quite a bit and always get taken care of by the Hilton group, however this was absolutely the best stay that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Normally Good, but do not use a Room of the 2nd Floor
Summary: This Hotel is a good Hotel for Business-Travelers. But do not stay at the 2nd Floor. Very loud on different Rooms there. 3 - 7th Floor is fine. Please be aware the Elevators are very slow there. If you don't like to wait each morning choose 3rd Floor. From 7th Floor you can see the Mountains.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: I don't care for hotels that charge you for EVERYTHING
Summary: Don't get me wrong, this is a nice hotel, but you will pay for it. After paying over $175.00 for the room, one would think that there would be at least a continental breakfast or parking included?  Not on your life, unless of course you are a top tier Hilton Honors member. If you HAVE to go anywhere in the Los Angeles area and spend a night or two, I guess it gets big city expensive, but only out of corporate greed, and the desire to be like New York City... for some reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel - Shuttle Service Not As Advertised
Summary: My brother and I stayed at this hotel for business for 4 nights in January.  We traveled from the East Coast and this was our first time in Santa Ana.  We originally wanted to book at the Embassy Suites, yet was told by the Hilton reservations that it was booked, yet the DoubleTree is only 1.4 miles away and we wouldn't have to worry about renting a car since a free shuttle service is included within a 5 mile radius of the hotel and to and from the airport.  They told us there is a phone in the airport baggage claim area where we could call for the shuttle when we arrived.  We arrived late in the evening and were not able to find this mythical phone anywhere, so we called the hotel directly where we were told to walk to a different area to find the shuttle.  We found it, yet the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel by John Wayne Airport
Summary: I've stayed at the Doubletree Hotel several times, the most recent being five days in January. The location is convenient to John Wayne Airport. Like most hotels near John Wayne, they charge for parking. If you don't want to pay for parking, don't stay there - they are up front about their parking charge and I have no problem paying it. At check-in, they never bothered to acknowledge my Hilton Honors Diamond Status, and they never provided me the benefits I was supposed to receive, mostly some free bottled water. The Hilton Honors breakfast included the "continental" breakfast for free, and they will ask you to upgrade for a fee which included the hot breakfast items - bacon/sausage, scrambled eggs and potatoes. No complaints about he breakfast, it's about what you'd expect. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This hotel is great, lacks a lobby so it is a little tight when you walk in, but makes up for it with the wonderful track in the back that you can either walk or jog around.  It makes for a nice way to get your exercise in a safe environment.  The fitness center is also pretty good, however the TVs connected to the treadmills do not seem to work very well.  I ordered room service while there, and had a delicious salad that was delivered with a smile.  Great hotel and I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: The best Doubletree in the world
Summary: While certainly a beautiful facility you will be Wowed by the staff from checkin to checkout. They smile and make you feel like you own the place. We had a business meeting there and the concern, follow up and delivery of every point was flawless. The food quality was superb.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Average hotel but good value for the price
Summary: First,   The good, the room was spotless. The room was a decent size with a king sized bed, a small desk and an armchair. There were five empty electrical sockets near the desk plus two extras on the lamp on the desk. Each night stand had a lamp with two sockets. There is a good sized flat screen tv, a tiny coffee maker and large towels in the bathroom.  Booking was easy and my request for early check in was immediately given the green light, two hours ahead of the normal check in time of 3 pm.  I was on the top floor, the seventh, and facing the Main Street. From here I can hear traffic noise and numerous ambulances. The hallway door was thin and every sound is coming through. The alarm clock and the phone are on two separate night stands. I had to choose which to sleep close
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Staff needs training and rooms need updating.
Summary: This hotel was used for a wedding event.  Clerk at check-in was instructed that we needed to have all rooms on the same floor as the bridal suite which was occupied by somebody who was supposed to have checked out.  Check-in was filled with errors for our four rooms and required us moving three times to an appropriate room. Rooms could use updating and extermination.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Not a whole lot to say about this place.  The rooms are alright.  The restaurant is alright.  The staff is alright.  The location is alright.  The parking is alright.  Though it is annoying to have to take an elevator from the parking garage one level to the lobby and then walk around to the back of the hotel to get in a separate elevator to your room.  There is a small shopping area across the street with a Starbucks and a handful of restaurants.  Other than that there's nothing within walking distance but there are enough options there to eat for a couple days without having to repeat places.  This is my fall back hotel when I'm in the area and my favorite hotels are running short on rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Rosanne was extremely helpful. After an EXTREMELY annoying day, she helped me very much by ensuring to resolve my issue. Obviously the issue was not her fault but she took careful consideration of the situation and made sure that everything was fixed ASAP. I highly recommend seeing her for all your booking needs. As far as the hotel goes, I heard our clients thoroughly enjoyed their stay and said the hotel was very clean and even though we had an issue they made sure it was resolved. Thanks Rosanne. Five stars for you!   -Katherine
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Very decent hotel to saty in!
Summary: I was there for 5 day during Christmas for some family event, room was very clean, daytime staff is very nice and helpful. Starbucks was walking distance and just cross the street and the hotel shuttle took to CVS and waited for me too, that was really great and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Hotel located short 5 minute drive to SNA airport with complimentary shuttle. Check in and check out was fast and no problems. On site business center was able to print my boarding pass. Room was comfortable and clean. Wifi was free for hilton HHonors member. Hotel had some parties going on so had some loud guests during the late night but was tolerable. Will consider this hotel again when in SNA. Weekend rates affordable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My company's office just move down the street from this hotel and I'm checking out places to stay in the area. I spent one week here and basically enjoyed the stay. The rooms are nice staff and is pretty good.    I had two small problems. The shuttle was not available as promised at one point and two nights in a row room service kept trying to deliver food to me that I didn't order. Very strange.  This hotel was headed for 3 stars but I had a very good checkout experience which gave it a boost. I'll come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights in January. The hotel was a nice place to stay as far as amenities go.  The problem I had with this hotel was the 8 day hold on my credit card. Summary Heading: Nice Choice Hotel in the Area
Summary: I've stayed at quite a few hotels in the Irvine and greater Orange County airport areas, I think that this is one of the better properties for the price point.  Rooms are nice sized and in good condition.  Underground parking is very accessible and convenient.  Not overrun with meeting/convention crowd and always good front desk service.  My only criticism is the restaurant.  So many hotels have moved to healthier and more flavorful cuisine as well as grab-and-go options.  Not having self service coffee or an espresso-type bar is a draw back for me.   I also found the restaurant concept a bit dated and not as well-suited for grabbing dinner, a drink and working in the bar area as business travelers do.  The breakfast was included in my rate but it wasn't very imaginative.
