Upon checking in the staff was very polite and check in was easy since we had made prior reservations.  The room they initially gave us was not what we asked for and we were quickly provide the correct room - King bed with sofa sleeper.  The room was clean, but very humid even after adjusting the A/C unit. We used the pool and found it to be somewhat small and there were no clean towels and had to call room service for more. The towels were brought quickly by staff.  There is a $15 fee for self parking and valet parking was also available at a higher rate. Must advise that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great Location for working in Orange County
Summary: The hotel has excellent rooms on the 5th Floor. I have stayed at the Hotel 2 times in July 2014. Courteous Staff, excellent breakfast . Convenient to dinning and shopping also.  The hotel has easy access to freeways, and to the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Three of us booked rooms for the same period at the same time.  All three wound up with drastically different pricing.  The front desk informed us that the billing irregularities were due to wifi and breakfast vouchers.  However, two of us had identical bookings (including breakfast and wifi).  The hotel's breakfast left a lot to be desired given the fee--fruit, yogurt, and grocery store baked goods.  They were more than happy to upcharge for anything hot or fresh, but for the cost of the room and the limited amenities, there was really no reasonable excuse for the limitations on breakfast: especially when "breakfast included" was so prominently displayed on their booking.  The rooms were comfortable, but not exceptional; the pool was tiny and constantly smelled of natural gas;
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel with great rates and decent location
Summary: We stayed one night after going to the OC fair. The staff was very helpful on check in and valet was same price as self parking. The beds were comfortable, the toiletries were better than average, and overall we had a good night sleep. The hotel is close the the Southcoast plaza and easy to get to from the freeway. The down side... there are no microwaves in the room, the fridge was so loud we had to unplug it, the gym is only big enough for 2 people at a time, and if you need complete dark to sleep in in the morning ask for a room facing North. The only real downside to the stay was the noise of the fridge. I would stay here again and would recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Very nice lobby, nice rooms, excellent bartender.  I would have ranked this hotel higher, but the staff who worked at breakfast both days we stayed were terrible.  I found them rude and unhelpful.  I am extremely patient with staff when they are clearly busy or have lots of guests to assist in addition to myself and my family.  However, when it is my family and one other table in the restaurant, please do not act as if you do not see us.  In addition, please do not be in such a rush to breakdown the breakfast buffet 20 minutes prior to its closing time that most of the items are not kept fresh (the oatmeal had more skin on top than oatmeal on the bottom).  My advice to this property would be to re-train or replace the morning wait staff.  My other advice, give your bartender a
Manager Response: Paul,  Thank you very much for your recent review of our property. I am truly sorry that you had a negative experience in the restaurant and breakfast staff. I can assure you that I will address this with them personally to continually increase our service levels to all of our guests. Thank you also for your kind words regarding our bartender Thierry. He is a valued team member and deserves the accolades.  We hope that we can have you as our guest again when you are in the area.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: This is a wonderfully conveniently located hotel. Easy access in and out of the facility. It is close to all the great shopping, dining, and fun places to go. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful..
Manager Response: Mary,  Thank you very much for your review of our property. I am happy to hear that you find us to be conveniently located and a great value. More importantly, I appreciate your comments regarding our staff. I will be sure to pass this along to them.  We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Decent stay with a few problems
Summary: Stayed here for several nights recently.  The hotel and rooms are a little dated but otherwise fine.  Beds are comfortable - A/C was nice and cold though a bit noisy.  Mini frig in the room was nice to have.  Front desk staff was helpful at check-in and later when I needed to extend my stay for a night.    Problems - Meritage restaurant and bar is a nice space but the food is very mediocre.  Quality of breakfast buffet was not good - eggs had an awful texture and the sausage was overcooked.  Fruit didn't taste fresh -- service was average.  Parking can be a little tight at the hotel, especially if there is an event going on at night.  They might ask you to park in a nearby garage.  Also, we got stuck in an elevator one morning.  We used the phone in the elevator to notify
Manager Response: Philtay,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry for your experiences with the quality of the restaurant food and the elevator incident. The comfort and safety of our guests is our number one priority. Rest assured, I will address these issues with the staff as well as the elevator company.  We hope to welcome you back as our guest in the future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Great services, average priced food and drinks, beds comfortable, pool and whirlpool clean and well kept. Staff friendly. Shuttle drivers nice and helpful. Sad that my room did not have mini-fridge and microwave and my coffe pot was broken and did not get fixed. Bummed there was not much to do around hotel when you haven't a rental car and all is too far to walk to. Overall, enjoyed my stay in the hotel and surrounding restaurants.
Manager Response: Rebecca,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. I am truly sorry that your room did not have adequate (working) amenities during your stay. I will ensure that they are fixed for the next guest. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us overall and hope to welcome you back as our guest soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights on business. Helpful staff at checkin provide a warm cookie and a list of restaurants with the distance from the hotel. Had a room facing the front - better off facing the back if street noice or lights from the street bother you. The hotel has a decent restaurant for breakfast and had a business dinner here as well. Small outdoor pool on the second floor is a pleasant retreat with lounge chairs. My room was spotless and the bed was comfortable with higher end linens. Great water pressure in the shower was a surprise given the drought situation. Onsite parking garage with easy access  via the room key was a big plus. This is a convenient location for business in Irvine and minutes away from Santa Ana airport. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: MToro,  Thank you for your recent review of our hotel. I am pleased that you enjoyed the amenities that we offer and that the staff was helpful. I will be sure to share your comments with the team and hope to have you back as our guest in the near future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Not bad if you are on business
Summary: I have stayed here around 10 times and the cookies are great but the rooms tired a little and the layout is just so so.  It is not easy to find even though it should be given how close it is to the airport.  I have no complaints as it is in my OK bin of places I wills stay for one or two nights max
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Came here for a saturday night.   This is the first time I have been at any hotels from DoubleTree.  The hotel was clean and all staff was friendly and professional.  The bed , room & bathroom was sufficient, no problems in any form.  They offered fresh cookies when I checked in, that was a little surprise treat.  There is a Starbucks in walking distance, so that is a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This is the 2nd year I've had the pleasure of working with the staff at this Doubletree.  Last year it was out of necessity and I was dreading having to book a hotel so far from our event location.  However, Monty Criss & his team jumped on it and did whatever they could to make it a pleasant experience.   This year, we also booked so far away due to necessity but I was truly looking forward to working with this team again. They go above and beyond my expectations when it comes to customer service and making sure that everything is in place and ready for our stay.   For our event, we require rooms for approximately 100 teenagers and 20 chaperones.  Since the teens don't arrive at the hotel until 10 pm, we send a member of our team to the hotel at 3 pm to check everyone in and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We regularly stay at this hotel when visiting Orange County. It is centrally located for our needs. The facilities and guest rooms are first rate. The staff has always been courteous and professional. The breakfast buffet is a good value. And we love the cookies! Best of all, it is sometimes possible to catch a good rate for weekends or non-peak days.
Manager Response: John,  Thank you so much for your review of your experiences at our hotel. I am pleased to hear that we have been your "Home away from home" when in the area. I will be sure to share your  sentiments with the staff.  We look forward to having you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Although I made room reservations in April 2014, our rooms were not available until almost 4PM on the day of arrival (check-in time is advertised as 3PM).  There was no sense of urgency or apologies from the front desk for the inconvenience.  The free breakfast was enjoyable, although nearly identical each morning.  Housekeeping was good, but it was odd when on the first day, our toiletries (i.e., dental floss, comb, brush, etc.) had been laid out on washcloths on the bathroom counter.  I assume it was a thoughtful gesture, but a bit unnerving that a stranger handled our personal items before/after cleaning the room. Note: My overall rating is "Average"; however, I would have chosen "Good" if it were available.  "Very good" would have been a stretch.
Manager Response: Stephanie,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay with us. I truly apologize that the rooms were not ready at the 3pm check-in time and more importantly that you did not feel urgency from the staff. I have already addressed the situation with our Housekeeping and Front Office teams to ensure they respond accordingly. Our Housekeeping team does work hard to add special touches to the room and they do place toiletries on a clean washcloth for all of our guests. It is not our intention to make you uncomfortable in any way and apologize if it made you feel that way.  We do hope to welcome you back to our hotel soon  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient for a night near SNA
Summary: Second time staying here - very convenient location near the Orange County Airport.  Room is fine, staff is friendly and helpful.  Efficient check in/check out.  Room was ok, not many dining options near the hotel on a Sunday night.  Room service was ok.  Service was fine.  Paying for internet remains an annoyance with Doubletree properties, but they give you a cookie, so it's a wash.  One minor caution:  There are three Doubletree hotel properties that provide shuttle service from SNA.  Know which one you're staying at before you call for a shuttle.  We called, waited 30 minutes, and had to call again.  Something got dropped, but we were eventually retrieved, and delivered to the hotel after a 40 minute wait.
Manager Response: Daisyfae,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay with us. We strive to be the choice of travelers in the area and appreciate the kind words about the staff. I do apologize for any miscommunication regarding the shuttle service from the airport. I will most definitely ensure proper communication is maintained.  Thanks again and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, clean hotel. I try to book a room here when we go to Disneyland since it's within driving distance. Great room rate, cannot beat the customer service here and the quiet location. The rooms are very clean, up to date. They have a small pool on the second floor and a nice gym to use. Few places to eat nearby, parking Is $15 but it makes sense since the rates are very competitive.
Manager Response: Carlos,  Thank you very much for the positive review of your recent stay with us!!I will be sure to pass on your comments to the staff. I am glad you were able to enjoy the proximity to Disneyland and the quiet location.  We look forward to having you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Stayed for one night on business, and found the hotel very friendly and convienent to Santa Ana and South Coast Plaza Mall.  The staff at breakfast were very friendly, and I have never had a problem with special requests at the restaurant.  The room was very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Lizziebill,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay with us. I am thrilled to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and flexible with special requests. I will be sure to pass on your comments to the entire team.  We look forward to having you as our guests again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: dont stay here, THERE'S BETTER HOTEL IN THE AREA
Summary: employees in the restaurant, front desk and the manager are rude. manager even argued about the issue of  complementary breakfast and i want to stay somewhere elses since he's doesnt care and rude, he even suggested me to stay else which really pisses me off. total RUDE.. will never stay here again. AND  I THINK BEING A GOLD MEMBER IS NOTHING FOR THEM.
Manager Response: Kanill,   We’re sorry we didn’t provide you the high quality of service that you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel (especially Hilton HHonors Members) and your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we value your business. We would love having you as a guest and hope you’ll give us another opportunity soon to make your stay the best it can be.   Kind Regards, Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Very clean, and it was a nice romantic getaway, I asked them to decorate my room with rose pedals and birthday signs and they did an amazing job! there is nothing bad i can really say about this hotel.
Manager Response: Susana,  Thank you very much for your kind review of your recent stay with us!! I am so glad to hear that the staff took care of your requests and created a wonderful memory for you!! I will be sure to pass this on to the team.  Thanks again and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: this airport hotel does not offer any morning coffee in the lobby and the dining room does not open until 6 am no coffee for early morning flights.  fitness room is the size of shoe box with limited fitness equipment  rooms are nice and comfortable.
Manager Response: Joseph,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay. I truly value your feedback and appreciate your business. We are always willing to be flexible and meet the needs of our guests, as such you can now receive coffee in the early morning prior to your flight. I do hope we can welcome you back again soon.  Kind Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Pros +good room w amenities +staff super nice, even the concierge and parking staff +courtesy shuttle +love the cookie-:)  Cons -parking fees -Internet fees  Summary The additional fees would deter me from booking a room, unless the rates are low! Unless I can figure out a way to use the shuttle better, the parking fees are a rip-off.
Manager Response: Xenoglosophilic,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I appreciate your kind review of some of the amenities and more importantly our biggest asset...our staff!! I will be sure to pass the sentiment along to them. I am sorry that the extra fees would deter you from staying with us again in the future. We do offer many different packages online that include Internet and parking and you can find them at our hotel website. You can also sign up with Hilton HHonors and enjoy the many benefits of being an HHonors member, such as Internet, parking and breakfast.  I do hope we can have you as our guest again in the future!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Very nice accommodations.  Everyone very friendly. The women cleaning the rooms were great and very accommodating.  Went for a wedding where we all stayed.  They were able to put us all together except for the last minute guest.
Manager Response: Lisa,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property on Tripadvisor! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed  your stay and the event was a success!! I will be sure to pass along your comments regarding our staff.  Thanks again and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: The rooms are super nice and the staff is friendly.  If you're lucky, you'll get a room on the side with a good view!    Valet is available for $19 or you can park your vehicle in the deck downstairs for free.  The Meritage Restaurant has a great little bar scene, especially if you are traveling on business.  Food there is good too.
Manager Response: Margaret,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear that you have enjoyed your time with us!! I will be sure to pass along your comments to the team here. Keep your eye open in the restaurant and bar as we are upgrading our menu selections in the coming months.  We hope to have you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I've been coming here for about 7 years for regular business trips. The service has improved tremendously in the past year. The rooms are always clean. The restaurant is pretty good (I preferred the previous menu). Thierry (the bartender) is one of the best in the business.
Manager Response: Robert,  First and foremost, THANK YOU for your loyalty to our hotel and Hilton Worldwide!! We appreciate the kind words about your time with us. As the new General Manager of this property, I appreciate the kind words. I will be sure to pass along your sentiments to the staff and their service improvements!! We do love the service and attention that Thierry gives to your guests and look forward to many more years with him. We are also currently looking into options and changing the menu to meet all of our guests needs so keep an eye out for future changes.  Thanks again and I look forward to meeting you the next time you are staying with us!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: We had an extra night to spend in the area Friday so we decided on Santa Ana because of the proximity to So. Coast Plaza, theaters and good restaurants. We were impressed by the hotel, it's rooms and wonderful beds.  It turned out we didn't have to go out for dinner. The hotel has a fantastic restaurant, great food and staff. We ordered food not on the menu and the chef was gracious enough to make a special dish. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: M3K1,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay with us!! I am happy to hear that you were able to stay in the area and enjoy the surrounding attractions. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant and that we were able to accommodate your requests. Our chef is currently in the process of updating the menu, so hopefully we can welcome you back again soon to sample and enjoy new dishes.  Thanks again  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: My flight was delayed coming in so I was not at the hotel all that long.  I checked in around 2am and left by 9am.  The desk staff was very nice.  And my room was nice and it was big as I was upgraded.  It seemed pretty nicely located.
Manager Response: RovingCOO,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay and more importantly, thanks for staying with us. I will be sure to pass along your comments to the staff. I do hope that we can welcome you back in the future and you can enjoy some of the amenities the hotel and surrounding area have to offer.   Thanks again.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Nice room, comfortable bed (most important), and staff was very friendly.  Great place to stay close to John Wayne Airport (Santa Ana).  Access to hotel is easy and you can self park or valet.  I recommend valet as it is very convenient and is only a few bucks more that self park.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay with us. I am glad that you found our location to be easily accessible and comfortable. Thank you for your kind words about the staff at the hotel as I feel they are our biggest asset. We hope to have you as our guest again soon  Regards, Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: My family needed a place to stay on a Saturday night for my nephew's wedding. The bride and groom got a very good rate for anyone attending the wedding but it turned out that our AAA rate was even better. We were able to get an early check-in to freshen up and have lunch before the wedding. The staff was helpful and polite throughout our visit. There are plenty of places to eat within walking distance. We ate onsite and had cocktails at the bar. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive review of our property. I am glad that you enjoyed the time here and it sounds as though the wedding was a success!! We look forward to having you as our guest soon.

Summary: We reserved a block of rooms for family and friends for my daughter's wedding and everyone thoroughly enjoyed their stay at the hotel. The rooms were nice with all amenities;the restaurant served excellent food; we used the shuttle service and it was prompt and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your recent stay at our hotel. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed some of the many amenities we have to offer. We look forward to having you as our guest in the near future.

Summary: Me and my girlfriend like to get away for a day once a week and this is the perfect opportunity.  Weekend prices can't be beat.  We love the free cookies and sometimes we ask for some at checkout which they gladly oblige.  This is our go-to hotel and I highly recommend it if you want to just have a nice weekend getaway from everyone else.
Manager Response: Darrell,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am very happy to hear that we can be your "getaway" place of choice. We will be happy to welcome you back anytime!!  Thanks again!!  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Me and my husband got a great deal at this hotel through priceline. We stayed 2 nights and had a great experience.  The parking for check in is very small.  It's a little roundabout in front of the hotel but we got lucky and all the cars were leaving as we arrived.  Check in was simple and quick and we were given 2 of their warm, delicious cookies while checking in. They were exactly what we needed after a 4 hour drive and one of the best cookies we've ever had. We were fortunate and ended up getting a corner suite. We had double the views of the city and airport from the room which was beautiful, especially at night. The room was spotless! Very spacious, warm and inviting. The bed was very comfortable and clean. The bathroom was well stocked with towels and basic toiletries. I
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your recent stay with us. I am glad that you enjoyed our delicious Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookies...we agree, they ARE the best cookies ever!! We do have several different room types in the hotel and most without the connecting door and keep checking our website for great deals throughout the year. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.

Summary: Wonderful !! Very Clean and relaxing. I will always choose Double Tree. My first stay and for now on this is the hotel I will look for. Thanks. It felt like home away from home. Did not want to get out of my comfy bed to catch my shuttle to the airport. Had stayed in a previous hotel for 4 days before coming here and this was much cheaper and much nicer. Very Clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us I am so happy to hear that you have found your "home away from home." We will be happy to welcome you back when you are in the area!!

Summary Heading: Balmy palm trees wafting breezes over swimmers
Summary: This hotel registered our conference attendees at a special rate. We still had the Hilton signature excellent beds, linens, room accouterments, and dining. I want to commend the bartender for recognizing my lost item and keeping it for me. The service for conferencing was also stellar. Breakfast and lunch were quickly served and soiled items removed quietly -the staff should be recognized. Evening were gorgeous there. My only critique was the price of dining in the hotel-I could not afford it. There are places within a mile that were much less expensive.  Thank you for the gorgeous pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The King suite room for the price cannot be beat. Doubletree concentrated on the things that REALLY matter like.....closet space, drawers, size of bathroom and vanity area (2 master bathrooms in suite!) actual hot water, and good water pressure. Plus, mattress was very comfortable.  Doubletree....I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I booked the double tree to host my school's semi-annual awards banquet, and everything was perfect from beginning to end! They have a great event manager, Angeline, and the staff for the day of the event is absolutely amazing in regards to how helpful and nice they are! We will definitely be going back to them for the Fall semester banquet!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about our staff and especially Angeline..All of us at the Doubletree Santa Ana Orange County Hotel appreciate you giving us a wonderful five star rating and we look forward to having you back for your next banquet.

Summary Heading: Clean but terrible food and no free internet
Summary: the hotel was very clean and nice but no free internet and the food in the restaurant was awful!! i mean the most disgusting food I have ever had. The cookies are a nice touch though. I fly into John Wayne 3-4 times a month and I was hoping this could be my hotel to stay at because it is a relatively good price but the food and internet will keep me away.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about our Doubletree Santa Ana Airport Hotel and that it was very clean and great cookies.  We do take pride in the food in the restaurant so I'm very concerned it did not meet your expectations and thank you for letting us know.  Please let me know personally the next time you come in and I let me take care of your breakfast....we get many compliments about our buffet and fresh bake goods we make fresh every morning and we do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed a total of 2 nights with the family. Really wish they had breakfast. We asked for a rollaway bed but because the rooms are narrow there is no room for one and it would be a fire hazard..bummer. They do charge $15 (self park) or $19 valet..this is California. I have to admit the cookies are delicious but I do prefer Embassy Suites up the road....more room & a quality breakfast. We are going back at the end of May and I already have embassy booked.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This is a great hotel.  Staff very pleasant, especially the restaurant staff.  I recommend this hotel highly.  Hotel is in a perfect spot near John Wayne airport.  Close to everything.  Perfect for the business traveler and the family on vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five stars rating for our Double Tree Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel by John Wayne Airport.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: This is very comfortable hotel, super clean and very well located. Front desk service is very friendly. This hotel offers complementary shuttle service from John Wayne airport. shuttle driver friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I just organized a business event at this hotel and the week went by seamlessly.  Our hotel organizer and the entire hotel staff was friendly and extremely accommodating.  I highly recommend the DoubleTree Santa Ana for both personal and business events.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The rooms are clean, and the beds are about as comfortable as you'll find anywhere. Have stayed here several times now and the only point of irritation is the $15/night parking fee. We usually get the breakfast buffet included with our room rate so that takes some of the sting out of the parking fee.  The buffet by the way is really good.  A diverse assortment of warm and cold choices.  Eggs are always done well considering how buffet scrambled eggs usually look and taste. The fresh pastries are also hard to pass up. We'll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write an excellent review of our Doubletree Santa Ana Orange County Airport hotel....We do take pride in our clean rooms and all of our beds are new so that is why it was so comfortable.  We take pride in not on our clean rooms but our food and you obviously noticed that we bake our pastries from scratch here every morning before you come to breakfast.  Thank you again and we will look forward to serving you again soon!

Summary: I can't believe this hotel charges $15 a day for parking. I booked thru hotwire and got a discounted rate. I don't think they should charge for parking if you book thru hotwire. The hotel is nice, beds are comfortable. There is a lot of restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Had a fantastic stay from start-to-finish. Friendly and helpful staff, clean and comfortable rooms, exactly what I needed for this trip. A little more expensive than I would normally pay for a hotel, but I got what I paid for and have no regrets about staying here. 10/10 would visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Good location with good access to the highway system, John Wayne Airport within 10 min.  Rooms are clean and well appointed - friendly and helpful staff.  Good restaurant with bar offering a nice variety of food - well prepared, and priced right.  Overall great value - prices were a big plus as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Very nice stay at the Double Tree Santa Ana, stayed here for a convention at the OC, nice and close. Good front desk service, nice beds, nice room and bathroom. Many options for meals outside of the hotel close by. I would stay here again but self parking is a bit high at $15.00 per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Pool Just for Kids to Splash Around
Summary: The hotel is relatively new and the parking is under the hotel for a fee.  The bed was comfortable and it was great for a place to stay on business.  My only disapointment is that the pool was maybe 20-25 feet and it looked biger in the photos.  It was not a lap pool.  It also looked like there was deck in the photos, but really just room for 1-2 chairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Came for a competition and rooms were decent.  Was a little warm in morning but a/c did kick in.  Temp was fine otherwise.  Breakfast buffet had 2 price levels (hot/cold), food ok, restaurant service was fair.  Location is good for Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Pleasant and Helpful Staff; Comfortable Room and Bedding
Summary: Upon arrival, a second staff member came out to ensure I didn't have to wait behind another patron.  A fresh, hot cookie was offered.  The valet allowed me to leave the car in the roundabout so I could take my luggage to the room.  When there was no self parking available, the night valet took car of the car for the same rate as self-parking.  Upon check out, the desk clerk made sure my not having the parking ticket was taken care of with the valet.  The room was clean and comfortable, and the bedding was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My brother was getting married and we booked this hotel because it was near the wedding site. We did not want to have to commute back to LA. We arrived 3hrs prior to check in and requested early check in, they were very accommodating and got us up to our room in ten minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: spent over 30 nites here.. comfy stay.. i like their shuttle service !!  They do give warm welcome to their guests with their signature cookie.........min 200 chars needed, so all the dots :)..............thank you !!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My apartment was under small renovation at the time. I booked some place for one night near by work so I didn't have to locate as far. Summary Heading: Very nice stay except for the fire alarm
Summary: We were here for 3 nights.  Airport shuttle arrived quickly, driver was friendly.  Quick check-in, love the cookies!  Our first night around 12:30a, the building fire alarm blared that an emergency was detected in the building and we needed to leave by the stairwell.  The alarm is extremely loud as it should be, and repeats.  My husband and I couldn't hear each other over the alarm, so we dressed hurriedly and headed for the stairs.  I assumed (and hoped) it was a false alarm, but I was shocked that we encountered only one other guest in the hallway and in our trek down the 7 flights of stairs.  The alarm stopped before we made it outside, where there were maybe five other guests.  That was it.  A car pulled up, and out stepped a pizza delivery man who headed into the lobby.

Rental car service onsite which is handy and not to expensive given the service and area.  Room quality and room service is good.   Couple of peeves, was trying to get something to drink and put in the room fridge.   $2 soda machines very poor.   Have to pay for nearly every service, parking, internet, breakfast and at $125 and up room rate this is not typical of other hotels.  Breakfast is great and well worth $15 but no free internet ??

Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with and glad you loved the bed (all of them are brand new) and the large TV's in the rooms..We wanted to apologize to you for the challenge with the Hot Water, the day you stayed one of our boilers went down and we didn't have enough hot water. Summary: No hot water, elevator not in working order (stopped Fire dept rescued at 12:40 am ) Front desk hung up when called from elevator stated "Broken elevator not his problem " After release from elevator no holtel personnel helped any guest . Hot tub when jets turned on shot out dirty water. Manager could not be found to address any issues
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apology for the problems you encountered during your stay with us in New Year. There is no excuse for incidents you have outlined in your comment such as no hot water, front desk hanging up when called from elevator and dirty water in hot tub. Your comments have been shared with the Associates and Managers here for immediate corrective action. Although we disappointed you in this instance, your experience does not, in any way, represent the level of prompt service we provide to all of our guests on a daily basis. Unfortunately, there were over 16 guests in the Elevator despite a visible sign that clearly indicated capacity of maximum 9 guests which caused the Elevator to breakdown. Once again, there is no excuse to have these types of incidents affecting our valued guests such as you. I sincerely hope you will allow us an opportunity to be of your service in the future.

Summary: The elevators were so slow...it was crazy. New motors and ops software in order. We waited up to five minutes for a 7 story building.  The rooms were ok....the lobby was nice....communication was ok but could be better.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments in Trip Advisor. We are truly sorry that you were inconvenienced due to our slow Elevators. I am happy to inform you that we are in the middle of complete modernization and upgrade to both of our Guest Elevators. Upon completion of this modernization project we expect the Elevators to be modern, efficient and lot faster. In addition to the Elevator upgrade we are also working on several other upgrades to our product and facility throughout 2014. We look forward to welcoming you back to Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana the next time your travel brings you this way.

Summary Heading: Another great stay, this time with family.
Summary: It's my second time staying in this hotel, first time was a conference and this time was a family vacation. Same good service and clean room, good breakfast and they were very helpful with the my packages I shopped from Amazon which were all waiting for me when I arrived, with no charge (I know other hotels charge for having stuffs delivered to the hotel).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Needed a hotel for 1 night near Santa Ana Airport and Double Tree was perfect.It was nearby, impeccably clean and well appointed. It was within walking distance to restaurants since it was a holiday and hotel restaurant was closed but open for breakfast . Service was attentive in both hotel and restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Chicken Noodle Soup...Made to Order for a Sick Traveler
Summary: Most people probably know Double Tree for the mouth-watering, delectable chocolate chip cookies offered at check-in.  After my experience, I hope this particular location is remembered for great, personable customer service.  Despite a HUGE conference which limited available dinner menu options, Roberto had chicken noodle soup prepared especially for me, a very sick traveler.  Thank you Roberto & Double Tree for great cookies & delicious soup!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Excellent location.  Very attentive staff.  Room was perfect, clean and very comfortable.  This is a frequent destination and we will stay here every time in the future. Wi-Fi was flawless and TV was a very large Hi-Def with a large selection of channels. Self parking was $15 per night, but it is a secure underground garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I visited Santa Ana last week and stayed at  Doubletree Santa Ana on MacArthur. I must say, it is an impressive location.    My family and I came down to visit Disneyland, and we had some issues because some extra family members (7 of them) came to join in the trip. You could probably guess how stressful that was. We had to move our reservation, and were concerned that we would lose our deposit. One of the managers, Skyler, was very helpful in getting our reservations switched and helping us through the entire process. When we arrived, Gloria held our hand and made us feel at home. I appreciate all the help your staff gave us and am looking forward to the next time we come to Southern California. We will definitely stay at your location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The best hotel in Anaheim ! We traveled here during Christmas with 2 young children and were very impressed with the quality of service we received, we enjoyed the beds so much and the decor was gorgeous. The ONLY issue is that parking is 15$ a day! I wish it had been a little less or waived for guests staying 2 or more nights or something. It just adds up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: the most comfortable beds ever!!! The beds and pillows are so soft and clean. Very fresh! The romms are big and very clean. The food was great. Our Employees booked this hotel due to the location (right down the street from work) but a great location as it is close to the beach and many restaurants if you do not choose to dine at the hotel. But...the food here is great. Would recomend this to everyone who want a very wonderful stay for business or pleasure. Book it here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed on business for 4 days; This in not the 1st DblTree I have stayed in, but Loved my stay so much I have become a HHonors member.  This is the cleanest hotel;my Room was kept spotless by very hard working housekeeping.  My only issue - No Free in Room WiFi.  It was in the lobby and business center, but going there daily just to check the internet was not very convo. Charge of $9 bucks a day just to check email in the room was not acceptable. Business Center was useful as an alternative.  Starbucks across street also has Free WiFi, so grab a coffee in the AM and get busy there.  restaurants in close walking distance, nice since I had no car on this trip. Seemed to be a clean safe area.  Bus service. Close to freeway entrance and airport shuttle only takes about 10 minutes to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Upon checking in, guess receiving warm cookies from the hotel staff. The room was nice and plenty of space for a couple.  Parking is being charged for $15 although the sign states $17 for overnight stayed. The area surrrounding hotel is a quiet neighborhood with few shops and a gas station around the corner.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Great rooms. Great rates.Great staff.The big let down is the breakfast buffet. Luke warm food at best and I don't know what those yellow things were, they said they were scrambled eggs, but I'm not sure. I did talk tho the front desk and the response was " I will make a note of it". Not the customer service I would expect from Doubletree.
Manager Response: Your comments regarding the poor quality of food at breakfast buffet and front desk response were very disturbing to me as they certainly do not represent the quality of service we have proudly built our reputation. I can assure you that we have taken immediate steps to ensure that other guests do not encounter similar issues. Please accept my sincere apologies for not living up to our usual high level of service and quality of food.

Summary Heading: I had a very Pleasant Experience
Summary: I recently visited this hotel for business and I had a great experience. I was greeted by a friendly staff. At reception I was greeted by Joel Aguilar. He checked me in very quickly. He was also very thoughtful. I let him know that it was my birthday so he had a small cake sent over to my room with a happy birthday card signed by the front desk staff. I was also handed a warm cookie which was very nice. I was very satisfied with my room. It  was very clean and there where no bedbugs. The area is also very quite at night. They have a complementary shuttle service which is very convenient when traveling. Overall, I was one happy guy! I definitely recommend staying at this hotel if you are in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stayed at a room that was set up for hearing impaired persons for the rate quoted.  I am not sure if there were service dogs that stayed in the same room in the past, but I had bug bites on my feet when I sat on the sofa.  The bed was very soft on one side and firm on the other.  My room had two queen-sized beds and both beds seemed to have the same issues.  I woke up with back pain three days in a row.  I would expect better mattresses from a Double Tree Hotel.  I would not recommend this hotel to my business associates or friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments and provide us with your feedback. It seems that everything that could go wrong during your visit, did go wrong and for that I offer my profound apologies. While we attempt to instill the importance of absolute accuracy in room assignment, once in a great while situation may arise whereby guests may be assigned to a room which may not be of their preference. Clearly, a comfortable clean bed is a fundamental service you should expect at any Hotel. I want you to know that we do have a program of regular mattress rotation as well as box springs inspection. I am pleased to let you know that we have just replaced majority of the mattresses and remaining mattresses are scheduled to be replaced in the 1st quarter of 2014. We also have Pest Control Company that is certified and does monthly inspection of our guest rooms and back of the house area to insure we have no bed bug issues. Please be assured that the comfort of our guests is of primary importance to us. I sincerely hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you whenever your travel brings you to this area

Summary: Doubletree is typically a step up from Garden Inn, which is part of why I expect to pay a bit more for the Doubletree room.  In this case, this particular location is not a step up from the Garden Inn.  As another reviewer mentioned, this hotel needs updating.  My room was small and overlooked a roof with mechanicals...no big deal except my cellphone signal was almost nil.  Valet parking is $15.00 a night, which seems excessive for this location, particularly with the room at $129 a night.  Soup and salad (no drink) came to $29.00 with room service charges.  The location simply isn't worth the expense.  In addition, my room was not ready upon my check in - at 4:30.  The stay wasn't horrible, just not what I expect from Hilton.  I loved that I was able to get to the airport
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed in this hotel many times. Clean room and good services.Very convenient for business traveler. There is a shuttle bus service if you do not have rental car. Will continue to stay in this hotel if I visit the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We often stay at this location, always nice. This is the first time we experienced something unpleasant. There was quite a bit of hair in the bath tub. Like I said, the first time of many, all other stays were absolutely great!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback concerning your recent stay at our Hotel. I can understand how disappointed you must be to find hair in the bath tub. There is certainly no excuse for this type of oversight. Please be assured that your comment has been shared with the staff and steps have been taken to prevent such type of recurrence. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Chocolate chip cookies when you check in!!
Summary: I enjoyed this hotel. Great staff, nice rooms, good breakfast buffet and of course, those cookies. Convenient shuttle to the airport. Property is kept up nicely. I would  definitely stay here again. Great business hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Fine place for an unexpected crash
Summary: After our flight was cancelled and rescheduled, we decided to stay here for the night. Restaurant was just ok (great service, food just ok) but the rooms were clean, shower had great pressure, bed was fine. Airport shuttle was fast. I imagine if you're on a business trip, it would be good for a business traveler.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This Doubletree was well maintained and served a quality breakfast.  It also had a gift shop which was perfect as I had forgotten my razor and needed to buy that and shaving cream.  I did not check out the pool but I saw there was one.  Parking was comped for guests and because I had booked at another Hilton property that had to relocate me due to flooding, they gave me a free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Made a trip to the area for Thanksgiving. Fortunately this Hotel wasn't too occupied and I was able to grab a room in short notice. Arrived and was able to check in immediately Staff was friendly, check in was expedient and the warm cookie was a perfect touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Lauren and Joel were very professional and tentative during my stay. All of my questions were answered in a timely manner and it was made to feel right at home. Will definitely be staying here again due to outstanding customer service and cleanliness
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We recently spent the weekend at this property and had a very good stay!  Friendly staff, clean and nicely furnished.  Adequate fitness room, outdoor small pool and spa.  Our normal hotel routine of trying to find and fight over the best hotel pillow was thrown off by SIX FABULOUS pillows on our very comfy king bed!  Stopped by the hotel bar for after dinner wine and appetizer, finding a very friendly and engaging bartender and a some nice wine selections. Added cost for parking,  but it is underground and conveniently connected to the hotel lobby by elevator.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Our room was very comfortable, neat and clean.  The staff was friendly, as well as the restaurant personnel.  The hotel was centrally located to our main destination, and to other locations we wanted to visit, which made it easier to get to from each of them, and was right near the main highway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The hotel staff was friendly, the room was extremely clean and the food/amenties were wonderful.  The location was also very convenient to my work location.  I will definitely stay at this hotel again in the future and will recommend to friends, family and co-workers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Where do I start? I can't say enough about the "Dynamic Duo" that consist of Monty Criss and Jacqueline Um.  They are a great team!  Together they made our Leadership meeting a huge success!  Not only did they display a great sense of urgency to meet all of our needs they did it with grace and professionalism that is par none.  They set the bar in this industry where expectations are very high.  We will definitely be using their facility for future endeavors.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Everything at this Hotel was great.  The food service and quality was fab.  I really liked our room as the bed was awesome.  Their staff all the way around was so warm and friendly.  I would stay at this facility again in a heart beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Best hotel bartendar I have ran across in many trips.  Terry made everyone feel welcome and if you came in alone he got you involved in the conversation with other guests. Very reasonable prices for the room and restaurant considering the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The room was an end-of-trip room near the John Wayne Airport.  It was nice and it was clean.  The front desk attendant was OK and the restaurant was OK.  Jesus drove us to the airport in the shuttle and he was the best part.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Hotel was very clean and parking was easy. Lobby staff was friendly and helpful.  The rooms were a bit strange. The bathroom door was in the way when entering/exiting the room.  There was no coffee available for guests in the morning other than purchasing it in the restaurant, and they were not happy to get you a cup to-go. Even though it cost almost $4.00!  I learned to take the short walk to Starbucks.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write your comments. We are glad to hear that you found the hotel to be clean and staff very friendly and helpful.  We are truly sorry to hear that you had challenges in getting coffee at the restaurant. For the convenience of our guests We do provide coffee in the rooms with to go cups. We hope to have the honor of serving you again should your travel brings you back to city of Santa Ana.

Summary: Seemed the hotel was a tad old and could have a bit of up keep. The heating/cooling system in the hotel was noisy and disturbed my sleep on more than one occasion. The beds were nice and the service was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I visited the Doubletree hotel of Santa Ana for a family member's wedding. The staff was great, the room was emaculate, however, I  noticed that I was charged a holding fee before I arrived. I contacted the hotel and was told it was just until I arrived and it would be credited back to my account. After my check out and after allowing them time to correct the problem, after a week, I am still waiting on them to credit this amount back to me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Clean, easy to stay, very accommodating staff. Restaurant ok, just not exceptional service or food. Bar and bartender are outstanding, as are the bellmen/shuttle drivers.  Very convenient to Orange County (Santa Ana) Airport.  Rooms are clean, modern and quiet. Starbucks right across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We arrived early and were able to get early check-in.  The pull out sofa bed wasn't the most comfortable, but most of them aren't.  We called the front desk to see what could be done to make it more comfortable, they sent someone up with extra blankets and that added some padding to the mattress and made it more comfortable.  The regular bed was very comfortable and the room was spacious and clean.  The bathroom did not have a vent fan in it, so the room got very hot and humid after a few people took showers.  Otherwise, everything was great.  We ate breakfast at the hotel restaurant and it was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We had an issue while making our reservation, so the reservation agent said they would put in an upgrade request. When we checked in, we mentioned the request and they said that they have put us on the "executive floor." Thinking this room would be nice and spacious, we were sorely disappointed when we opened the door. The room was small and very basic. Also, a few lights didn't even work. The view was of the freeway and a parking structure. The pool is very small and they charge you $15.00 per night to park there. Ridiculous.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comment concerning your recent stay at our Hotel. I would like to offer my sincere apology for the less than enjoyable stay you expereinced at our Hotel. I truly appreciate your concern, interest and the extra time you have taken to bring these matters to our attention. Your comments are well taken and shared with our Associates as we continue to enhance our services and products. I hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the near future.

Summary: This is the best hotel in America.  Beautiful rooms, lobby, and a great restaurant!  But best of all, the greatest staff in the world.  I visit this hotel approximately 3 times a year, and everyone there always remembers me by name.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Family was looking for a quick weekend get away. Some Contruction in the lobby - not a big deal. Overall stay was great. Friendly housekeeping staff. Pool was small but my boys loved it! We like this hotel and will be back hopefully soon.    Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We at ASQ Orange Empire have had a long term relationship with the Doubletree, Santa Ana.  Our 7-8 years has been a true partnership.  However, today Angeline Abrena and Monty Criss have made our life a little easier.  We have a major biennial conference schedule for November 1st with a guarantee of 225 participants.  Despite 3 months of marketing, and a sell out two years ago, we probably will significantly miss our guarantee.  After pleading our case, Angelina and Monty offered a compromise to lessen the impact of potentially missing our guarantee.   Awesome customer partnering and relationship management.  Dave Nagy ASQ Orange Empire Program Chair and former Chairman
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I've stayed here multiple times on business and always have a great experience, especially for the price.  Gym is small and light on equipment, but otherwise it's a fantastic place to stay.  Much better than the "doubletree club" across the street!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I was pretty happy with my stay in this hotel.  The rooms were clean and it was in a fairly safe area.  I always worry, when I book a hotel, that it's going to be in a bad part of town.  As far as hotel stays go, this was pretty average.  There is no microwave or fridge in the room though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Double Tree HIlton SAnta Ana not worth the tariff
Summary: Will not recommend this hotel; some of the staff are very nice. The hotel is over-priced;the lifts are too slow. The lobby is unimpressive. Food very average. The muffins are awful but their cookies are the best we have had in the US. GO some place else.
Manager Response: Thank for taking the time out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. It is our goal to consistently provide the highest quality in both products and service, and it is vital to our continued success to know when we have fallen short of our own high standard. We have just retained an Elevator company to upgrade/ modernize our elevators and expect to have this project completed before the end of the year. We have a new Executive chef who is in the process of upgrading our breakfast as well as revamping our menu. I sincerely hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you in the near future.

Summary: Great hotel, great service, friendly staff. Presented with two warm cookies at check-in. Had a King Suite, which is essentially just two hotel rooms with a connecting door, in one room it had a table, sofa/lounge area, and the other room was a standard room. It was nice because we had two bathrooms and closets in the suite. Just minutes away from John Wayne Airport, and about a 15 minute drive to Disneyland. Hotel did not charge me for parking which is good, I would have sort of felt ripped off if they charged me for parking, given that the parking lot under the hotel was literally empty throughout my entire stay. Would definitely stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Everything was good except that fact that there was no free wifi. That's very important for me when I go on a business trip. So I won't be staying at your hotel again.   And 2 of the days we did not have hot water.
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback. Please accept my sincere apology for the hot water issue. I can assure you that this was an isolated incident as we have 2 boilers and have not had any challenges with the hot water. Your suggestion of making WiFi  complimentary is well taken and will be reviewed as we continue to enhance our services. Thank you and hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you whenever your travel brings you to this area.

Summary: The stay was pleasant overall as the service desk personnel were enthusiastic in dealing with me. I was allowed to check in early which was awesome. The service was fast and efficient but there was only one elevator working during my stay, as a courtesy my one night of parking fee was waived.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Monty Criss and Jacqueline Um were great to work with.  I recently placed a corporate program at this property and the client was very pleased with the accommodations and customer service.  Sales team covered every detail!  Thank you for your hard work and dedication.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This Doubletree off MacArthur Blvd is nice. Its about 7 stories tall and has a nice, small bar.  Food is fine and a few faster food restaurants across the street (Sushi, Thai, Sbux) that suffices for variety.  The hotel is in the middle of offices but also right by Hwy 55 for easy N/S access to Newport Beach and I-5.  Plus being on MacArthur, just 5 min to/from Orange County airport.  There are a bunch of hotels in the area and our company chose this one for cost (about $170) and comfort.   Its good for business, not families or kids.  Small workout facility. Not really a place to walk around the neighborhood either... so go, work, eat, drink, sleep, back to airport kind of place. Isn't that what business travel is anyway?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: After all day travel to get to Santa Ana for business meetings I was very tired. There was no hassle checking in. Room was clean and quiet. Staff was efficient and extremely helpful. Rate my stay experience higher than even other DoubleTree Hotels where I have stayed in the LA area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Our water polo team stayed overnight October 11th at the DoubleTree Santa Ana.  We had a wonderful experience from start to finish.  Our team competes in this area regularly and have stayed in several other competing hotels. The DoubleTree is tops and it is our new home.  Teresa Karcher and Jacqueline Um in the reservation department were great to work with. They helped us put together our package and kept in contact with us throughout the process. Even though we only stayed one night on this trip, they were awesome and treated us like regulars.  We chose this facility for several reasons that work well for our team:  Convenient location (close to freeways, restaurants across the street; big, clean and comfortable rooms; awesome free breakfast (key for our players); on-site
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Overall stay was nice. There are two areas where improvement can be made for a more enjoyable stay; 1) quality of breakfast and 2) Elevator refurbish or upgrade.  Breakfast: I ate breakfast two of the three mornings as by the third morning it held no appeal. The eggs were consistently runny and the oatmeal was consistently dry. Several pieces of the fruit was even bruised.  Elevator: Seems quite dated and extremely slow. One elevator was even missing the close door button. The slowness and eventual stop of the elevator between floors seemed painfully slow.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I had a good experience during my stay regarding cleanliness. My biggest issue was that there was no evident way to contact the front desk. I also was unable to contact room service a couple of evenings and had to go down to the restaurant to order.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments. I am truly sorry that you had challenges reaching the front desk and also room service. I want to assure you that your experience is not typical of the quality of service and hospitality we offer our guests and corrective steps have been taken, as a result of your feedback, to preclude a recurrence to future guests. We are also happy to know that you were satisfied with the cleanliness of the facilty. Thank you and look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: This hotel was just what I needed.  I was traveling on some personal business of a serious nature. After a long, emotional day, I was warmly welcomed and quickly checked in. The room was very nice, clean and comfortable. Room service was friendly, fast and the food was tasty. My stay was easy and relaxing after a rough day. The hotel is minutes from the airport with a complimentary shuttle every half hour.
Manager Response: On behalf of our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Hotel, we wanted to thank you for your four star review...We pride ourselves on our warm welcome and quick check in as well, room cleanliness is very important to our team.  Please come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: I enjoyed the pleasant staff and the clean environment.  The feel was very relaxing and didn't feel rushed to move about the hotel. I would definitely stay at Double tree again.  The bed was very comfortable, I slept thru the night without a problem. The sheets were clean and there was a coffee pot for morning coffee or tea.  The mini refrigerator came in handy although at first I thought it was un-necessary to have it proved me wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you Curtis for your four star review of our Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana Hotel...We are pleased that you had a comfortable stay in our exceptionally clean room serviced by our staff that you will find warm and pleasant and happy that you found our all new refrigerators in your room helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again and look forward to another four star review of our Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana Hotel.

Summary: The hotel have a clean and quiet surrounding area. Both the lobby and room at Double tree Santa Anna is new and clean. Also they have a great ballroom, and the restaurant offer high quality food.Monty and Jacqueline work so efficient and organized.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: GREAT Hotel for business and personal. BEST Staff around!
Summary: After having TWO meetings, dinners, and rooms here for about 35 people each time, they were great.  Their food is fabulous and hats off to the chef.  EVERY one complimented on the food and it's NOT regular hotel food.  Good to know, huh? Also, the contract was easy and Monty and Jacqueline were very communicative and easy to work with.  I will use them over and over again. AND the rooms are great too.  NO BAD NEWS HERE!  As for location, they are in a great area to walk to many eateries, businesses, and just plain ol' easy peasy!  Great location!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Super helpful and pleasant staff, very well maintained building, welcoming and pretty décor. Great value. Great location near restaurants and mall. Good place to stay when leaving LA en route to San Diego for an overnighter. Will stay again if opportunity arises!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The hotel is very nice but could use new carpet in the rooms. The parking is secure. The bar is good. The staff was helpful.  Gave us extra cookies when we asked.  It is local to the airport and close enough to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The hotel is very nicely appointed and at first glance looks great; however, as a Hilton Honors Diamond memeber, I have never been treated so poorly.  These people actually think that they are doing you a favor.    I was charged $15.00 per day for parking but had no car on the premise - attempts to resolve this were met with indifference until I had to get HH customer service involved.  The location is the only positive that I can offer as it is very close to the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comment in Trip Advisor. I am truly sorry that you were charged for parking erroneously, and we failed to resolve it immediately to your satisfaction. I can certainly understand your frustration and disappointment in our level of service. Please be assured that your experience is certainly not typical of the quality of service and hospitality we offer our guests and corrective steps have been taken. I sincerely hope you will give us an opportunity to serve you whenever your travel brings you to this area.

Summary Heading: Fantastic customer service and a lovely clean Hotel
Summary: I stayed here for one night, that being Independence Day this year, as I wanted to go down to Newport Beach to celebrate with the locals but couldn't afford the accommodation down on the beach.  I found this hotel, and it was only a short 15  or so cab ride there.  The Hotel is immaculate and the room was fantastic for the price I paid.  Most importantly the service was faultless the staff went out of their way to assist every question I had.  If you are looking to stay in the Santa Ana area or perhaps you are the same as me and can't afford to stay in Newport Beach itself, then I would most definitely recommend this Hotel.  No complaints at all in any way shape or form.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Great hotel, amenities were very good, rooms were very comfortable and clean, good location, breakfast buffet was excellent but the elevators are too small and too slow, expect a long delay or use the stairs.  The gym was also very small, however, overall I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: First things first: there are two Doubletrees near John Wayne airport, almost within sight of each other so check which one you booked! I went to the wrong one first...  This place was OK for the brand. Decent public areas, room was pleasant, clean but nothing special. I was on the exec floor and surprised not to have a walk-in shower, but daily delivery of fruit, chocs, bottle of wine etc was a nice touch.   Public areas are ok, but main restaurant feels dated and gloomy. Menu very uninspiring, food a bit bland. But there are tons of restaurants nearby...  Wifi was $10 a day, a rip off. Especially when it's free in the Doubletree in nearby Irvine, where I normally stay, but of course you don't have the "we're near an airport so we can rip people off easier" mentality there...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: great hotel in a fine location
Summary: recently stayed at the doubletree santa ana/orange county airport and had a wonderful stay-check-in was courteous and friendly and the doubletree cookies a real treat-our room was spacious/ clean with all the right amenties-great location-had the opportunity of meeting the director of sales mr. monty criss-professional and very friendly-we would stay here again when visiting the southern california area
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Nice, clean rooms. The bed was really comfortable. The pool was a great temperature, and I had it to myself. Staff is helpful and friendly. I was there for a training, and the conference room was fine. The food we had during the conference was much better than expected too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Good location, consistant for the brand, nice enough staff.
Summary: So don't get me wrong, the hotel is consistant for the DoubleTree brand in the Hilton line. Very clean, mostly attentive staff, comfortable rooms/beds.  In my personal opinion, the Doubltree Club across the street is the better choice, all things considered.  Odd to have two properties within a stone's throw of each other -- but having stayed in both, I return to the other.  So some specifics -- check in parking area in front is a bit awkward, as it's a circle "ish" drive.  Often times people park in the middle of it, and you can't actuall circle through.  They do have underground garage parking.  Be SURE to bring your key, as you'll need it to get in -- and actually, even to get out.  When you check out, keep a key -- so you can exit. There is a drop box for keys.  This
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This hotel is always consistent.  Very clean, friendly staff and great restaurant/bar amenities.   The additional benefit of having hotel transportation is also a wonderful convenience.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel - near South Coast Plaza & John Wayne Airport
Summary: Spacious and attractive hotel.  Nice rooms, friendly staff and very good restaurant.  Hotel is geared toward business travelers.  Rack up your Hilton points at this hotel.  Shuttle service available.  Don't forget to try this famous chocolate chip cookies!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The staff from beginning to the end was excellent. Helpful when asked and out of the way and professional at al times. The location is good, easy access to roads and the airport, decent food within walking distance and a good restaurant in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This DoubleTree Hotel was very nice.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  My business partner and I had some extra time when we arrived before our client meeting and when asked where we should go to shop were given suggestions and then a ride by the shuttle.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stay here frequently for work. The hotel is very clean. The service is awesome, and the hotel bar is always welcoming. A nighttime swim in the rooftop pool and hot tub is a great way to unwind from the day. Great place!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This Doubletree is in a convenient location to John Wayne Airport, and there are some really good restaurant choices only a few blocks away by the mall, or good fast food (such as Rubio's) right across the street.   They charge for parking, but the deck was mostly empty. The property is in good shape, the staff was friendly, and the rooms are very clean and in good repair. In fact the HHonors room I received was apparently recently renovated and looked great. The bed was nice, too... NO waking up in the middle of the night due to a poor mattress!   The biggest negative is slow and very small elevators  Would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: DoubleTree NEAR John Wayne Airport: (SNA) Cali
Summary: The rooms are nice with a comfortable bed. Most of the staff is courteous but did NOT meet the requests we had as they did on previous visit EXACTLY 1 week prior, which showed inconsistency of the property & staff
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This Hilton Doubletree is a nice value for the location and convenience.   It is fairly close to the airport.  Able to walk to Starbucks and several restaurants across the street.  Restaurant was clean and staff helpful.  Parking and internet were additional.  Bar/Restaurant staff provided excellent service and the food was tasty.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for for taking time to write an excellent review about our Double Tree by Hilton Orange County Airport  Hotel.  We especially want to thank you for your 5 of 5 Star Review. *We do take pride in our breakfasts and glad they were spectacular!
