We also are privileged to have some wonderful team members as you mentioned," gracious and attentive" *Please come back and stay with us again and try our fantastic lunches and dinners.

Summary: The breakfasts were spectacular.  I had the eggwhite omelet and requested berries and pineapple to replace the hashbrowns. I could not believe the quality of the berries and pineapple consistently over three breakfasts.  They were excellent!  The vegetables in the omelet were wonderful also and I loved the mozzarella on top of the omelot.  The waitresses were gracious and attentive.  I have never (really!) had such a fantastic breakfast experience.  I would come back to the Doubletree Hilton at Santa Ana just for those. Kudos to the chef and the entire staff.  I'm just sorry that we didn't get an opportunity to try lunches and dinners.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your 5 of 5 STAR REVIEW...The egg white omelets here are great and we have egg beaters too at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We hope to see you again soon and you know that you will have an excellent stay again with some great Omelets and service to go with it.

Summary: Just an average hotel.  Told Internet was free, then charged each night for the service.  I had to provide the name of the front desk person who told me it was free before they would resolve.  Unacceptable.  I would have used my phone to check email if I was going to be charged $9.00 per night, but I was told it was included in my room fee.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our DoubleTree by Hilton Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are very sorry that you we gave you and "average' experience because we are very serious about make everyone's stay much more than average.   Please come back and visit us again and your internet will be Complimentary on me.  By the way, we just upgraded out internet to be the fastest in the area with over 50mgbs, so next time you won't have to pay for it and it will be so fast you won't know what to do.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon

Summary Heading: Great Venue (DoubleTree on McFadden in Santa Ana)
Summary: If you're looking for the PERFECT location to have an event, this is the place!  Great staff....love love love Angeline and Hilda, see you @ the next one!  Our staff and guests always have such an enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 STAR REVIEW at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We agree with you that our location is PERFECT to have an event and our staff is above all others who really care about our guests.  Angeline and Hilda are those team members who do such a great job.  We look forward to seeing you again at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel to have a GREAT EVENT again and again.

Summary: The rooms were very comfortable and clean.  Housekeeping quickly remembered we like extra towels and coffee so that we only asked for them the first time.  Breakfast was included with our stay and was very good.  All the staff we encountered were friendly and helpful.  We would stay here again if we came back to Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and writing an excellent review of our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.. We know it is the little things that make your stay perfect and glad you experienced our fantastic breakfast!  We hope to see you again at  our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel and we will make sure you have another great stay.

Summary: Good stay at the Santa Ana location. Overall, not bad but they need a little more in the gym. Other than that it is a good place. The breakfast was good as well. Very nice staff. For business this is good, but I didn't see anything for families to do in the general area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking your time to write a great review about our DoubleTree Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel!  We are also pleased you had such a great experience and enjoyed our restaurant and the window view.  We are very serious about pleasing all of our happy guests and look forward to having you visit our hotel again.

Summary Heading: Great overnight stay between San Diego and Santa Barbara
Summary: The hotel is in a nice commercial district and easy to find.  We chose this hotel for it's location and price. We drove here after arriving on a early-afternoon flight to San Diego heading to Santa Barbara. It was a good overnight point and we didn't have to deal with driving in LA traffic at rush hour.    Check in was quick (we were the only one).  The lobby was very nice and the room was great.  Bathroom was spotless and roomy.  Beds were comfortable as usual.  Overall the room was very comfortable.  Internet was included in our stay and worked well for email and general browsing.    Breakfast was pretty standard.  We had a continental breakfast included with our stay - full breakfast would have been I think $5 more each.  Service was great and helpful.  I liked the window
Manager Response: Thank you for writing an excellent review for you stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel. We are pleased your room was spotless and roomy with comfortable beds...We pride ourselves in having a clean and spotless rooms for all of our valued guests...  We are currently upgrading our wireless so it will even be faster and easier to you utilize.  Again, thank you very  much for your great review and your stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Had problems at checkout; final bill was not ready to take.  Breakfast charges had not been added.  Was told it would be emailed that day (Friday) but had not arrived by Monday morning, so I had to speak with two people just to get it sent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We would like to apologize that your bill was not ready at your time of check out and that it didn't get emailed promptly.  At the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel we are very serious about getting all of our customers exactly what they need and didn't meet your needs this stay.  We would like to invite you back again and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Right off-the-bat the front desk had difficulty with my reservation. I was part of a group and this apparently overwhelmed an already out-of-sorts operation. Next, the parking situation came to light...to park in the ($15/nite)garage means you have to transfer elevators to get to the elevator that serves your floor. Some might find this no big deal, I find it irritating... Then I had reserved a room with 2 doubles, but received a king with a pull-out. When I had brought this to the attention of the front desk, they had pretty much told me I was SOL. A "full house" was the excuse I received for not getting what I had reserved. Last but not least, you have to pay for wifi (unless you are a Hilton Honors member). How about you keep your crazy-sweet cookies and offer free wifi!?
Manager Response: Thank you Joe for taking the time to write a review about our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Hotel.  We would  like to apologize that you did not get the bed type you requested we always try to make certain our guests get what they want. You will be very happy to know that we are bringing in Fiber Optic Cable with 50+of mbps which will be screaming fast and we will have a level that is complimentary for you...If you would like to be a HH Member, please email or call and we will be more than pleased to sign you up so you can enjoy some of the awards...Thank you again for your suggestions, we value all of our customers and that is why we gave you a complimentary nights stay.

Summary: I am always satisfied when I stay at this hotel.  Folks are pleasant and the hotel is clean.  The hotel staff is always willing to assist with whatever you need.  I would recommend to anyone to stay here when coming to Orange County CA.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your great review about the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are so happy that you are Always Satisfied when you stay at your hotel.  We are very serious about our hotel being exceptionally clean and our staff exceptionally friendly and always ready to service our guests.  Thank you again for your excellent review of our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Hotel as we know there are many choices but you choose to stay with us.

Summary: My husband ,myself and daughter stayed for 2 nights in King room with pullout sofa. The room was extremely clean and I check every thing before settling in. The bed was very comfortable. My 5 yr old slept comfortably on the sofa bed. The staff was nice. I didn't use or even see the pool as I was there for the beach not the hotel  pool. We payed $15 a night for parking which I thought was a bit much. We booked through expedia and didn't get the breakfast included with our reservation. The continental breakfast was $15.00 each. A bit much for the basic breakfast. We ate elsewhere. We liked our stay. My only wish was to sleep in a little but I woke early at approx 7:30 am when I heard the house  keeping crew vacuuming and cleaning the rooms on each side of us. The location is great
Manager Response: Thank you very much Cheri for staying at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel and we were very happy to hear that your room was extremely clean and a comfortable room.  Thank you for letting us know about the noise in the early morning, we have directed our staff to start later so our weekend guests can sleep in a little bit. We appreciate our guests letting us know how we can make their stay better....We are very serious about our customers comfort and our goal is to satisfy all of our guests at the DoubleTree Santa Ana Orange County Airport hotel and we hope to see you again soon....try booking on our site next time.

Summary: I found the hotel to be very clean and up to date.  The front desk staff were very helpful and friendly.  The location was perfect for my needs.  Some restaurants and coffee shops were within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our DoubleTree by Hilton Orange County Airport Hotel  and for writing a great review about how clean and up to date our hotel is and how friendly and helpful our front desk staff was.  We take cleanliness very serious and make sure our hotel is up to date with on going improvements.  This year we are adding fiber optic cable to give our guest 50mbps of bandwidth and a Starbucks Coffee in our lobby.  Thank you again for telling us about your excellent stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Orange County Airport Hotel, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: NO SHUTTLE+NO FREE WIFI= NOT HAPPY
Summary: First off, everything in this hotel is decent. Nothing extraordinary... Except the warm cookie everyone receives at check in :) my major complaint are the "extras" that are advertised and that ultimately made me choose this hotel to redeem my credit card points. The shuttle was a big plus for me because we didn't want to drive anywhere. We were told just to ask for the shuttle when we were ready but For some weird reason the shuttle driver was either always on break or on a run. The $10 fee for wifi stinks.. In my opinion It should be free if you pay full price for a hotel room. We also had an issue on getting local recommendations on what to do in this area.. We kept getting referred to disneyland!?! Not everyone wants to go to Disneyland for dinner/fireworks/lunch/relaxing
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Hotel... You will be happy to know that we have just purchased a NEW 20 passenger Shuttle to help with our valued guests and we are bringing in FIBER OPTIC with huge bandwidth and we will have free wireless.  We are happy that you loved the view at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel and the Double Tree Cookies and the Starbucks across the street.  You will be happier to know that we are building a Starbucks on our property and you can enjoy Starbucks right in our hotel....Please come back and visit us again and enjoy the great view.

Summary: Location is in a business district, and we happened to be there close to the 4th of July Holiday ~ so there was NOTHING going on and not a lot of people around. The pool.......was smaller than my Hot Tub at home, but the cookies were great and the staff was fantastic as always.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review about the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We appreciate your business and glad you enjoyed some of our warm chocolate chip cookies which actually represents some of our warm hospitality.   We hope that you have some time to come and visit our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel soon.

Summary Heading: stay at double tree sna airport
Summary: the hotel was nice and the services provided were on time and promt work out area was average, beds comfortable and staff was very pleasant to deal with. The pool and hot area are very poor. other than that the hotel is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review about the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Hotel...We take our job very serious and our guests and are happy you had a great  stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.    You will be happy to hear that we are enhancing our work out area for your convenience and we look forward seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel.Some issues, but would recommend.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a wedding over the busy Fourth of July weekend. Typical good quality that we've found for many years at many Hilton Family Hotels. The room was very well decorated, clean and comfortable. There were a few issues, but the hotel staff went out of their way to make it right. The first problem was no towels, either on arrival or the next day. I'm not sure why that happened. Perhaps, it was a result of a full hotel. We called the front desk both times and towels were quickly delivered, but we should not have had to do that. The second issue was very slow service in the hotel dining room. The food was very good, but service was glacially slow. The restaurant staff was very friendly and were working hard, but the problem seems to lie in understaffing. They
Manager Response: I certainly appreciate you taking the time to write your comments regarding your stay at our Hotel. I was sorry to read that you had to request for towels and the restaurant service was slow, which is not typical of the quality service we offer our guests. We were extremely busy with full house during 4th of July weekend and some call offs did not help the situation. It is our goal to provide the highest quality in both product and service, and it is vital to our continued success to know when we have fallen short of our own high standards. I have also noted your comments regarding Wi-Fi charge and will certainly look into it. I am glad that your overall experience with us was very satisfactory. Again, thank you for taking the time to post your comments and hope to have the opportunity to be of your service in near future.

Summary: I have stayed at this Doubletree several times. This is my first choice in Santa Ana area to stay at everytime. I have a choice of staying in several areas of Southern California, but I stay here because of the service I receive there. I would like to say that Thierry Poli is the best bartender I have ever had at a hotel!!! He remembers you everytime you come to town and even remembers your cocktail of choice. Sergio Villa makes your breakfast experience an excellent one and always remembers you preferences as well. The manager ,Joel Aguilar, always makes sure you are well taken care of. It is because of the people working at this Doubletree, I feel as if it is like my home away from home. I will be back again soon to stay there. It is also close to several freeway access and of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to post your comments regarding your stay at our Hotel. I am sharing your comments with all the Associates here at the Hotel, knowing that it will serve as an inspiration to them to continue their efforts. Staff members such as Thierry and Joel truly reflect our culture and make our Hotel especial. We truly appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming your family in the near future.

Summary: Very nice front desk staff.  Room wasn't ready when we checked in (was a little early), for waiting they gave us 2 complimentary breakfast passes.  Room was clean and modern.  Would stay here again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying at our property and especially thank you for taking the time to tell us what a GREAT STAY you had at our DoubleTree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel and that you loved our modern and clean rooms and the quick check in.  We want to make sure that all of our guests have a quick and painless check in and we are also very serious about our rooms being in the best possible condition and always clean.  We look forward to having you back again soon at the DoubleTree By Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel

Summary: My family will stay again at the doubletree by Hilton in Santa Ana. We had good experience. As mentioned, this hotel is clean, quiet, and has great location for beaches, Disney, shopping centers, and access to major interstates. It would have been a perfect experience if free breakfast was included. We had a discount which covered the amount for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We had a very good experience Service was Excellent and Shuttle Service was Wonderful... especially after a night of having Fun with friends and Family Celebrating our  Very Special friend 50th Birthday...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Often times the airport hotels are not as nice as one might expect, this one is an exception.  Nice rooms, wonderful dining area outside lakeside, and helpful staff.  Also the short, complimentary  shuttle ride to the airport was a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Comfortable, clean, great value and great service.  Would definitely recommend this hotel when staying in Orange County.  Very convenient to the airport and many other Orange County visitor attractions!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: I dont know what this means??
Summary: Very Clean and near many restaurants,etc.  I would definitely reccommend this to anyone.  A plus was the shuttle to the airport. Alll in all it was a great experience.  California is a great place to visit, just too many people and cars.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to write such a complimentary letter. I will be sharing your comments with the Associates here knowing that it will serve as an inspiration to them to continue their efforts. We appreciate your patronage and hope you will stay with us the next time you are in the area. We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is a nice quiet, business oriented hotel that provided extremely nice service and quality amentities.   The area is really nice and also close to the airport.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Rented the room for a few hours and the guy at the desk helped me and made it so I only had to pay half of the original price for one night. He was pretty nice. Would've given a tip had i had some cash with me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: for the money a good stay. Noise when we checked in.    Big wedding going on. parking was confusing. Rooms were ok. Had a hard time getting keys to work for the door. had to wait 15 minutes for someone to bring up new keys so we could get into our room. Hard after a long day of travel
Manager Response: I certainly appreciate you taking the time to write concerning your recent stay at our Hotel. I was sorry to read that we failed to meet your expectations in several areas. Unfortunately, wedding party tends to be noisy despite our several requests for them to be quiet. It is our goal to consistently provide the highest quality in both product and service, and it is vital to our continued success to know when we have fallen short of our own standards. Let me simply say that all of us here at Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana are committed to providing a much better and pleasant experience for our guests than what you had the misfortune of experiencing. Again, thank you for taking the time to write. I sincerely hope that you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you properly.

Summary: I was extremely satisfied with my room and staff. The only problem I encountered was that the air was a bit warm in the room. I turned down the air since it was warm trying to sleep (I didn't see any air vents blowing toward the bed). I tried to turn the air down only to have it turn back down automatically. When I sat on the couch the temp felt good, just not when I was in bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Two star hotel for three star price.
Summary: Everything was adequate but not commensurate with the rate ($199).  Paid parking ($15) and internet ($10) were outrageous and should be included at this rate.  Would not reserve this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment your stay at Doubletree by Hilton, Santa Ana. While feedback from our guests is always welcome and of significant value , I was distrubed that our service and product was just adequate, and you were not satisfied with the value for price paid. I do aplogize and hope that you will allow us the opportunity to provide you with an experience that is typical of Doubletree by Hilton, Santa Ana whereby you are satisfied with the value for price paid.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay! Area was safe and easy to get to. Lobby and restaurants were very nice as were the rooms! Very comfortable and spacious. Didn't have the time to use the pool or fitness area. No complaints, would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We had been driving all night, we were exhausted and we drove into the hotel. The front desk agent saw how tired we were, checked us in fast and we were able to have a little something to eat and then go straight to our comfy bed. I appreciated the prompt service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This is one of two double tree hotels located within a block of each other near the Santa Ana airport.  This one is on the main street and is a stone throw away from the airport. It has all the usual amenities you can come to expect from double tree so I will just focus on the unusual and the slightly negative or positive.  The diamond member breakfast vouchers you get here only allow you to use the continental breakfast selection and NOT the full buffet. This is disappointing given that the double tree across the street gives you a full buffet. They also don't include a complimentary breakfast which is also disappointing. It's only an extra $5 to enjoy the buffet so it's not so bad.  Their parking situation is a hassle. It's subterranean and has a gate you have to swipe your
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Good centrally located hotel, watch out for extra charges
Summary: My company has decided to start using this hotel for business trips to the Irvine area. The hotel is centrally located between Santa Ana and Irvine and it is only approx. a 10 minute drive from John Wayne airport. Check in was quick and easy and my room was clean, neat and quiet (the things I value the most). This DB hotel is also located across a building with several fast food joints including a Starbucks. But watch out for the extra costs, this is one of the few Hilton brand hotels that charges for internet. You even have to be a Premium Hilton Honors member to get free internet. This is something, I have not yet experienced with any other Hilton brand hotels I have used. In addition, if you decide to use the hotel parking, be ready to pay $15.00 a night. In all, the DB Santa
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate you taking the time to write your comments regarding your stay with us. We are glad that you liked the facility being clean and neat, service being friendly and quick and the location being close to several fast food joints. We are sorry that you were disappointed with the internet and parking charges. Most all the hotels in the area do charge for parking. We have actually installed parking gates to secure our garage in order to provide a safer environment to our guests. As far as the Internet is concerned the guests do have a choice as we have complimentary WiFi in our public areas including Business center. Again thank you for your feedback as we continue to enhance our products and services.

Summary: Parking and Internet fees are rediculously high. If I had not been required to stay at this hotel by my employer, I would have chosen an alternate facility a mile away with lower price, free hot brkfst, free wireless and wired (better security) internet, and free parking. Staff had trouble programming cards for parking garage & seemed annoyed with having to bother. Maybe pushing folks to valet parking for extra revenue.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Hotel, Santa Ana. I would like to offer my sincere apology for the disappointment in service with regards to parking garage and parking charge. Parking gate was recently installed in order to provide our guests with a secure parking facility. It has become clear from your feedback that our Associates need more training in programming key cards so that our guests have a positive experience. Again, thank you for your concerns.

Summary: even though my stay at this hotel was brief, the hotel staff made it seem as if I was on a mini vacation. The checked my in quickly and were very friendly and kind. The warm cookies were wonderful! I needed toothpaste and though I didn't mind going down to get it they brought it to my room. thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to write such a complimentary comment. I am sharing your comments, knowing that it will serve as an inspiration to our staff to continue their efforts. We appreciate your patronage and hope you will stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton, Santa Ana the next time your travel brings you to this area. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The rooms and open areas of this hotel were very comfortable and desirable.  The pool area was very small and dirty, with dead plants all around, this was very different then the pictures on the internet.  Very disapointing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments concerning your stay at our Hotel. Please accept our sincere apologies for your disappointment in our swimming pool facility. I want to assure you that your experience is certainly not typical of the quality of facility we offer our guests and corrective steps have been taken as a result of your comments, to preclude a recurrence to future guests. As part of our ongoing upgrade, We have already planted new plants/flowers in swimming pool area along with frequent visits/clean up by our Associates.

Summary: This is a great place for business or pleasure.  Clean, spacious, and not short on friendly staff.  Highly recommended!  The location is pretty central, and allows for easy access to route 55 and the 405.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My girlfriend and I had a family function, didn't want to drive after, so booked a room at the Doubletree.  Couldn't have been any better. Only wrinkle is parking, below the lobby underground. Spaces are small, and was pretty full that night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Great hotel and excellent staff.  It is conveniently located with a 24 hour fitness center.    My only complaints are the complimentary breakfast is only "continental."  There is an additional charge for the hot breakfast, and parking is $15 per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights at this hotel with my husband and daughter.   Pros- Hotel and room were clean. Beds were supportive and not too soft, which is perfect for those of us with back problems. In room safe and refrigerator. Close to Segerstrom Center for the Arts where our daughter was performing.   Cons- Shower drain was extremely slow, had to stand in water up to our shins almost immediately after turning on the shower. Bathroom was small and does not have adequate venting which made it uncomfortably hot and steamy after showers.  Air conditioning fan in the room seemed to be on it's last legs.  Made a repeated loud noise like it was an engine trying to start up, and didn't cool the room very well. Walls are among the thinnest I've noticed in awhile.  We could hear every small noise
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced while a guest at our Hotel. There is no excuse for some of the shortcomings you have mentioned such as slow shower drain and noisy air-conditioning fan. We carry out regular preventive maintenance to all of our guest rooms on a regular basis to ensure problem free Guest rooms. It is through concerned guests, such as yourself, that we gain insight into areas of our facility/business that require attention, areas that may have otherwise gone unnoticed. I want to assure you that your experience is not typical of the quality of facility we offer our guests and corrective steps have been taken

Summary: The hotel and my stay were OK, but the card key reader for my room never worked. Never. No one could figure out why and it wasn't fixed. This meant I had to go to the check-in desk and request maintenance assistance every time I wanted to enter my room. This wasted a LOT of my time. Also, I could hear the couple above me (next to me? below me?) screwing every night. Sound proofing could be better!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: As a diamond member I stay at a lot of Hilton properties. This one stands out to me as having the most "professional" well trained staff I have encountered. The front desk person was fabulous, the bartender was extraordinary and the waitress at breakfast went above and beyond. It's like they all took a "smart pill" as to how to treat travelers. If I could stay here every week I would but alas, I must drive the "entire" state of California ...town to town like Willie Lowman haha.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience at a great price!
Summary: This hotel was really gorgeous and conveniently located near the John Wayne Airport.  The staff was extremely courteous - they provided a cookie at check-in.  I didn't have one, but thought the idea was so cute!  The food was fresh - I had several meals there as I was at a conference and the drinks at the bar were fabulous. The bed was a bit uncomfortable, unfortunately.  However that was the only negative about the experience.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The staff at the hotel was really nice.  I truly appreciated that getting in late.  The bed comfortable and while I did not feel that it was a great bargain -  for a last minute booking, I did okay.   No view except for a roof from our room (4th floor- #18)   The parking for the guests is underneath and why is it that no one tells you that that is extra ?   $15 for each 24 hr period.   If you go over say, 25 hours its another $15 - but hey its Orange County you know.     It is very close to the job interview we had that early morning and that worked out beautifully.  Thanks for a restful sleep.   p.s. if there was a buffet offered, we weren't told about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Quick stay prior to an early flight.  Location was good but still 10-15 minutes from airport. The room was adequate for the price.  We had a nice breakfast in the morning and the bar served decent drinks the night before. I would probably try somewhere else next time I needed an airport hotel here. Only one real negative was the bathroom seemed to have a slight smell like sewer in it. There was a note that they were trying to fix something in the room and we did leave a note stating the problem.  It was not so bad that we wanted to mess around with the fuss of changing rooms, just an annoyance.
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate you taking the time to write your comments concerning your recent stay at our Hotel. I was sorry to read that we failed to meet your expectations due to distance from the Airport and bath room smell. While we are not all that far from the Airport -- just about 1.5 miles, we also provide shuttle service to the Airport for our guests on a complimentary basis. We did have a minor issue as it relates to the Bathroom smell caused by backed up drainage and was corrected promptly.  I would like to offer my sincere apology for the less than enjoyable stay you had at our Hotel. I sincerely hope that you will not judge by this isolated incident and give us the opportunity to serve you whenever your travel brings you to this area.

Summary Heading: I LOVED OUR STAY. MY SON HAD A BASKETABALL TOURNY THAT WEEKEND AND IT DIDN'T TAKE US VERY LONG TO GET WHERE WE WENT.
Summary: Everything about our stay for the weekend was great.  The restaurants were walking distant.  Shopping centers were only a few miles away.  The location was great! Rooms were nice and clean, and beds were comfy.  The spa was nicely heated!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Right off the freeway, right on the price, clean comfortable.  Nice breakfast included. Did not try the internet. Parking was easy and there was plenty - there is underground parking as well.   If only all my business travel experiences were this good....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights due to a music conference held in the hotel. Location is good. Close to airport and Disneyland in Anaheim. But besides that, the hotel is basically near an industrial park. So it is very quiet especially at night. Rooms are very well furnished in a contemporary style and are always clean. You'll feel very at ease and comfortable in this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Extremely happy with everything -- the room, the staff and esp the quality of the food. Which is saying a lot cuz I'm a picky eater.   I'd totally stay there again! My only complaint was that the internet wasn't as fast as my own, but I think that's normal for a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I've stayed at the Doubletree in Santa Ana on several occasions for business travel.  If you need to head to the Federal Court House, the hotel is about 15-20 minutes away by taxi (including morning traffic).  The staff has always proved efficient and helpful.  My hotel rooms have always been very clean and the beds and pillows are also very comfortable.  For the price you pay, this hotel is an excellent deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This hotel has just everything you want and a business traveler. Rooms are clean, spacious. The breakfast is just great. Could be crowdy during breakfast. No parking problems, even valet parking service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel for a number of times in the last 6 years or so for business. Every time it always was an excellent stay. It is clean and the staff is very friendly. Never had to wait long for the shuttle for drop off or pick up. The dinner at the restaurant has always been good. Internet is reliable although not free in the room, just in the restaurant and the lobby. Looking forward to many more stays at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel In The John Wayne Airport Area
Summary: I'm surprised this is only a 3.5 star hotel, because it is nicer than many 4 start hotels I have stayed at. The star ratings must have something to do with amenities or something like that, because as far as quality is concerned, the 4 start joint have nothing on this place! I've stayed here twice now and both times have been absolutely great. The rooms are very clean...and not just regular clean...I'm talking SPOTLESS clean. Also, the rooms are spacious, very modern with plenty of electrical outlets everywhere, have a big flat screen TV, and even have a comfy sofa. The cookie at check-in is a nice touch as well. The only thing I don't like is that not only do they charge you for parking($15), it isn't even convenient parking. Oh well, can't win 'em all :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We had friendly staff who even gave us an early check-in (9am).  Our entire waterpolo club stayed at the hotel for a tournament.  We had boys with ages that ranged from 10 to 18, and they treated us all well.  Not fancy, but comfortable and of course, too many cookies.  The fitness room is also better than average with a fair number of aerobic machines.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The hotel is nice and the buffet foods they served all throughout our training all-day is good, love the salsa :-) The only bad thing is that you have to pay for the Internet connection and they probably need to replace their elevators as it was shaking and slow, but no big deal on that as it still works fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The front desk personnel attitude was unbelievable.  I called late at night asking for a bottle of water to take meds.  They denied and told me to go to a vending machine...even when I told them I did not have any change and that they can charge my account they denied and told me to go get change and use the vending machine for water...that was awful.    In the morning, went for the breakfast.  Asked for tea...twice...waitress never brought me it.  I wrote a note on the check saying that waitress did not attend to me at all...only showed up to have me sign the check.  I will not stay there again.  There are other hotels in the area that are a lot more friendly where I have been staying for almost couple years.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments. Your experience regarding rude desk clerk and waitress at the restaurant are very disturbing to me as they certainly do not represent the quality of service we have proudly built our reputation. It should not be necessary but, occasionally, we must remind our staff that we are in a highly competitive business, where good service is often the distinguishing feature between us and our competition. Service is our business and there is no room on our staff for anyone who is rude to our guests. Again, I certainly appreciate your taking the time to inform of the inadequacies you experienced during your stay. I sincerely hope that you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you properly.

Summary: Terrific hotel!  Very comfortable, clean and attractive. The staff at this hotel were very welcoming, friendly and very attentive to what they could do for me as a guest. My compliments and gratitude to the staff and my complimments on the decor and comfort of the hotel and my room during my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed only one night, and found the hotel room clean and well laid out.  The breakfast was very good and the wait staff very friendly.  There are two Double Tree's very close together, and we prefer this one.  I was, however, slightly disappointed that we weren't offered an up graded room.  We are Gold Members, and stay almost exclusively at Hilton properties.  So an automatic room upgrade would have been appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay. I am truly sorry that we were not able to provide you with an upgrade this time.  Please be assured that we try our best to upgrade our valued guests especially Gold and Diamond members but it is sometime challenging when we have a full house. I will be sharing your positive expericnece  as it relates to clean room, great breakfast and friendly staff with the Associates here. We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Not as good as last time but still good
Summary: I just stayed here again since my last stay was so positive, and this one did not match up with the prior stay. The room I was in felt cramped, the front desk was nowhere near as engaging as my prior visit. It is still a great place to stay and it is easy to get onto the major freeways. There was a large group in while I was there. They even brought their own music into the bar at night, which was weird they kind of took over the bar with about a dozen of their people. I will probably stay here again but may try the Double Tree club down the street it was only $10 more per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to write your experience concerning your recent stay at our Hotel. I am sorry that you did not receive the same level of service that you received during your previous stay here.  We did have a large group in house and most of the guests ended up using the Bar to unwind but that should not have affected our overall service and the engagement with our guests. Please accept my apologies for not living up to our usual high level of service. I sincerely hope you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you.

Summary Heading: Great Bargain for a lovely hotel
Summary: I have stayed at this Doubletree several times in the past twelve months. The staff is friendly, the rooms are newly decorated and very well kept and the restaurant has good food--all in all a great choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Originally chose this hotel due to proximity to work location, but based on stay will use for both business and family travel. Has all needs for business: wifi, business center, and restaurant/lounge. Ample parking or airport shuttle. Clean and very comfortable rooms. Excercise center a little small so leave extra time. Pool and spa outside. All in all a good value, plus an awesome staff who make you feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly professional staff, nice rooms and easy parking
Summary: Hotel has recently been upgraded with updated furnishings and carpeting. Rooms are a very good size.  Nice lobby and friendly, professional hotel staff.  This was our Disney trip and we got $71 rates..awesome for 4-star like property!  We were also upgraded to executive level (with fridge in room) so it's really hard not to give this place a good rating.  Proximity to Disneyland via Hwy 55 to  5 commuter lane couldn't be beat.  15 minutes from hotel parking lot to Mickey and Friends lot!  One outstanding item for me was the mirror in bathroom.  I love that feature!  One minor inconvenience..room was a little hot at night, but I didn't bother to tell hotel staff or anything, South Coast Plaza is nearby as well.  Little tip for those of you wanting mini van rentals.  Check out
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a Five Star Review about the DoubleTree Santa Ana Airport hotel.  We take our job seriously and want all of our guests to have the best experience they can at our property. *Also, thank you for taking the time to notice our last renovation of our entire lobby which you took the time to write about. *We have just recently repaired some equipment so that all of the rooms will be cold this next summer, but thank you for mentioning that and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Had the best time of my life.... just chillen..... nailz cars and feeling free.... Had an great time staying and an night on the town didnt stay long to travel to all the places but the dinners were great along with my room mate. The Hotel itself ... perfect if needed anything they were there less then 5 mins of your needs and outside of there was too perfect went for an walk the only thing you did need to travel to the beach but the pool on the roof top made up for all that..
Manager Response: TyL, thank you so much for writing such a wonderful review about our DoubleTree Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are pleased that you and your friend had such a great time at our hotel and that you enjoyed our great location and roof top pool.  We are very serious about making certain that all of our guests have a superior experience at our property and are pleased that you did! *Next time you visit, please let me know and I will show you how to get to the beach in only ten minutes from our hotel....Laguna, Newport, Huntington, we are minutes to so many amazing places.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 9 days over New Years.  We had two separate reservations due to arriving earlier than we expected and when we checked in, guest services combined the two reservations into one!  This allowed us to stay the whole time in the same room at the same rate!  Also no checking out and checking back in and getting keys reset!  Very helpful!  We enjoyed breakfast every morning and it was great!  The only issue we had was over the weekend and New Year's Eve, there was only lukewarm water to shower in (not sure if it was because there were so many people showering at the same time or not).  Once New Year's was over, we had no problem with hot water.  The other possible irritant was that the elevators were very slow.  Overall, a great stay and we would definitely
Manager Response: Hello MM Becker and thank you very much for taking the time to write great review about the DoubleTree Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are very serious about taking great care of all of our valued customers and we were pleased to hear that our front desk team was able to help you our with your rooms over New Years. *Glad you mentioned the hot water because there was a part we immediately replaced to make sure everyone has ample hot water no matter how busy we are. *We are waiting for you to come and visit us again, just let us know how we can serve you.

Summary: I recently stayed here for business travel.  The front desk was very helpful in arranging transportation and also helpful in holding my luggage as my flight was not until after check out.  The room was very comfortable and clean however I was awakened in the night as the room had an adjoining door and I could hear every word of the conversation going on in the adjoining room while I was trying to sleep.  I am not sure if they have rooms without adjoining doors, but definitely ask for one if possible. It is the only reason I wouldn't give this hotel a higher rating.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time to write a response for the Double Tree by Hilton Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are glad that our front desk took such good care of you and that your stay was great.  Most of our rooms do no have adjoining rooms, so let us know next time you are traveling on business and we will make certain you get a room that is not adjoining  and notify me personally and I will upgrade you next visit as a way of saying thank you for writing a review.  Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Front Desk staff doesn't even make eye contact
Summary: I stayed here for a few days and brought a large group of people.  I found that the front desk staff was not polite and I received complaints from my group.  It seems as if since they are in a great location, they don't feel the need to be extra friendly.  The room was okay, the manager tried to be helpful, but everything seemed to fall short of my expectations.  Aldo, I got a surprise parking fee when I checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review about the Doubletree by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about our desk and eye contact.  We will certainly mention this to all of our staff as our goal is to always go above and beyond to help all of our guests as their home away from home.  We hope you have the opportunity to visit again and we would love to have you and will make certain your met with a warm greeting and friendly eye contact.  Thank you again for taking the time to post your review.

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay at for business
Summary: I was here for 3 nights for work and I would stay here again. It was easy to get to the main highways and was easy to get all over S. Orange county. The hotel was clean and nice, Room service was fast and the food was good. The room was larger and clean. Of course the cookies were great. The only issue was parking one of the nights I was there, the lot under the hotel was full and had to park in another lot across from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much  for taking the time to write a wonderful review of the DoubleTreeby Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel..We are easy to get to and leave.  We pride ourselves on our exceptionally clean rooms which you pointed out and glad you enjoyed our great food..We actually have many guests that return just for our food and famous "Terry". All of our guests get a fresh baked cookie on check in and glad you enjoyed,  but we are very sorry for any inconvenience when our first parking was full.  We are currently revamping our parking system so even when we are full, it will be easier.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon at your home away from home!

Summary Heading: Tried to make this hotel cool, not cutting it
Summary: At first I thought this hotel was going to be awesome. The lobby looks very cool and you get a cookie.  But then I had to take the elevator up to my room. Waited and waited.  The elevators are so slow. I dread having to go up and down.  The hallways are dark.  They tried to renovate the rooms to be upscale and modern-- but the old hotel shows through. Dirty light switch covers and electric outlets. Shower had tile cracking and rust.  Bed is okay but old and squeaky.  I've definitely stayed in better Doubletree hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, Comfy beds and friendly staff.
Summary: This is a good location, especially if you are flying in and out of Orange Co.  We stayed here 3 nights and we were comfortable and satisfied.  No hitches and the check in/out was smooth.  The bed was really comfy and the A/C worked well.  We were on the top floor and the location of our room was quiet.  This doubletree I think is a little older but they've done renovations and it looks nice on the inside.  I read reviews and a lot of them are not very positive but we were satisfied and we are picky.  Granted we've stayed in nicer hotels but this one was satisfactory to us and we would stay there again.  The only thing we didn't like were the pillows.  They were not comfy at all.  I suppose we could have called the front desk and ask for different ones.  The front desk staff is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Not the Best DoubleTree We Stayed In
Summary: My husband and I did get a great deal during our 1-night stay here. It's clean and seems to have undergone some renovation. We asked for a room in a quiet location. But we were put in a room that overlooked the main road and that meant street noise (namely some dudes on loud motor bikes and the occasional boom-boom ricky racers driving around...and the bus that idled in the bus stop below). So we had only 5.5 hrs of good, quiet sleep - after midnight and before 6 AM. The bed was OK, if you like a softer mattress. The room was clean. Not one of our more memorable restful stays in a DoubleTree.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review of the Double Treeby Hilton, Santa Ana Orange County Airport Hotel.  We are happy you got a "great deal" on your one night stay...and happy that you room was "very clean".  We are very serious about the cleanliness of our sleeping rooms and our hotel as it is  your home away from home. We hope you have the opportunity to come back to visit us soon and we will  have a warm cookie waiting for you and a quiet rooms.

Summary: Upon our arrival at the time of check-in for some reason their signature is a free chocolate chip cookie for each guest! Though it was a tasty cookie, it wasn't a big perk! This Hotel was average! The room was very clean and the bed was VERY comfy. Internet available in the room at an extra fee! In the business district, REALLY? The $15.00 per night parking fee was a bit much. Don't even get me started on the  pool and spa area! It was BAD!! On our second night they were hosting a youth Soccer organization! Kids everywhere! Running and yelling in the halls, playing in the elevators with the luggage dollies and just causing all kind of delays with the elevators. We stayed our 3 nights and only because we booked and payed on-line at a  non-refundable rate! Won't stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stay at this hotel each time I am in Irvine/Santa Ana Location.  It is easy access to the 55, 405, 73 and a short drive to the 5.  Perfect location to get anywhere in about 10-15min (minus the traffic).  The staff is friendly, the parking is easy and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed there for one night for a business trip and better than I thought.  Very clean rooms, helpful staff, great breakfast, close to everything.  It was a Friday night and packed with kids for a soccer tournament but the rooms were quiet. The only downside of the room was that it was hard to find wall sockets for cell phones.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: This actually was the nicest hotel we stayed at during our California road trip.  My GF thoroughly enjoyed the exercise center and our room was fantastic.    My only complaint was the hidden costs.  We got a terrific deal on hotwire for this hotel but it was a little too good to be true.  Parking costed $15 extra and wifi would also have been extra.  Personally I think it would be better to just include essentials such as parking in the overall price rather than using this tactic.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your terrific comments with others who are making their decision where to stay!   We're thrilled to have been dubbed the "nicest hotel you stayed at during your California road trip"  and I'm happy to enjoyed your visit with us.   We offer an array of choices when making reservations so that you can choose what works best for you.  Some people don't have vehicals, so they find the room only deal the right one.  Next time, just look for the packages and discounts that nclude the extras you seek like breakfast,parking etc.  Thanks again for sharing!

Summary: The rooms were clean, the staff and service was fantastic.  The amenities were slightly lacking.  The restaurant is average at best, and while the bartender/server was wonderful, he was the only one there on a Friday night and the poor guy couldn't keep up.  In the morning, I grabbed some coffee to go, and got charged $2.  Really Doubletree??  We can't offer free coffee?  And refills were the same.  I think that's pretty tacky for $100 + a night.  I'm not asking for a Continental spread here, but coffee would be a nice gesture.  If you plan on taking the elevators much, then you should plan on losing several minutes that you can never have back just waiting for them to get there.  Then a few more on your way up or down.  There isn't much at all around the hotel in walking
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments about your recent stay. How wonderful that you found the staff and the service to be "fantastic".  I understand we had a very busy and unexpected evening in the restaurant/lounge and we should have pulled in someone else to assist.  I have addressed this with our food & beverage manager to make sure we have a back-up person on-hand.  As far as free coffee, the hotel offers complimentary Wolfgang Puck coffees in every room!  Thanks again for taking time to post.  We hope to have you back with us again.  And, when you do, give me a buzz and I'll be happy to provide a hot cup of coffee from the restaurant.

Summary: A generic presentation of excellence- and everything that one would has come to expect from this particular hotel chain.  The room was immaculate, the mattress on the king-size bed was very comfortable, and the pillows were to our liking.  There is also a small but nice bar conveniently located on the premises.  However, the primary reason why anybody should consider staying at this hotel is its location.  It is within 15 minutes of Disneyland, Newport Beach, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your comments on Trip Advisor.  We learn so very much when guests share their experience and we use the information to improve service, add amenities and adapt.  It's wonderful when someone takes the time to share all the good news and I'm looking forward to sharing your generous review with my entire staff.  "A presentation of Excellence" is exactly what we strive to do everyday and I'm delighted that your family enjoyed the hotel.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent one night at this Doubletree property during our Callifornia vacation.  The location is easy to find, check-in was easy and the staff were helpful and courteous.  Our rooms were very nice--great beds, plenty of space and a refrigerator.  Only negative was that the walls seem very thin.  This was the 9th hotel stay during our 2 week vacation and the only time we experienced a noise problem. We could very clearly hear their entire conversation of our neighbors next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your high marks about our DoubleTree by Hilton in Santa Ana.  We're proud to provide clean, comfortable rooms with the amenities you want when traveling away from home.  Weekends in the summer time are quite busy and full of activity and I'm sorry you were bothered by noise from the room nextdoor. So glad you found our staff to be helpful and courteous and we hope to be of service to you again!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 2 nights in August 2012. We booked our room at this hotel by bidding on Priceline.  Pros: The hotel location is great, a nice break from metro Los Angeles. The hotel front desk staff is nice for the most part. The housekeeping staff are sweethearts. There are refrigerators in the rooms. Comfortable beds, clean rooms and lobby.  Cons: $15/day parking fee. No microwaves in te rooms. No free wifi.  PAPER THIN walls of which screaming children woke us up the first night.   If you can get this hotel for a low rate to offset the parking fees, do not hesitate!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting you great comments about your recent stay with us.  I'm delighted that your family enjoyed the hotel, the location and found it to be a good value!  We learn valuable things from guests who post on Trip Advisor and because of comments like yours, we're in the process of installing small refrigerators in every room!  Enjoy the rest of your summer and we hope to welcome you back again!

Summary: For the very good price I scored via Priceline, I was pleased.  The location is close to the airport and freeways so score points there.  The rooms are spacious for two people. Nice flat screen TV, small coffee maker, a desk and ample closet.  The bed was among the most comfortable I have had away from home!  The climate control was a bit difficult to program, and I am not by any means clueless when it comes to electronics.  It was just off in terms of programming.  The parking fee is ridiculous, but for some reason there was no one tendingthebooth, so i we sever charged.  No idea why ythat happened so I happily saved $30 for two days of parking.  The wireless charge of $11 (tax included) should be illegal, and is perhaps my only real complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post your comments on Trip Advisor.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  The Sweet Dreams Sleep  experience is  often commented on as incredibly comfortable and you will find them at every DoubleTree location! I'm sorry the A/C wasn't programmed properly.We'll make a point to have our maintenance team check each room.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Enjoyable for a simple overnight stay.
Summary: Just stayed one night. Hotel is very clean and up to date. Had a good and quiet night sleep on a friday night. We got a good rate by using the hotels tonight app. Self parking is $15. We ordered room service around 930pm, but food didn't take long and was tasty.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience on Trip Advisor!  I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to welcome you back!

Summary: Stayed here a night for a business trip.  The property is beautiful.  While the view from my room wasn't much, the room itself was very nice, comfortable and clean.  Ate in the restaurant which was one of the best hotel meals I have had although the service was a bit spotty.  The food was great.  Would stay here again without question.
Manager Response: Thank you vey much for posting your positive comments about your stay!  We're proud of our hotel and very happy that you enjoyed your visit with us.  I'll pass along your great comment about the food to our chef.  He's recently changed the menu offerings and we're getting very good feedback.  Please come back and visit again soon!

Summary: I chose this property because of its location near the Orange County airport.  Access from MacArthur is a little confusing but once you're on the property there is self-parking beneath the hotel with an elevator to the lobby area.  Check-in was fast and the trainee working the front desk was professional yet personable.  My room on the 7th floor was very, very small.  With two beds crammed into the limited space, it took some fancy footwork to be able to reach the HVAC controls.  Airflow was weak, very little cooling resulted, and throughout the night I was bothered by the musty odor.  The bed was comfortable and the duvet was clean.  The room itself appeared to have been updated (new carpeting) but the walls were scuffed.  The bathroom was adequate in size and was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your comments on Trip Advisor.  We strive to provide great service and comfortable, clean accomodations and I'm glad you had positive feedback about those.  I am terribly sorry that the HVAC wasn't working properly in your room.  We recently discovered that programming was changed in a few rooms and have since corrected that issue.  We also changed out all air filters to ensure that the air is clean and we've got a regular schedule on-going to prevent any issues. Most of our rooms are good size but we do have a handful of rooms that, due to their location, are smaller.  If your travels bring you back to the OC, please contact me directly and I'll upgrade your accomodations to the best available room.  Thank you again for sharing.

Summary: Every time I stop in a Hilton, I am reminded why I prefer Marriott. This is OK - some of the staff were great.....but (1) both nights were spoiled with strange vibrating noises that sounded like someone above me had their mobile phone on continuous vibrate...(2) wireless internet laughably slow, won't allow any YouTube videos to run at all (3) Overzealous breakfast staff clear your table when your back is turned (4) The restaurant may be called Bordeaux, but nary a French wine to be had, and ...oh yes (5) elevators soooo slow. Only (1) and (2) could be classified as really obnoxious. But Marriott next time, sorry.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments and experience on Trip Advisor.  I am sorry that we failed to provide excellent service during your recent stay.  Noise from another guest room is horrible and the fact that the internet and elevators were slow must have been frustrating.  The elevators are a bit slower that some but it's not something that causes guest complaints.  The internet on the other hand is a big concern.  After getting a few comments and reading your post, we looked into the issue and found that one of our receivers was off-line, affecting a handful of rooms.  I am sorry that you were inconvenienced and would like to offer a discount on a future stay.  Please contact me directly the next time your travels bring you to Orange County and I'll be delighted to handle your reservation personally.  Thank you for posting and I hope to hear from you.

Summary Heading: Unacceptable service and horrible customer service.
Summary: My husband is the best man and our 5 year old daughter is the flower girl in our friends wedding tomorrow. The ENTIRE wedding party and their spouses, several family members & friends booked rooms with this hotel! We drove up from San Diego after work, arrived around 9:30pm, only to be told that they didn't have our room reservation nor did they have one single room in the entire hotel available. Not ONE!?!? They pretty much said we were SOL and to take all of our stuff (dresses, tuxedo, suitcases, etc.), with our very tired 5 year old, and go to another hotel for tonight! We need to be at a salon by 8am tomorrow and now not only are we farther away, but I don't have a room to get ready in tomorrow. And all we were offered was compensated $15 parking and a breakfast we won't
Manager Response: What a horrible thing to happen! Drive a long distance and arrive at the hotel with no reservation and no rooms available.  DoubleTree by Hilton, and all Hilton hotels issue confirmations for guest room reservations- either verbally or by email.  We have a strict policy for confirmed reservations and certainly would have had a room for you if we had record of yours.  How did you make your reservation?  I'm wondering if you made the reservation at a different DoubleTree nearby?  And, even with no reservation, we would gladly accomodate guests whenever rooms are unoccupied.  I am sorry that you had this experience and wish I knew more detail.  Thank you for sharing.

Summary: Was stranded in SNA due to horrible security and their ridiculous noise ordinance, so I popped over to this hotel. Location is very nice proximity to the airport (had a early flight the next morning). The room was clean with a very nice view and the rate was great, esp. for OC. I found the pool and exercise area to be very small, but since that was not my main focus, I was ok with it. The hotel is not too far from many shops / eateries. Would definately stay there as a business traveler again, but probably not a family spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your positive review of the DoubleTree Santa Ana-Orange County Airport.  Our goal is always to provide great customer service, comfortable accomodations and a good value.  Hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: I booked my stay months in advance and had a family emergency less than an hour after there 24hr cancelation policy. Hotel manager said 'no way' and charged me anyway. Best part is that they won't send me a receipt (I've been on hold for a half hour) and you don't get credit for the stay even though you pay full price. I moved to Hyatt last year and the customer service has been spot on and very accomodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments on Trip Advisor.  I was disappointed to learn that we lost your business because we didnheld firm on our cancellation policy.   Although we do have a 24-hour cancellation policy, perhaps we could have made an exception for you and I'm sorry that I wasn't made aware of your disappointment at the time. When your travels bring you back to the OC, please contact me directly and I will be happy to handle your arrangements and would enjoy meeting you. DB

Summary Heading: Slowest elevators on earth, chraged me twice
Summary: Elevators were slowest elevators on earth, the bus shuttle runs on a terrible schedule, and lastly they charged me for my room even though I had prepaid throuh a different website!  Also the bathtub at my house is larger then the pool.  Very dissappointed I have stayed at Doubletree's all over the country and never been upset with my choice until this last trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed here last weekend, The lobby and ballrooms were under construction, the smell of glue and paint permeated the lower floors, No notice of this at reservation or check in.  As with most business (M-F) hotels the weekend is slow so there were some youth teams booked in. The mornings and evenings were noisy making it hard to relax with the activity and noise in the halls. Service was good and rooms are in clean current condition.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: A nice hotel.  Nothing particularly special, but not anything bad either.  Everything done right.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Like Hiltons, everything cost extra. Parking fee Internet  Nice location, near the 55 and John Wayne airport.  Great breakfast and restutant.  The cookies are not as warm and fresh as most DT.  No fridges in te room, and lack of power outlets were issues for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a conference June 3-7th 2012.  I was in room 422.  1. The room keys are of poor quality. No matter how slow or fast you insert them, it takes about 10 tries to get into your room, pool, fitness center, anywhere. I actually had to have housekeeping let me into the fitness center because the key didn't work. 2. The breakfast potatoes in the breakfast buffet have no flavor. How you screw up something so simple I'm not sure. 3. The bathroom exhaust vent in room 422 had no suction, I actually had to prop the door open to air out the room. 4. The elevators are slow.  But wait till you hear this! Housekeeping took my pajamas out with the bed sheets one day. I called the front desk at midnight, was told they would call back, but they never did. Called the next
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: We stayed here one night before an early flight the next morning. We often stay at Doubletree hotels, but this is seriously the nicest Doubletree I have ever seen! The lobby is spectacular. And even though it is close to the airport, we never heard any noise, either from inside or outside the hotel.  We slept wonderfully. I wanted to take the bed home it was so comfortable, and I own a expensive Tempurpedic mattress!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The staff were friendly,and the rooms emaculate, up to date and comfortable.  The location was great...right near South Coast Plaza and the 55. The front desk and Carlos (?) helped me locate a charger since I forgot mine..  BRAVO!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: My room was well furnished, well maintained and clean.  The hardwire worked decently.  The location is convenient to the airport and Irvine.  The self parking (a bit high at $15) is not convenient to the rooms.  You have to take an elevator from the self parking below the hotel to the lobby, then weave through the lobby and the conference/event area to get to the elevators to the guest rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Hotel was decent for a business stay, and was convenient to get to and from the airport.  The rooms were okay, and beds were comfortable.  I would have thought for a nicer hotel they would of had valet, but they did not, so that was disappointing.  Also, the food in the restaurant was not good at all.  I had the chicken and penne pasta, I would not recommend eating there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Check in staff were unfriendly, and unhelpful when my claustrophobic wife had difficulty with the elevators (elevators are old, shabby, small, and smelled of smoke).  There are stairs only usable during the day (and for emergency exit) but were locked and they struggled to figure out how to open them.    The room was recently renovated but still had low ceilings and had not had air circulation so was very stuffy.  Hallway also smelled of smoke.  Decided to write off our payment (prepaid via Hotwire) and not stay at the hotel.    While we were telling them we would leave another check in agent was arguing with a visitor who had a parking pass.  The visitor was told that “new management would not accept any previous arrangements and everyone had to pay for parking” all said in a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stay at this hotel on all my business trips to Orange County. The Hotel is very nice and the staff is fantastic. The bartender Terry has been there since the hotel opened and is a tremendous asset to the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice, but be ready for the nickel and dime treatment
Summary: This property is a bit of an enigma.   The pros: - clean and reasonably attractive - good location - very comfortable bed and pillows - good service at check in  The cons: - $15/day for parking - $10/day for internet - No breakfast included - There were some spots on my carpet  It's a nice hotel, but definitely one of those "nickel and dime" places. These types of hotels try to act like you are the most important person in their world, but then they charge you for every little thing that even less expensive hotels do not. Internet + parking = add $25/day to the tab. I guess that's ok if you don't have a car or a computer. Internet speeds were on the lower side, too. The round modern $5/bottle water looked very attractive! Luckily I didn't drink *that* water. The very attractive
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel five minutes from the John Wayne/Orange County Airport
Summary: The hotel is very close to the John Wayne airport and is very easy to find. You would figure a hotel that is very close to the airport you would hear a lot of plane traffic. Interestingly,  during my overnight stay, I never heard one plane.  We arrived at the hotel on Saturday May 5, at 5:00pm and the check in was quick and easy with a very friendly staff. When we arrived, there was a beautiful large wedding going on. It was kind of strange that the hotels main ballroom was right outside of the front desk. There were a lot of the wedding attendees out in the hotel lobby, so we had to maneuver around them to get to the elevators. They were very courteous and we had no problem moving through the crowd. I looked into the main ballroom and it was large and absolutely beautiful.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: I stay at this hotel on a regular basis for business and really like it.  Its location is good and they have plenty of parking.  There are few restaurants across the street along with a Starbucks.  They also have a restaurant which has a good breakfast and a bar area.  The rooms are well kept and the service is good as well.  The corner rooms are really great.  The pricing is good and would recommend this hotel for both business and pleasure travel.  Side note…there is a Doubletree Club hotel right down the street from this one and I would definitely pick this hotel over the Club hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: Stayed overnight for pleasure, and found our room waiting as reserved.  There was a slight mix-up at check-in, but we are Hilton Gold Members so the issue was quickly rectified.  Room was clean and comfortable, and the breakfast the next morning a welcome treat.  If you are in Orange County for business, or pleasure, this property would be an good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and sharing your feedback.

Summary: The Doubletree OC Airport (MacArthur Blvd) is very convenient to the airport!  Shuttle service prompt and efficient! Beautiful facility!
